trans-unit.source: You will not get paid for delivering cargo if any of the cargo goes missing or gets damaged during the transport.
trans-unit.target: You will not get paid for delivering cargo if any of the cargo goes missing or gets damaged during the transport.

trans-unit.source: Generating more power than the devices in the submarine are consuming may damage junction boxes or cause fires.
trans-unit.target: Generating more power than the devices in the submarine are consuming may damage junction boxes or cause fires.

trans-unit.source: Junction boxes and other electrical devices may get damaged if they stay submerged too long.
trans-unit.target: Junction boxes and other electrical devices may get damaged if they stay submerged too long.

trans-unit.source: Letting the submarine's nuclear reactor overheat may cause fires. If an overheated reactor is not shut down, it will eventually lead to a nuclear meltdown.
trans-unit.target: Letting the submarine's nuclear reactor overheat may cause fires. If an overheated reactor is not shut down, it will eventually lead to a nuclear meltdown.

trans-unit.source: Most submarines are equipped with stationary batteries that can be used as a temporary source of backup power in the case of a reactor failure.
trans-unit.target: Most submarines are equipped with stationary batteries that can be used as a temporary source of backup power in the case of a reactor failure.

trans-unit.source: Railgun shells and depth charges include a compartment that can hold additional explosives.
trans-unit.target: Railgun shells and depth charges include a compartment that can hold additional explosives.

trans-unit.source: Passive sonar can be used to detect nearby sound sources without attracting unwanted attention. You can also get a rough idea of your surroundings based on the sounds reflected from the ice walls.
trans-unit.target: Passive sonar can be used to detect nearby sound sources without attracting unwanted attention. You can also get a rough idea of your surroundings based on the sounds reflected from the ice walls.

trans-unit.source: There are many ways to get past locked doors, including forcing them open with a crowbar or rewiring them to a button you have access to.
trans-unit.target: There are many ways to get past locked doors, including forcing them open with a crowbar or rewiring them to a button you have access to.

trans-unit.source: Stationary batteries are equipped with docks that can be used to charge battery cells.
trans-unit.target: Stationary batteries are equipped with docks that can be used to charge battery cells.

trans-unit.source: Oxygen generators are equipped with docks that can be used to refill oxygen tanks.
trans-unit.target: Oxygen generators are equipped with docks that can be used to refill oxygen tanks.

trans-unit.source: Supercapacitors can deliver large bursts of power, but cannot store as much energy as batteries. They are often used to power railguns and other devices that require brief bursts of high current.
trans-unit.target: Supercapacitors can deliver large bursts of power, but cannot store as much energy as batteries. They are often used to power railguns and other devices that require brief bursts of high current.

trans-unit.source: Nuclear reactors are equipped with an automatic control system that adjusts the power output to a suitable level when enabled. However, the system is not always fast enough to react to large fluctuations in power consumption.
trans-unit.target: Nuclear reactors are equipped with an automatic control system that adjusts the power output to a suitable level when enabled. However, the system is not always fast enough to react to large fluctuations in power consumption.

trans-unit.source: The sonar imaging on the navigation terminal may become inaccurate if the terminal is damaged—make sure your engineers keep the terminal in a good condition!
trans-unit.target: The sonar imaging on the navigation terminal may become inaccurate if the terminal is damaged—make sure your engineers keep the terminal in a good condition!

trans-unit.source: When deploying a decoy, be sure to deactivate your active sonar for best results.
trans-unit.target: When deploying a decoy, be sure to deactivate your active sonar for best results.

trans-unit.source: Attempting to rewire powered devices without adequate electrical engineering skills may get you electrocuted.
trans-unit.target: Attempting to rewire powered devices without adequate electrical engineering skills may get you electrocuted.

trans-unit.source: Welding tools are simple enough to be used by any submariner, but trained mechanics are generally faster welders and have a lower risk of injuring themselves with the tool.
trans-unit.target: Welding tools are simple enough to be used by any submariner, but trained mechanics are generally faster welders and have a lower risk of injuring themselves with the tool.

trans-unit.source: All submariners have been trained to do basic repairs on electrical devices, but electrical engineers get the job done much faster.
trans-unit.target: All submariners have been trained to do basic repairs on electrical devices, but electrical engineers get the job done much faster.

trans-unit.source: All submariners have been trained to do basic repairs on mechanical devices, but mechanics get the job done much faster.
trans-unit.target: All submariners have been trained to do basic repairs on mechanical devices, but mechanics get the job done much faster.

trans-unit.source: Captains are generally much more adept at maneuvering the submarine than the average sailor.
trans-unit.target: Captains are generally much more adept at maneuvering the submarine than the average sailor.

trans-unit.source: If the reactor on a sub is not able to produce sufficient power to run all onboard systems, try reducing the charge rate for the onboard batteries and supercapacitors, or regulate the times when the sub is running at full speed.
trans-unit.target: If the reactor on a sub is not able to produce sufficient power to run all onboard systems, try reducing the charge rate for the onboard batteries and supercapacitors, or regulate the times when the sub is running at full speed.

trans-unit.source: The electrical and mechanical systems on a sub will gradually degrade due to the harsh conditions and constant wear and tear. Be sure to have mechanics and engineers perform maintenance from time to time in order to avoid breakdowns at inopportune moments.
trans-unit.target: The electrical and mechanical systems on a sub will gradually degrade due to the harsh conditions and constant wear and tear. Be sure to have mechanics and engineers perform maintenance from time to time in order to avoid breakdowns at inopportune moments.

trans-unit.source: Breaking down alien artifacts in a deconstructor may provide you with exotic raw materials.
trans-unit.target: Breaking down alien artifacts in a deconstructor may provide you with exotic raw materials.

trans-unit.source: Some of the alien structures on Europa have been constructed of a metamaterial that's outstandingly resistant to physical damage, and as such has become an important subject of research to Europan scientists.
trans-unit.target: Some of the alien structures on Europa have been constructed of a metamaterial that's outstandingly resistant to physical damage, and as such has become an important subject of research to Europan scientists.

trans-unit.source: Special caution must be taken when bringing alien artifacts on board the submarine.
trans-unit.target: Special caution must be taken when bringing alien artifacts on board the submarine.

trans-unit.source: Very little is known of the presumably extinct alien civilization that built the ruins scattered all across Europa. The age of the ruins is also a mystery, since the self-repairing properties of the structures and devices make chronological dating methods wildly inaccurate.
trans-unit.target: Very little is known of the presumably extinct alien civilization that built the ruins scattered all across Europa. The age of the ruins is also a mystery, since the self-repairing properties of the structures and devices make chronological dating methods wildly inaccurate.

trans-unit.source: No remains of the alien lifeforms that built the ruins scattered all across Europa have ever been discovered. The only life encountered inside the structures are the biomechanical entities that maintain and guard them.
trans-unit.target: No remains of the alien lifeforms that built the ruins scattered all across Europa have ever been discovered. The only life encountered inside the structures are the biomechanical entities that maintain and guard them.

trans-unit.source: While exploring ruins or caves, drop flares as often as possible to help mark a path out, should you need to make a hasty exit for some reason.
trans-unit.target: While exploring ruins or caves, drop flares as often as possible to help mark a path out, should you need to make a hasty exit for some reason.

trans-unit.source: Watchers are docile but inquisitive creatures: Despite having no desire to attack submarines, they frequently approach ships to gaze at human activities.
trans-unit.target: Watchers are docile but inquisitive creatures: Despite having no desire to attack submarines, they frequently approach ships to gaze at human activities.

trans-unit.source: Cannibalistic behavior is very common among crawlers. Killing one in a swarm may distract the rest as they enter into a feeding frenzy.
trans-unit.target: Cannibalistic behavior is very common among crawlers. Killing one in a swarm may distract the rest as they enter into a feeding frenzy.

trans-unit.source: Mudraptors can easily tear their way through metal doors with their sharp beaks.
trans-unit.target: Mudraptors can easily tear their way through metal doors with their sharp beaks.

trans-unit.source: The so-called husk parasites slowly take over and consume the body of their host, eventually turning them into nothing but an empty exoskeleton controlled by the parasite.
trans-unit.target: The so-called husk parasites slowly take over and consume the body of their host, eventually turning them into nothing but an empty exoskeleton controlled by the parasite.

trans-unit.source: Many creatures on Europa are protected by a strong shell, and are difficult to damage with conventional weapons, though there may be weak points in their armor.
trans-unit.target: Many creatures on Europa are protected by a strong shell, and are difficult to damage with conventional weapons, though there may be weak points in their armor.

trans-unit.source: Loud devices and sonar pings may alert nearby creatures.
trans-unit.target: Loud devices and sonar pings may alert nearby creatures.

trans-unit.source: Performing CPR without adequate medical skills may cause internal damage to the patient.
trans-unit.target: Performing CPR without adequate medical skills may cause internal damage to the patient.

trans-unit.source: Opiates such as morphine and fentanyl are an effective way of treating injuries in an emergency, but regular use may eventually lead to a state of addiction and cause dangerous withdrawal symptoms.
trans-unit.target: Opiates such as morphine and fentanyl are an effective way of treating injuries in an emergency, but regular use may eventually lead to a state of addiction and cause dangerous withdrawal symptoms.

trans-unit.source: Bleeding wounds can be treated with bandages and hemostatic agents. The patient may also need saline or blood packs to replace the lost blood.
trans-unit.target: Bleeding wounds can be treated with bandages and hemostatic agents. The patient may also need saline or blood packs to replace the lost blood.

trans-unit.source: Mental disorders such as psychosis are unfortunately common among submarine crews, particularly after ruin expeditions. If your crewmates start seeing or hearing things others don't see or hear, report it to a medical doctor immediately.
trans-unit.target: Mental disorders such as psychosis are unfortunately common among submarine crews, particularly after ruin expeditions. If your crewmates start seeing or hearing things others don't see or hear, report it to a medical doctor immediately.

trans-unit.source: The medical doctors' main task is to keep the crew in a good shape, but a medic with a syringe gun and a bit of knowhow on poisons can also be very useful in fending off intruders.
trans-unit.target: The medical doctors' main task is to keep the crew in a good shape, but a medic with a syringe gun and a bit of knowhow on poisons can also be very useful in fending off intruders.

trans-unit.source: Many drugs may have unintended side effects. Keep an eye on the patient and be ready to administer additional medications to counteract these side effects if necessary.
trans-unit.target: Many drugs may have unintended side effects. Keep an eye on the patient and be ready to administer additional medications to counteract these side effects if necessary.

trans-unit.source: When using a diving mask, be careful not to mix up welding fuel tanks and oxygen tanks.
trans-unit.target: When using a diving mask, be careful not to mix up welding fuel tanks and oxygen tanks.

trans-unit.source: Diving masks let you breathe underwater, but don't offer any protection against the bone-crushing pressure outside the submarine. If there's a major hull breach, find a diving suit immediately.
trans-unit.target: Diving masks let you breathe underwater, but don't offer any protection against the bone-crushing pressure outside the submarine. If there's a major hull breach, find a diving suit immediately.

trans-unit.source: In the event of a fire, burns are not the only thing to watch out for—fires can quickly consume all the oxygen inside the submarine.
trans-unit.target: In the event of a fire, burns are not the only thing to watch out for—fires can quickly consume all the oxygen inside the submarine.

trans-unit.source: Traversing the so-called Hydrothermal Wastes requires special caution. Not only are they abundant in wildlife, but the water currents caused by geothermal activity make navigation even more hazardous.
trans-unit.target: Traversing the so-called Hydrothermal Wastes requires special caution. Not only are they abundant in wildlife, but the water currents caused by geothermal activity make navigation even more hazardous.

trans-unit.source: Some of the sessile lifeforms in Europa emit low-frequency sounds that may disrupt the submarine's sonar.
trans-unit.target: Some of the sessile lifeforms in Europa emit low-frequency sounds that may disrupt the submarine's sonar.

trans-unit.source: Europa is rich in natural resources, and an enterprising captain with a sharp eye and a plasma cutter may stand to make a tidy profit.
trans-unit.target: Europa is rich in natural resources, and an enterprising captain with a sharp eye and a plasma cutter may stand to make a tidy profit.

trans-unit.source: You can disguise yourself as someone else by wearing their ID card and something that covers your face.
trans-unit.target: You can disguise yourself as someone else by wearing their ID card and something that covers your face.

trans-unit.source: It's possible to build voice-controlled systems by linking wifi components to the radio chat in the submarine editor.
trans-unit.target: It's possible to build voice-controlled systems by linking wifi components to the radio chat in the submarine editor.

trans-unit.source: The radiation belts around Jupiter make it impracticable to establish permanent settlements above Europa's surface, and as such almost all Europan outposts are located below its icy crust.
trans-unit.target: The radiation belts around Jupiter make it impracticable to establish permanent settlements above Europa's surface, and as such almost all Europan outposts are located below its icy crust.

trans-unit.source: The dynamics of Europa's underwater ecosystem are still not fully understood, but it is believed that the base of the food chain is mostly formed by chemosynthetic bacteria.
trans-unit.target: The dynamics of Europa's underwater ecosystem are still not fully understood, but it is believed that the base of the food chain is mostly formed by chemosynthetic bacteria.

trans-unit.source: The Europa Coalition started off as a trade and cooperation agreement between the two largest Europan settlements and a handful of private paramilitary groups, but gradually grew to become what is essentially the Europan government.
trans-unit.target: The Europa Coalition started off as a trade and cooperation agreement between the two largest Europan settlements and a handful of private paramilitary groups, but gradually grew to become what is essentially the Europan government.

trans-unit.source: The much-ridiculed initiative to help submariners cope in a high-stress environment by including professional entertainers in the crews was promptly deemed a failure and discontinued.
trans-unit.target: The much-ridiculed initiative to help submariners cope in a high-stress environment by including professional entertainers in the crews was promptly deemed a failure and discontinued.

trans-unit.source: Most vessels avoid venturing outside the tunnels and cracks within Europa's icy crust—the vast, empty Abyss between the surface layers and the rocky interior hosts many of Europa's largest and most dangerous inhabitants.
trans-unit.target: Most vessels avoid venturing outside the tunnels and cracks within Europa's icy crust—the vast, empty Abyss between the surface layers and the rocky interior hosts many of Europa's largest and most dangerous inhabitants.

trans-unit.source: If left undisturbed for several years, a colony of ballast flora can eventually grow into a Thalamus, an intelligent organism capable of exerting some degree of control over the systems of the submarine it's inhabiting.
trans-unit.target: If left undisturbed for several years, a colony of ballast flora can eventually grow into a Thalamus, an intelligent organism capable of exerting some degree of control over the systems of the submarine it's inhabiting.

trans-unit.source: You can give context-sensitive commands when the cursor is over a usable object by holding down shift and opening the command interface.
trans-unit.target: You can give context-sensitive commands when the cursor is over a usable object by holding down shift and opening the command interface.

trans-unit.source: Making trouble at an outpost hurts your reputation. A bad reputation might cause the inhabitants of the outpost to charge you a premium for their services, or, in more extreme cases, lead to a confrontation with their security.
trans-unit.target: Making trouble at an outpost hurts your reputation. A bad reputation might cause the inhabitants of the outpost to charge you a premium for their services, or, in more extreme cases, lead to a confrontation with their security.

trans-unit.source: Many Europan outposts don't recognize the Coalition's authority, although it is still powerful enough that few dare to openly oppose it. However, there are groups such as the Jovian Separatists who do fight against it, aiming to bring it down and create a more democratic society.
trans-unit.target: Many Europan outposts don't recognize the Coalition's authority, although it is still powerful enough that few dare to openly oppose it. However, there are groups such as the Jovian Separatists who do fight against it, aiming to bring it down and create a more democratic society.

trans-unit.source: Behold the Watcher. Don't lose your mind.
trans-unit.target: Behold the Watcher. Don't lose your mind.

trans-unit.source: Straddling the border between surface ice and the denser, rockier subsurface ice layer, the Europan Ridge is the area along the western-most slope of the Eye of Europa. Warmer water is convected into this area, allowing a wider array of life to subsist.
trans-unit.target: Straddling the border between surface ice and the denser, rockier subsurface ice layer, the Europan Ridge is the area along the western-most slope of the Eye of Europa. Warmer water is convected into this area, allowing a wider array of life to subsist.

trans-unit.source: The Aphotic Plateau sits atop the western rim of an ancient impact crater known as the Eye of Europa. As with the neighboring Europan Ridge, the Plateau’s tunnel networks consist mostly of dark, rocky ice pressed as hard as any stone by the unimaginable weight of the ice above it.
trans-unit.target: The Aphotic Plateau sits atop the western rim of an ancient impact crater known as the Eye of Europa. As with the neighboring Europan Ridge, the Plateau’s tunnel networks consist mostly of dark, rocky ice pressed as hard as any stone by the unimaginable weight of the ice above it.

trans-unit.source: Most of the human habitation on Europa is situated in the so-called Cold Caverns. Due to the cold water and relative proximity to the surface, this biome is biologically less diverse than others, primarily hosting moderate concentrations of crawlers and practically no vegetation.
trans-unit.target: Most of the human habitation on Europa is situated in the so-called Cold Caverns. Due to the cold water and relative proximity to the surface, this biome is biologically less diverse than others, primarily hosting moderate concentrations of crawlers and practically no vegetation.

trans-unit.source: Ice spires are enormous icy projections that sometimes burst through the subsurface tunnels under Europa's crust. Submarine crews are advised to avoid any contact with the spires, or to destroy any they come across, as the sharp edges can easily tear through a submarine's hull.
trans-unit.target: Ice spires are enormous icy projections that sometimes burst through the subsurface tunnels under Europa's crust. Submarine crews are advised to avoid any contact with the spires, or to destroy any they come across, as the sharp edges can easily tear through a submarine's hull.

trans-unit.source: The poorly understood "Piezo Crystals" found in The Great Sea pose some extra challenges to crews travelling through the region: Navigating too close to one may cause disruptions in the submarine's electrical grid.
trans-unit.target: The poorly understood "Piezo Crystals" found in The Great Sea pose some extra challenges to crews travelling through the region: Navigating too close to one may cause disruptions in the submarine's electrical grid.

trans-unit.source: Administering drugs without sufficient medical knowledge may reduce the quality of the effects of the drug.
trans-unit.target: Administering drugs without sufficient medical knowledge may reduce the quality of the effects of the drug.

trans-unit.source: Generating more power than your sub's devices require leads to overvoltage, which can be used to push some devices (such as engines and pumps) past their normal capacity. However, a too-high voltage level may also damage devices.
trans-unit.target: Generating more power than your sub's devices require leads to overvoltage, which can be used to push some devices (such as engines and pumps) past their normal capacity. However, a too-high voltage level may also damage devices.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to return to the main menu? All your unsaved progress will be lost.
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to return to the main menu? All your unsaved progress will be lost.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to stop the mission and load the previous save file? All your unsaved progress will be lost.
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to stop the mission and load the previous save file? All your unsaved progress will be lost.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to return to the main menu? All your unsaved progress will be lost.
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to return to the main menu? All your unsaved progress will be lost.

trans-unit.source: If you quit now, you will lose the progress you've made during the round, and you'll have to start the mission from the beginning when continuing the campaign. Are you sure you want to quit?
trans-unit.target: If you quit now, you will lose the progress you've made during the round, and you'll have to start the mission from the beginning when continuing the campaign. Are you sure you want to quit?

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to save the game and return to the server lobby?
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to save the game and return to the server lobby?

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to save the game and return to the main menu?
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to save the game and return to the main menu?

trans-unit.source: The port used to communicate with clients. If clients fail to connect to your server, you may need to enable UPnP port forwarding or forward the port manually.
trans-unit.target: The port used to communicate with clients. If clients fail to connect to your server, you may need to enable UPnP port forwarding or forward the port manually.

trans-unit.source: The port used to communicate with Steam's server browser and respond to info pings from clients. If clients don't see your server in the server list or if authenticating their Steam ID fails, you may need to enable UPnP port forwarding or forward the port manually.
trans-unit.target: The port used to communicate with Steam's server browser and respond to info pings from clients. If clients don't see your server in the server list or if authenticating their Steam ID fails, you may need to enable UPnP port forwarding or forward the port manually.

trans-unit.source: Public servers are shown in the list of available servers in the "Server Browser."
trans-unit.target: Public servers are shown in the list of available servers in the "Server Browser."

trans-unit.source: UPnP can be used for forwarding ports on your router to allow players to join the server. However, UPnP isn't supported by all routers, so you may need to setup port forwards manually if players are unable to join the server (see the readme for instructions).
trans-unit.target: UPnP can be used for forwarding ports on your router to allow players to join the server. However, UPnP isn't supported by all routers, so you may need to setup port forwards manually if players are unable to join the server (see the readme for instructions).

trans-unit.source: The version of the game executable (v[gameversion]) does not match the content (v[contentversion]). This may happen if you're using a mod that overrides the game executable, and the mod has not been updated to match the vanilla game content. Using a mismatching executable may result in various issues, including crashes and save file corruption.
trans-unit.target: The version of the game executable (v[gameversion]) does not match the content (v[contentversion]). This may happen if you're using a mod that overrides the game executable, and the mod has not been updated to match the vanilla game content. Using a mismatching executable may result in various issues, including crashes and save file corruption.

trans-unit.source: Do you still want to launch [exename]?
trans-unit.target: Do you still want to launch [exename]?

trans-unit.source: Embark on a journey through the depths of Europa. Travel from location to location, complete missions to earn money for supplies, discover new biomes…
trans-unit.target: Embark on a journey through the depths of Europa. Travel from location to location, complete missions to earn money for supplies, discover new biomes…

trans-unit.source: A game mode with no specific objectives.
trans-unit.target: A game mode with no specific objectives.

trans-unit.source: The crew must work together to complete a single mission, such as retrieving an alien artifact or killing a creature that's terrorizing nearby outposts.
trans-unit.target: The crew must work together to complete a single mission, such as retrieving an alien artifact or killing a creature that's terrorizing nearby outposts.

trans-unit.source: Embark on a journey through the depths of Europa. Travel from location to location, complete missions to earn money for supplies, discover new biomes…
trans-unit.target: Embark on a journey through the depths of Europa. Travel from location to location, complete missions to earn money for supplies, discover new biomes…

trans-unit.source: You haven't subscribed to any mods on the Steam Workshop. Select the "Popular Mods" tab to find some!
trans-unit.target: You haven't subscribed to any mods on the Steam Workshop. Select the "Popular Mods" tab to find some!

trans-unit.source: You can use this tab to publish new items in the Steam Workshop. You can select a submarine or a content package to publish from the "Your items" menu at the left.
trans-unit.target: You can use this tab to publish new items in the Steam Workshop. You can select a submarine or a content package to publish from the "Your items" menu at the left.

trans-unit.source: Core packages are special content packages that contain all the core files (executables, configuration files) the game won't run without. There must always be one (and only one) core package selected. Only select this if you wish to create a mod that replaces all the Vanilla files. Mods that only add things to the Vanilla game (or another core package) should not be marked as core packages.
trans-unit.target: Core packages are special content packages that contain all the core files (executables, configuration files) the game won't run without. There must always be one (and only one) core package selected. Only select this if you wish to create a mod that replaces all the Vanilla files. Mods that only add things to the Vanilla game (or another core package) should not be marked as core packages.

trans-unit.source: You're publishing an update for an existing Workshop item. You can use the change note to explain what's new in the update.
trans-unit.target: You're publishing an update for an existing Workshop item. You can use the change note to explain what's new in the update.

trans-unit.source: Deletes the item from Steam Workshop.
trans-unit.target: Deletes the item from Steam Workshop.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete the item "[itemname]" from the Steam Workshop?
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to delete the item "[itemname]" from the Steam Workshop?

trans-unit.source: Uploads the files to the Steam Workshop.
trans-unit.target: Uploads the files to the Steam Workshop.

trans-unit.source: File will be included in the Workshop item.
trans-unit.target: File will be included in the Workshop item.

trans-unit.source: File is not present in the Workshop item folder and will not be included in the Workshop item. This may be desirable if you want the mod to use Vanilla files that the players already have—otherwise you should copy the file to the Workshop item folder.
trans-unit.target: File is not present in the Workshop item folder and will not be included in the Workshop item. This may be desirable if you want the mod to use Vanilla files that the players already have—otherwise you should copy the file to the Workshop item folder.

trans-unit.source: Workshop items are only allowed to modify files in the Mod folder or add submarine files to the Submarines folder. Please create a separate subfolder for the files.
trans-unit.target: Workshop items are only allowed to modify files in the Mod folder or add submarine files to the Submarines folder. Please create a separate subfolder for the files.

trans-unit.source: Reload the configuration file of the Workshop item (filelist.xml inside the item's folder) and add all new files in it to the file list.
trans-unit.target: Reload the configuration file of the Workshop item (filelist.xml inside the item's folder) and add all new files in it to the file list.

trans-unit.source: [itemname] is now available in the Steam Workshop!
trans-unit.target: [itemname] is now available in the Steam Workshop!

trans-unit.source: Publishing "[itemname]" in the Steam Workshop failed.
trans-unit.target: Publishing "[itemname]" in the Steam Workshop failed.

trans-unit.source: Select the preview image for the Steam Workshop item.
trans-unit.target: Select the preview image for the Steam Workshop item.

trans-unit.source: The file size of the preview image has to be less than 1 MB.
trans-unit.target: The file size of the preview image has to be less than 1 MB.

trans-unit.source: Cannot edit the Workshop item "[itemname]" because it has not been installed.
trans-unit.target: Cannot edit the Workshop item "[itemname]" because it has not been installed.

trans-unit.source: Cannot enable the Workshop item "[itemname]" because it has not been installed.
trans-unit.target: Cannot enable the Workshop item "[itemname]" because it has not been installed.

trans-unit.source: Cannot enable Workshop item "[itemname]". The file "[filename]" would be overwritten by the item.
trans-unit.target: Cannot enable Workshop item "[itemname]". The file "[filename]" would be overwritten by the item.

trans-unit.source: Could not install the file "[filename]". Workshop items are only allowed to modify files in the Mod folder or add submarine files to the Submarines folder.
trans-unit.target: Could not install the file "[filename]". Workshop items are only allowed to modify files in the Mod folder or add submarine files to the Submarines folder.

trans-unit.source: This Workshop item is not compatible with your version of Barotrauma.
trans-unit.target: This Workshop item is not compatible with your version of Barotrauma.

trans-unit.source: Publishing the Workshop item failed (limit exceeded). Make sure you have enabled Steam Cloud and haven't exceeded your Steam Cloud quota. If you are using Steam Cloud sync, having a large number of save files can cause you to run out of space on the cloud. You may want to check [savepath] to make sure you're not storing an excessive number of save files.
trans-unit.target: Publishing the Workshop item failed (limit exceeded). Make sure you have enabled Steam Cloud and haven't exceeded your Steam Cloud quota. If you are using Steam Cloud sync, having a large number of save files can cause you to run out of space on the cloud. You may want to check [savepath] to make sure you're not storing an excessive number of save files.

trans-unit.source: Publishing the Workshop item failed. Limited user accounts are not allowed to publish items in the Steam Workshop. You need to spend at least $5 in the Steam store to become a non-limited user.
trans-unit.target: Publishing the Workshop item failed. Limited user accounts are not allowed to publish items in the Steam Workshop. You need to spend at least $5 in the Steam store to become a non-limited user.

trans-unit.source: Publishing the Workshop item failed because your account has been banned.
trans-unit.target: Publishing the Workshop item failed because your account has been banned.

trans-unit.source: Publishing the Workshop item failed (insufficient privileges). This can happen due to a hub ban, account lock or a community ban. You may need to contact Steam Support.
trans-unit.target: Publishing the Workshop item failed (insufficient privileges). This can happen due to a hub ban, account lock or a community ban. You may need to contact Steam Support.

trans-unit.source: Publishing the Workshop item failed (service unavailable). The workshop servers may be having issues. Please try again in a moment.
trans-unit.target: Publishing the Workshop item failed (service unavailable). The workshop servers may be having issues. Please try again in a moment.

trans-unit.source: Releasing workshop items with Barotrauma Unstable is not recommended. Features in Unstable are not guaranteed to make it to the public version in the exact same form, and mods developed for Unstable may not work as-is in the public version. trans-unit.target: You cannot delete this submarine because it's part of the mod "[modname]." Please disable the mod from the settings menu instead.

trans-unit.source:
You are about to load a submarine from a non-local copy of "[modname]."

The submarine editor is only able to save to a local content package; if you already have a local copy, it's recommended that you load that version instead.

If you do not have a local copy, you may create one by selecting your mod in the "Publish" tab in the Steam Workshop menu.
trans-unit.target:
You are about to load a submarine from a non-local copy of "[modname]."

The submarine editor is only able to save to a local content package; if you already have a local copy, it's recommended that you load that version instead.

If you do not have a local copy, you may create one by selecting your mod in the "Publish" tab in the Steam Workshop menu.

trans-unit.source: The radiation belts around Jupiter are slowly becoming more intense, forcing Europans to delve deeper below the moon's icy crust. In practice, this feature slowly pushes you toward the more dangerous areas of the game, ensuring a gradual increase in difficulty.
trans-unit.target: The radiation belts around Jupiter are slowly becoming more intense, forcing Europans to delve deeper below the moon's icy crust. In practice, this feature slowly pushes you toward the more dangerous areas of the game, ensuring a gradual increase in difficulty.

trans-unit.target: A challenge for expert sailors. Difficulty is increased. Characters gain more experience, but all character progress is lost on death.

trans-unit.target: Start the game in a tutorial outpost and learn the basics of navigating through the campaign mode!

trans-unit.source: To whoever's out there swimming below the outpost, please head back immediately. It's not safe out there.
trans-unit.target: To whoever's out there swimming below the outpost, please head back immediately. It's not safe out there.

trans-unit.source: Hey! You there, below the outpost—what the hell do you think you're doing? I saw you on the sonar and thought you were a crawler for a second! Get back here before someone with an itchier trigger finger gets you killed.
trans-unit.target: Hey! You there, below the outpost—what the hell do you think you're doing? I saw you on the sonar and thought you were a crawler for a second! Get back here before someone with an itchier trigger finger gets you killed.

trans-unit.source: To the diver below the outpost: Head back immediately. You're almost out of sonar range, and I really don't want to send a rescue team to save your ass when you get yourself lost.
trans-unit.target: To the diver below the outpost: Head back immediately. You're almost out of sonar range, and I really don't want to send a rescue team to save your ass when you get yourself lost.

trans-unit.source: Having fun is more important than completing the objective. A good choice for new players.
trans-unit.target: Having fun is more important than completing the objective. A good choice for new players.

trans-unit.source: The crew should focus on working together efficiently and completing their objective. No unnecessary messing around.
trans-unit.target: The crew should focus on working together efficiently and completing their objective. No unnecessary messing around.

trans-unit.source: The crew should aim to act like a real submarine crew. Chain of command is important, as is taking care of your responsibilities and following orders. Speaking out-of-character should be avoided when a round is running.
trans-unit.target: The crew should aim to act like a real submarine crew. Chain of command is important, as is taking care of your responsibilities and following orders. Speaking out-of-character should be avoided when a round is running.

trans-unit.source: Gameplay differs significantly from the usual Barotrauma gameplay. Modded servers, very unconventional subs, battle royale rounds, shuttle racing, deathrun maps... Anything goes!
trans-unit.target: Gameplay differs significantly from the usual Barotrauma gameplay. Modded servers, very unconventional subs, battle royale rounds, shuttle racing, deathrun maps... Anything goes!

trans-unit.source: Get ready to fight for your life! A server heavily geared toward combat. This can mean player-versus-player combat, PvE or both—the server description should include guidelines as to what kind of violence is allowed on the server.
trans-unit.target: Get ready to fight for your life! A server heavily geared toward combat. This can mean player-versus-player combat, PvE or both—the server description should include guidelines as to what kind of violence is allowed on the server.

trans-unit.source: Seismic readings are indicating that something colossal has emerged from the depths of Europa into the passageway between [location1] and [location2]. All transports through the passageway have been canceled for now and a reward of [reward] has been promised to those who get rid of whatever is causing the seismic activity.
trans-unit.target: Seismic readings are indicating that something colossal has emerged from the depths of Europa into the passageway between [location1] and [location2]. trans-unit.source: The Endworm is dead and the passageway is open for transport again.
trans-unit.target: The Endworm is dead and the passageway is open for transport again.

trans-unit.source: The beast is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.
trans-unit.target: The beast is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

trans-unit.source: Researchers of [location1] have picked up an infrasonic signal highly similar to those emitted by alien artifacts previously discovered on Europa. Investigate the signal and retrieve the potential artifact.
trans-unit.target: Researchers of [location1] have picked up an infrasonic signal highly similar to those emitted by alien artifacts previously discovered on Europa. Investigate the signal and retrieve the potential artifact.

trans-unit.source: It turns out the signal was emitted by a Moloch. The researchers of [location1] have agreed to pay you the reward nevertheless for getting rid of the Moloch.
trans-unit.target: It turns out the signal was emitted by a Moloch. The researchers of [location1] have agreed to pay you the reward nevertheless for getting rid of the Moloch.

trans-unit.source: Turns out the signal was emitted by a Moloch! You should navigate out of the cavern and inform the researchers.
trans-unit.target: Turns out the signal was emitted by a Moloch! You should navigate out of the cavern and inform the researchers.

trans-unit.target: The explosives have been successfully delivered.

trans-unit.source: The materials have been successfully delivered.
trans-unit.target: The materials have been successfully delivered.

trans-unit.source: The materials have been successfully delivered.

trans-unit.target: The Hammerheads are dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

trans-unit.source: According to our sources, there is a group of Hammerheads blocking the route from [location1] to [location2]. Get rid of the creatures so that our vessels can continue traveling safely through the passage.

trans-unit.source: The Hammerheads have been neutralized. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.
trans-unit.target: The Hammerheads have been neutralized. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

trans-unit.source: A large and hostile creature, a so-called "Hammerhead Matriarch," has taken residence in the passageway between [location1] and [location2] along with a swarm of smaller Hammerheads. Kill the creatures so that vessels can continue traveling safely through the route. This might not be the easiest task, but the reward is not small either!
trans-unit.target: A large and hostile creature, a so-called "Hammerhead Matriarch," has taken residence in the passageway between [location1] and [location2] along with a swarm of smaller Hammerheads. trans-unit.source: The Matriarch has been killed. The route should be safe again.
trans-unit.target: The Matriarch has been killed. The route should be safe again.

trans-unit.source: The Matriarch and its minions have been taken care of. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.
trans-unit.target: The Matriarch and its minions have been taken care of. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

trans-unit.source: There have been several reports of an aggressive Golden Hammerhead assaulting vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] marks has been promised to whoever gets rid of the creature.
trans-unit.target: There have been several reports of an aggressive Golden Hammerhead assaulting vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] marks has been promised to whoever gets rid of the creature.

trans-unit.source: The Golden Hammerhead is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.
trans-unit.target: The Golden Hammerhead is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

trans-unit.source: There have been several reports of a large swarm of threshers assaulting vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] marks has been promised to any crew who can get rid of them.
trans-unit.target: There have been several reports of a large swarm of threshers assaulting vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] marks has been promised to any crew who can get rid of them.

trans-unit.source: The swarm is terminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.
trans-unit.target: The swarm is terminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

trans-unit.source: A small cargo vessel went missing approximately two months ago when transporting xenomaterials from [location1] to [location2]. The vessel was presumed to be taken by the Abyss, but now its emergency beacon seems to have been activated near [location2]. Find the vessel and recover the cargo.
trans-unit.target: A small cargo vessel went missing approximately two months ago when transporting xenomaterials from [location1] to [location2]. The vessel was presumed to be taken by the Abyss, but now its emergency beacon seems to have been activated near [location2]. Find the vessel and recover the cargo.

trans-unit.source: The researchers of [location2] are eager to know all the details of the encounter, but seem hesitant to answer any questions regarding the vessel. They do however offer you 1,000 credits as reimbursement for your troubles.
trans-unit.target: The researchers of [location2] are eager to know all the details of the encounter, but seem hesitant to answer any questions regarding the vessel. They do however offer you 1,000 credits as reimbursement for your troubles.

trans-unit.source: The missing vessel appears to have been taken over by some sort of parasitic growth, leading it to attack your submarine. It seems to be incapacitated now. You should report the incident to [location2].
trans-unit.target: The missing vessel appears to have been taken over by some sort of parasitic growth, leading it to attack your submarine. It seems to be incapacitated now. You should report the incident to [location2].

trans-unit.source: [location1] just received a fragmented distress call from a vessel that was thought to have been lost along with some highly sensitive encrypted data. Retrieve the captain's logbook as a priority and return it.
trans-unit.target: [location1] just received a fragmented distress call from a vessel that was thought to have been lost along with some highly sensitive encrypted data. Retrieve the captain's logbook as a priority and return it.

trans-unit.source: A Coalition sub has sunk nearby. Search the area for signs of its distress beacon and investigate the wreck for any information about what might have caused its sinking.

trans-unit.source: Find and retrieve a specific item—for example, an artifact from an alien ruin, or sensitive cargo from a sunken submarine.
trans-unit.target: Find and retrieve a specific item—for example, an artifact from an alien ruin, or sensitive cargo from a sunken submarine.

trans-unit.source: Terminate an aggressive creature (or a group of creatures) residing within the passageway.
trans-unit.target: Terminate an aggressive creature (or a group of creatures) residing within the passageway.

trans-unit.source: Deliver cargo (such as explosives, dangerous chemicals or minerals) from one outpost to another.
trans-unit.target: Deliver cargo (such as explosives, dangerous chemicals or minerals) from one outpost to another.

trans-unit.source: Find and destroy a nest. Nests are usually located inside small caverns within the passageway.
trans-unit.target: Find and destroy a nest. Nests are usually located inside small caverns within the passageway.

trans-unit.source: Locate a beacon station and get it back online by repairing any damage to the station or its systems.
trans-unit.target: Locate a beacon station and get it back online by repairing any damage to the station or its systems.

trans-unit.source: There's been talk of valuable mineral clusters within the passageway. Locate the clusters and retrieve the minerals.
trans-unit.target: There's been talk of valuable mineral clusters within the passageway. Locate the clusters and retrieve the minerals.

trans-unit.source: Eradicate aggressive creatures or bandit outlaws who have taken over an abandoned outpost, or rescue hostages from one.

trans-unit.source: Clear an alien ruin of its guardians.
trans-unit.target: Clear an alien ruin of its guardians.

trans-unit.source: Escort a number of personnel from outpost to another while ensuring their safety.
trans-unit.target: Escort a number of personnel from outpost to another while ensuring their safety.

trans-unit.source: Install scanners in the alien ruins. Retrieve the data by returning the scanners to the next outpost.
trans-unit.target: Install scanners in the alien ruins. Retrieve the data by returning the scanners to the next outpost.

trans-unit.source: Find the pirate ship and destroy it, along with its crew.
trans-unit.target: Find the pirate ship and destroy it, along with its crew.

trans-unit.source: A crawler nest was recently discovered in a cave near [location1]. A reward of [reward] marks has been promised to any crew that can get rid of the nest.

trans-unit.target: The nest has been wiped out. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

trans-unit.target: The nest has been wiped out. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

trans-unit.source: The beacon station between [location1] and [location2] is down—get in there, and get it back online and transmitting an active sonar signal.

trans-unit.source: A mudraptor nest was recently discovered in a cave near [location1]. A reward of [reward] marks has been promised to any crew that can get rid of the nest.

trans-unit.source: A Coalition vessel has been dispatched from [location1] to destroy a renegade vessel at the outskirts of [location2].
trans-unit.target: A Coalition vessel has been dispatched from [location1] to destroy a renegade vessel at the outskirts of [location2].

trans-unit.source: A renegade vessel has been detected at the outskirts of [location2]. Treason against the Europa Coalition is punishable by death—eliminate the renegades by any means necessary.
trans-unit.target: A renegade vessel has been detected at the outskirts of [location2]. Treason against the Europa Coalition is punishable by death—eliminate the renegades by any means necessary.

trans-unit.source: You're a member of the Jovian Separatists, a group opposing the Europa Coalition. According to your informants at [location1], a Coalition vessel has just been dispatched on a mission to take down your boat. Eliminate their crew by any means necessary.
trans-unit.target: You're a member of the Jovian Separatists, a group opposing the Europa Coalition. According to your informants at [location1], a Coalition vessel has just been dispatched on a mission to take down your boat. Eliminate their crew by any means necessary.

trans-unit.source: Contact with [location1] was recently lost, and it's suspected to have been taken over by someone. Destroy the outpost's reactor to drive away any squatters and ensure they don't return.
trans-unit.target: Contact with [location1] was recently lost, and it's suspected to have been taken over by someone. Destroy the outpost's reactor to drive away any squatters and ensure they don't return.

trans-unit.source: The squatters were driven away from the outpost successfully.
trans-unit.target: The squatters were driven away from the outpost successfully.

trans-unit.source: The reactor has been destroyed. This should make sure squatters won't try to take over the outpost again. Undock from the outpost to complete the mission.
trans-unit.target: The reactor has been destroyed. This should make sure squatters won't try to take over the outpost again. Undock from the outpost to complete the mission.

trans-unit.source: Contact with [location1] was recently lost, and it's suspected that hostile fauna has built a nest inside it. Find any eggs inside the outpost and destroy them.
trans-unit.target: Contact with [location1] was recently lost, and it's suspected that hostile fauna has built a nest inside it. Find any eggs inside the outpost and destroy them.

trans-unit.source: The nest inside the outpost has been successfully destroyed.
trans-unit.target: The nest inside the outpost has been successfully destroyed.

trans-unit.source: The nest inside the outpost has been successfully destroyed. Undock from the outpost to complete the mission.
trans-unit.target: The nest inside the outpost has been successfully destroyed. Undock from the outpost to complete the mission.

trans-unit.source: Contact with [location1] was recently lost, and there have been reports about a notorious group of outlaws having claimed it as their base. There's a bounty on the head of the group's leader's—eliminate the leader to claim the reward.
trans-unit.target: Contact with [location1] was recently lost, and there have been reports about a notorious group of outlaws having claimed it as their base. There's a bounty on the head of the group's leader's—eliminate the leader to claim the reward.

trans-unit.source: The leader of the bandit group has been successfully eliminated. Undock from the outpost to complete the mission.
trans-unit.target: The leader of the bandit group has been successfully eliminated. Undock from the outpost to complete the mission.

trans-unit.source: A bandit group that has claimed the abandoned [location1] recently sent out a message in which they demand a ransom for releasing a group of civilians they're holding hostage. The Coalition doesn't negotiate with terrorists, but has promised a considerable reward to anyone who manages to rescue the hostages.
trans-unit.target: A bandit group that has claimed the abandoned [location1] recently sent out a message in which they demand a ransom for releasing a group of civilians they're holding hostage. trans-unit.source: A creature from the Abyss has made this passageway its hunting grounds. Until the beast is dead, new outposts won't be established in the adjacent locations, and existing outposts may get abandoned.

trans-unit.source: At the end of the round, if the majority of players have correctly suspected the traitor, the traitor fails their objective and will not receive any rewards (such as getting to steal experience points or portions of the mission reward).
trans-unit.target: At the end of the round, if the majority of players have correctly suspected the traitor, the traitor fails their objective and will not receive any rewards (such as getting to steal experience points or portions of the mission reward).

trans-unit.source: I think [name] might be trying to sabotage our mission…
trans-unit.target: I think [name] might be trying to sabotage our mission…

trans-unit.source: I have a feeling [name] is a traitor…
trans-unit.target: I have a feeling [name] is a traitor…

trans-unit.source: [name] is acting kinda sus, right crew? Right…?
trans-unit.target: [name] is acting kinda sus, right crew? Right…?

trans-unit.source: What are you up to, [name]? Something is off…
trans-unit.target: What are you up to, [name]? Something is off…

trans-unit.source: [name], you traitorous scum. I do not trust you!
trans-unit.target: [name], you traitorous scum. I do not trust you!

trans-unit.source: What shady business have you gotten yourself into, [name]?
trans-unit.target: What shady business have you gotten yourself into, [name]?

trans-unit.source: What nefarious plan is occupying you, [name]?
trans-unit.target: What nefarious plan is occupying you, [name]?

trans-unit.source: [name] is not working toward our mission objective. Do they have some hidden agenda?
trans-unit.target: [name] is not working toward our mission objective. Do they have some hidden agenda?

trans-unit.source: The crew suspected [name] as a traitor!
trans-unit.target: The crew suspected [name] as a traitor!

trans-unit.source: The crew's suspicions were correct. Since the traitor was exposed, they will not receive any rewards from whoever assigned them the traitorous task, even though they successfully completed it.
trans-unit.target: The crew's suspicions were correct. Since the traitor was exposed, they will not receive any rewards from whoever assigned them the traitorous task, even though they successfully completed it.

trans-unit.source: The crew's suspicions were correct. Luckily, the traitor failed to complete their task.
trans-unit.target: The crew's suspicions were correct. Luckily, the traitor failed to complete their task.

trans-unit.source: The crew's suspicions turned out to be incorrect, and the traitor may still be at large.
trans-unit.target: The crew's suspicions turned out to be incorrect, and the traitor may still be at large.

trans-unit.source: The crew has received a fine of [money] marks for wasting the official's time with the false accusations.
trans-unit.target: The crew has received a fine of [money] marks for wasting the official's time with the false accusations.

trans-unit.source: By equipping the bomb and a screwdriver, one could remove a panel.
trans-unit.target: By equipping the bomb and a screwdriver, one could remove a panel.

trans-unit.source: Wires are exposed. A skilled weapon-user could defuse this by equipping the bomb and a sharp tool like a knife.
trans-unit.target: Wires are exposed. A skilled weapon-user could defuse this by equipping the bomb and a sharp tool like a knife.

trans-unit.source: It looks like a nuke with a text display and some wires strapped to it. It has been defused.
trans-unit.target: It looks like a nuke with a text display and some wires strapped to it. It has been defused.

trans-unit.source: How dangerous the traitor objectives can be. If, for example, you're playing the campaign mode and don't want players to get assigned traitor objectives that would seriously harm the crew's progress, you might want to choose a low danger level.
trans-unit.target: How dangerous the traitor objectives can be. If, for example, you're playing the campaign mode and don't want players to get assigned traitor objectives that would seriously harm the crew's progress, you might want to choose a low danger level.

trans-unit.source: Might result in injuries and/or damage to the submarine.
trans-unit.target: Might result in injuries and/or damage to the submarine.

trans-unit.source: High chance of causing injuries or even casualties.
trans-unit.target: High chance of causing injuries or even casualties.

trans-unit.source: The probability of some players getting assigned traitor objectives during a round.
trans-unit.target: The probability of some players getting assigned traitor objectives during a round.

trans-unit.source: You are angry. Enraged, even. The constant stress of being confined to your metal coffin is taking its toll on you, and you know it. You have to take out that anger somewhere on something… The beacon station you're supposed to visit might have a nuclear reactor that could be overloaded, causing a huge explosion and radiation to harm those Jove-forsaken crawlers and mudraptors for a long time to come. Your hand stops shaking for the first time in days. You know now: It is what you have to do.
trans-unit.target: You are angry. Enraged, even. The constant stress of being confined to your metal coffin is taking its toll on you, and you know it. You have to take out that anger somewhere on something… The beacon station you're supposed to visit might have a nuclear reactor that could be overloaded, causing a huge explosion and radiation to harm those Jove-forsaken crawlers and mudraptors for a long time to come. Your hand stops shaking for the first time in days. You know now: It is what you have to do.

trans-unit.source: Cause a nuclear meltdown at the beacon station's nuclear reactor.
trans-unit.target: Cause a nuclear meltdown at the beacon station's nuclear reactor.

trans-unit.source: The beacon station has been burnt to a crisp!
trans-unit.target: The beacon station has been burnt to a crisp!

trans-unit.source: No beacon station meltdown has been observed.
trans-unit.target: No beacon station meltdown has been observed.

trans-unit.source: Right before you entered the submarine through the station's airlock, you found a shady-looking figure standing in the shadows. He gave you a crooked smile, and said: “Your wallet looks awfully light after the shore leave, eh? Want to do something about that? You see, the cargo you're transporting… The recipients are very desperate for that cargo. They pay good money. Now, if that cargo arrives, they're no longer desperate, no longer paying good money. See where I am going with this? If some cargo were to go missing, it might profit both of us.”\n\nNow you're still wondering whether or not to take the money. It's dirty, but marks are marks.
trans-unit.target: Right before you entered the submarine through the station's airlock, you found a shady-looking figure standing in the shadows. He gave you a crooked smile, and said: “Your wallet looks awfully light after the shore leave, eh? Want to do something about that? You see, the cargo you're transporting… The recipients are very desperate for that cargo. They pay good money. Now, if that cargo arrives, they're no longer desperate, no longer paying good money. See where I am going with this? If some cargo were to go missing, it might profit both of us.”\n\nNow you're still wondering whether or not to take the money. It's dirty, but marks are marks.

trans-unit.source: Ensure at least half of the cargo that's part of the transport mission doesn't make it to the destination.
trans-unit.target: Ensure at least half of the cargo that's part of the transport mission doesn't make it to the destination.

trans-unit.source: The cargo is no longer on the submarine. Looks like you're getting paid while your crew is getting played.
trans-unit.target: The cargo is no longer on the submarine. Looks like you're getting paid while your crew is getting played.

trans-unit.source: To the dismay of your crew and the receiving party, the cargo was nowhere to be found.
trans-unit.target: To the dismay of your crew and the receiving party, the cargo was nowhere to be found.

trans-unit.source: When the time came to unload the cargo, your crew found out most of the items were missing. The client is not pleased.
trans-unit.target: When the time came to unload the cargo, your crew found out most of the items were missing. The client is not pleased.

trans-unit.source: You've failed to get rid of enough cargo.
trans-unit.target: You've failed to get rid of enough cargo.

trans-unit.source: The cargo was found on board the submarine, despite a risk of betrayal.
trans-unit.target: The cargo was found on board the submarine, despite a risk of betrayal.

trans-unit.source: A burly figure leans in the doorframe, blocking your way. You're already late, having just heard the call to get back to your submarine ASAP—what could he possibly want? He has a scowl on his face, but does not seem to be threatening you.\n\n“Hear me out,” he starts. “I oversee mining operations around here, and to put it frankly, your mining mission is going to cut into my profits. Not your problem, you could say, but I say: business opportunity. Cause a few malfunctions in your plasma cutters, and I'll see you're paid more than your mission's cut would be.”
trans-unit.target: A burly figure leans in the doorframe, blocking your way. You're already late, having just heard the call to get back to your submarine ASAP—what could he possibly want? He has a scowl on his face, but does not seem to be threatening you.\n\n“Hear me out,” he starts. “I oversee mining operations around here, and to put it frankly, your mining mission is going to cut into my profits. Not your problem, you could say, but I say: business opportunity. Cause a few malfunctions in your plasma cutters, and I'll see you're paid more than your mission's cut would be.”

trans-unit.source: Disrupt the mining efforts by swapping oxygen tanks in 50% of the plasma cutters for welding fuel tanks.
trans-unit.target: Disrupt the mining efforts by swapping oxygen tanks in 50% of the plasma cutters for welding fuel tanks.

trans-unit.source: This should scare the crew off from future mining operations, which will make your employer happy.
trans-unit.target: This should scare the crew off from future mining operations, which will make your employer happy.

trans-unit.source: The plasma cutters have been sabotaged. Fingers crossed that nobody actually dies.
trans-unit.target: The plasma cutters have been sabotaged. Fingers crossed that nobody actually dies.

trans-unit.source: The sabotage has been carried out successfully.
trans-unit.target: The sabotage has been carried out successfully.

trans-unit.source: The sabotage did not meet the requirements.
trans-unit.target: The sabotage did not meet the requirements.

trans-unit.source: Swap welding fuel tanks into 50% of the plasma cutters
trans-unit.target: Swap welding fuel tanks into 50% of the plasma cutters

trans-unit.source: In the latest edition of The Europan magazine, you read about a hot new craze: pet mudraptors. How cool would it be if you could hatch and train a mudraptor from birth to be your loyal ally? Your captain wouldn't dare refuse your requests for a pay raise after that. And it just so happens that you might have a perfect chance to get yourself a fresh mudraptor egg!
trans-unit.target: In the latest edition of The Europan magazine, you read about a hot new craze: pet mudraptors. How cool would it be if you could hatch and train a mudraptor from birth to be your loyal ally? Your captain wouldn't dare refuse your requests for a pay raise after that. And it just so happens that you might have a perfect chance to get yourself a fresh mudraptor egg!

trans-unit.source: Obtain a mudraptor egg from the nest and bring it into the submarine.
trans-unit.target: Obtain a mudraptor egg from the nest and bring it into the submarine.

trans-unit.source: In the latest edition of The Europan magazine, you read about a hot new craze: pet mudraptors. How cool would it be if you could hatch and train a mudraptor from birth to be your loyal ally? Your captain wouldn't dare refuse your requests for a pay raise after that. Now, it just so happens the beacon station here was destroyed by mudraptors, and they may have left an egg behind. You better volunteer to fix that station and find the egg!
trans-unit.target: In the latest edition of The Europan magazine, you read about a hot new craze: pet mudraptors. How cool would it be if you could hatch and train a mudraptor from birth to be your loyal ally? Your captain wouldn't dare refuse your requests for a pay raise after that. Now, it just so happens the beacon station here was destroyed by mudraptors, and they may have left an egg behind. You better volunteer to fix that station and find the egg!

trans-unit.source: Obtain a mudraptor egg from the beacon station and bring it into the submarine.
trans-unit.target: Obtain a mudraptor egg from the beacon station and bring it into the submarine.

trans-unit.source: You found a mudraptor's egg! Now to sneak it back to the submarine unseen…
trans-unit.target: You found a mudraptor's egg! Now to sneak it back to the submarine unseen…

trans-unit.source: You've obtained an egg. Better keep it safe for now.
trans-unit.target: You've obtained an egg. Better keep it safe for now.

trans-unit.source: A mudraptor egg has been brought to the submarine. Keep it safe from deconstructors.
trans-unit.target: A mudraptor egg has been brought to the submarine. Keep it safe from deconstructors.

trans-unit.source: A mudraptor egg has been collected. Maybe it will hatch into a beautiful and loyal pet one day?
trans-unit.target: A mudraptor egg has been collected. Maybe it will hatch into a beautiful and loyal pet one day?

trans-unit.source: A mudraptor egg has found its way onto the submarine.
trans-unit.target: A mudraptor egg has found its way onto the submarine.

trans-unit.source: No mudraptor eggs have been brought and kept safe on the submarine.
trans-unit.target: No mudraptor eggs have been brought and kept safe on the submarine.

trans-unit.source: Find and obtain a mudraptor egg
trans-unit.target: Find and obtain a mudraptor egg

trans-unit.source: Bring a mudraptor egg to the submarine
trans-unit.target: Bring a mudraptor egg to the submarine

trans-unit.source: A one-armed wretch of a man has sold you a guide titled “Mudraptor Pets 101.” It is far from professional—in fact it's all written on some crusty old bandages—but he insisted he has experience in raising mudraptors as pets.\n\nAccording to the guide, the first minutes after hatching are crucial. If they get a taste of human flesh during this period, they'll forever crave more, so this should be avoided at all costs.
trans-unit.target: A one-armed wretch of a man has sold you a guide titled “Mudraptor Pets 101.” It is far from professional—in fact it's all written on some crusty old bandages—but he insisted he has experience in raising mudraptors as pets.\n\nAccording to the guide, the first minutes after hatching are crucial. If they get a taste of human flesh during this period, they'll forever crave more, so this should be avoided at all costs.

trans-unit.source: You want to hatch a mudraptor and train it as a pet. According to the instructions, you need to inject a mudraptor egg with saline, wait until it hatches and then ensure the mudraptor lives long enough to really experience pet ownership. A mudraptor egg has already been stashed away in a loose vent.
trans-unit.target: You want to hatch a mudraptor and train it as a pet. According to the instructions, you need to inject a mudraptor egg with saline, wait until it hatches and then ensure the mudraptor lives long enough to really experience pet ownership. A mudraptor egg has already been stashed away in a loose vent.

trans-unit.source: You've obtained the egg. Next step is to hatch it with [catalystitem] in a safe place.
trans-unit.target: You've obtained the egg. Next step is to hatch it with [catalystitem] in a safe place.

trans-unit.source: The egg bulges and makes strange noises… You're about to become a parent!
trans-unit.target: The egg bulges and makes strange noises… You're about to become a parent!

trans-unit.source: The egg has hatched! Keep the abyss-puppy alive for [time] minutes.
trans-unit.target: The egg has hatched! Keep the abyss-puppy alive for [time] minutes.

trans-unit.source: The egg has hatched. Now make sure the mudraptor hatchling doesn't get killed for [time] minutes.
trans-unit.target: The egg has hatched. Now make sure the mudraptor hatchling doesn't get killed for [time] minutes.

trans-unit.source: Your dream of having your own pet mudraptor was shot to pieces by the reality of Europa. It is an unforgiving moon, and weakness has no place here.
trans-unit.target: Your dream of having your own pet mudraptor was shot to pieces by the reality of Europa. It is an unforgiving moon, and weakness has no place here.

trans-unit.source: You have followed the instructions to the letter, so the mudraptor should be trainable as an obedient pet now, right?
trans-unit.target: You have followed the instructions to the letter, so the mudraptor should be trainable as an obedient pet now, right?

trans-unit.source: Your mudraptor hatchling has survived long enough. You feel proud of your accomplishment, no matter what happens next.
trans-unit.target: Your mudraptor hatchling has survived long enough. You feel proud of your accomplishment, no matter what happens next.

trans-unit.source: Inject a mudraptor egg with saline, wait until it hatches and then ensure the baby mudraptor lives long enough to really experience pet ownership.
trans-unit.target: Inject a mudraptor egg with saline, wait until it hatches and then ensure the baby mudraptor lives long enough to really experience pet ownership.

trans-unit.source: The mudraptor hatchling lived as long as required.
trans-unit.target: The mudraptor hatchling lived as long as required.

trans-unit.source: The mudraptor hatchling didn't live long enough.
trans-unit.target: The mudraptor hatchling didn't live long enough.

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the mudraptor egg from its hiding spot
trans-unit.target: Retrieve the mudraptor egg from its hiding spot

trans-unit.source: Hatch the egg in a safe spot
trans-unit.target: Hatch the egg in a safe spot

trans-unit.source: People often get more honest when under the influence of alcohol, and yesterday was no exception. Although your head is spinning and parts of the night are missing from memory, you remember the comments of one crewmember rubbing you the wrong way, and not just you. While you can't exactly recall who insulted whom, the drunk version of you left behind a note: “Codeword: [codeword].” Perhaps this will help with identifying like-minded folk?
trans-unit.target: People often get more honest when under the influence of alcohol, and yesterday was no exception. Although your head is spinning and parts of the night are missing from memory, you remember the comments of one crewmember rubbing you the wrong way, and not just you. While you can't exactly recall who insulted whom, the drunk version of you left behind a note: “Codeword: [codeword].” Perhaps this will help with identifying like-minded folk?

trans-unit.source: Some of your memory from last night is slowly returning—you seem to recall it was [victim] spewing vile words to multiple crewmates. Time to teach [victim] a little lesson on slander and smear campaigns.
trans-unit.target: Some of your memory from last night is slowly returning—you seem to recall it was [victim] spewing vile words to multiple crewmates. Time to teach [victim] a little lesson on slander and smear campaigns.

trans-unit.source: Ensure the majority of crewmembers will accuse the target of being a traitor. With everyone's memories a bit hazy, only a co-conspirator might remember the name of the target. A note saying “Codeword: [codeword]” could help you.
trans-unit.target: Ensure the majority of crewmembers will accuse the target of being a traitor. With everyone's memories a bit hazy, only a co-conspirator might remember the name of the target. A note saying “Codeword: [codeword]” could help you.

trans-unit.source: Your memory tells you [victim] is the one bad-mouthing other crewmembers. Let your fellow conspirators and the rest of the crew know they're not to be trusted. Use the codeword “[codeword]” to identify the co-conspirators.
trans-unit.target: Your memory tells you [victim] is the one bad-mouthing other crewmembers. Let your fellow conspirators and the rest of the crew know they're not to be trusted. Use the codeword “[codeword]” to identify the co-conspirators.

trans-unit.source: The reputation of the target has been successfully ruined.
trans-unit.target: The reputation of the target has been successfully ruined.

trans-unit.source: The crew did not agree the target was a traitor. Their reputation remains intact.
trans-unit.target: The crew did not agree the target was a traitor. Their reputation remains intact.

trans-unit.source: Get your target accused of being a traitor
trans-unit.target: Get your target accused of being a traitor

trans-unit.source: Ensure people know who the target is
trans-unit.target: Ensure people know who the target is

trans-unit.source: “You step into the forest clearing…roll for initiative,” said the GM. The appropriately costumed party members looked at each other in concern.\n“Not again…” exclaimed the rogue. “A one…oh dear.”\n“Goblin children appear at the tree lines all around you, and their bows sing: ‘Thwang, thwang.’”
trans-unit.target: “You step into the forest clearing…roll for initiative,” said the GM. The appropriately costumed party members looked at each other in concern.\n“Not again…” exclaimed the rogue. “A one…oh dear.”\n“Goblin children appear at the tree lines all around you, and their bows sing: ‘Thwang, thwang.’”

trans-unit.source: Roll for dexterity at a disadvantage.
trans-unit.target: Roll for dexterity at a disadvantage.

trans-unit.source: “Party-wiped by goblin children again,” sighed the warlock. “We need to grow stronger. We must understand our enemies and, to do that, think like our enemies.” And thus, a plan has formed: You will roleplay as goblins. Use the codeword “[codeword]” to identify fellow goblins.
trans-unit.target: “Party-wiped by goblin children again,” sighed the warlock. “We need to grow stronger. We must understand our enemies and, to do that, think like our enemies.” And thus, a plan has formed: You will roleplay as goblins. Use the codeword “[codeword]” to identify fellow goblins.

trans-unit.source: Roleplay as ballast goblins. Ensure all ballast tanks are painted green and all goblins are in a ballast tank. Use the codeword “[codeword]” to identify fellow goblins.
trans-unit.target: Roleplay as ballast goblins. Ensure all ballast tanks are painted green and all goblins are in a ballast tank. Use the codeword “[codeword]” to identify fellow goblins.

trans-unit.source: You've gained valuable insight into the psyche of a (ballast) goblin, which will surely prove to be invaluable the next time you encounter a horde of greenskins.
trans-unit.target: You've gained valuable insight into the psyche of a (ballast) goblin, which will surely prove to be invaluable the next time you encounter a horde of greenskins.

trans-unit.source: Roleplay as ballast goblins. Ensure all ballast tanks are painted green and all goblins are in a ballast tank.
trans-unit.target: Roleplay as ballast goblins. Ensure all ballast tanks are painted green and all goblins are in a ballast tank.

trans-unit.source: The goblins were too green to accomplish their task (read: inexperienced).
trans-unit.target: The goblins were too green to accomplish their task (read: inexperienced).

trans-unit.source: Occupy ballast tanks for five minutes straight
trans-unit.target: Occupy ballast tanks for five minutes straight

trans-unit.source: Get every goblin in a ballast tank
trans-unit.target: Get every goblin in a ballast tank

trans-unit.source:
“How about we throw a heckin' big party?” one of you said.
