“Yeah!”someone replied. “But it's gotta be a surprise until we're ready.”
“Let's call it ‘Project: [codeword],’” another anonymous voice on the terminal suggested. 

You don't know who your fellow planners are, yet, but they're probably the coolest kids on the crew.
trans-unit.target:
“How about we throw a heckin' big party?” one of you said.
“Yeah!”someone replied. “But it's gotta be a surprise until we're ready.”
“Let's call it ‘Project: [codeword],’” another anonymous voice on the terminal suggested. 

You don't know who your fellow planners are, yet, but they're probably the coolest kids on the crew.

trans-unit.source: As luck would have it, you have a banner that'd work perfectly as a party decoration. Designate the party room by attaching the banner on a wall.
trans-unit.target: As luck would have it, you have a banner that'd work perfectly as a party decoration. Designate the party room by attaching the banner on a wall.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that preparations for a big party, called “Project: [codeword],” are completed. Nobody should enter the designated party room until the preparations are complete. The party planners are anonymous, but mentioning [codeword] will help with coordinating the planning.
trans-unit.target: Ensure that preparations for a big party, called “Project: [codeword],” are completed. Nobody should enter the designated party room until the preparations are complete. The party planners are anonymous, but mentioning [codeword] will help with coordinating the planning.

trans-unit.source: Designate a party room using party decorations.
trans-unit.target: Designate a party room using party decorations.

trans-unit.source: The party room has been designated. Now, time to find some drinks for the party. One can have booze without fun, but not the other way around, right? A bottle of ethanol per guest should do.
trans-unit.target: The party room has been designated. Now, time to find some drinks for the party. One can have booze without fun, but not the other way around, right? A bottle of ethanol per guest should do.

trans-unit.source: Gather enough ethanol in the party room to get everyone drunk.
trans-unit.target: Gather enough ethanol in the party room to get everyone drunk.

trans-unit.source: Ensure there's music by bringing an instrument to the party room. An instrument has been stashed in a loose vent, but any instrument will do.
trans-unit.target: Ensure there's music by bringing an instrument to the party room. An instrument has been stashed in a loose vent, but any instrument will do.

trans-unit.source: The drinks have been taken care of, but we need music! Find an instrument of some sort and bring it to the party room. One instrument had been smuggled aboard and stashed in a loose vent somewhere, but any instrument will do.
trans-unit.target: The drinks have been taken care of, but we need music! Find an instrument of some sort and bring it to the party room. One instrument had been smuggled aboard and stashed in a loose vent somewhere, but any instrument will do.

trans-unit.source: Party lighting. There has to be suitable red-colored lighting. Red room rave!
trans-unit.target: Party lighting. There has to be suitable red-colored lighting. Red room rave!

trans-unit.source: Now we've got drinks and music, but how about some party lighting? Make the lighting in the party room red. Red room rave!
trans-unit.target: Now we've got drinks and music, but how about some party lighting? Make the lighting in the party room red. Red room rave!

trans-unit.source:
“Well well well, it seems we have a murder mystery on our hands,” you mutter while looking at the mangled corpse of a crawler.
“No we don't,” replied a crewmember. “Crawler lives don't count. We should murder an assistant or something, present the crew with a real murder mystery.”

While it seems like a rather psychopathic thing to say, you do think giving the crew some relief from their dreary routines is worth sacrificing one crewmember. After all, a lack of motivation could get the entire crew killed.
trans-unit.target:
“Well well well, it seems we have a murder mystery on our hands,” you mutter while looking at the mangled corpse of a crawler.
“No we don't,” replied a crewmember. “Crawler lives don't count. We should murder an assistant or something, present the crew with a real murder mystery.”

While it seems like a rather psychopathic thing to say, you do think giving the crew some relief from their dreary routines is worth sacrificing one crewmember. After all, a lack of motivation could get the entire crew killed.

trans-unit.source: You are part of creating a murder mystery. To make the murder very mysterious, nobody knows the full details.\nThere are three accomplices, who are not known to each other. One knows the victim, one knows the murder weapon, and one knows which of the accomplices is supposed to do the murder.
trans-unit.target: You are part of creating a murder mystery. To make the murder very mysterious, nobody knows the full details.\nThere are three accomplices, who are not known to each other. One knows the victim, one knows the murder weapon, and one knows which of the accomplices is supposed to do the murder.

trans-unit.source: Set up a murder mystery. Information about the mystery—the murderer, the victim, and the weapon—is split among three accomplices. The murderer is one of the accomplices. Use the codeword “[codeword]” to identify your accomplices.
trans-unit.target: Set up a murder mystery. Information about the mystery—the murderer, the victim, and the weapon—is split among three accomplices. The murderer is one of the accomplices. Use the codeword “[codeword]” to identify your accomplices.

trans-unit.source: You know who the murderer is: it's [murderer]. Use the codeword “[codeword]” to identify your accomplices.
trans-unit.target: You know who the murderer is: it's [murderer]. Use the codeword “[codeword]” to identify your accomplices.

trans-unit.source: You know who the murder victim is: it's [victim]. Use the codeword “[codeword]” to identify your accomplices.
trans-unit.target: You know who the murder victim is: it's [victim]. Use the codeword “[codeword]” to identify your accomplices.

trans-unit.source: You know the weapon to use: There's a special [weapon] hidden somewhere in the submarine. Use the codeword “[codeword]” to identify your accomplices.
trans-unit.target: You know the weapon to use: There's a special [weapon] hidden somewhere in the submarine. Use the codeword “[codeword]” to identify your accomplices.

trans-unit.source: A murder has been committed—now the crew can play detective and hopefully be not very good at it.
trans-unit.target: A murder has been committed—now the crew can play detective and hopefully be not very good at it.

trans-unit.source: The victim has died, but wasn't killed with the correct murder weapon, by the correct murderer. The murder mystery has failed.
trans-unit.target: The victim has died, but wasn't killed with the correct murder weapon, by the correct murderer. The murder mystery has failed.

trans-unit.source: Set up a murder mystery. Information about the mystery—the murderer, the victim, and the weapon—is split among three accomplices. The identities of the accomplices are part of the mystery, but the murderer is one of them.
trans-unit.target: Set up a murder mystery. Information about the mystery—the murderer, the victim, and the weapon—is split among three accomplices. The identities of the accomplices are part of the mystery, but the murderer is one of them.

trans-unit.source: The murder mystery was very mysterious indeed.
trans-unit.target: The murder mystery was very mysterious indeed.

trans-unit.source: Here's a clue: The murder mystery sucked.
trans-unit.target: Here's a clue: The murder mystery sucked.

trans-unit.source: “The plebs have been growing unruly as of late, and we are lacking in certain peacekeeping tools. Perhaps for a reward, you could craft some on your submarine? You've probably got too many resources stockpiled, anyway—time to clear some of those cabinets.”
trans-unit.target: “The plebs have been growing unruly as of late, and we are lacking in certain peacekeeping tools. Perhaps for a reward, you could craft some on your submarine? You've probably got too many resources stockpiled, anyway—time to clear some of those cabinets.”

trans-unit.source: Use the fabricator to craft [number] handcuffs.
trans-unit.target: Use the fabricator to craft [number] handcuffs.

trans-unit.source: You have created enough handcuffs to resupply the Coalition.
trans-unit.target: You have created enough handcuffs to resupply the Coalition.

trans-unit.source: There's enough newly crafted handcuffs. Now you need to ensure they reach their destination.
trans-unit.target: There's enough newly crafted handcuffs. Now you need to ensure they reach their destination.

trans-unit.source: The Coalition has been provided an ample supply of handcuffs.
trans-unit.target: The Coalition has been provided an ample supply of handcuffs.

trans-unit.source: There weren't enough handcuffs aboard the submarine to meet the Coalition's needs.
trans-unit.target: There weren't enough handcuffs aboard the submarine to meet the Coalition's needs.

trans-unit.source: Just as you enter the submarine, your headset emits some static noises. When you're about to check whether or not it's damaged, you hear a voice: \n“Listen carefully. You're transporting high explosive materials to be used in a terrorist attack on civilians. Remember, the Coalition is kind to those who help us.”
trans-unit.target: Just as you enter the submarine, your headset emits some static noises. When you're about to check whether or not it's damaged, you hear a voice: \n“Listen carefully. You're transporting high explosive materials to be used in a terrorist attack on civilians. Remember, the Coalition is kind to those who help us.”

trans-unit.source: Ensure the weapons from the Arms Delivery mission are no longer on the submarine when it docks.
trans-unit.target: Ensure the weapons from the Arms Delivery mission are no longer on the submarine when it docks.

trans-unit.source: The explosives have been disposed of. As long as they stay gone, the Coalition will be pleased.
trans-unit.target: The explosives have been disposed of. As long as they stay gone, the Coalition will be pleased.

trans-unit.source: The explosives were delivered to the separatists.
trans-unit.target: The explosives were delivered to the separatists.

trans-unit.source: To the dismay of your crew and the separatists, the explosives were nowhere to be found.
trans-unit.target: To the dismay of your crew and the separatists, the explosives were nowhere to be found.

trans-unit.source: “A certain activist you're transporting is actually responsible for the bombing of Dank Station. We want the separatist scum to know what it is like to be caught in the blast. It's the one with the fancy hat who calls himself a captain.”
trans-unit.target: “A certain activist you're transporting is actually responsible for the bombing of Dank Station. We want the separatist scum to know what it is like to be caught in the blast. It's the one with the fancy hat who calls himself a captain.”

trans-unit.source: Blow up the VIP you're escorting, an alleged separatist bomber, using a supplied detonator and C-4.
trans-unit.target: Blow up the VIP you're escorting, an alleged separatist bomber, using a supplied detonator and C-4.

trans-unit.source: First, find the detonator and C-4 in a loose vent.
trans-unit.target: First, find the detonator and C-4 in a loose vent.

trans-unit.source: Detonate the C-4 near the VIP.
trans-unit.target: Detonate the C-4 near the VIP.

trans-unit.source: Kaboom. Your task has been completed.
trans-unit.target: Kaboom. Your task has been completed.

trans-unit.source: Well shoot. The C-4 is gone, but the VIP wasn't caught in the blast.
trans-unit.target: Well shoot. The C-4 is gone, but the VIP wasn't caught in the blast.

trans-unit.source: Blow up the alleged separatist bomber using a supplied detonator and C-4.
trans-unit.target: Blow up the alleged separatist bomber using a supplied detonator and C-4.

trans-unit.source: The VIP was caught in the blast radius of an explosion.
trans-unit.target: The VIP was caught in the blast radius of an explosion.

trans-unit.source: The VIP hasn't been harmed by explosives on their voyage.
trans-unit.target: The VIP hasn't been harmed by explosives on their voyage.

trans-unit.source: Detonate the C-4 near the VIP
trans-unit.target: Detonate the C-4 near the VIP

trans-unit.source: “We have strong suspicions [character] is actually the nefarious Sootman, although we have no evidence to back it up. We’ve put a big bounty on their head, dead or alive. Also, about that evidence… We'd like you to plant some.”
trans-unit.target: “We have strong suspicions [character] is actually the nefarious Sootman, although we have no evidence to back it up. We’ve put a big bounty on their head, dead or alive. Also, about that evidence… We'd like you to plant some.”

trans-unit.source: Incapacitate [character], then replace their ID card with the fabricated ID card belonging to the terrorist Sootman. To avoid facial recognition, mask the victim. Don't get caught.
trans-unit.target: Incapacitate [character], then replace their ID card with the fabricated ID card belonging to the terrorist Sootman. To avoid facial recognition, mask the victim. Don't get caught.

trans-unit.source: Someone saw you plant the evidence! Your plan is foiled.
trans-unit.target: Someone saw you plant the evidence! Your plan is foiled.

trans-unit.source: The evidence is planted—now someone needs to discover it…
trans-unit.target: The evidence is planted—now someone needs to discover it…

trans-unit.source: You have covertly planted the evidence—now "Sootman" just has to be found.
trans-unit.target: You have covertly planted the evidence—now "Sootman" just has to be found.

trans-unit.source: The evidence you've planted has been discovered!
trans-unit.target: The evidence you've planted has been discovered!

trans-unit.source: The nefarious Sootman was found aboard your submarine, and you are the hero who took them out. Well done!
trans-unit.target: The nefarious Sootman was found aboard your submarine, and you are the hero who took them out. Well done!

trans-unit.source: Looks like your "Sootman" is up and about again, and your ploy has been discovered.
trans-unit.target: Looks like your "Sootman" is up and about again, and your ploy has been discovered.

trans-unit.source: The crewmate you disguised as Sootman has been resuscitated, and your ploy has been discovered.
trans-unit.target: The crewmate you disguised as Sootman has been resuscitated, and your ploy has been discovered.

trans-unit.source: The terrorist Sootman was found as a part of your crew! No one was more surprised than "Sootman" themself.
trans-unit.target: The terrorist Sootman was found as a part of your crew! No one was more surprised than "Sootman" themself.

trans-unit.source: The requirements of the tasks were not met.
trans-unit.target: The requirements of the tasks were not met.

trans-unit.source: Plant Sootman's ID card and mask
trans-unit.target: Plant Sootman's ID card and mask

trans-unit.source: “Your crew is aiding the oppressors, another boot on the neck of the workers who risk their lives every day. Will you do what is right? All we need is [target]'s ID card…”
trans-unit.target: “Your crew is aiding the oppressors, another boot on the neck of the workers who risk their lives every day. Will you do what is right? All we need is [target]'s ID card…”

trans-unit.source: The Jovian separatists have some designs on [target]'s ID card. Find a way to obtain it.
trans-unit.target: The Jovian separatists have some designs on [target]'s ID card. Find a way to obtain it.

trans-unit.source: You've taken a crewmember's ID card. The separatists seem to have a plan in mind for it.
trans-unit.target: You've taken a crewmember's ID card. The separatists seem to have a plan in mind for it.

trans-unit.source: You've obtained the ID card. Keep it on you until you make it to the station.
trans-unit.target: You've obtained the ID card. Keep it on you until you make it to the station.

trans-unit.source: The separatists have obtained a crewmember's ID card.
trans-unit.target: The separatists have obtained a crewmember's ID card.

trans-unit.source: The security of the crew remains uncompromised…for now.
trans-unit.target: The security of the crew remains uncompromised…for now.

trans-unit.source: You find a wrinkly note in your pocket that you certainly didn't put there yourself. You unfold it and can barely make out the hastily written instructions: \n“You know those weapons you're transporting are going to harm good people—get rid of them and we'll see you're rewarded.”
trans-unit.target: You find a wrinkly note in your pocket that you certainly didn't put there yourself. You unfold it and can barely make out the hastily written instructions: \n“You know those weapons you're transporting are going to harm good people—get rid of them and we'll see you're rewarded.”

trans-unit.source: Ensure the weapons of the Arms Delivery mission are no longer on the submarine when docking.
trans-unit.target: Ensure the weapons of the Arms Delivery mission are no longer on the submarine when docking.

trans-unit.source: The weapons are no longer on the submarine, and the separatists will be pleased—assuming the weapons stay gone.
trans-unit.target: The weapons are no longer on the submarine, and the separatists will be pleased—assuming the weapons stay gone.

trans-unit.source: The weapons were delivered to the Coalition.
trans-unit.target: The weapons were delivered to the Coalition.

trans-unit.source: To the dismay of your crew and the Coalition, the weapons were nowhere to be found.
trans-unit.target: To the dismay of your crew and the Coalition, the weapons were nowhere to be found.

trans-unit.source: “You know when the Coalition says you are transporting ‘a highly esteemed medical expert,’ they mean someone who does horrible experiments on anyone disagreeing with them, right?” The separatist recruiter sounded convincing and gave plenty of evidence of a certain Dr. Happy, to boot. Now they asked you to give the VIP a taste of their own medicine. Even if they survive, it will get the message across.
trans-unit.target: “You know when the Coalition says you are transporting ‘a highly esteemed medical expert,’ they mean someone who does horrible experiments on anyone disagreeing with them, right?” The separatist recruiter sounded convincing and gave plenty of evidence of a certain Dr. Happy, to boot. Now they asked you to give the VIP a taste of their own medicine. Even if they survive, it will get the message across.

trans-unit.source: Poison the VIP using the supplied poison.
trans-unit.target: Poison the VIP using the supplied poison.

trans-unit.source: Find the poison in a loose vent.
trans-unit.target: Find the poison in a loose vent.

trans-unit.source: Inject the VIP with the poison.
trans-unit.target: Inject the VIP with the poison.

trans-unit.source: Looks like VIP stands for “Very Injected with Poison” today. Task completed.
trans-unit.target: Looks like VIP stands for “Very Injected with Poison” today. Task completed.

trans-unit.source: The VIP has not been poisoned.
trans-unit.target: The VIP has not been poisoned.

trans-unit.source: Find the poison in a hiding spot
trans-unit.target: Find the poison in a hiding spot

trans-unit.source: Inject the VIP with the poison
trans-unit.target: Inject the VIP with the poison

trans-unit.source: While the comrades are unhappy that you have chosen to socialize with the ruling class, they are willing to look past this. You have been chosen as the executive muscle for a display of strength, cause and message. The separatist effort has tasked Blind Jim to stash necessary tools inside your vessel. Retrieve the stash and separate the bourgeoisie snakehead from its body, or whatever the missive suggests.
trans-unit.target: While the comrades are unhappy that you have chosen to socialize with the ruling class, they are willing to look past this. You have been chosen as the executive muscle for a display of strength, cause and message. The separatist effort has tasked Blind Jim to stash necessary tools inside your vessel. Retrieve the stash and separate the bourgeoisie snakehead from its body, or whatever the missive suggests.

trans-unit.source: The task is to remove the “head of the snake.” You imagine blowing up the person steering this vessel would symbolically fit the objective.
trans-unit.target: The task is to remove the “head of the snake.” You imagine blowing up the person steering this vessel would symbolically fit the objective.

trans-unit.source: Find the hidden stash in a loose vent.
trans-unit.target: Find the hidden stash in a loose vent.

trans-unit.source: You rummage through the container but find nothing. Maybe you've been discovered, or maybe the stash is in a different location?
trans-unit.target: You rummage through the container but find nothing. Maybe you've been discovered, or maybe the stash is in a different location?

trans-unit.source: You've found the bomb. Now, blow up the person steering the vessel.
trans-unit.target: You've found the bomb. Now, blow up the person steering the vessel.

trans-unit.source: The command room has been bombed!
trans-unit.target: The command room has been bombed!

trans-unit.source: Blowing up the command room failed.
trans-unit.target: Blowing up the command room failed.

trans-unit.source: The command room was not bombed.
trans-unit.target: The command room was not bombed.

trans-unit.source: Blow up the crew at the navigation terminal
trans-unit.target: Blow up the crew at the navigation terminal

trans-unit.source: You find a handkerchief with drawings and incoherent scribbling. Writing runs along the edges: “You know what's funny? Rubber ducks. What's even funnier is rubber ducks filled with lead so that they sink instead of float. We need prototypes. Get to it. Now that's funny.”
trans-unit.target: You find a handkerchief with drawings and incoherent scribbling. Writing runs along the edges: “You know what's funny? Rubber ducks. What's even funnier is rubber ducks filled with lead so that they sink instead of float. We need prototypes. Get to it. Now that's funny.”

trans-unit.source: Use the fabricator to craft [number] Deepdiver Ducks.
trans-unit.target: Use the fabricator to craft [number] Deepdiver Ducks.

trans-unit.source: There's enough Deepdiver Duck prototypes—now you need to ensure they survive the rest of the voyage.
trans-unit.target: There's enough Deepdiver Duck prototypes—now you need to ensure they survive the rest of the voyage.

trans-unit.source: The Children of the Honkmother have prototyped a new Deepdiver Duck. The purpose is unknown, but it's full of potential nonetheless.
trans-unit.target: The Children of the Honkmother have prototyped a new Deepdiver Duck. The purpose is unknown, but it's full of potential nonetheless.

trans-unit.source: The Children of the Honkmother's attempts at prototyping Deepdiver Ducks have failed.
trans-unit.target: The Children of the Honkmother's attempts at prototyping Deepdiver Ducks have failed.

trans-unit.source: You find a note in your pocket.\n\n“The Con-sortium of Very Important Deliveries has chosen you to deliver a very important item to your destination. The item is a seemingly normal (but in reality, a very important) duffel bag, hidden somewhere in your submarine. It is very important that you do not let anyone look inside the bag until it's reached its destination.”
trans-unit.target: You find a note in your pocket.\n\n“The Con-sortium of Very Important Deliveries has chosen you to deliver a very important item to your destination. The item is a seemingly normal (but in reality, a very important) duffel bag, hidden somewhere in your submarine. It is very important that you do not let anyone look inside the bag until it's reached its destination.”

trans-unit.source: Deliver a duffel bag to your destination. For some reason, nobody is supposed to look inside the bag.
trans-unit.target: Deliver a duffel bag to your destination. For some reason, nobody is supposed to look inside the bag.

trans-unit.source: This seems to be the bag the note talked about. Now I'll just need to make sure no one looks inside it…?
trans-unit.target: This seems to be the bag the note talked about. Now I'll just need to make sure no one looks inside it…?

trans-unit.source: You've found the bag. Make sure no one looks inside it.
trans-unit.target: You've found the bag. Make sure no one looks inside it.

trans-unit.source: Oh no! Someone looked inside the bag.
trans-unit.target: Oh no! Someone looked inside the bag.

trans-unit.source: Someone looked inside the bag. The Con-sortium of Very Important Deliveries must be very disappointed in you.
trans-unit.target: Someone looked inside the bag. The Con-sortium of Very Important Deliveries must be very disappointed in you.

trans-unit.source: Nobody has looked into the bag. The Con-sortium of Very Important Deliveries is likely to be pleased.
trans-unit.target: Nobody has looked into the bag. The Con-sortium of Very Important Deliveries is likely to be pleased.

trans-unit.source: Tossing the duffel bag out of the submarine wasn't exactly the Con-sortium of Very Important Deliveries' plan, although they appreciate the creative thinking.
trans-unit.target: Tossing the duffel bag out of the submarine wasn't exactly the Con-sortium of Very Important Deliveries' plan, although they appreciate the creative thinking.

trans-unit.source: Do not let anyone look inside the bag
trans-unit.target: Do not let anyone look inside the bag

trans-unit.source: You find a note in your pocket.\n\n“The Con-sortium of Very Important Deliveries has chosen you, yet again, to deliver a very important item to your destination. Plot twist, though! You do want people to take a peek inside it this time.”
trans-unit.target: You find a note in your pocket.\n\n“The Con-sortium of Very Important Deliveries has chosen you, yet again, to deliver a very important item to your destination. Plot twist, though! You do want people to take a peek inside it this time.”

trans-unit.source: The clowns have tasked you to deliver yet another duffel bag to your destination. This time it's booby trapped with a time bomb and needs to be found as quickly as possible.
trans-unit.target: The clowns have tasked you to deliver yet another duffel bag to your destination. This time it's booby trapped with a time bomb and needs to be found as quickly as possible.

trans-unit.source: This seems to be the bag the note talked about. Now to make sure it's discovered…
trans-unit.target: This seems to be the bag the note talked about. Now to make sure it's discovered…

trans-unit.source: You've found the bag. Make sure someone discovers it.
trans-unit.target: You've found the bag. Make sure someone discovers it.

trans-unit.source: Someone looked inside the bag, and the time bomb has been activated! …All according to plan? Now it should probably be kept from killing everyone on board, but your task is complete regardless.
trans-unit.target: Someone looked inside the bag, and the time bomb has been activated! …All according to plan? Now it should probably be kept from killing everyone on board, but your task is complete regardless.

trans-unit.source: Someone looked inside the bag. The time bomb has been activated—now it should preferably be kept from killing everyone. Regardless though, your task is complete.
trans-unit.target: Someone looked inside the bag. The time bomb has been activated—now it should preferably be kept from killing everyone. Regardless though, your task is complete.

trans-unit.source: Someone was wise enough to just toss the bomb out of the submarine. Time to leave the blast area.
trans-unit.target: Someone was wise enough to just toss the bomb out of the submarine. Time to leave the blast area.

trans-unit.source: A ticking time bomb was tossed out of the submarine.
trans-unit.target: A ticking time bomb was tossed out of the submarine.

trans-unit.source: The bomb was found and chaos ensued.
trans-unit.target: The bomb was found and chaos ensued.

trans-unit.source: You find a note in your pocket.\n\n“The Con-sortium of Very Important Deliveries has chosen you to—well, you know the drill. Do they look inside? Do they not look inside? You'll figure it out.”
trans-unit.target: You find a note in your pocket.\n\n“The Con-sortium of Very Important Deliveries has chosen you to—well, you know the drill. Do they look inside? Do they not look inside? You'll figure it out.”

trans-unit.source: The clowns have tasked you to deliver another explosive duffel bag to your destination. No further instructions have been given, so the plan requires some improvisation.
trans-unit.target: The clowns have tasked you to deliver another explosive duffel bag to your destination. No further instructions have been given, so the plan requires some improvisation.

trans-unit.source: This seems to be the bag the note talked about. Now what…? Inside, there appears to be a battery-powered bomb.
trans-unit.target: This seems to be the bag the note talked about. Now what…? Inside, there appears to be a battery-powered bomb.

trans-unit.source: You've found the bag. It has a battery-powered bomb inside it.
trans-unit.target: You've found the bag. It has a battery-powered bomb inside it.

trans-unit.source: Someone looked inside the bag and the time bomb has been activated.
trans-unit.target: Someone looked inside the bag and the time bomb has been activated.

trans-unit.source: Someone looked inside the bag. The time bomb has been activated.
trans-unit.target: Someone looked inside the bag. The time bomb has been activated.

trans-unit.source: Tick tick tick. You hear some very ominous ticking aboard the submarine. Better check it out.
trans-unit.target: Tick tick tick. You hear some very ominous ticking aboard the submarine. Better check it out.

trans-unit.source: The bomb's inner workings could be accessed by equipping the bomb and a screwdriver.
trans-unit.target: The bomb's inner workings could be accessed by equipping the bomb and a screwdriver.

trans-unit.source: Bomb defusal progress is being made. Should I tell them to cut the red wire as a joke?
trans-unit.target: Bomb defusal progress is being made. Should I tell them to cut the red wire as a joke?

trans-unit.source: The bomb's wires are exposed. Someone skilled in explosives or weapons manufacturing and equipped with a sharp tool could disarm it.
trans-unit.target: The bomb's wires are exposed. Someone skilled in explosives or weapons manufacturing and equipped with a sharp tool could disarm it.

trans-unit.source: Crisis averted—the bomb has been defused.
trans-unit.target: Crisis averted—the bomb has been defused.

trans-unit.source: Phew, the bomb has been defused.
trans-unit.target: Phew, the bomb has been defused.

trans-unit.source: Someone incompetent is cutting wires on the bomb. Your clown friends would love to hear about this.
trans-unit.target: Someone incompetent is cutting wires on the bomb. Your clown friends would love to hear about this.

trans-unit.source: The bomb was found and more chaos ensued.
trans-unit.target: The bomb was found and more chaos ensued.

trans-unit.source: “Honk…” A pause. “Honk…” Closer this time. The Honkmother is calling. And furthermore, she's calling you! The message is clear: Go honk or go home.
trans-unit.target: “Honk…” A pause. “Honk…” Closer this time. The Honkmother is calling. And furthermore, she's calling you! The message is clear: Go honk or go home.

trans-unit.source: They saw me honking, but I should honk unseen. I need to avoid further suspicion.
trans-unit.target: They saw me honking, but I should honk unseen. I need to avoid further suspicion.

trans-unit.source: Honk a bike horn in [halfHulls] rooms unseen. Hide a bike horn in at least [halfCabinets] supplies cabinets. If you need more horns, you should be able to find some in a crate that has just been delivered to the cargo area.
trans-unit.target: Honk a bike horn in [halfHulls] rooms unseen. Hide a bike horn in at least [halfCabinets] supplies cabinets. If you need more horns, you should be able to find some in a crate that has just been delivered to the cargo area.

trans-unit.source: Someone saw me honk. Not ideal.
trans-unit.target: Someone saw me honk. Not ideal.

trans-unit.source: Honk. Just a few more rooms…
trans-unit.target: Honk. Just a few more rooms…

trans-unit.source: The call of the Honkmother has undoubtedly been heard by now. Time for the next step.
trans-unit.target: The call of the Honkmother has undoubtedly been heard by now. Time for the next step.

trans-unit.source: The call of the Honkmother has been heard. Once [halfCabinets] of the supplies cabinets are stocked with bike horns, the call shall be heard again.
trans-unit.target: The call of the Honkmother has been heard. Once [halfCabinets] of the supplies cabinets are stocked with bike horns, the call shall be heard again.

trans-unit.source: You've placed half the bike horns. Good progress!
trans-unit.target: You've placed half the bike horns. Good progress!

trans-unit.source: Your job as the Harbinger of Honks has been completed.
trans-unit.target: Your job as the Harbinger of Honks has been completed.

trans-unit.source: You have earned some rest, having set the honks onto a path of inevitability.
trans-unit.target: You have earned some rest, having set the honks onto a path of inevitability.

trans-unit.source: The honkin' objectives were not completed.
trans-unit.target: The honkin' objectives were not completed.

trans-unit.source: Honk a bike horn in various rooms
trans-unit.target: Honk a bike horn in various rooms

trans-unit.source: Hide a bike horn in supplies cabinets
trans-unit.target: Hide a bike horn in supplies cabinets

trans-unit.source: There was an addendum in the monthly issue of Beacon: “Hard times are upon the Church of Husk. We require aluminum to make a batch of commemorative Velonaceps calyx figurines, but the coffers run dry. All the faithful are called upon to create figures according to their means.”
trans-unit.target: There was an addendum in the monthly issue of Beacon: “Hard times are upon the Church of Husk. We require aluminum to make a batch of commemorative Velonaceps calyx figurines, but the coffers run dry. All the faithful are called upon to create figures according to their means.”

trans-unit.source: Use the fabricator to craft [number] husk figurines.
trans-unit.target: Use the fabricator to craft [number] husk figurines.

trans-unit.source: There's enough husk figurines—now you need to ensure they make it to the end of this voyage.
trans-unit.target: There's enough husk figurines—now you need to ensure they make it to the end of this voyage.

trans-unit.source: The Church of Husk's hard times may soon be over, now that they've been supplied with finely crafted Velonaceps calyx figurines.
trans-unit.target: The Church of Husk's hard times may soon be over, now that they've been supplied with finely crafted Velonaceps calyx figurines.

trans-unit.source: The Church of Husk's struggles know no end. They're lacking both volunteers for communion and Velonaceps calyx figurines.
trans-unit.target: The Church of Husk's struggles know no end. They're lacking both volunteers for communion and Velonaceps calyx figurines.

trans-unit.source: A recent mishap at a Church of Husk initiation rite left the church feeling rather embarrassed. Some of their robes didn't do their intended job of masking the wearer from the husks. Not a good showing for potential recruits, as those wearing the faulty robes got torn to pieces or taken over. Now they're offering a reward for anyone willing to test out the faulty batch.\n\nAll you have to do is get your crew to wear the robes amidst a large group of husks. It may be difficult to convince them to participate—better wait for the husks to board so the crew is more willing to try out the robes.
trans-unit.target: A recent mishap at a Church of Husk initiation rite left the church feeling rather embarrassed. Some of their robes didn't do their intended job of masking the wearer from the husks. Not a good showing for potential recruits, as those wearing the faulty robes got torn to pieces or taken over. Now they're offering a reward for anyone willing to test out the faulty batch.\n\nAll you have to do is get your crew to wear the robes amidst a large group of husks. It may be difficult to convince them to participate—better wait for the husks to board so the crew is more willing to try out the robes.

trans-unit.source: Some Church of Husk robes didn't do their intended job of masking their wearers from the husks. Test which robes are functional and which are faulty by exposing them to the husks—the husks won't attack someone wearing functional robes. Once your tests are complete, get rid of the faulty robes.
trans-unit.target: Some Church of Husk robes didn't do their intended job of masking their wearers from the husks. Test which robes are functional and which are faulty by exposing them to the husks—the husks won't attack someone wearing functional robes. Once your tests are complete, get rid of the faulty robes.

trans-unit.source: Find the robes and the husk caller.
trans-unit.target: Find the robes and the husk caller.

trans-unit.source: Use the husk caller and test the robes.
trans-unit.target: Use the husk caller and test the robes.

trans-unit.source: You've found the supplies. You can use the husk caller to attract husks to your submarine.\n\nFind a way to test which of the robes prevent husks from attacking, and make sure you've gotten rid of the ones that don't before the submarine makes it to the destination.
trans-unit.target: You've found the supplies. You can use the husk caller to attract husks to your submarine.\n\nFind a way to test which of the robes prevent husks from attacking, and make sure you've gotten rid of the ones that don't before the submarine makes it to the destination.

trans-unit.source: Husks have been called! Test the robes, then deconstruct or dump the faulty robes out of the submarine.
trans-unit.target: Husks have been called! Test the robes, then deconstruct or dump the faulty robes out of the submarine.

trans-unit.source: The cultist robes have been sorted. The Church of Husk will be happy to receive their functional robes back.
trans-unit.target: The cultist robes have been sorted. The Church of Husk will be happy to receive their functional robes back.

trans-unit.source: Although no faulty robes were returned to the Church of Husk, they didn't receive all the good robes, either.
trans-unit.target: Although no faulty robes were returned to the Church of Husk, they didn't receive all the good robes, either.

trans-unit.source: Some faulty robes were returned to the Church of Husk, which may cause a few unlucky sods to get bitten in the near future.
trans-unit.target: Some faulty robes were returned to the Church of Husk, which may cause a few unlucky sods to get bitten in the near future.

trans-unit.source: Find the robes and the husk caller
trans-unit.target: Find the robes and the husk caller

trans-unit.source: Dock with only functional robes on board
trans-unit.target: Dock with only functional robes on board

trans-unit.source: You find a note in your pocket. “The Church would like to offer you an assignment. You may or may not believe in our cause, but this is strictly for research purposes.\n\nWe need blood samples from healthy individuals. Your crew would make excellent test subjects. We've hidden some blood sample vials in your sub; find and fill them, and we'll be sure to make it worth your while.”
trans-unit.target: You find a note in your pocket. “The Church would like to offer you an assignment. You may or may not believe in our cause, but this is strictly for research purposes.\n\nWe need blood samples from healthy individuals. Your crew would make excellent test subjects. We've hidden some blood sample vials in your sub; find and fill them, and we'll be sure to make it worth your while.”

trans-unit.source: You've found the vials. Now, they'll need some filling… First, inflict bleeding on a crewmate (in a preferably inconspicuous way), and then use the vial on the bleeding area to collect a sample.
trans-unit.target: You've found the vials. Now, they'll need some filling… First, inflict bleeding on a crewmate (in a preferably inconspicuous way), and then use the vial on the bleeding area to collect a sample.

trans-unit.source: The traitor successfully collected the samples.
trans-unit.target: The traitor successfully collected the samples.

trans-unit.source: “Research of the husk symbiote is progressing, but could be sped up if you ask me. The next experiment is dangerous but crucial for any significant breakthrough to occur. Your blood samples collection suggests [character] is the perfect candidate for symbiosis. It is up to you to convince them to voluntarily agree to the symbiosis, or just inject them against their will.”
trans-unit.target: “Research of the husk symbiote is progressing, but could be sped up if you ask me. The next experiment is dangerous but crucial for any significant breakthrough to occur. Your blood samples collection suggests [character] is the perfect candidate for symbiosis. It is up to you to convince them to voluntarily agree to the symbiosis, or just inject them against their will.”

trans-unit.source: Inject [character] with the provided Calyx extract. Blood tests suggested a good chance for symbiosis to occur.
trans-unit.target: Inject [character] with the provided Calyx extract. Blood tests suggested a good chance for symbiosis to occur.

trans-unit.source: The test subject has been infected. Now we wait.
trans-unit.target: The test subject has been infected. Now we wait.

trans-unit.source: The husk is about to take over the test subject. Soon we will see if the researchers were correct. In any case, my mission has been completed.
trans-unit.target: The husk is about to take over the test subject. Soon we will see if the researchers were correct. In any case, my mission has been completed.

trans-unit.source: The scientific experiment has concluded. The target was successfully infected.
trans-unit.target: The scientific experiment has concluded. The target was successfully infected.

trans-unit.source: The experiment was never completed to the Church of Husk's satisfaction.
trans-unit.target: The experiment was never completed to the Church of Husk's satisfaction.

trans-unit.source: Inject the target with Calyx extract
trans-unit.target: Inject the target with Calyx extract

trans-unit.source: You have succeeded in your mission.
trans-unit.target: You have succeeded in your mission.

trans-unit.source: You have failed your traitorous mission.
trans-unit.target: You have failed your traitorous mission.

trans-unit.source: There are no hidden containers (such as loose vents or panels) in the submarine. Certain traitor events require these to function properly.
trans-unit.target: There are no hidden containers (such as loose vents or panels) in the submarine. Certain traitor events require these to function properly.

trans-unit.source: “Who laughs last…” you mumbled to yourself as you walked through the airlock, into the submarine. They pulled the classic “broken airlock” prank on you, and you did for a moment there think you'd be flushed, crushed and imploded.\n\nLet's see how they react to one of the true classics: the blank ammunition prank. You just need to sabotage one of the coilgun's ammunition boxes a bit…
trans-unit.target: “Who laughs last…” you mumbled to yourself as you walked through the airlock, into the submarine. They pulled the classic “broken airlock” prank on you, and you did for a moment there think you'd be flushed, crushed and imploded.\n\nLet's see how they react to one of the true classics: the blank ammunition prank. You just need to sabotage one of the coilgun's ammunition boxes a bit…

trans-unit.source: You tinkered a bit with the coilgun's ammunition box, meaning it's now utterly useless to kill enemies with. For good measure, you installed some bike horns in there, because why not. If the bike horns sound, you know your prank was successful.
trans-unit.target: You tinkered a bit with the coilgun's ammunition box, meaning it's now utterly useless to kill enemies with. For good measure, you installed some bike horns in there, because why not. If the bike horns sound, you know your prank was successful.

trans-unit.source: The sound of a honk emanating from the tampered ammunition box fills you with joy. Your prank was a success! While you feel like laughing out loud and rubbing it in their faces, you are aware of the potential repercussions. Better wait a day or two, and have a laugh about it later.
trans-unit.target: The sound of a honk emanating from the tampered ammunition box fills you with joy. Your prank was a success! While you feel like laughing out loud and rubbing it in their faces, you are aware of the potential repercussions. Better wait a day or two, and have a laugh about it later.

trans-unit.source: You plan to prank your crewmembers by replacing a coilgun ammunition box with a version that just has blanks. First, obtain a coilgun ammo box, then insert it into a loader and make sure your crew tries to engage an enemy with it.
trans-unit.target: You plan to prank your crewmembers by replacing a coilgun ammunition box with a version that just has blanks. First, obtain a coilgun ammo box, then insert it into a loader and make sure your crew tries to engage an enemy with it.

trans-unit.source: You successfully replaced an ammo box with blanks. It is indistinguishable from the real thing. Insert it into a loader and make sure it is fired [shotsfired] times by someone other than you.
trans-unit.target: You successfully replaced an ammo box with blanks. It is indistinguishable from the real thing. Insert it into a loader and make sure it is fired [shotsfired] times by someone other than you.

trans-unit.source: The sabotaged coilgun ammunition box has been loaded—now you just need to make sure the blanks are fired [shotsfired] times by someone other than you.
trans-unit.target: The sabotaged coilgun ammunition box has been loaded—now you just need to make sure the blanks are fired [shotsfired] times by someone other than you.

trans-unit.source: You successfully pranked the crew with blanks.
trans-unit.target: You successfully pranked the crew with blanks.

trans-unit.source: The traitor successfully pranked the crew with blanks.
trans-unit.target: The traitor successfully pranked the crew with blanks.

trans-unit.source: Insert the blanks into a loader
trans-unit.target: Insert the blanks into a loader

trans-unit.source:
Oof. You feel the lightness of your pockets. “That wretched [victim] did it again…” Foul play HAS to be involved—how can you be this unlucky ALL the time? On the other hand, luck always seems to be in the favor of that wretched [victim]. You know you weren't the only one who lost money yesterday, although the shady gambling room made it hard to see who else was there.

Maybe you can get some of your money back in an old-fashioned robbery. You can play unfair too.

The gambling event was called “[codeword],” so mentioning the “[codeword]” incident might help you identify possible co-conspirators.
trans-unit.target:
Oof. You feel the lightness of your pockets. “That wretched [victim] did it again…” Foul play HAS to be involved—how can you be this unlucky ALL the time? On the other hand, luck always seems to be in the favor of that wretched [victim]. You know you weren't the only one who lost money yesterday, although the shady gambling room made it hard to see who else was there.

Maybe you can get some of your money back in an old-fashioned robbery. You can play unfair too.

The gambling event was called “[codeword],” so mentioning the “[codeword]” incident might help you identify possible co-conspirators.

trans-unit.source: Welp. You are all out of money again, thanks to this gambling event aptly named “[codeword].” Luckily you still have those bandanas from last time this happened, so you can just take the money right back and call it even.\n\nNow, if only you could identify who actually took your money. Unfortunately the lighting was rather dim, but perhaps mentioning “[codeword]” will get you some information from a crewmember.
trans-unit.target: Welp. You are all out of money again, thanks to this gambling event aptly named “[codeword].” Luckily you still have those bandanas from last time this happened, so you can just take the money right back and call it even.\n\nNow, if only you could identify who actually took your money. Unfortunately the lighting was rather dim, but perhaps mentioning “[codeword]” will get you some information from a crewmember.

trans-unit.source: You have your masks, and you have your target. “Let's go…” you and your accomplice whisper to each other. You just have to isolate the [victim] and get your money back. The rest of the crew might disapprove, so make it inconspicuous.
trans-unit.target: You have your masks, and you have your target. “Let's go…” you and your accomplice whisper to each other. You just have to isolate the [victim] and get your money back. The rest of the crew might disapprove, so make it inconspicuous.

trans-unit.source: Robbery successful! Now, better find a way to avoid getting accused of treachery…
trans-unit.target: Robbery successful! Now, better find a way to avoid getting accused of treachery…

trans-unit.source: Find your accomplice to rob your target with.
trans-unit.target: Find your accomplice to rob your target with.

trans-unit.source: The target is [victim]. Ensure your accomplice knows who you're robbing.
trans-unit.target: The target is [victim]. Ensure your accomplice knows who you're robbing.

trans-unit.source: You have bandanas. Share them with your accomplice in order to stay hidden.
trans-unit.target: You have bandanas. Share them with your accomplice in order to stay hidden.

trans-unit.source: You're ready to go. Isolate your target, knock them unconscious with a blunt tool or weapon, and rob them!
trans-unit.target: You're ready to go. Isolate your target, knock them unconscious with a blunt tool or weapon, and rob them!

trans-unit.source: You successfully robbed your target. Now deny or deflect any accusations!
trans-unit.target: You successfully robbed your target. Now deny or deflect any accusations!

trans-unit.source: You and your accomplice successfully robbed the target. And got away with it, too!
trans-unit.target: You and your accomplice successfully robbed the target. And got away with it, too!

trans-unit.source: Two robbers successfully stole from their target without getting accused.
trans-unit.target: Two robbers successfully stole from their target without getting accused.

trans-unit.source: The two robbers were caught attempting to steal from their target.
trans-unit.target: The two robbers were caught attempting to steal from their target.

trans-unit.source: Use a blunt instrument to knock the victim unconscious
trans-unit.target: Use a blunt instrument to knock the victim unconscious

trans-unit.source: Rob the victim while they're unconscious
trans-unit.target: Rob the victim while they're unconscious

trans-unit.source: You've gotten yourself in quite a preduckament. All signs induckate yet another preducktable trip from outpost to outpost. Without feather ado, you started Operation: “[codeword].” You do reckon you need some help, and you already know who fits the bill.\n\nYou ducktate to them what to do: “What's this? A submarine woefully underpopulated by ducks?!…”
trans-unit.target: You've gotten yourself in quite a preduckament. All signs induckate yet another preducktable trip from outpost to outpost. Without feather ado, you started Operation: “[codeword].” You do reckon you need some help, and you already know who fits the bill.\n\nYou ducktate to them what to do: “What's this? A submarine woefully underpopulated by ducks?!…”

trans-unit.source: “…A large influx of DUCKS outta put a stop to that.”\n\nAfter a very seducktive speech, the leader of Operation: “[codeword]” promptly quacked off. You were convinced from the words “more ducks,” but you didn't get all the plan details nor their identity. Waddle we do now? Mentioning “[codeword]” might be a good start.
trans-unit.target: “…A large influx of DUCKS outta put a stop to that.”\n\nAfter a very seducktive speech, the leader of Operation: “[codeword]” promptly quacked off. You were convinced from the words “more ducks,” but you didn't get all the plan details nor their identity. Waddle we do now? Mentioning “[codeword]” might be a good start.

trans-unit.source: You found the a-duck-ately large stash of ducks. Time to get producktive and fill up the ballast tanks with them.
trans-unit.target: You found the a-duck-ately large stash of ducks. Time to get producktive and fill up the ballast tanks with them.

trans-unit.source: Find the duck stash. Guide your partners of misconduckt to the stash. Use the codeword “[codeword]” to identify them.
trans-unit.target: Find the duck stash. Guide your partners of misconduckt to the stash. Use the codeword “[codeword]” to identify them.

trans-unit.source: Follow the lead of the operation leader. Use the codeword “[codeword]” to identify them.
trans-unit.target: Follow the lead of the operation leader. Use the codeword “[codeword]” to identify them.

trans-unit.source: Finish the mission with an a-duck-ate number of ducks. Ensure nobody removes the ducks (or replenish them if necessary).
trans-unit.target: Finish the mission with an a-duck-ate number of ducks. Ensure nobody removes the ducks (or replenish them if necessary).

trans-unit.source: Duckies are endangered! Replenish the ballast tanks!
trans-unit.target: Duckies are endangered! Replenish the ballast tanks!

trans-unit.source: Fill ballast tanks with [number] ducks. Progress is being made.
trans-unit.target: Fill ballast tanks with [number] ducks. Progress is being made.

trans-unit.source: You and your partners of misconduckt successfully duckified the ballast tanks.
trans-unit.target: You and your partners of misconduckt successfully duckified the ballast tanks.

trans-unit.source: Fowl play! Two ducking traitors successfully duckified the ballast tanks.
trans-unit.target: Fowl play! Two ducking traitors successfully duckified the ballast tanks.

trans-unit.source: All signs in-duck-ate two traitors failed at their fowl play.
trans-unit.target: All signs in-duck-ate two traitors failed at their fowl play.

trans-unit.source: A-duck-ate number of ducks in ballast
trans-unit.target: A-duck-ate number of ducks in ballast

trans-unit.source:
You wake up from a fever dream. Beads of sweat have collected on your forehead, but you're not bothered by all that. You still remember your dream vividly, and it must have had some meaning to it. In it, a person taken over by the husk infection slowly approached you, and you had no way to move—your limbs were completely frozen. But! Instead of brutally attacking and murdering you, the Velonaceps calyx radiated calmness and compassion. They WANT to save us, if we'll let them!

As long as we show our faith and truly BELIEVE, we can do anything. Although your crew is full of blasphemous non-believers, you'll ensure the submarine will be turned into a temple worthy of the husks' blessing. You do hope you might enlist some people to your cause, though.

Studies have shown that believing in husks as saviors can be linked to an interest in [codeword]. Mentioning [codeword] might find you some allies.
trans-unit.target:
You wake up from a fever dream. Beads of sweat have collected on your forehead, but you're not bothered by all that. You still remember your dream vividly, and it must have had some meaning to it. In it, a person taken over by the husk infection slowly approached you, and you had no way to move—your limbs were completely frozen. But! Instead of brutally attacking and murdering you, the Velonaceps calyx radiated calmness and compassion. They WANT to save us, if we'll let them!

As long as we show our faith and truly BELIEVE, we can do anything. Although your crew is full of blasphemous non-believers, you'll ensure the submarine will be turned into a temple worthy of the husks' blessing. You do hope you might enlist some people to your cause, though.

Studies have shown that believing in husks as saviors can be linked to an interest in [codeword]. Mentioning [codeword] might find you some allies.

trans-unit.source: One of your crewmembers was having a fever dream last night; you could hear their shouts and screams followed by an eerie calmness and murmurs of “praise the husks.”Seems like someone found their religion in their dreams and, you won't lie, you're kinda into that. Lacking any kind of conviction yourself, you often look for others to follow, sometimes just to interrupt the tedious day-to-day grind. Sounds like you found yourself a new temporary source of entertainment.\n\nStudies have shown that believing in husks as saviors can be linked to an interest in [codeword]. Mentioning [codeword] might get you involved.
trans-unit.target: One of your crewmembers was having a fever dream last night; you could hear their shouts and screams followed by an eerie calmness and murmurs of “praise the husks.”Seems like someone found their religion in their dreams and, you won't lie, you're kinda into that. Lacking any kind of conviction yourself, you often look for others to follow, sometimes just to interrupt the tedious day-to-day grind. Sounds like you found yourself a new temporary source of entertainment.\n\nStudies have shown that believing in husks as saviors can be linked to an interest in [codeword]. Mentioning [codeword] might get you involved.

trans-unit.source: You found a miraculously infinite stash of husk figurines! Surely a sign you're on the right track. Better inform your fellow cultists of this…
trans-unit.target: You found a miraculously infinite stash of husk figurines! Surely a sign you're on the right track. Better inform your fellow cultists of this…

trans-unit.source: The submarine has been transformed into a temple worshipping the Velonaceps calyx, and rather tastefully too. However, clearly this is not enough, as a new idea popped into your head: Prove the power of the husks by replacing the fuel rod in the reactor with a husk figurine.
trans-unit.target: The submarine has been transformed into a temple worshipping the Velonaceps calyx, and rather tastefully too. However, clearly this is not enough, as a new idea popped into your head: Prove the power of the husks by replacing the fuel rod in the reactor with a husk figurine.

trans-unit.source: Guess your faith in the husks might have been a bit overrated and not actually capable of magically fueling the nuclear reactor. That's not really part of the Church of Husk's faith anyways, you remember now. Oh well, it was just a fever dream, after all. Time to move on.
trans-unit.target: Guess your faith in the husks might have been a bit overrated and not actually capable of magically fueling the nuclear reactor. That's not really part of the Church of Husk's faith anyways, you remember now. Oh well, it was just a fever dream, after all. Time to move on.

trans-unit.source: Turn the submarine into a shrine to worship the Velonaceps calyx. Use the codeword “[codeword]” to identify fellow husk worshippers.
trans-unit.target: Turn the submarine into a shrine to worship the Velonaceps calyx. Use the codeword “[codeword]” to identify fellow husk worshippers.

trans-unit.source: codeword “[codeword]” to identify the leader and fellow husk worshippers.
trans-unit.target: codeword “[codeword]” to identify the leader and fellow husk worshippers.

trans-unit.source: Use the miraculously near-infinite stash of husk figurines to sanctify the submarine. Attach husk figurines in [percentage]% of the rooms in the submarine.
trans-unit.target: Use the miraculously near-infinite stash of husk figurines to sanctify the submarine. Attach husk figurines in [percentage]% of the rooms in the submarine.

trans-unit.source: Replace the fuel rod in the nuclear reactor with a husk figurine.
trans-unit.target: Replace the fuel rod in the nuclear reactor with a husk figurine.

trans-unit.source: You're all done! Hopefully you haven't been acting so suspiciously that anyone would accuse you of treason.
trans-unit.target: You're all done! Hopefully you haven't been acting so suspiciously that anyone would accuse you of treason.

trans-unit.source: Use the miraculously near-infinite stash of husk figurines to sanctify the submarine. You're halfway there!
trans-unit.target: Use the miraculously near-infinite stash of husk figurines to sanctify the submarine. You're halfway there!

trans-unit.source: You and your co-conspirators successfully represented your faith. Unfortunately the reactor still seems to prefer fuel rods over figurines.
trans-unit.target: You and your co-conspirators successfully represented your faith. Unfortunately the reactor still seems to prefer fuel rods over figurines.

trans-unit.source: Traitors decorated the submarine with figurines and replaced the fuel rod. To what end? Only those silly husk worshippers would know.
trans-unit.target: Traitors decorated the submarine with figurines and replaced the fuel rod. To what end? Only those silly husk worshippers would know.

trans-unit.source: Traitors tried to use husk figurines as an alternative to fuel rods. A bad idea and a worse execution.
trans-unit.target: Traitors tried to use husk figurines as an alternative to fuel rods. A bad idea and a worse execution.

trans-unit.source: Replace the fuel rods in the reactor
trans-unit.target: Replace the fuel rods in the reactor

trans-unit.source: You were contacted by the Church of Husk: “We acknowledge having a symbiote growing inside your throat may be a bit scary for some people, so we would like to research the psychological effects of the threat of the husk infection, in order to be able to treat it effectively…”\n\nAttached with the message were three syringes, two of which don't do anything, one of which contains the Velonaceps calyx in advanced stages. You'll be running the “[codeword]” test group, for a small monetary reward.
trans-unit.target: You were contacted by the Church of Husk: “We acknowledge having a symbiote growing inside your throat may be a bit scary for some people, so we would like to research the psychological effects of the threat of the husk infection, in order to be able to treat it effectively…”\n\nAttached with the message were three syringes, two of which don't do anything, one of which contains the Velonaceps calyx in advanced stages. You'll be running the “[codeword]” test group, for a small monetary reward.

trans-unit.source: You were contacted by the Church of Husk: “We acknowledge having a symbiote growing inside your throat may be a bit scary for some people, so we would like to research the psychological effects of the threat of the husk infection, in order to be able to treat it effectively…”\n\nThe message states you are part of the “[codeword]” test group. You'll be given a randomized syringe to inject yourself with that either contains the Velonaceps calyx, also known as husk infection, or does absolutely nothing. Find your group leader to take part, and receive a small monetary reward.
trans-unit.target: You were contacted by the Church of Husk: “We acknowledge having a symbiote growing inside your throat may be a bit scary for some people, so we would like to research the psychological effects of the threat of the husk infection, in order to be able to treat it effectively…”\n\nThe message states you are part of the “[codeword]” test group. You'll be given a randomized syringe to inject yourself with that either contains the Velonaceps calyx, also known as husk infection, or does absolutely nothing. Find your group leader to take part, and receive a small monetary reward.

trans-unit.source: You have your syringe—now it's time to inject yourself. Try to be subtle about it, as the rest of the crew might not appreciate such risks.
trans-unit.target: You have your syringe—now it's time to inject yourself. Try to be subtle about it, as the rest of the crew might not appreciate such risks.

trans-unit.source: Hand out two of the three syringes to the test group. Use the codeword “[codeword]” to identify fellow testers.
trans-unit.target: Hand out two of the three syringes to the test group. Use the codeword “[codeword]” to identify fellow testers.

trans-unit.source: Receive a syringe from the test group's leader. Use the codeword “[codeword]” to identify fellow testers.
trans-unit.target: Receive a syringe from the test group's leader. Use the codeword “[codeword]” to identify fellow testers.

trans-unit.source: Survive, help your fellow testers to survive, and deflect any accusations.
trans-unit.target: Survive, help your fellow testers to survive, and deflect any accusations.

trans-unit.source: You and your fellow test subjects gathered useful data on the psychological effects of husk infections.
trans-unit.target: You and your fellow test subjects gathered useful data on the psychological effects of husk infections.

trans-unit.source: Some treasonous lackeys of the Church of Husk gathered useful data on the psychological effects of husk infections.
trans-unit.target: Some treasonous lackeys of the Church of Husk gathered useful data on the psychological effects of husk infections.

trans-unit.source: Traitors were tasked to gather useful data on the psychological effects of husk infections, but did not complete this task.
trans-unit.target: Traitors were tasked to gather useful data on the psychological effects of husk infections, but did not complete this task.

trans-unit.source:
Tack-tack-tack-tack. With chattering teeth you practically embrace the somewhat heated pipes running along the walls of the submarine. The chill air sends shivers through your spine, and you frantically try to rub your hands together before they go numb. “Why is it always so darned cold here?” you think to yourself. “Would turning up the heating just a tiny bit really hurt our fuel consumption?!”

In the distance, you see a fellow crewmember buried in blankets, and hear a familiar sound: “tack-tack-tack.” Perhaps together you could heat up the submarine?

You vaguely recall someone else complaining about the cold earlier on the radio too. Perhaps you could all heat up the submarine? Use the codeword “[codeword]” to find the other freezing crewmates.
trans-unit.target:
Tack-tack-tack-tack. With chattering teeth you practically embrace the somewhat heated pipes running along the walls of the submarine. The chill air sends shivers through your spine, and you frantically try to rub your hands together before they go numb. “Why is it always so darned cold here?” you think to yourself. “Would turning up the heating just a tiny bit really hurt our fuel consumption?!”

In the distance, you see a fellow crewmember buried in blankets, and hear a familiar sound: “tack-tack-tack.” Perhaps together you could heat up the submarine?

You vaguely recall someone else complaining about the cold earlier on the radio too. Perhaps you could all heat up the submarine? Use the codeword “[codeword]” to find the other freezing crewmates.

trans-unit.source: Looks like someone stashed strong booze in the hidden compartment. This should come in useful.
trans-unit.target: Looks like someone stashed strong booze in the hidden compartment. This should come in useful.

trans-unit.source: Light fires aboard the submarine simultaneously with your co-conspirator. Use the codeword “[codeword]” to identify fellow traitors.
trans-unit.target: Light fires aboard the submarine simultaneously with your co-conspirator. Use the codeword “[codeword]” to identify fellow traitors.

trans-unit.source: Find items to help you start a fire.
trans-unit.target: Find items to help you start a fire.

trans-unit.source: Have fire raging in a total of [rooms] different rooms, at the same time.
trans-unit.target: Have fire raging in a total of [rooms] different rooms, at the same time.

trans-unit.source: Have fire raging in a total of [rooms] different rooms, at the same time. The submarine is getting warmer—repeat [amount] more times.
trans-unit.target: Have fire raging in a total of [rooms] different rooms, at the same time. The submarine is getting warmer—repeat [amount] more times.

trans-unit.source: Aah, the warmth is spreading through your body. You feel revitalized.
trans-unit.target: Aah, the warmth is spreading through your body. You feel revitalized.

trans-unit.source: You and your co-conspirators finally feel warm again. All it took was setting half the submarine alight for a mere moment!
trans-unit.target: You and your co-conspirators finally feel warm again. All it took was setting half the submarine alight for a mere moment!

trans-unit.source: Traitors successfully set the submarine aflame to warm themselves up.
trans-unit.target: Traitors successfully set the submarine aflame to warm themselves up.

trans-unit.source: Traitors failed to warm themselves up enough.
trans-unit.target: Traitors failed to warm themselves up enough.

trans-unit.source: Wait for the fires to go out
trans-unit.target: Wait for the fires to go out

trans-unit.source: You have created [number] prototype ducks as requested. They're magnificent.
trans-unit.target: You have created [number] prototype ducks as requested. They're magnificent.

trans-unit.source: You have devotedly created [number] husk figurines and you're sad to have to part with them.
trans-unit.target: You have devotedly created [number] husk figurines and you're sad to have to part with them.

trans-unit.source: Find the empty vials, then collect blood samples from half of your crewmates.
trans-unit.target: Find the empty vials, then collect blood samples from half of your crewmates.

trans-unit.source: You've now collected blood samples from half the crew. The Church of Husk will be pleased.
trans-unit.target: You've now collected blood samples from half the crew. The Church of Husk will be pleased.

trans-unit.source: Confined to your calamitous coffin, with the same sweaty sailors for company day by day, moment to month. You need to feel freedom, the air caressing your exposed body. It's time to get those clothes off.
trans-unit.target: Confined to your calamitous coffin, with the same sweaty sailors for company day by day, moment to month. You need to feel freedom, the air caressing your exposed body. It's time to get those clothes off.

trans-unit.source: You finally feel free again! At last! Now, to keep it up for the entire remainder of the tumultuous trip, without arousing too much suspicion or outrage.
trans-unit.target: You finally feel free again! At last! Now, to keep it up for the entire remainder of the tumultuous trip, without arousing too much suspicion or outrage.

trans-unit.source: Take off any clothes that might restrict or cover you. This includes diving suits, but excludes headwear or gear covering a small part of the body.
trans-unit.target: Take off any clothes that might restrict or cover you. This includes diving suits, but excludes headwear or gear covering a small part of the body.

trans-unit.source: Complete the mission without covering yourself. Avoid being suspected of eccentric behavior.
trans-unit.target: Complete the mission without covering yourself. Avoid being suspected of eccentric behavior.

trans-unit.source: I went an entire mission without covering myself, and there was barely a complaint about it!
trans-unit.target: I went an entire mission without covering myself, and there was barely a complaint about it!

trans-unit.source: The traitor went an entire mission without covering themselves with clothes or a diving suit. Hats off to them.
trans-unit.target: The traitor went an entire mission without covering themselves with clothes or a diving suit. Hats off to them.

trans-unit.source: Going without clothes on for the entire journey has failed. Another victim to the shackles of a prude society.
trans-unit.target: Going without clothes on for the entire journey has failed. Another victim to the shackles of a prude society.

trans-unit.source: The Original Clown Experience™. You aren't currently tormenting any crewmembers with bike horns. An absolute disgrace, which you plan to rectify IMMEDIATELY.
trans-unit.target: The Original Clown Experience™. You aren't currently tormenting any crewmembers with bike horns. An absolute disgrace, which you plan to rectify IMMEDIATELY.

trans-unit.source: You've found the Bike Horn. “Well done…” you hear your imaginary clown colleagues congratulating you.\n\nNow to find [character] and become their worst nightmare. Of course, all the other crew should think you're innocent, so try not to be too obvious about it. Finally, you should ensure the torment lasts the entire journey, so pausing a bit between honks is mandatory.
trans-unit.target: You've found the Bike Horn. “Well done…” you hear your imaginary clown colleagues congratulating you.\n\nNow to find [character] and become their worst nightmare. Of course, all the other crew should think you're innocent, so try not to be too obvious about it. Finally, you should ensure the torment lasts the entire journey, so pausing a bit between honks is mandatory.

trans-unit.source: Find a Bike Horn, then torment [victim] with it. Collateral damage should be avoided, so try not to honk when other crewmembers might see you. Honk [honks] times, with at least a [cooldown] second interval to really let that honk sink in.
trans-unit.target: Find a Bike Horn, then torment [victim] with it. Collateral damage should be avoided, so try not to honk when other crewmembers might see you. Honk [honks] times, with at least a [cooldown] second interval to really let that honk sink in.

trans-unit.source: You obtained a Bike Horn. Honking time!
trans-unit.target: You obtained a Bike Horn. Honking time!

trans-unit.source: The traitor successfully tormented one crewmember.
trans-unit.target: The traitor successfully tormented one crewmember.

trans-unit.source: Torment your victim with your Bike Horn
trans-unit.target: Torment your victim with your Bike Horn

trans-unit.source: The [loser] vessel has been defeated by the [winner] crew!
trans-unit.target: The [loser] vessel has been defeated by the [winner] crew!

trans-unit.source: There's an active ‖color:gui.orange‖beacon station‖end‖ in this passageway, which helps human habitation spread into nearby locations.
trans-unit.target: There's an active ‖color:gui.orange‖beacon station‖end‖ in this passageway, which helps human habitation spread into nearby locations.

trans-unit.source: There's an inactive ‖color:gui.orange‖beacon station‖end‖ in this passageway. Getting it back online will make it easier for human habitation to spread into nearby locations.
trans-unit.target: There's an inactive ‖color:gui.orange‖beacon station‖end‖ in this passageway. Getting it back online will make it easier for human habitation to spread into nearby locations.

trans-unit.source: A creature from the Abyss has made this passageway its ‖color:gui.orange‖hunting grounds‖end‖. Until the beast is dead, new outposts won't be established in the adjacent locations, and existing outposts may get abandoned.
trans-unit.target: A creature from the Abyss has made this passageway its ‖color:gui.orange‖hunting grounds‖end‖. Until the beast is dead, new outposts won't be established in the adjacent locations, and existing outposts may get abandoned.

trans-unit.source: Select a destination and leave the passageway
trans-unit.target: Select a destination and leave the passageway

trans-unit.source: You cannot undock from the outpost before the mission is completed.
trans-unit.target: You cannot undock from the outpost before the mission is completed.

trans-unit.source: The hostages have been located, but still need to be escorted out of the outpost safely. You may want to take their handcuffs off and order them to follow you.
trans-unit.target: The hostages have been located, but still need to be escorted out of the outpost safely. You may want to take their handcuffs off and order them to follow you.

trans-unit.source: A sliding door with no integrated buttons—has to be wired manually.
trans-unit.target: A sliding door with no integrated buttons—has to be wired manually.

trans-unit.source: A sliding door with a window. No integrated buttons—has to be wired manually.
trans-unit.target: A sliding door with a window. No integrated buttons—has to be wired manually.

trans-unit.source: A door, but on the horizontal axis. No integrated buttons—has to be wired manually.
trans-unit.target: A door, but on the horizontal axis. No integrated buttons—has to be wired manually.

trans-unit.target: A sliding door with two integrated buttons.
