trans-unit.target: A sliding door with a window and two integrated buttons.

trans-unit.source: A door, but on the horizontal axis. Two integrated buttons.
trans-unit.target: A door, but on the horizontal axis. Two integrated buttons.

trans-unit.source: Usable device for setting the course of the sub.
trans-unit.target: Usable device for setting the course of the sub.

trans-unit.source: Usable device for setting the course of the shuttle.
trans-unit.target: Usable device for setting the course of the shuttle.

trans-unit.source: Usable device for observing the sub's sonar. Non-interactive.
trans-unit.target: Usable device for observing the sub's sonar. Non-interactive.

trans-unit.source: Usable device for viewing a schematic of the sub as well as the status of each room.
trans-unit.target: Usable device for viewing a schematic of the sub as well as the status of each room.

trans-unit.source: Sonar generator, allowing the sonar monitors and navigation terminals to receive a sonar signal other than the default one (useful for drones and remote-controlled shuttles).
trans-unit.target: Sonar generator, allowing the sonar monitors and navigation terminals to receive a sonar signal other than the default one (useful for drones and remote-controlled shuttles).

trans-unit.source: Usable device for generating motion on the X axis.
trans-unit.target: Usable device for generating motion on the X axis.

trans-unit.source: Usable device for generating motion on the X axis.
trans-unit.target: Usable device for generating motion on the X axis.

trans-unit.source: Usable device for generating motion on the X axis.
trans-unit.target: Usable device for generating motion on the X axis.

trans-unit.source: A machine capable of manufacturing a wide range of items out of basic raw materials.
trans-unit.target: A machine capable of manufacturing a wide range of items out of basic raw materials.

trans-unit.source: A machine that can be used to manufacture various medicines.
trans-unit.target: A machine that can be used to manufacture various medicines.

trans-unit.source: Disassembles and breaks down items to reusable components and material bars.
trans-unit.target: Disassembles and breaks down items to reusable components and material bars.

trans-unit.source: Usable device for oxygen generation—must be linked to vents to work. Also recharges oxygen tanks.
trans-unit.target: Usable device for oxygen generation—must be linked to vents to work. Also recharges oxygen tanks.

trans-unit.source: Usable device for oxygen generation—must be linked to vents to work. Also recharges oxygen tanks.
trans-unit.target: Usable device for oxygen generation—must be linked to vents to work. Also recharges oxygen tanks.

trans-unit.source: Oxygen output point. Must be linked to an oxygen generator to work.
trans-unit.target: Oxygen output point. Must be linked to an oxygen generator to work.

trans-unit.source: Usable device for generating electrical power.
trans-unit.target: Usable device for generating electrical power.

trans-unit.source: A rapid-firing turret that propels metal bolts using electromagnets. Generally not very effective against large or heavily armored targets, but ideal for taking down smaller enemies.
trans-unit.target: A rapid-firing turret that propels metal bolts using electromagnets. Generally not very effective against large or heavily armored targets, but ideal for taking down smaller enemies.

trans-unit.source: Feeds coilgun ammunition into a linked coilgun.
trans-unit.target: Feeds coilgun ammunition into a linked coilgun.

trans-unit.source: Deploys a depth charge or decoy.
trans-unit.target: Deploys a depth charge or decoy.

trans-unit.source: Feeds depth charges and decoys into a linked depth charge tube.
trans-unit.target: Feeds depth charges and decoys into a linked depth charge tube.

trans-unit.source: Produces a harmful localized electrical shock across a portion of the adjacent hull.
trans-unit.target: Produces a harmful localized electrical shock across a portion of the adjacent hull.

trans-unit.source: A heavy turret that uses electromagnetic force to launch shells at very high velocities. Requires very large surges of power (usually supplied by supercapacitors) and has a low rate of fire, and as such it's most often used against large and heavily armored targets.
trans-unit.target: A heavy turret that uses electromagnetic force to launch shells at very high velocities. Requires very large surges of power (usually supplied by supercapacitors) and has a low rate of fire, and as such it's most often used against large and heavily armored targets.

trans-unit.source: A device that can be used to observe the outside of the sub by connecting it to a camera, or to control weapons such as the railgun and coilgun.
trans-unit.target: A device that can be used to observe the outside of the sub by connecting it to a camera, or to control weapons such as the railgun and coilgun.

trans-unit.source: Feeds railgun ammunition into a linked railgun.
trans-unit.target: Feeds railgun ammunition into a linked railgun.

trans-unit.source: Feeds railgun ammunition into a linked railgun. Single shot version.
trans-unit.target: Feeds railgun ammunition into a linked railgun. Single shot version.

trans-unit.source: Feeds railgun ammunition into a linked railgun. Single shot version.
trans-unit.target: Feeds railgun ammunition into a linked railgun. Single shot version.

trans-unit.source: A way to neatly stow ammunition boxes.
trans-unit.target: A way to neatly stow ammunition boxes.

trans-unit.source: An empty weapon station turrets can be installed on.
trans-unit.target: An empty weapon station turrets can be installed on.

trans-unit.source: A pellet fired out of a canister shell.
trans-unit.target: A pellet fired out of a canister shell.

trans-unit.source: A large pulsed chemical laser attached to a turret, capable of firing intense beams of energy after charging up. Inflicts extreme burns on anything it hits.
trans-unit.target: A large pulsed chemical laser attached to a turret, capable of firing intense beams of energy after charging up. Inflicts extreme burns on anything it hits.

trans-unit.source: A box of arranged chemicals and a focusing lens, useful for inducing intense bursts of energy. Used as ammo by the Pulse Laser.
trans-unit.target: A box of arranged chemicals and a focusing lens, useful for inducing intense bursts of energy. Used as ammo by the Pulse Laser.

trans-unit.source: A powerful multiple-barrel turreted weapon, based on coilgun technology. Though somewhat unwieldy and slow to wind up to its firing state, its capability to deliver a hail of high-velocity metal at any would-be foe is unparalleled.
trans-unit.target: A powerful multiple-barrel turreted weapon, based on coilgun technology. Though somewhat unwieldy and slow to wind up to its firing state, its capability to deliver a hail of high-velocity metal at any would-be foe is unparalleled.

trans-unit.source: A heavy box of ammo for the Chaingun.
trans-unit.target: A heavy box of ammo for the Chaingun.

trans-unit.source: An empty weapon station large turrets can be installed on.
trans-unit.target: An empty weapon station large turrets can be installed on.

trans-unit.source: A double-barreled version of the coilgun.
trans-unit.target: A double-barreled version of the coilgun.

trans-unit.source: A large cannon, designed to fire shells that explode into sharp shrapnel fragments.
trans-unit.target: A large cannon, designed to fire shells that explode into sharp shrapnel fragments.

trans-unit.source: A heavy box of wide-spread shrapnel ammo for the flak cannon. Good against swarms.
trans-unit.target: A heavy box of wide-spread shrapnel ammo for the flak cannon. Good against swarms.

trans-unit.source: A heavy box of low spread ammo for the flak cannon. Good against single targets.
trans-unit.target: A heavy box of low spread ammo for the flak cannon. Good against single targets.

trans-unit.source: A backbreakingly heavy box of ammo for the flak cannon, utilizing Physicorium as its main material.
trans-unit.target: A backbreakingly heavy box of ammo for the flak cannon, utilizing Physicorium as its main material.

trans-unit.source: A heavy box of ammo for the flak cannon, loaded with high explosive materials.
trans-unit.target: A heavy box of ammo for the flak cannon, loaded with high explosive materials.

trans-unit.source: Allows limited access to areas of the sub.
trans-unit.target: Allows limited access to areas of the sub.

trans-unit.source: A handgun powered by alien power cells.
trans-unit.target: A handgun powered by alien power cells.

trans-unit.source: A token of the captain's unquestionable authority.
trans-unit.target: A token of the captain's unquestionable authority.

trans-unit.source: Makes you look like you might be in charge.
trans-unit.target: Makes you look like you might be in charge.

trans-unit.source: A heads-up display that shows information about the vital signs and status of nearby humans.
trans-unit.target: A heads-up display that shows information about the vital signs and status of nearby humans.

trans-unit.source: Makes you look like you might be useful in a medical emergency.
trans-unit.target: Makes you look like you might be useful in a medical emergency.

trans-unit.source: The fire-resistant fabric offers some protection against fires.
trans-unit.target: The fire-resistant fabric offers some protection against fires.

trans-unit.target: The fire-resistant fabric offers some protection against fires.

trans-unit.source: A portable container for storing tools and supplies.
trans-unit.target: A portable container for storing tools and supplies.

trans-unit.source: Allows remote communication among the crew.
trans-unit.target: Allows remote communication among the crew.

trans-unit.source: Makes you look like you might offer a mission to a passerby at any moment.
trans-unit.target: Makes you look like you might offer a mission to a passerby at any moment.

trans-unit.source: While the body armor won't offer adequate protection against most of the inhabitants of the subsurface ocean, it can be extremely useful if there are traitors on board.
trans-unit.target: While the body armor won't offer adequate protection against most of the inhabitants of the subsurface ocean, it can be extremely useful if there are traitors on board.

trans-unit.source: While the helmet won't offer adequate protection against most of the inhabitants of the subsurface ocean, it can be extremely useful if there are traitors on board.
trans-unit.target: While the helmet won't offer adequate protection against most of the inhabitants of the subsurface ocean, it can be extremely useful if there are traitors on board.

trans-unit.source: Blocks projectiles and prevents creatures or people from passing.
trans-unit.target: Blocks projectiles and prevents creatures or people from passing.

trans-unit.source: Small enough to carry around in case it's needed, but won't protect you from the water pressure in the event of a full-blown hull breach.
trans-unit.target: Small enough to carry around in case it's needed, but won't protect you from the water pressure in the event of a full-blown hull breach.

trans-unit.source: An atmospheric diving suit capable of withstanding the immense pressure under Europa's crust. Only offers adequate protection up to the depth of 4,000 meters—beyond this point, an Abyss or Combat suit is required.
trans-unit.target: An atmospheric diving suit capable of withstanding the immense pressure under Europa's crust. Only offers adequate protection up to the depth of 4,000 meters—beyond this point, an Abyss or Combat suit is required.

trans-unit.source: A severely damaged diving suit that could be deconstructed for some raw materials.
trans-unit.target: A severely damaged diving suit that could be deconstructed for some raw materials.

trans-unit.source: One of the most crucial tools on board the submarine. Also works underwater.
trans-unit.target: One of the most crucial tools on board the submarine. Also works underwater.

trans-unit.source: Cuts through various materials using a jet of ionized oxygen.
trans-unit.target: Cuts through various materials using a jet of ionized oxygen.

trans-unit.source: Makes electrical repairs and rewiring possible.
trans-unit.target: Makes electrical repairs and rewiring possible.

trans-unit.source: Forces doors and hatches open. Also a blunt weapon.

trans-unit.source: Produces a localized signal that can be detected by a sonar monitor, handheld sonar, or navigation terminal.

trans-unit.target: Temporary handheld light. Useful for marking a path while exploring outside the sub. Burns for longer than a regular flare.

trans-unit.target: A simple explosive compound made of sodium and phosphorus.

trans-unit.target: A compound made of C-4 and incendium.

trans-unit.source: A device that detonates any contained explosive when receiving a signal.

trans-unit.target: A harpoon for the harpoon gun.

trans-unit.source: Used as a power source for various handheld devices. Most submarines have several stationary backup batteries with recharge docks for battery cells.

trans-unit.source: A battery cell constructed of the rare and poorly understood compound Fulgurium.

trans-unit.target: A sturdy piece of a moloch's shell.

trans-unit.source: For calming the nerves when the sea is stormy.

trans-unit.source: Has a protective lead shielding against radiation.

trans-unit.source: A well-worn cap that has seen many ports.

trans-unit.source: A warm jacket to protect its wearer against the cold depths.
trans-unit.target: A warm jacket to protect its wearer against the cold depths.

trans-unit.source: I ain't got time to bleed.

trans-unit.source: Designed for crowd control but equally useful against alien invaders.

trans-unit.source: Not much to look at, but pretty warm and comfortable.

trans-unit.source: For friends and enemies alike. Mostly enemies.

trans-unit.source: A tactical weapon, available in black and slightly darker black.
trans-unit.target: A tactical weapon, available in black and slightly darker black.

trans-unit.source: Gets rid of pests like nothing else. Patent pending.
trans-unit.target: Gets rid of pests like nothing else. Patent pending.

trans-unit.source: Temporary handheld light. Useful for marking a path while exploring outside the sub.

trans-unit.source: This medical contraption, when used, bestows the user with permanent performance enhancement.

trans-unit.source: A heavy, hard material derived from processing a spent fuel rod. Can be further fabricated into tools and munitions.

trans-unit.source: A small handheld device with a screen displaying the current status of the ship, informing the user of any breaches remotely.
trans-unit.target: A small handheld device with a screen displaying the current status of the ship, informing the user of any breaches remotely.

trans-unit.source: A device that remotely detects and visualizes electrical fields, allowing an engineer to detect power and signals traveling through wires and to read the values of the signals from a device's connection panel.
trans-unit.target: A device that remotely detects and visualizes electrical fields, allowing an engineer to detect power and signals traveling through wires and to read the values of the signals from a device's connection panel.

trans-unit.source: A roughly engineered automatic shotgun with a vast ammo capacity. Its size and heft makes it a bit cumbersome to lug around.
trans-unit.target: A roughly engineered automatic shotgun with a vast ammo capacity. Its size and heft makes it a bit cumbersome to lug around.

trans-unit.source: A humongous beast of a revolver, designed to better deal with the large alien threats on Europa than typical firearms.
trans-unit.target: A humongous beast of a revolver, designed to better deal with the large alien threats on Europa than typical firearms.

trans-unit.source: An exceedingly large .61 revolver round. The unique alloy of materials allows for high penetration and stopping power.
trans-unit.target: An exceedingly large .61 revolver round. The unique alloy of materials allows for high penetration and stopping power.

trans-unit.source: A small medal fashioned out of copper, originally created by the Coalition. When applied to another crewmember's body, it instantly bestows them with a sum of experience.
trans-unit.target: A small medal fashioned out of copper, originally created by the Coalition. When applied to another crewmember's body, it instantly bestows them with a sum of experience.

trans-unit.source: A small medal fashioned out of bronze, originally created by the Coalition. When applied to another crewmember's body, it instantly bestows them with a large sum of experience.
trans-unit.target: A small medal fashioned out of bronze, originally created by the Coalition. When applied to another crewmember's body, it instantly bestows them with a large sum of experience.

trans-unit.source: An assault rifle chambering 6.8mm cartridges. Though banned by the Coalition, the schematics for these rifles are still passed around Europa as they present a premier option for submarine defense, or as the Separatists would prefer, societal revolution.
trans-unit.target: An assault rifle chambering 6.8mm cartridges. Though banned by the Coalition, the schematics for these rifles are still passed around Europa as they present a premier option for submarine defense, or as the Separatists would prefer, societal revolution.

trans-unit.source: A magazine designed for holding 6.8mm cartridges.
trans-unit.target: A magazine designed for holding 6.8mm cartridges.

trans-unit.source: A .30 caliber rifle with a manual reload mechanism. Slow rate of fire for unskilled users.
trans-unit.target: A .30 caliber rifle with a manual reload mechanism. Slow rate of fire for unskilled users.

trans-unit.source: A .30 caliber round for the rifle.
trans-unit.target: A .30 caliber round for the rifle.

trans-unit.source: Heavy Machine Gun, capable of dealing a lot of damage, provided the user is skilled enough to handle the recoil.
trans-unit.target: Heavy Machine Gun, capable of dealing a lot of damage, provided the user is skilled enough to handle the recoil.

trans-unit.source: A magazine of 5.56mm rounds for the HMG
trans-unit.target: A magazine of 5.56mm rounds for the HMG

trans-unit.source: Round of a Heavy Machine Gun
trans-unit.target: Round of a Heavy Machine Gun

trans-unit.source: An advanced harpoon gun, powered by an energy source to launch harpoons at high velocities.
trans-unit.target: An advanced harpoon gun, powered by an energy source to launch harpoons at high velocities.

trans-unit.source: A high rate of fire automatic weapon, using .45 (SMG) caliber magazines. Hard to aim.
trans-unit.target: A high rate of fire automatic weapon, using .45 (SMG) caliber magazines. Hard to aim.

trans-unit.source: A large and heavy titanium wrench. Can only be properly swung by very burly mechanics.
trans-unit.target: A large and heavy titanium wrench. Can only be properly swung by very burly mechanics.

trans-unit.source: A handheld weapon based on electric discharge coil technology. Fires a high-voltage electrical arc.
trans-unit.target: A handheld weapon based on electric discharge coil technology. Fires a high-voltage electrical arc.

trans-unit.source: A bulky and unwieldy set of iron plates, fashioned into something that resembles armor.
trans-unit.target: A bulky and unwieldy set of iron plates, fashioned into something that resembles armor.

trans-unit.source: A very simple and very heavy helmet that covers the entire face.
trans-unit.target: A very simple and very heavy helmet that covers the entire face.

trans-unit.source: A heavy powered suit originally designed for underwater construction work. Well-armored and capable of carrying substantial loads.
trans-unit.target: A heavy powered suit originally designed for underwater construction work. Well-armored and capable of carrying substantial loads.

trans-unit.source: Launches syrettes containing drugs or poisons. Has a higher capacity and integrated health scanner.
trans-unit.target: Launches syrettes containing drugs or poisons. Has a higher capacity and integrated health scanner.

trans-unit.source: A crate large enough to fit a prankster inside.
trans-unit.target: A crate large enough to fit a prankster inside.

trans-unit.source: A grenade filled with acid, causing acid burns when it explodes.
trans-unit.target: A grenade filled with acid, causing acid burns when it explodes.

trans-unit.source: Ammunition for grenade launcher. Filled with acid, causing acid burns when it explodes.
trans-unit.target: Ammunition for grenade launcher. Filled with acid, causing acid burns when it explodes.

trans-unit.source: A small handheld device with a screen, capable of easily finding items within the submarine.
trans-unit.target: A small handheld device with a screen, capable of easily finding items within the submarine.

trans-unit.source: Crate storage shelves that can be manually installed on a submarine.
trans-unit.target: Crate storage shelves that can be manually installed on a submarine.

trans-unit.source: A sharp sword to commemorate graduating. It takes varied skills to use it to it's highest potential.
trans-unit.target: A sharp sword to commemorate graduating. It takes varied skills to use it to it's highest potential.

trans-unit.source: A shotgun slug containing explosive material. Powerful, but still somewhat inaccurate on account of being fired out of a shotgun.
trans-unit.target: A shotgun slug containing explosive material. Powerful, but still somewhat inaccurate on account of being fired out of a shotgun.

trans-unit.source: A hand axe, meant to be wielded with both hands.
trans-unit.target: A hand axe, meant to be wielded with both hands.

trans-unit.source: A small handbook that covers all the tasks associated with underwater sailing, though in limited scope.
trans-unit.target: A small handbook that covers all the tasks associated with underwater sailing, though in limited scope.

trans-unit.source: A small handbook with useful information pertaining to all things submarine warfare, with detailed pictures of elaborate tactical manuevers and proper firearms discipline.
trans-unit.target: A small handbook with useful information pertaining to all things submarine warfare, with detailed pictures of elaborate tactical manuevers and proper firearms discipline.

trans-unit.source: A small handbook containing detailed information on the most-often-encountered technical problems on board the submarines of Europa, with simple-to-understand instructions for dealing with them.
trans-unit.target: A small handbook containing detailed information on the most-often-encountered technical problems on board the submarines of Europa, with simple-to-understand instructions for dealing with them.

trans-unit.source: A small handbook seeking to educate its reader on the proper conduct with treating the wounded and the sick using limited medical resources. The word "triage" appears to be mentioned a lot.
trans-unit.target: A small handbook seeking to educate its reader on the proper conduct with treating the wounded and the sick using limited medical resources. The word "triage" appears to be mentioned a lot.

trans-unit.source: A thermal imaging device that makes it easier to distinguish living targets in poor lighting conditions, even through solid obstacles.
trans-unit.target: A thermal imaging device that makes it easier to distinguish living targets in poor lighting conditions, even through solid obstacles.

trans-unit.source: A handheld device that can be used to remotely control the submarine's reactor.
trans-unit.target: A handheld device that can be used to remotely control the submarine's reactor.

trans-unit.source: An explosive compound mixed with highly radioactive material. Though the explosive payload is low, the ensuing fallout will catastrophically irradiate the area.
trans-unit.target: An explosive compound mixed with highly radioactive material. Though the explosive payload is low, the ensuing fallout will catastrophically irradiate the area.

trans-unit.source: An especially dirty bomb built for nefarious purposes.
trans-unit.target: An especially dirty bomb built for nefarious purposes.

trans-unit.source: A prototype energy weapon built using the unique alien materials on Europa. The weapon induces a type of fission reaction at the end of the barrel, and releases it in a powerful beam once it is too violent to contain.
trans-unit.target: A prototype energy weapon built using the unique alien materials on Europa. The weapon induces a type of fission reaction at the end of the barrel, and releases it in a powerful beam once it is too violent to contain.

trans-unit.source: An underwater scooter special-made to transport material underwater. While the scooter is too large to be stored in one's inventory, its inherent buoyancy means the scooter will stay where you leave it.
trans-unit.target: An underwater scooter special-made to transport material underwater. While the scooter is too large to be stored in one's inventory, its inherent buoyancy means the scooter will stay where you leave it.

trans-unit.source: A clown mask combined with a diving mask, allowing the user to both clown around and breathe underwater.
trans-unit.target: A clown mask combined with a diving mask, allowing the user to both clown around and breathe underwater.

trans-unit.source: A special harness made to reduce workplace related injuries incurred on Europan submarines. The harness also dampens the effects of rushing water, stabilizing the user in the event of a hull breach.
trans-unit.target: A special harness made to reduce workplace related injuries incurred on Europan submarines. The harness also dampens the effects of rushing water, stabilizing the user in the event of a hull breach.

trans-unit.source: A submariner's life is mentally taxing, but perhaps this exquisitely crafted cigar can help you soothe your nerves a bit.
trans-unit.target: A submariner's life is mentally taxing, but perhaps this exquisitely crafted cigar can help you soothe your nerves a bit.

trans-unit.source: A highly potent stun gun dart that will drop any would-be creep like a sack of potatoes.
trans-unit.target: A highly potent stun gun dart that will drop any would-be creep like a sack of potatoes.

trans-unit.source: Emits a cloud of chemical sealant that quickly seals off leaks.
trans-unit.target: Emits a cloud of chemical sealant that quickly seals off leaks.

trans-unit.source: A small battery-powered pump that can be installed on walls. Pumps out water very fast, but consumes a lot of power.
trans-unit.target: A small battery-powered pump that can be installed on walls. Pumps out water very fast, but consumes a lot of power.

trans-unit.source: A highly advanced stimulant that makes the user rapidly recover from physical injuries and bloodloss.
trans-unit.target: A highly advanced stimulant that makes the user rapidly recover from physical injuries and bloodloss.

trans-unit.source: Fabricated from the poorly understood alien material dementonite. Holding it evokes a strange sense of unease.
trans-unit.target: Fabricated from the poorly understood alien material dementonite. Holding it evokes a strange sense of unease.

trans-unit.source: A mass of alien genetic material. Use a research station to identify the material and to process it into something that can be inserted into a gene splicer.
trans-unit.target: A mass of alien genetic material. Use a research station to identify the material and to process it into something that can be inserted into a gene splicer.

trans-unit.source: Increases resistance to physical damage by [value]%
trans-unit.target: Increases resistance to physical damage by [value]%

trans-unit.source: Decreases the subject's oxygen consumption by [value]%.
trans-unit.target: Decreases the subject's oxygen consumption by [value]%.

trans-unit.source: Increases movement speed on land by [value]%.
trans-unit.target: Increases movement speed on land by [value]%.

trans-unit.source: Allows the subject to to do [value]% more damage with melee weapons.
trans-unit.target: Allows the subject to to do [value]% more damage with melee weapons.

trans-unit.source: Makes the subject's physical injuries heal at a rate of [value]% per minute.
trans-unit.target: Makes the subject's physical injuries heal at a rate of [value]% per minute.

trans-unit.source: Receiving physical damage makes the subject gain [value]% vigor.
trans-unit.target: Receiving physical damage makes the subject gain [value]% vigor.

trans-unit.source: A more advanced form of the gene splicer, capable of activating two types of genetic materials at the same time.

trans-unit.source: Mantis Energy keeps you skittering from dawn till dusk!

trans-unit.source: A heavy box of ammunition for the chaingun. Designed to shred through flesh and armor of any enemy.
trans-unit.target: A heavy box of ammunition for the chaingun. Designed to shred through flesh and armor of any enemy.

trans-unit.source: Ammunition for a shotgun. Less lethal.

trans-unit.source: A disposable diving suit capable of withstanding the immense pressure under Europa's crust.

trans-unit.target: Field-programmable gate array—a multipurpose circuit that can be reconfigured for use in a large variety of electrical devices.

trans-unit.target: A relatively mild opioid obtained from aquatic poppy. Most commonly used to manufacture morphine and fentanyl.

trans-unit.source: Used as an ingredient in the manufacture of various medicines. On its own, can be used to slow down the effects of most toxins.
trans-unit.target: Used as an ingredient in the manufacture of various medicines. On its own, can be used to slow down the effects of most toxins.

trans-unit.source: A strong acid that causes burns when in contact with skin. Used as an ingredient in several poisons.
trans-unit.target: A strong acid that causes burns when in contact with skin. Used as an ingredient in several poisons.

trans-unit.source: A powerful opiate for treating pain associated with internal injuries, but will cause shortness of breath and eventual dependency with overuse.
trans-unit.target: A powerful opiate for treating pain associated with internal injuries, but will cause shortness of breath and eventual dependency with overuse.

trans-unit.target: An antidote for acute morbusine poisoning.

trans-unit.target: An antidote for acute sufforin poisoning.

trans-unit.target: An antidote for acute deliriumine poisoning.

trans-unit.source: Slows down cellular degradation caused by radiation.
trans-unit.target: Slows down cellular degradation caused by radiation.

trans-unit.source: Temporarily increases muscular strength and physical performance.
trans-unit.target: Temporarily increases muscular strength and physical performance.

trans-unit.source: An extremely potent muscle stimulant for those moments when you gotta go fast.
trans-unit.target: An extremely potent muscle stimulant for those moments when you gotta go fast.

trans-unit.target: A highly potent neurotoxin that causes an eventual shutdown of lungs and muscles, greatly hindering movement.

trans-unit.source: A sedative that can be used to knock someone out for a short period of time.
trans-unit.target: A sedative that can be used to knock someone out for a short period of time.

trans-unit.target: A highly radioactive substance that causes radiation sickness and eventual liquefaction of inner organs.

trans-unit.source: A highly unstable liquid that may explode when subjected to heat or physical shock.
trans-unit.target: A highly unstable liquid that may explode when subjected to heat or physical shock.

trans-unit.source: A silvery-white powder. Used to fabricate Tonic Liquid.
trans-unit.target: A silvery-white powder. Used to fabricate Tonic Liquid.

trans-unit.source: A soft, lightweight metal. Used in the manufacture of diving equipment and some military applications.
trans-unit.target: A soft, lightweight metal. Used in the manufacture of diving equipment and some military applications.

trans-unit.source: A hard and strong metal. Used for creating the durable Titanium-Aluminium alloy, as well as military applications.
trans-unit.target: A hard and strong metal. Used for creating the durable Titanium-Aluminium alloy, as well as military applications.

trans-unit.source: A weakly radioactive, silvery metal. Can be refined to create longer lasting fuel rods.

trans-unit.source: A strong metal alloy of iron and carbon. Used in fuel rod manufacturing, as well as many military applications.

trans-unit.source: A very tough metal alloy. Used in durable diving gear and advanced weaponry.
trans-unit.target: A very tough metal alloy. Used in durable diving gear and advanced weaponry.

trans-unit.source: An easily shaped, synthetic material. Contains Silicon and Carbon. Used in circuitry and various equipment.
trans-unit.target: An easily shaped, synthetic material. Contains Silicon and Carbon. Used in circuitry and various equipment.

trans-unit.source: Strong fiber strung from plastic and titanium. Used in the manufacture of armor.
trans-unit.target: Strong fiber strung from plastic and titanium. Used in the manufacture of armor.

trans-unit.source: Fiber created from plants. Used in the manufacture of clothing and bandages.

trans-unit.source: A tough and elastic substance. Used in the manufacture of diving gear and other equipment.
trans-unit.target: A tough and elastic substance. Used in the manufacture of diving gear and other equipment.

trans-unit.source: A quick burning powder, composed of magnesium and potassium. Used in flares and explosives.
trans-unit.target: A quick burning powder, composed of magnesium and potassium. Used in flares and explosives.

trans-unit.source: The foliage of this plant cannot be torn, only stretched. Can be processed into elastin.

trans-unit.source: It's warm to the touch. Can be processed into opium.

trans-unit.source: Modify the quantity of items to be spawned on the sub initially
trans-unit.target: Modify the quantity of items to be spawned on the sub initially

trans-unit.source: Higher tier submarines are more advanced, costlier and better equipped than lower-tier submarines. They can also be upgraded further than lower tier submarines.
trans-unit.target: Higher tier submarines are more advanced, costlier and better equipped than lower-tier submarines. They can also be upgraded further than lower tier submarines.

trans-unit.source: A submarine's class describes what kinds of tasks it was primarily designed for. The class also affects how far certain features of the submarine can be upgraded.
trans-unit.target: A submarine's class describes what kinds of tasks it was primarily designed for. The class also affects how far certain features of the submarine can be upgraded.

trans-unit.source: Submarine tier and class affect the number of available upgrades, as well as the maximum upgrade level per category. Higher tier submarines can be upgraded further than lower tier submarines. Class can raise the maximum upgrade level of matching categories even higher.
trans-unit.target: Submarine tier and class affect the number of available upgrades, as well as the maximum upgrade level per category. Higher tier submarines can be upgraded further than lower tier submarines. Class can raise the maximum upgrade level of matching categories even higher.

trans-unit.source: Scout class submarines are fast and agile. Their engines and turret visibility ranges can be upgraded further than other classes, and they support mineral scanner installations.
trans-unit.target: Scout class submarines are fast and agile. Their engines and turret visibility ranges can be upgraded further than other classes, and they support mineral scanner installations.

trans-unit.source: Designed for combat, attack submarines are tough and heavily armed. Their turrets can be upgraded further than other classes.
trans-unit.target: Designed for combat, attack submarines are tough and heavily armed. Their turrets can be upgraded further than other classes.

trans-unit.source: Transport submarines have plenty of space for cargo and are well equipped for collecting and processing resources. Their fabricators, deconstructors and fuel efficiency can be upgraded further than other classes, and they support mineral scanner installations.
trans-unit.target: Transport submarines have plenty of space for cargo and are well equipped for collecting and processing resources. Their fabricators, deconstructors and fuel efficiency can be upgraded further than other classes, and they support mineral scanner installations.

trans-unit.source: A former military vessel, WH4-L3 "Humpback" has been outfitted to withstand most of the dangers in deep Europa. Her relatively high velocity is offset by low maneuverability. As she's still boasting an older model reactor, power needs to be supplemented by a backup battery array or the crew will find themselves unable to run all of the new equipment.
trans-unit.target: A former military vessel, WH4-L3 "Humpback" has been outfitted to withstand most of the dangers in deep Europa. Her relatively high velocity is offset by low maneuverability. As she's still boasting an older model reactor, power needs to be supplemented by a backup battery array or the crew will find themselves unable to run all of the new equipment.

trans-unit.source: Latest in the line of personnel transports, Bunyip is capable of ferrying crew between submarines and installations. Its operating radius is considerably lower than its more advanced cousins and no weapons on board makes it vulnerable to attacks.
trans-unit.target: Latest in the line of personnel transports, Bunyip is capable of ferrying crew between submarines and installations. Its operating radius is considerably lower than its more advanced cousins and no weapons on board makes it vulnerable to attacks.

trans-unit.source: The workhorse of the colonies, these little shuttles have good speed and dive/ascent characteristics, but they are fragile and their low-capacity batteries limit their range somewhat.
trans-unit.target: The workhorse of the colonies, these little shuttles have good speed and dive/ascent characteristics, but they are fragile and their low-capacity batteries limit their range somewhat.

trans-unit.source: With a relatively high top speed and fantastic ascent and descent characteristics due to her 3 large ballast tanks, Orca class subs are agile vessels, let down only by their small compliment of weapons, unreliable engine and reactors with a greater than average hunger for fuel.
trans-unit.target: With a relatively high top speed and fantastic ascent and descent characteristics due to her 3 large ballast tanks, Orca class subs are agile vessels, let down only by their small compliment of weapons, unreliable engine and reactors with a greater than average hunger for fuel.

trans-unit.source: A range of customization options are available for Remora. In this model, some of the main hull space has been replaced by a detachable ballast and a remote-controlled drone. A large crew is needed to operate this submarine.
trans-unit.target: A range of customization options are available for Remora. In this model, some of the main hull space has been replaced by a detachable ballast and a remote-controlled drone. A large crew is needed to operate this submarine.

trans-unit.source: Typhon class subs are known for their brutish appearance, reasonable array of light and heavy firepower, and their general dependability. Any captain should be aware of their poor rate of descent and unimpressive top speed.
trans-unit.target: Typhon class subs are known for their brutish appearance, reasonable array of light and heavy firepower, and their general dependability. Any captain should be aware of their poor rate of descent and unimpressive top speed.

trans-unit.source: Compared to larger vessels, the Dugong series is overshadowed in all aspects except one: Their reliability for their price is world class. They're lacking in firepower and speed, so smart maneuvering is key.
trans-unit.target: Compared to larger vessels, the Dugong series is overshadowed in all aspects except one: Their reliability for their price is world class. They're lacking in firepower and speed, so smart maneuvering is key.

trans-unit.source: The workhorse of the colonies, these little shuttles have good speed and dive/ascent characteristics, but they are fragile and their low-capacity batteries limit their range somewhat.
trans-unit.target: The workhorse of the colonies, these little shuttles have good speed and dive/ascent characteristics, but they are fragile and their low-capacity batteries limit their range somewhat.

trans-unit.source: Originally intended as research vessels, Venture shuttles have been co-opted as a more robust alternative for travel between outposts and submarines.
trans-unit.target: Originally intended as research vessels, Venture shuttles have been co-opted as a more robust alternative for travel between outposts and submarines.

trans-unit.source: The Kastrull is a dependable attack sub class bringing plenty of firepower to any fight, and although it's not very nimble, it does sport a drone gunship as standard. Keep in mind that with its experimental open ballast tanks, low tolerance to flooding and numerous crew stations, a large, experienced crew will get the most out of this sub.
trans-unit.target: The Kastrull is a dependable attack sub class bringing plenty of firepower to any fight, and although it's not very nimble, it does sport a drone gunship as standard. Keep in mind that with its experimental open ballast tanks, low tolerance to flooding and numerous crew stations, a large, experienced crew will get the most out of this sub.

trans-unit.source: For when you need extra room to stretch your legs or want some space between you and the poor, choose Hemulen shuttles.
trans-unit.target: For when you need extra room to stretch your legs or want some space between you and the poor, choose Hemulen shuttles.

trans-unit.source: Typhon 2 is an overhauled version of the venerable Typhon class of sub. Serving as a heavy gunship, the Typhon 2 class subs remain slow and ugly, but with the benefit of better survivability for their crews.
trans-unit.target: Typhon 2 is an overhauled version of the venerable Typhon class of sub. Serving as a heavy gunship, the Typhon 2 class subs remain slow and ugly, but with the benefit of better survivability for their crews.

trans-unit.source: Superior speed, sleek design and quality-of-life systems make this submarine a favorite among wealthy Coalition captains who manage to make it to retirement.
trans-unit.target: Superior speed, sleek design and quality-of-life systems make this submarine a favorite among wealthy Coalition captains who manage to make it to retirement.

trans-unit.source: R-29 is a heavyweight transport ship. While not terribly well armed against Europa's underwater denizens, it has been retrofitted with two powerful electric discharge coils. Original design by rav2n.
trans-unit.target: R-29 is a heavyweight transport ship. While not terribly well armed against Europa's underwater denizens, it has been retrofitted with two powerful electric discharge coils. Original design by rav2n.

trans-unit.source: Barsuk is a favorite among beginner captains. Using materials out of recycled hulls of destroyed submarines (many of which were Barsuks anyway) keeps the price of the line down. Over the years, a subculture of Barsuk-enthusiasts has formed around customizing and tuning their vessels.
trans-unit.target: Barsuk is a favorite among beginner captains. Using materials out of recycled hulls of destroyed submarines (many of which were Barsuks anyway) keeps the price of the line down. Over the years, a subculture of Barsuk-enthusiasts has formed around customizing and tuning their vessels.

trans-unit.source: Originally manufactured by Archsteel Yards in New Iapetus, Winterhalter submarines were only in production for a year until they were acquired by the Coalition for research purposes. Many surviving models come equipped with an onboard research laboratory, and they are heavily armed.
trans-unit.target: Originally manufactured by Archsteel Yards in New Iapetus, Winterhalter submarines were only in production for a year until they were acquired by the Coalition for research purposes. Many surviving models come equipped with an onboard research laboratory, and they are heavily armed.

trans-unit.source: With its varied weaponry, Herja submarines are equipped for encounters against most expected and unexpected run-ins with the denizens of Europa. A reliable workhorse in the Coalition fleet. If a monster nest has been cleared nearby, chances are high that it was a Herja that did the deed.
trans-unit.target: With its varied weaponry, Herja submarines are equipped for encounters against most expected and unexpected run-ins with the denizens of Europa. A reliable workhorse in the Coalition fleet. If a monster nest has been cleared nearby, chances are high that it was a Herja that did the deed.

trans-unit.source: Successor for the classic Orca series, this submarine boasts the same three-ballast setup which allows it to ascend and descend with only a moment's notice. Well armed and equipped for a scout vessel, Orca2 is capable of taking on all but the most dangerous denizens of Europa.
trans-unit.target: Successor for the classic Orca series, this submarine boasts the same three-ballast setup which allows it to ascend and descend with only a moment's notice. Well armed and equipped for a scout vessel, Orca2 is capable of taking on all but the most dangerous denizens of Europa.

trans-unit.source: Medical Logistics) submarine is best known as the Camel. The Camel has an extensive medic bay and ample cargo space, but it handles flooding poorly. The front ballast tank is a liability, and some less-liked crewmembers may have found an untimely death in an "accident" there. Trivia: The two humps are welded to the submarine during missions, but they can still be detached relatively easily when needed to supply heavier equipment to stations.
trans-unit.target: Medical Logistics) submarine is best known as the Camel. The Camel has an extensive medic bay and ample cargo space, but it handles flooding poorly. The front ballast tank is a liability, and some less-liked crewmembers may have found an untimely death in an "accident" there. Trivia: The two humps are welded to the submarine during missions, but they can still be detached relatively easily when needed to supply heavier equipment to stations.

trans-unit.source: Type "on" or "off" to either connect batteries to power grid or disconnect them. Enter a number from 0 to 100 to set recharge rate for each battery at once.
trans-unit.target: Type "on" or "off" to either connect batteries to power grid or disconnect them. Enter a number from 0 to 100 to set recharge rate for each battery at once.

trans-unit.source: Enter a value between 0 and 100 to set battery array recharge rate.
trans-unit.target: Enter a value between 0 and 100 to set battery array recharge rate.

trans-unit.source:
Day 1 of the expedition out of Meltwater. We're navigating through a newly discovered gap in the ice, trying to find a shorter route to Novaya Moskva.

It's not the safest of missions, but hopefully it'll be my last. Should be able to retire after this one.

Day 3. Cap says the whole voyage shouldn't take more than six days. By my reckoning that should place us somewhere around halfway there.

Course there's always a chance this cave doesn't actually have an exit and we'll have to turn back.

Day 4. Now if I were a superstitious man, I'd wager that saying the worst outcome in any given situation out loud makes it come true. Turns out this route is a dead end.

Captain is bummed out. I share his disappointment. It'll take a few days longer to get to an outpost now that we have to go back.

Day 8. There was a hole in the ice here. It's gone now. Icebergs must've moved and closed it. We've started broadcasting our position in hopes that someone picks it up. They're joking now, asking me why I chose my last expedition to get lost at sea.

Day 9. We're rationing food and water. Crew is getting ornery.

Day 11? 12? No response. Food's running out. More concerned about water, myself. Don't feel like writing any more.

Day 30-ish, who cares anymore? I'm surrounded by dead men. Pale husks of men slumped on the floor. Some of their eyes still move, but they're dead nonetheless.
trans-unit.target:
Day 1 of the expedition out of Meltwater. We're navigating through a newly discovered gap in the ice, trying to find a shorter route to Novaya Moskva.

It's not the safest of missions, but hopefully it'll be my last. Should be able to retire after this one.

Day 3. Cap says the whole voyage shouldn't take more than six days. By my reckoning that should place us somewhere around halfway there.

Course there's always a chance this cave doesn't actually have an exit and we'll have to turn back.

Day 4. Now if I were a superstitious man, I'd wager that saying the worst outcome in any given situation out loud makes it come true. Turns out this route is a dead end.

Captain is bummed out. I share his disappointment. It'll take a few days longer to get to an outpost now that we have to go back.

Day 8. There was a hole in the ice here. It's gone now. Icebergs must've moved and closed it. We've started broadcasting our position in hopes that someone picks it up. They're joking now, asking me why I chose my last expedition to get lost at sea.

Day 9. We're rationing food and water. Crew is getting ornery.

Day 11? 12? No response. Food's running out. More concerned about water, myself. Don't feel like writing any more.

Day 30-ish, who cares anymore? I'm surrounded by dead men. Pale husks of men slumped on the floor. Some of their eyes still move, but they're dead nonetheless.

trans-unit.source:
Replaying last outgoing transmissions.
[2451-3-4 11:33] DG-35 calling for Tara colony. Do you read?
[2451-3-4 11:35] Tara colony, do you read? We're taking heavy hits to our topside!
[2451-3-4 11:35] Look at the size of that thing!
[2451-3-4 12:02] We managed to take down the attacker, but the hull is heavily damaged. Requesting rescue from anyone who receives this call.
[2451-3-4 12:06] Hello?
trans-unit.target:
Replaying last outgoing transmissions.
[2451-3-4 11:33] DG-35 calling for Tara colony. Do you read?
[2451-3-4 11:35] Tara colony, do you read? We're taking heavy hits to our topside!
[2451-3-4 11:35] Look at the size of that thing!
[2451-3-4 12:02] We managed to take down the attacker, but the hull is heavily damaged. Requesting rescue from anyone who receives this call.
[2451-3-4 12:06] Hello?

trans-unit.source: This message will be both my farewell and confession. I was tasked to smuggle this sonar beacon on board and turn it on when we were a safe distance away. It turns out it was set to a frequency that attracts monsters. I was promised a shuttle was picking me up when the task was done but they never showed.\n\nThis is the last time I accept a "research assignment" from a big-shoe. Or anyone, for that matter. May they honk in hell.
trans-unit.target: This message will be both my farewell and confession. I was tasked to smuggle this sonar beacon on board and turn it on when we were a safe distance away. It turns out it was set to a frequency that attracts monsters. I was promised a shuttle was picking me up when the task was done but they never showed.\n\nThis is the last time I accept a "research assignment" from a big-shoe. Or anyone, for that matter. May they honk in hell.

trans-unit.source: Increasing the fission rate makes the reactor consume more fuel and generate more heat. The heat is used to spin the turbine, which generates electricity.
trans-unit.target: Increasing the fission rate makes the reactor consume more fuel and generate more heat. The heat is used to spin the turbine, which generates electricity.

trans-unit.source: The higher the turbine output, the more the reactor attempts to generate electricity. If the output is too high relative to the fission rate, the reactor will cool down, and if too low, it will overheat.
trans-unit.target: The higher the turbine output, the more the reactor attempts to generate electricity. If the output is too high relative to the fission rate, the reactor will cool down, and if too low, it will overheat.

trans-unit.source: The temperature of the reactor core. The temperature is optimal when the bar is between the red indicators.
trans-unit.target: The temperature of the reactor core. The temperature is optimal when the bar is between the red indicators.

trans-unit.source: How much power is currently being consumed by the devices connected to the reactor.
trans-unit.target: How much power is currently being consumed by the devices connected to the reactor.

trans-unit.source: How much power is currently being generated by the reactor.
trans-unit.target: How much power is currently being generated by the reactor.

trans-unit.source: When automatic control is on, the reactor will automatically adjust itself according to the power consumption. However, the system is not fast enough to react to large fluctuations in power consumption, so manual adjustments may still be needed.
trans-unit.target: When automatic control is on, the reactor will automatically adjust itself according to the power consumption. However, the system is not fast enough to react to large fluctuations in power consumption, so manual adjustments may still be needed.

trans-unit.source: Increase pressure to temporarily increase the temperature of the reactor.
trans-unit.target: Increase pressure to temporarily increase the temperature of the reactor.

trans-unit.source: Release pressure to temporarily reduce the temperature of the reactor.
trans-unit.target: Release pressure to temporarily reduce the temperature of the reactor.

trans-unit.source: The reactor needs fuel to generate power. Place one in these slots.
trans-unit.target: The reactor needs fuel to generate power. Place one in these slots.

trans-unit.source: Turns the reactor on or off.
trans-unit.target: Turns the reactor on or off.

trans-unit.source: Load is the amount of power the submarine is currently consuming, and output is the amount the reactor is currently generating. The output should be kept as close to the load as possible.
trans-unit.target: Load is the amount of power the submarine is currently consuming, and output is the amount the reactor is currently generating. The output should be kept as close to the load as possible.

trans-unit.source: Fission rate controls the amount of heat generated, and turbine output controls the amount of power generated from the heat. Try to keep both needles on the green.
trans-unit.target: Fission rate controls the amount of heat generated, and turbine output controls the amount of power generated from the heat. Try to keep both needles on the green.

trans-unit.source: When automatic control is on, the reactor will operate itself automatically. However, it reacts to power fluctuations slower than a human operator would be able to.
trans-unit.target: When automatic control is on, the reactor will operate itself automatically. However, it reacts to power fluctuations slower than a human operator would be able to.

trans-unit.source: The temperature of the reactor core. The temperature is optimal when the bar is between the red indicators.

trans-unit.source: When active sonar is on, the transponders send out pings that reflect from nearby obstacles. The pings may also be heard by hostile creatures or enemy submarines.
trans-unit.target: When active sonar is on, the transponders send out pings that reflect from nearby obstacles. The pings may also be heard by hostile creatures or enemy submarines.

trans-unit.source: In passive mode, the sonar only listens to sources of sound and sounds reflected from nearby obstacles without actively sending out pings.
trans-unit.target: In passive mode, the sonar only listens to sources of sound and sounds reflected from nearby obstacles without actively sending out pings.

trans-unit.source: When there's not enough power available, the voltage drops, which may cause some devices to shut down.

trans-unit.target: I need someone to fix the navigation terminal!

trans-unit.source: Huh... I must be seeing things.
trans-unit.target: Huh... I must be seeing things.

trans-unit.source: Shut up. Shut up. Shut up.
trans-unit.target: Shut up. Shut up. Shut up.

trans-unit.source: It will all be over soon.
trans-unit.target: It will all be over soon.

trans-unit.source: They won't trouble us for long.
trans-unit.target: They won't trouble us for long.

trans-unit.source: I won't let you take me!
trans-unit.target: I won't let you take me!

trans-unit.source: I won't let you hurt me!
trans-unit.target: I won't let you hurt me!

trans-unit.source: I have to put you down!
trans-unit.target: I have to put you down!

trans-unit.source: This ship belongs to the Jovian Separatists!
trans-unit.target: This ship belongs to the Jovian Separatists!

trans-unit.source: This ship will serve the Separatists well!
trans-unit.target: This ship will serve the Separatists well!

trans-unit.source: You must all die for the revolution!
trans-unit.target: You must all die for the revolution!

trans-unit.source: The Jovian Separatists shall be victorious!
trans-unit.target: The Jovian Separatists shall be victorious!

trans-unit.source: The Jovian Separatists shall rule Europa!
trans-unit.target: The Jovian Separatists shall rule Europa!

trans-unit.source: We're out of pulse laser fuel.
trans-unit.target: We're out of pulse laser fuel.

trans-unit.source: We're running low on chaingun ammunition! Fire short controlled bursts!
trans-unit.target: We're running low on chaingun ammunition! Fire short controlled bursts!

trans-unit.source: There's not much pulse laser fuel left onboard.
trans-unit.target: There's not much pulse laser fuel left onboard.

trans-unit.source: My throat feels a bit sore.
trans-unit.target: My throat feels a bit sore.

trans-unit.source: I think I might have a fever.
trans-unit.target: I think I might have a fever.

trans-unit.source: I feel really weak. Every muscle hurts.
trans-unit.target: I feel really weak. Every muscle hurts.

trans-unit.source: I'm not protected enough from the pressure!
trans-unit.target: I'm not protected enough from the pressure!

trans-unit.source: The pressure is breaking up my suit!
trans-unit.target: The pressure is breaking up my suit!

trans-unit.source: I'm getting crushed by the pressure!
trans-unit.target: I'm getting crushed by the pressure!

trans-unit.source: I don't have the means to treat myself!
trans-unit.target: I don't have the means to treat myself!

trans-unit.source: Honestly, I'd rather not do business with you people, but I don't have the luxury of picking my customers.
trans-unit.target: Honestly, I'd rather not do business with you people, but I don't have the luxury of picking my customers.

trans-unit.source: They say I shouldn't be serving you, but I say I shouldn't be turning down a paying customer.
trans-unit.target: They say I shouldn't be serving you, but I say I shouldn't be turning down a paying customer.

trans-unit.source: If I wasn't broke, I'd tell you to piss off. But if you've got the money…
trans-unit.target: If I wasn't broke, I'd tell you to piss off. But if you've got the money…

trans-unit.source: Oh, you're one of those people. Although…if there's marks in your wallet, let's pretend you're just a kind stranger in need of my services.
trans-unit.target: Oh, you're one of those people. Although…if there's marks in your wallet, let's pretend you're just a kind stranger in need of my services.

trans-unit.source: This is a mandatory security inspection. Just a moment.
trans-unit.target: This is a mandatory security inspection. Just a moment.

trans-unit.source: Someone's been stealing our supplies as of late. I'll just pat you down quick to make sure it wasn't you…
trans-unit.target: Someone's been stealing our supplies as of late. I'll just pat you down quick to make sure it wasn't you…

trans-unit.source: Hey, you! I need to check your pockets. Hold on for a second.
trans-unit.target: Hey, you! I need to check your pockets. Hold on for a second.

trans-unit.source: Thank you for your cooperation. You're free to go.
trans-unit.target: Thank you for your cooperation. You're free to go.

trans-unit.source: Everything's in order. Have a good day!
trans-unit.target: Everything's in order. Have a good day!

trans-unit.source: What do we have here? Drop the stolen goods and I'll let it slide this time.
trans-unit.target: What do we have here? Drop the stolen goods and I'll let it slide this time.

trans-unit.source: Took something that doesn't belong to you, eh? Drop the stolen goods right now!
trans-unit.target: Took something that doesn't belong to you, eh? Drop the stolen goods right now!

trans-unit.source: Thief! Drop the stolen items now or there will be consequences.
trans-unit.target: Thief! Drop the stolen items now or there will be consequences.

trans-unit.source: All right, have it your way then. You're under arrest!
trans-unit.target: All right, have it your way then. You're under arrest!

trans-unit.source: Want to do this the hard way, huh? Fine.
trans-unit.target: Want to do this the hard way, huh? Fine.

trans-unit.source: You're off the hook for now. But I'll be keeping an eye on you…
trans-unit.target: You're off the hook for now. But I'll be keeping an eye on you…

trans-unit.source: Okay, you're free to go. But I'll be keeping an eye on you…
trans-unit.target: Okay, you're free to go. But I'll be keeping an eye on you…

trans-unit.source: I'll take care of the reactor!
trans-unit.target: I'll take care of the reactor!

trans-unit.source: [name], set the course to our destination!
trans-unit.target: [name], set the course to our destination!

trans-unit.source: [name], make sure all batteries are charged!
trans-unit.target: [name], make sure all batteries are charged!

trans-unit.source: [name], give medical aid to anyone in need!
trans-unit.target: [name], give medical aid to anyone in need!

trans-unit.source: I'll give medical aid to anyone in need!
trans-unit.target: I'll give medical aid to anyone in need!

trans-unit.source: I'll take care of broken devices!
trans-unit.target: I'll take care of broken devices!

trans-unit.source: I'll take care of broken devices!
trans-unit.target: I'll take care of broken devices!

trans-unit.source: [name], repair any damaged systems! I don't care if you don't have the skills—do your best!
trans-unit.target: [name], repair any damaged systems! I don't care if you don't have the skills—do your best!

trans-unit.source: [name], try to fix any broken devices, even if it's something you're not trained for!
trans-unit.target: [name], try to fix any broken devices, even if it's something you're not trained for!

trans-unit.source: [name], repair any damaged devices! Anything you can—I don't care about your training now!
trans-unit.target: [name], repair any damaged devices! Anything you can—I don't care about your training now!

trans-unit.source: I'll take care of broken devices!
trans-unit.target: I'll take care of broken devices!

trans-unit.source: Need someone to repair devices in [roomname]!
trans-unit.target: Need someone to repair devices in [roomname]!

trans-unit.source: I'll take care of electrical devices!
trans-unit.target: I'll take care of electrical devices!

trans-unit.source: I'll take care of mechanical devices!
trans-unit.target: I'll take care of mechanical devices!

trans-unit.source: [name], clean up all the items lying around!
trans-unit.target: [name], clean up all the items lying around!

trans-unit.source: [name], put things back where they belong!
trans-unit.target: [name], put things back where they belong!

trans-unit.source: Maintain position, Navigate back, Navigate to destination
trans-unit.target: Maintain position, Navigate back, Navigate to destination

trans-unit.source: Pump out, Pump in, Stop pumping
trans-unit.target: Pump out, Pump in, Stop pumping

trans-unit.source: You should consider the target in [roomname] again!
trans-unit.target: You should consider the target in [roomname] again!

trans-unit.source: I found weird, fleshy, plants in [roomname].
trans-unit.target: I found weird, fleshy, plants in [roomname].

trans-unit.source: We need to do something to these things growing in [roomname]!
trans-unit.target: We need to do something to these things growing in [roomname]!

trans-unit.source: [name], take care of any enemy you can find!
trans-unit.target: [name], take care of any enemy you can find!

trans-unit.source: I'll take care of the enemies!
trans-unit.target: I'll take care of the enemies!

trans-unit.source: Something suspicious is going on in [roomname]!
trans-unit.target: Something suspicious is going on in [roomname]!

trans-unit.source: I think we might have a traitor in [roomname]!
trans-unit.target: I think we might have a traitor in [roomname]!

trans-unit.source: Recharge battery cells, Refill oxygen tanks, Reload ammo
trans-unit.target: Recharge battery cells, Refill oxygen tanks, Reload ammo

trans-unit.source: [name], make sure all the battery cells are charged!
trans-unit.target: [name], make sure all the battery cells are charged!

trans-unit.source: [name], make sure all the oxygen tanks are filled!
trans-unit.target: [name], make sure all the oxygen tanks are filled!

trans-unit.source: I'll load ammo for the submarine weapons.
trans-unit.target: I'll load ammo for the submarine weapons.

trans-unit.source: [name], make sure the submarine weapons don't run out of ammo!
trans-unit.target: [name], make sure the submarine weapons don't run out of ammo!

trans-unit.source: [name], load ammo for the submarine weapons!
trans-unit.target: [name], load ammo for the submarine weapons!

trans-unit.source: I'll load ammo for the submarine weapons.
trans-unit.target: I'll load ammo for the submarine weapons.

trans-unit.source: [name], you don't have to return to the submarine!
trans-unit.target: [name], you don't have to return to the submarine!

trans-unit.source: [name], thanks for taking care of the leaks!
trans-unit.target: [name], thanks for taking care of the leaks!

trans-unit.source: [name], thanks for taking care of broken devices!
trans-unit.target: [name], thanks for taking care of broken devices!

trans-unit.source: [name], thanks for taking care of electrical devices!
trans-unit.target: [name], thanks for taking care of electrical devices!

trans-unit.source: [name], thanks for taking care of mechanical devices!
trans-unit.target: [name], thanks for taking care of mechanical devices!

trans-unit.source: [name], thanks for cleaning up all the items lying around!
trans-unit.target: [name], thanks for cleaning up all the items lying around!

trans-unit.source: [name], thanks for putting things back where they belong!
trans-unit.target: [name], thanks for putting things back where they belong!

trans-unit.source: This character can't hear the order
trans-unit.target: This character can't hear the order

trans-unit.source: There's no character that can hear the order
trans-unit.target: There's no character that can hear the order

trans-unit.source: It feels as if something was stuck in your throat
trans-unit.target: It feels as if something was stuck in your throat

trans-unit.source: You feel something moving in your throat. You try to scream but no sound comes out.
trans-unit.target: You feel something moving in your throat. You try to scream but no sound comes out.

trans-unit.source: A strange chitinous appendage bursts out from your mouth. Use it to inject eggs into a living body by pressing [Attack]!
trans-unit.target: A strange chitinous appendage bursts out from your mouth. Use it to inject eggs into a living body by pressing [Attack]!

trans-unit.source: This door is controlled by buttons or remote controllers wired to it.
trans-unit.target: This door is controlled by buttons or remote controllers wired to it.

trans-unit.source: Insert oxygen tank to refill it
trans-unit.target: Insert oxygen tank to refill it

trans-unit.source: Special training required to place this item.
trans-unit.target: Special training required to place this item.

trans-unit.source: Too many of this item type placed on this submarine
trans-unit.target: Too many of this item type placed on this submarine

trans-unit.source: There are signs of burst blood vessels and of organ damage.
trans-unit.target: There are signs of burst blood vessels and of organ damage.

trans-unit.source: You have succumbed to your internal injuries.
trans-unit.target: You have succumbed to your internal injuries.

trans-unit.source: Blood pours freely from this ragged and particularly nasty open wound.
trans-unit.target: Blood pours freely from this ragged and particularly nasty open wound.

trans-unit.source: The area is blistered and red, and skin is already beginning to peel away in sheets.
trans-unit.target: The area is blistered and red, and skin is already beginning to peel away in sheets.

trans-unit.source: The skin is pale and clammy, and the lips turning blue.
trans-unit.target: The skin is pale and clammy, and the lips turning blue.

trans-unit.source: The patient is pale and cold. Their heart beats in an alarmingly rapid fashion.
trans-unit.target: The patient is pale and cold. Their heart beats in an alarmingly rapid fashion.

trans-unit.source: The patient is dazed and unresponsive.
trans-unit.target: The patient is dazed and unresponsive.

trans-unit.source: There is obvious massive organ damage and the blood vessels of the eye have burst, creating an unnerving red gaze.
trans-unit.target: There is obvious massive organ damage and the blood vessels of the eye have burst, creating an unnerving red gaze.

trans-unit.source: You have been crushed by water pressure.
trans-unit.target: You have been crushed by water pressure.

trans-unit.source: Something dark and unpleasant moves in the mouth. They are rendered completely mute, save for occasional clicking sounds apparently emanating from deep within the throat.
trans-unit.target: Something dark and unpleasant moves in the mouth. They are rendered completely mute, save for occasional clicking sounds apparently emanating from deep within the throat.

trans-unit.source: Taken over by a husk parasite.
trans-unit.target: Taken over by a husk parasite.

trans-unit.source: You have been taken over by the husk parasite.
trans-unit.target: You have been taken over by the husk parasite.

trans-unit.source: The patient rants and mutters in an agitated fashion, a steady commentary of unseen events.
trans-unit.target: The patient rants and mutters in an agitated fashion, a steady commentary of unseen events.

trans-unit.source: The smell of alcohol rises from them like a vapor, their speech slurs a little, and their eyes fail to focus.
trans-unit.target: The smell of alcohol rises from them like a vapor, their speech slurs a little, and their eyes fail to focus.

trans-unit.source: You have died of alcohol poisoning.
trans-unit.target: You have died of alcohol poisoning.

trans-unit.source: Agitation and a tremor are obvious, as are the signs of nausea.
trans-unit.target: Agitation and a tremor are obvious, as are the signs of nausea.

trans-unit.source: You have died of opiate withdrawal.
trans-unit.target: You have died of opiate withdrawal.

trans-unit.source: The patient has pinpoint pupils and icy cold skin. They struggle to breathe and swallow.
trans-unit.target: The patient has pinpoint pupils and icy cold skin. They struggle to breathe and swallow.

trans-unit.source: You have died of opiate overdose.
trans-unit.target: You have died of opiate overdose.

trans-unit.source: The patient is happy enough...so long as they get what they need.
trans-unit.target: The patient is happy enough...so long as they get what they need.

trans-unit.source: The entry site is a small, dark, bruised hole oozing a little blood. The exit wound, however, is a large ragged mess of exposed tissue, and it's pouring blood.
trans-unit.target: The entry site is a small, dark, bruised hole oozing a little blood. The exit wound, however, is a large ragged mess of exposed tissue, and it's pouring blood.

trans-unit.source: You have died of gunshot wounds.
trans-unit.target: You have died of gunshot wounds.

trans-unit.source: The patient can't breathe at all, and their heart rate is slowing rapidly.
trans-unit.target: The patient can't breathe at all, and their heart rate is slowing rapidly.

trans-unit.source: You have died of morbusine poisoning.
trans-unit.target: You have died of morbusine poisoning.

trans-unit.source: You have died of sufforin poisoning.
trans-unit.target: You have died of sufforin poisoning.

trans-unit.source: You have died of cyanide poisoning.
trans-unit.target: You have died of cyanide poisoning.

trans-unit.source: The area is an ugly shade of purple, and apparently very painful to touch. You suspect a bone might be broken.
trans-unit.target: The area is an ugly shade of purple, and apparently very painful to touch. You suspect a bone might be broken.

trans-unit.source: You have succumbed to injuries from blunt force trauma.
trans-unit.target: You have succumbed to injuries from blunt force trauma.

trans-unit.source: The skin is pierced and there are deep, bleeding wounds.
trans-unit.target: The skin is pierced and there are deep, bleeding wounds.

trans-unit.source: You have succumbed to your wounds.
trans-unit.target: You have succumbed to your wounds.

trans-unit.source: There is extensive damage to soft tissue in the area and there are asymmetrical, bleeding wounds.
trans-unit.target: There is extensive damage to soft tissue in the area and there are asymmetrical, bleeding wounds.

trans-unit.source: You have been mauled to death.
trans-unit.target: You have been mauled to death.

trans-unit.source: The patient's skin is red and blistering.
trans-unit.target: The patient's skin is red and blistering.

trans-unit.source: The patient seems agitated, with small but noticeable nervous twitches in their face and hands.
trans-unit.target: The patient seems agitated, with small but noticeable nervous twitches in their face and hands.

trans-unit.source: The patient is suffering from sharp pain in their internal organs. There is no visible damage to the epidermis.
trans-unit.target: The patient is suffering from sharp pain in their internal organs. There is no visible damage to the epidermis.

trans-unit.source: Perished as a result of internal organ failure.
trans-unit.target: Perished as a result of internal organ failure.

trans-unit.source: You have perished as a result of internal organ failure.
trans-unit.target: You have perished as a result of internal organ failure.

trans-unit.source: The area is colored purple. The tissue underneath feels different than the surrounding skin.
trans-unit.target: The area is colored purple. The tissue underneath feels different than the surrounding skin.

trans-unit.source: You have succumbed to your deep tissue injuries.
trans-unit.target: You have succumbed to your deep tissue injuries.

trans-unit.source: The skin is clammy and the patient is vomiting periodically.
trans-unit.target: The skin is clammy and the patient is vomiting periodically.

trans-unit.source: You have choked on your own vomit.
trans-unit.target: You have choked on your own vomit.

trans-unit.source: Seeming confused and slightly terrified, the patient doesn't look good. Could it be a mental breakdown? A stress reaction? There's not much you can do about it.
trans-unit.target: Seeming confused and slightly terrified, the patient doesn't look good. Could it be a mental breakdown? A stress reaction? There's not much you can do about it.

trans-unit.source: Stared to death by a Watcher.
trans-unit.target: Stared to death by a Watcher.

trans-unit.source: Stared to death by a Watcher.
trans-unit.target: Stared to death by a Watcher.

trans-unit.source: The patient is tormented by painful visions of death and rebirth. Memories of past lives or just a stress reaction...? Consulting a medical doctor at an outpost is advised.
trans-unit.target: The patient is tormented by painful visions of death and rebirth. Memories of past lives or just a stress reaction...? Consulting a medical doctor at an outpost is advised.

trans-unit.source: The patient seems disoriented and has trouble focusing their eyes.
trans-unit.target: The patient seems disoriented and has trouble focusing their eyes.

trans-unit.source: As long as you keep covering your face, others might not be able to tell who you are...
trans-unit.target: As long as you keep covering your face, others might not be able to tell who you are...

trans-unit.source: The things you hear and see appear so real! But are they?
trans-unit.target: The things you hear and see appear so real! But are they?

trans-unit.source: No injuries are visible externally, but the sweating and aches suggest something is amiss.
trans-unit.target: No injuries are visible externally, but the sweating and aches suggest something is amiss.

trans-unit.source: A light bruise shows where something hit, but it doesn’t look like anything is broken.
trans-unit.target: A light bruise shows where something hit, but it doesn’t look like anything is broken.

trans-unit.source: The cuts look worse than they really are.
trans-unit.target: The cuts look worse than they really are.

trans-unit.source: Something tried to take a big chomp but luckily only caught a nibble. It will leave a scar though.
trans-unit.target: Something tried to take a big chomp but luckily only caught a nibble. It will leave a scar though.

trans-unit.source: The bullet missed all the important bits and went straight through, but the pain is real and so is the risk of infection.
trans-unit.target: The bullet missed all the important bits and went straight through, but the pain is real and so is the risk of infection.

trans-unit.source: You feel a sharp pain in your abdomen. There are no wounds to be seen.
trans-unit.target: You feel a sharp pain in your abdomen. There are no wounds to be seen.

trans-unit.source: The area of skin appears slightly bruised.
trans-unit.target: The area of skin appears slightly bruised.

trans-unit.source: Blood is slowly dripping out from the wound.
trans-unit.target: Blood is slowly dripping out from the wound.

trans-unit.source: Blood is gushing out at an alarming rate.
trans-unit.target: Blood is gushing out at an alarming rate.

trans-unit.source: The area is red and dry.
trans-unit.target: The area is red and dry.

trans-unit.source: The skin is white and partially charred; this looks severe.
trans-unit.target: The skin is white and partially charred; this looks severe.

trans-unit.source: The skin is irritated and raw.
trans-unit.target: The skin is irritated and raw.

trans-unit.source: Parts of the flesh are stripped away by acid; a mixture of red and white mark the edges.
trans-unit.target: Parts of the flesh are stripped away by acid; a mixture of red and white mark the edges.

trans-unit.source: The flesh has deformed and essentially melted away due to high amounts of acid.
