trans-unit.target: The flesh has deformed and essentially melted away due to high amounts of acid.

trans-unit.source: Restless anxiety and headaches hint at low blood oxygen levels.
trans-unit.target: Restless anxiety and headaches hint at low blood oxygen levels.

trans-unit.source: You feel cold and dizzy, probably not far from passing out.
trans-unit.target: You feel cold and dizzy, probably not far from passing out.

trans-unit.source: The patient's skin feels cold and moist.
trans-unit.target: The patient's skin feels cold and moist.

trans-unit.source: You are temporarily rendered unable to move.
trans-unit.target: You are temporarily rendered unable to move.

trans-unit.source: Something hit you so hard your eyes are still shaking.
trans-unit.target: Something hit you so hard your eyes are still shaking.

trans-unit.source: A massive headache, your ears are ringing and your eyes refuse to focus. It takes a lot of effort to stand upright.
trans-unit.target: A massive headache, your ears are ringing and your eyes refuse to focus. It takes a lot of effort to stand upright.

trans-unit.source: There’s an itch in your throat; the source seems to move around.
trans-unit.target: There’s an itch in your throat; the source seems to move around.

trans-unit.source: Something growing in your throat prevents you from talking; it’s freaking you out.
trans-unit.target: Something growing in your throat prevents you from talking; it’s freaking you out.

trans-unit.source: Deep down you know you should be worried about the thing chittering and moving about in your mouth. Yet, you feel oddly at peace.
trans-unit.target: Deep down you know you should be worried about the thing chittering and moving about in your mouth. Yet, you feel oddly at peace.

trans-unit.source: A faint clicking noise can be heard occasionally from within the patient.
trans-unit.target: A faint clicking noise can be heard occasionally from within the patient.

trans-unit.source: The patient is eerily silent, save for occasional clicking sounds apparently emanating from deep within the throat.
trans-unit.target: The patient is eerily silent, save for occasional clicking sounds apparently emanating from deep within the throat.

trans-unit.source: Something dark and unpleasant moves in the mouth. They are rendered completely mute.
trans-unit.target: Something dark and unpleasant moves in the mouth. They are rendered completely mute.

trans-unit.source: Violent seizures signal the emergence of the husk.
trans-unit.target: Violent seizures signal the emergence of the husk.

trans-unit.source: You feel as ugly on the outside as they said you were on the inside. Karma strikes back?
trans-unit.target: You feel as ugly on the outside as they said you were on the inside. Karma strikes back?

trans-unit.source: You seem to have two left feet, and your brain disagrees with both. It’s like trying to walk mirrored.
trans-unit.target: You seem to have two left feet, and your brain disagrees with both. It’s like trying to walk mirrored.

trans-unit.source: The patient insists they saw a spider the other day, but seem otherwise healthy.
trans-unit.target: The patient insists they saw a spider the other day, but seem otherwise healthy.

trans-unit.source: After all… why not? Why shouldn’t you have another drink?
trans-unit.target: After all… why not? Why shouldn’t you have another drink?

trans-unit.source: Is it time to lie down? Oh the infinite bliss of drowning out your sorrow…
trans-unit.target: Is it time to lie down? Oh the infinite bliss of drowning out your sorrow…

trans-unit.source: This crewmate is in high spirits, perhaps a bit too high to operate complex machinery.
trans-unit.target: This crewmate is in high spirits, perhaps a bit too high to operate complex machinery.

trans-unit.source: This crewmate has departed this world mentally, with a grin on their face. You fear the crewmate's life functions will soon depart as well.
trans-unit.target: This crewmate has departed this world mentally, with a grin on their face. You fear the crewmate's life functions will soon depart as well.

trans-unit.source: Teary-eyed, sweaty and fidgety, the craving is growing.
trans-unit.target: Teary-eyed, sweaty and fidgety, the craving is growing.

trans-unit.source: You feel disoriented and struggle to breathe. The world is very cold, even colder than usual.
trans-unit.target: You feel disoriented and struggle to breathe. The world is very cold, even colder than usual.

trans-unit.source: You’re feeling good… so long as the next fix isn’t too far.
trans-unit.target: You’re feeling good… so long as the next fix isn’t too far.

trans-unit.source: You feel feverish. Even your skin feels as though it’s on fire.
trans-unit.target: You feel feverish. Even your skin feels as though it’s on fire.

trans-unit.source: You’ve never felt nausea like this, and your body aches all over.
trans-unit.target: You’ve never felt nausea like this, and your body aches all over.

trans-unit.source: The patient can’t stop vomiting, and they’re showing ulcers and various soft tissue symptoms.
trans-unit.target: The patient can’t stop vomiting, and they’re showing ulcers and various soft tissue symptoms.

trans-unit.source: You’re gasping for air, but to no avail.
trans-unit.target: You’re gasping for air, but to no avail.

trans-unit.source: The patient is seemingly sick, and without a prompt treatment they will only get worse.
trans-unit.target: The patient is seemingly sick, and without a prompt treatment they will only get worse.

trans-unit.source: The patient has been poisoned and is unable to move. Unless an antidote is found, the patient will eventually die in agony.
trans-unit.target: The patient has been poisoned and is unable to move. Unless an antidote is found, the patient will eventually die in agony.

trans-unit.source: Your vision seems to be getting blurry and you feel the urgent need to regurgitate.
trans-unit.target: Your vision seems to be getting blurry and you feel the urgent need to regurgitate.

trans-unit.source: The patient’s symptoms are barely detectable, but may indicate poisoning.
trans-unit.target: The patient’s symptoms are barely detectable, but may indicate poisoning.

trans-unit.source: You see and hear things that aren't there. They're the effects of Deliriumine poisoning.
trans-unit.target: You see and hear things that aren't there. They're the effects of Deliriumine poisoning.

trans-unit.source: The patient is manic, their eyes darting around wildly. They're wondering how you can be so calm, when everything around you is on fire…
trans-unit.target: The patient is manic, their eyes darting around wildly. They're wondering how you can be so calm, when everything around you is on fire…

trans-unit.source: You feel very very wrong. Have you been poisoned?
trans-unit.target: You feel very very wrong. Have you been poisoned?

trans-unit.source: You regret not having invested in antidotes for Cyanide poisoning. Now you die.
trans-unit.target: You regret not having invested in antidotes for Cyanide poisoning. Now you die.

trans-unit.source: Scanning the patient reveals Cyanide poisoning. Unless administered an antidote, this will be fatal.
trans-unit.target: Scanning the patient reveals Cyanide poisoning. Unless administered an antidote, this will be fatal.

trans-unit.source: The patient's mouth is foaming and they are rendered unable to move. You could probably steal their valuables and get away with it…
trans-unit.target: The patient's mouth is foaming and they are rendered unable to move. You could probably steal their valuables and get away with it…

trans-unit.source: The patient is gasping, the skin is blue, and there are occasional muscle spasms all over the body. Their condition is decreasing rapidly.
trans-unit.target: The patient is gasping, the skin is blue, and there are occasional muscle spasms all over the body. Their condition is decreasing rapidly.

trans-unit.source: You’re having trouble moving your limbs.
trans-unit.target: You’re having trouble moving your limbs.

trans-unit.source: The patient is completely paralyzed and unable to move.
trans-unit.target: The patient is completely paralyzed and unable to move.

trans-unit.source: Feeling queasy, but nothing a rest wouldn't fix.
trans-unit.target: Feeling queasy, but nothing a rest wouldn't fix.

trans-unit.source: You are really sick. Should you worry about it or just rest?
trans-unit.target: You are really sick. Should you worry about it or just rest?

trans-unit.source: You can’t shake it. It will always be there, staring. Would tearing out your own eyes make it go away?
trans-unit.target: You can’t shake it. It will always be there, staring. Would tearing out your own eyes make it go away?

trans-unit.source: There's something strange going on with your senses.
trans-unit.target: There's something strange going on with your senses.

trans-unit.source: You’re plagued by a sense of déjà vu, and it’s too real. Maybe you should be glad you can only remember your death, and not your birth.
trans-unit.target: You’re plagued by a sense of déjà vu, and it’s too real. Maybe you should be glad you can only remember your death, and not your birth.

trans-unit.source: Movement speed and reflexes are heightened.
trans-unit.target: Movement speed and reflexes are heightened.

trans-unit.source: Internal organs are more accustomed to high pressures.
trans-unit.target: Internal organs are more accustomed to high pressures.

trans-unit.source: The patient's body is less affected by paralysis. It also seems to recover from any existing effects.
trans-unit.target: The patient's body is less affected by paralysis. It also seems to recover from any existing effects.

trans-unit.source: Oxygen flows more freely into the subject's limbs, resulting in greater swimming speed.
trans-unit.target: Oxygen flows more freely into the subject's limbs, resulting in greater swimming speed.

trans-unit.source: A sharp beak is protruding from the subject's forehead.
trans-unit.target: A sharp beak is protruding from the subject's forehead.

trans-unit.source: Sharp spikes are growing from the subject's back.
trans-unit.target: Sharp spikes are growing from the subject's back.

trans-unit.source: Subject's skin is hardened and more resistant to damage.
trans-unit.target: Subject's skin is hardened and more resistant to damage.

trans-unit.source: Subject's lung capacity is grown, resulting in more efficient oxygen consumption.
trans-unit.target: Subject's lung capacity is grown, resulting in more efficient oxygen consumption.

trans-unit.source: Subject's bone structure is lighter, resulting in greater walking and running speed.
trans-unit.target: Subject's bone structure is lighter, resulting in greater walking and running speed.

trans-unit.source: Subject has gained muscle mass, resulting in greater strength.
trans-unit.target: Subject has gained muscle mass, resulting in greater strength.

trans-unit.source: Subject's wounds are healed at an accelerated rate.
trans-unit.target: Subject's wounds are healed at an accelerated rate.

trans-unit.source: Subject's pain receptors are numbed in response to physical trauma.
trans-unit.target: Subject's pain receptors are numbed in response to physical trauma.

trans-unit.source: Subject's reflexes are heightened in response to physical trauma.
trans-unit.target: Subject's reflexes are heightened in response to physical trauma.

trans-unit.source: Subject's adrenaline level is heightened in response to physical trauma.
trans-unit.target: Subject's adrenaline level is heightened in response to physical trauma.

trans-unit.source: Subject has gained a heightened tolerance for the husk parasite.
trans-unit.target: Subject has gained a heightened tolerance for the husk parasite.

trans-unit.source: Subject's eyes are sensitive to light.
trans-unit.target: Subject's eyes are sensitive to light.

trans-unit.source: Subject's joints are stiff and moving is more difficult.
trans-unit.target: Subject's joints are stiff and moving is more difficult.

trans-unit.source: Subject's skin is sore and more sensitive to touch.
trans-unit.target: Subject's skin is sore and more sensitive to touch.

trans-unit.source: Subject's organs are resistant to traditional medicine.
trans-unit.target: Subject's organs are resistant to traditional medicine.

trans-unit.source: Subject hears unintelligible voices inside their head.
trans-unit.target: Subject hears unintelligible voices inside their head.

trans-unit.source: Subject suffers from longer periods of unconsciousness when knocked out.
trans-unit.target: Subject suffers from longer periods of unconsciousness when knocked out.

trans-unit.source: Subject suffers from decreased muscle mass.
trans-unit.target: Subject suffers from decreased muscle mass.

trans-unit.source: Subject has an adverse reaction to oxygen.
trans-unit.target: Subject has an adverse reaction to oxygen.

trans-unit.source: The subject is slowly regaining their vitality.
trans-unit.target: The subject is slowly regaining their vitality.

trans-unit.source: The subject is in the flow, and able to repair devices effortlessly.
trans-unit.target: The subject is in the flow, and able to repair devices effortlessly.

trans-unit.source: The subject has momentarily become a much better captain.
trans-unit.target: The subject has momentarily become a much better captain.

trans-unit.source: The subject has become sturdier and resistant to stuns.
trans-unit.target: The subject has become sturdier and resistant to stuns.

trans-unit.source: Only by wearing the mask is the true self revealed.
trans-unit.target: Only by wearing the mask is the true self revealed.

trans-unit.source: The sounds of clownery have a healing effect on the subject.
trans-unit.target: The sounds of clownery have a healing effect on the subject.

trans-unit.source: The subject's skills are momentarily increased.
trans-unit.target: The subject's skills are momentarily increased.

trans-unit.source: The subject is gaining combat effectiveness from being near an inspiring ally.
trans-unit.target: The subject is gaining combat effectiveness from being near an inspiring ally.

trans-unit.source: The subject's effectiveness with pistols is increased.
trans-unit.target: The subject's effectiveness with pistols is increased.

trans-unit.source: The subject is prepared to draw.
trans-unit.target: The subject is prepared to draw.

trans-unit.source: The subject is moving forward, quickly.
trans-unit.target: The subject is moving forward, quickly.

trans-unit.source: The subject, ordered by their captain, has become stalwart and able!
trans-unit.target: The subject, ordered by their captain, has become stalwart and able!

trans-unit.source: The subject, ordered by their captain, has become better at ship repairs and maintenance.
trans-unit.target: The subject, ordered by their captain, has become better at ship repairs and maintenance.

trans-unit.source: The subject, ordered by their captain, is now a much better warrior.
trans-unit.target: The subject, ordered by their captain, is now a much better warrior.

trans-unit.source: The subject refuses to abandon ship, and will do anything to restore it to its former glory.
trans-unit.target: The subject refuses to abandon ship, and will do anything to restore it to its former glory.

trans-unit.source: The subject is about to unleash a powerful attack.
trans-unit.target: The subject is about to unleash a powerful attack.

trans-unit.source: The subject feels they must work a bit harder to make up for someone else.
trans-unit.target: The subject feels they must work a bit harder to make up for someone else.

trans-unit.source: The subject is enjoying the smell of searing flesh a bit too much.
trans-unit.target: The subject is enjoying the smell of searing flesh a bit too much.

trans-unit.source: The subject can't tinker with any more devices for the time being.
trans-unit.target: The subject can't tinker with any more devices for the time being.

trans-unit.source: The subject is feeling very healthy.
trans-unit.target: The subject is feeling very healthy.

trans-unit.source: The subject is prepared for the next attack on them.
trans-unit.target: The subject is prepared for the next attack on them.

trans-unit.source: The subject has become better at learning.
trans-unit.target: The subject has become better at learning.

trans-unit.source: The patient has grown dependent on performance-boosting drugs.
trans-unit.target: The patient has grown dependent on performance-boosting drugs.

trans-unit.source: The patient sweats and twitches a lot, likely craving their next fix.
trans-unit.target: The patient sweats and twitches a lot, likely craving their next fix.

trans-unit.source: The subject is immune to pressure and has no need for oxygen at this time.
trans-unit.target: The subject is immune to pressure and has no need for oxygen at this time.

trans-unit.source: The subject has gained heightened capabilities, permanently.
trans-unit.target: The subject has gained heightened capabilities, permanently.

trans-unit.source: The subject is unable to fall unconscious.
trans-unit.target: The subject is unable to fall unconscious.

trans-unit.source: You thrive in isolation. Without interference of others, your capabilities are enhanced.
trans-unit.target: You thrive in isolation. Without interference of others, your capabilities are enhanced.

trans-unit.source: Your captain trusts you to take care of the sub in case of their absence. You wouldn't let them down.
trans-unit.target: Your captain trusts you to take care of the sub in case of their absence. You wouldn't let them down.

trans-unit.source: Your captain is leading by example. You feel confident and energetic.
trans-unit.target: Your captain is leading by example. You feel confident and energetic.

trans-unit.source: This crew is like a family to you. Nobody messes with your little submarine family.
trans-unit.target: This crew is like a family to you. Nobody messes with your little submarine family.

trans-unit.source: Your captain inspires and encourages you to learn.
trans-unit.target: Your captain inspires and encourages you to learn.

trans-unit.source: The presence of your captain makes you eager to impress.
trans-unit.target: The presence of your captain makes you eager to impress.

trans-unit.source: Your medical doctor has tampered with your genes, eliminating minor health issues.
trans-unit.target: Your medical doctor has tampered with your genes, eliminating minor health issues.

trans-unit.source: It's fortunate food is scarce. It makes crewmmates that much easier to carry to safety.
trans-unit.target: It's fortunate food is scarce. It makes crewmmates that much easier to carry to safety.

trans-unit.source: As long as you follow the Doctor's instructions, the patient will be fine.
trans-unit.target: As long as you follow the Doctor's instructions, the patient will be fine.

trans-unit.source: Your lifeforces are fading, yet one Doctor shines bright like a beacon. While they're nearby, you won't give in.
trans-unit.target: Your lifeforces are fading, yet one Doctor shines bright like a beacon. While they're nearby, you won't give in.

trans-unit.source: They've bruised your body and, more importantly, your ego. You'll make them pay. Deal more damage.
trans-unit.target: They've bruised your body and, more importantly, your ego. You'll make them pay. Deal more damage.

trans-unit.source: Dang, they sure gave you a beating. But what doesn't kill you makes you stronger. Resist some physical damage.
trans-unit.target: Dang, they sure gave you a beating. But what doesn't kill you makes you stronger. Resist some physical damage.

trans-unit.source: They killed our assistant. You don't remember their name, but you will avenge them. Temporarily take reduced damage.
trans-unit.target: They killed our assistant. You don't remember their name, but you will avenge them. Temporarily take reduced damage.

trans-unit.source: Once an apprentice proves their skill, they can efficiently help the professionals. Gain your primary skill faster.
trans-unit.target: Once an apprentice proves their skill, they can efficiently help the professionals. Gain your primary skill faster.

trans-unit.source: A friend is someone who walks into a room when everyone else is walking out. A loyal assistant keeps working even when you walk out. Increases your crafting quality.
trans-unit.target: A friend is someone who walks into a room when everyone else is walking out. A loyal assistant keeps working even when you walk out. Increases your crafting quality.

trans-unit.source: The assistant's dedication to their apprenticeship and their master leaves a lot to be desired, but hanging out with the other crew boosts their efficiency. Repairing and skill gains are increased.
trans-unit.target: The assistant's dedication to their apprenticeship and their master leaves a lot to be desired, but hanging out with the other crew boosts their efficiency. Repairing and skill gains are increased.

trans-unit.source: The commanding officer is responsible for commanding the entirety of the crew and ensuring that everything is running smoothly.
trans-unit.target: The commanding officer is responsible for commanding the entirety of the crew and ensuring that everything is running smoothly.

trans-unit.source: Engineers are the backbone of a submarine's crew, complementing a mechanic's mechanical engineering skill with their knowledge of electrical engineering. They are capable of performing maintenance on the various electrical pieces of the submarine.
trans-unit.target: Engineers are the backbone of a submarine's crew, complementing a mechanic's mechanical engineering skill with their knowledge of electrical engineering. They are capable of performing maintenance on the various electrical pieces of the submarine.

trans-unit.source: Mechanics are capable of fixing various mechanical devices with their high mechanical engineering skill. Together with engineers they ensure a submarine is working to its fullest.
trans-unit.target: Mechanics are capable of fixing various mechanical devices with their high mechanical engineering skill. Together with engineers they ensure a submarine is working to its fullest.

trans-unit.source: Security Officers are responsible for keeping the submarine safe from threats, both external and internal. The creatures inhabiting the ocean aren't the only threat they need to worry about, as several of the renegade groups opposing the Europa Coalition are known to have sent infiltrators on board the vessels.
trans-unit.target: Security Officers are responsible for keeping the submarine safe from threats, both external and internal. The creatures inhabiting the ocean aren't the only threat they need to worry about, as several of the renegade groups opposing the Europa Coalition are known to have sent infiltrators on board the vessels.

trans-unit.source: Although usually taken for granted, doctors play an important role on the submarine, possessing the required skill to treat injured or unconscious crewmembers. Their skills can also be useful for creating various non-medicinal chemicals.
trans-unit.target: Although usually taken for granted, doctors play an important role on the submarine, possessing the required skill to treat injured or unconscious crewmembers. Their skills can also be useful for creating various non-medicinal chemicals.

trans-unit.source: Assistants don't have any specific responsibilities or areas of expertise. This job is a good choice for newcomers who want to get a hang of working on board the submarine without taking up tasks that they aren't qualified for.
trans-unit.target: Assistants don't have any specific responsibilities or areas of expertise. This job is a good choice for newcomers who want to get a hang of working on board the submarine without taking up tasks that they aren't qualified for.

trans-unit.source: A veteran of Europan seas, this captain either inspires loyalty in their crew or keeps them in line by force.
trans-unit.target: A veteran of Europan seas, this captain either inspires loyalty in their crew or keeps them in line by force.

trans-unit.source: Renegade captains are a thorn in the establishment's side. They use a combination of daring and aggressive maneuvers to keep the Coalition off balance.
trans-unit.target: Renegade captains are a thorn in the establishment's side. They use a combination of daring and aggressive maneuvers to keep the Coalition off balance.

trans-unit.source: Captains of the Coalition adhere to a strict set of rules. That doesn't stop them from coming up with new innovations to hunt down their enemies.
trans-unit.target: Captains of the Coalition adhere to a strict set of rules. That doesn't stop them from coming up with new innovations to hunt down their enemies.

trans-unit.source: Nuclear engineers are in charge of the sub's reactor. Occupational hazards require them to wear some protective gear against radiation.
trans-unit.target: Nuclear engineers are in charge of the sub's reactor. Occupational hazards require them to wear some protective gear against radiation.

trans-unit.source: The submarine's fickle electrical systems need constant maintenance. The dubious honor of replacing fuses, hooking up devices with power and taking numerous electric shocks falls to electrical engineers.
trans-unit.target: The submarine's fickle electrical systems need constant maintenance. The dubious honor of replacing fuses, hooking up devices with power and taking numerous electric shocks falls to electrical engineers.

trans-unit.source: A mechanic's primary job in Europa is to plug leaks wherever they appear. These guys are trained to keep the hull, devices and equipment in shape.
trans-unit.target: A mechanic's primary job in Europa is to plug leaks wherever they appear. These guys are trained to keep the hull, devices and equipment in shape.

trans-unit.source: A mechanic variant that specializes in making art (and supplies) out of crude materials.
trans-unit.target: A mechanic variant that specializes in making art (and supplies) out of crude materials.

trans-unit.source: Commandos are a special breed of security officer. They only have a single purpose: Destroy the enemy, whether it's at range or mano a mano.
trans-unit.target: Commandos are a special breed of security officer. They only have a single purpose: Destroy the enemy, whether it's at range or mano a mano.

trans-unit.source: These peacekeepers are dedicated to keeping the peace at any cost. Preferably but not necessarily using non-lethal force.
trans-unit.target: These peacekeepers are dedicated to keeping the peace at any cost. Preferably but not necessarily using non-lethal force.

trans-unit.source: Submarine gunners are trained not only to shoot accurately with coil and railguns but also to keep them in working condition.
trans-unit.target: Submarine gunners are trained not only to shoot accurately with coil and railguns but also to keep them in working condition.

trans-unit.source: Administering first aid often requires venturing into dangerous areas. These front-line medics have gear that offers them some protection against monsters and guns, while not compromising their mobility.
trans-unit.target: Administering first aid often requires venturing into dangerous areas. These front-line medics have gear that offers them some protection against monsters and guns, while not compromising their mobility.

trans-unit.source: These doctors are prepared to treat most, if not all, injuries that threaten the crew on lengthy trips underwater.
trans-unit.target: These doctors are prepared to treat most, if not all, injuries that threaten the crew on lengthy trips underwater.

trans-unit.source: A group of settlers has ventured into [previousname] and established a new outpost.
trans-unit.target: A group of settlers has ventured into [previousname] and established a new outpost.

trans-unit.source: A new military outpost has been established at [previousname].
trans-unit.target: A new military outpost has been established at [previousname].

trans-unit.source: A new research outpost has been established at [previousname].
trans-unit.target: A new research outpost has been established at [previousname].

trans-unit.source: [previousname] has been rid of its monster lair and is now safe for colonization.
trans-unit.target: [previousname] has been rid of its monster lair and is now safe for colonization.

trans-unit.source: An outpost has been established at [previousname].
trans-unit.target: An outpost has been established at [previousname].

trans-unit.source: A military outpost has been established at [previousname].
trans-unit.target: A military outpost has been established at [previousname].

trans-unit.source: A research outpost has been established at [previousname].
trans-unit.target: A research outpost has been established at [previousname].

trans-unit.source: A coalition force has moved into [previousname], establishing a military presence in the area.
trans-unit.target: A coalition force has moved into [previousname], establishing a military presence in the area.

trans-unit.source: A band of researchers have turned [previousname] into a research station to study the surrounding fauna.
trans-unit.target: A band of researchers have turned [previousname] into a research station to study the surrounding fauna.

trans-unit.source: The commander at [previousname] has been appointed governor, making [name] officially a city.
trans-unit.target: The commander at [previousname] has been appointed governor, making [name] officially a city.

trans-unit.source: Research laboratories at [previousname] have driven more settlers to move in. It is now known as [name].
trans-unit.target: Research laboratories at [previousname] have driven more settlers to move in. It is now known as [name].

trans-unit.source: Families of miners at [previousname] have moved in and turned it into a proper city.
trans-unit.target: Families of miners at [previousname] have moved in and turned it into a proper city.

trans-unit.source: Uninhabited, a potential location for an outpost.
trans-unit.target: Uninhabited, a potential location for an outpost.

trans-unit.source: Bristling with activity and no shortage of supplies.
trans-unit.target: Bristling with activity and no shortage of supplies.

trans-unit.source: Offers an abundance of military hardware.
trans-unit.target: Offers an abundance of military hardware.

trans-unit.source: Offers raw materials at discount prices.
trans-unit.target: Offers raw materials at discount prices.

trans-unit.source: Contact was lost with this outpost.\nRe-establishing contact or eliminating a threat here could net you money.
trans-unit.target: Contact was lost with this outpost.\nRe-establishing contact or eliminating a threat here could net you money.

trans-unit.source: Do you want to try again?
trans-unit.target: Do you want to try again?

trans-unit.source: It looks like this might be the first time you've played Barotrauma. We strongly recommend that you give the tutorials a try before starting your journey through the depths of Europa.
trans-unit.target: It looks like this might be the first time you've played Barotrauma. We strongly recommend that you give the tutorials a try before starting your journey through the depths of Europa.

trans-unit.source: Mechanic - Glue, duct tape and your nerve are the only things keeping the crew alive.
trans-unit.target: Mechanic - Glue, duct tape and your nerve are the only things keeping the crew alive.

trans-unit.source: When the plan goes as planned and the gear works is as probable as the human race leaving this shithole. There are no breaks or rest for you, as everything that can break down, will break down. And if nothing’s broken, then it's maintenance, maintenance, maintenance. Getting to the next destination is all that matters, and you’re the one who delivers. There’s no thank-yous or respect, just snickering and contempt from your "fellow crewmembers"—but that’s okay. This is YOUR survival vessel, and if any of them make it too, well...whoop dee doo for them.
trans-unit.target: When the plan goes as planned and the gear works is as probable as the human race leaving this shithole. There are no breaks or rest for you, as everything that can break down, will break down. And if nothing’s broken, then it's maintenance, maintenance, maintenance. Getting to the next destination is all that matters, and you’re the one who delivers. There’s no thank-yous or respect, just snickering and contempt from your "fellow crewmembers"—but that’s okay. This is YOUR survival vessel, and if any of them make it too, well...whoop dee doo for them.

trans-unit.source: Engineer - The one who harnesses the power of nature.
trans-unit.target: Engineer - The one who harnesses the power of nature.

trans-unit.source: Power and oxygen, it's like that. Without, the ship don’t move and the lungs won’t breathe. Beyond the fancy talk and costume play, you are the guy who really runs the ship, get it? Trust in the laws of physics and think clear. Also, keep your eye on that damn toy-tinkering wannabe engineer mechanic, and whatever you do, don’t bite into the psycho-babble of the medic. He’s so deep in his softie inner world he’s practically a woman. Captain and security are harmless, and way below your intelligence. Obviously.
trans-unit.target: Power and oxygen, it's like that. Without, the ship don’t move and the lungs won’t breathe. Beyond the fancy talk and costume play, you are the guy who really runs the ship, get it? Trust in the laws of physics and think clear. Also, keep your eye on that damn toy-tinkering wannabe engineer mechanic, and whatever you do, don’t bite into the psycho-babble of the medic. He’s so deep in his softie inner world he’s practically a woman. Captain and security are harmless, and way below your intelligence. Obviously.

trans-unit.source: Security Officer - The backbone of violence.
trans-unit.target: Security Officer - The backbone of violence.

trans-unit.source: It is said that pressure brings out the worst in people. Not everybody has your moral strength—hell, most of them are so crooked that it’s questionable if they even should be allowed to live. Channel the crew’s anger toward the creatures outside, but never fool yourself into trusting them. Keep the nukes ready, the handcuffs available, and every now and then put someone in the brig just so they know who’s in charge!
trans-unit.target: It is said that pressure brings out the worst in people. Not everybody has your moral strength—hell, most of them are so crooked that it’s questionable if they even should be allowed to live. Channel the crew’s anger toward the creatures outside, but never fool yourself into trusting them. Keep the nukes ready, the handcuffs available, and every now and then put someone in the brig just so they know who’s in charge!

trans-unit.source: Medical Doctor - Maintaining the key resource: the people
trans-unit.target: Medical Doctor - Maintaining the key resource: the people

trans-unit.source: Guns and engines and reactors don't keep the ship running—people do. It’s up to you to keep the gunner alive to man the guns and captain alive to steer the ship. And remember, your job goes well beyond the physical. We live crammed into tight spaces, under ice, in the sea. When the lights go out and your "buddies" go to sleep, all kinds of dark shit crawls into their minds. Keep them alive and sane, or put them down like dogs. It’s up to you.
trans-unit.target: Guns and engines and reactors don't keep the ship running—people do. It’s up to you to keep the gunner alive to man the guns and captain alive to steer the ship. And remember, your job goes well beyond the physical. We live crammed into tight spaces, under ice, in the sea. When the lights go out and your "buddies" go to sleep, all kinds of dark shit crawls into their minds. Keep them alive and sane, or put them down like dogs. It’s up to you.

trans-unit.source: Captain - Naval visionary, seafarer, a genius. Possibly.
trans-unit.target: Captain - Naval visionary, seafarer, a genius. Possibly.

trans-unit.source: Captain Ahab once said, "Hell is an idea first born on an undigested apple-dumpling." Do you know what that means? No. Does the crew think you are a mysterious genius? Hell yeah. This job is at least as much appearing to know what to do as actually knowing what to do. You are the map and the compass, the guy with the big picture. Navigate and make the tough calls. And remember, you’re just a few steps away from being the mayor of an outpost, and if a couple fellows need to die for that—so be it!
trans-unit.target: Captain Ahab once said, "Hell is an idea first born on an undigested apple-dumpling." Do you know what that means? No. Does the crew think you are a mysterious genius? Hell yeah. This job is at least as much appearing to know what to do as actually knowing what to do. You are the map and the compass, the guy with the big picture. Navigate and make the tough calls. And remember, you’re just a few steps away from being the mayor of an outpost, and if a couple fellows need to die for that—so be it!

trans-unit.source: “Ah, I see you're standing. I'd like to keep this brief, since you're the sixth person I've had to guide today, and frankly I'm getting tired of it.”
trans-unit.target: “Ah, I see you're standing. I'd like to keep this brief, since you're the sixth person I've had to guide today, and frankly I'm getting tired of it.”

trans-unit.source: “You're in an automated rehabilitation chamber. You've suffered a traumatic experience and were in a perpetual state of screaming and defecating your boiler suit. Dr. Happy has seen fit to treat you.”
trans-unit.target: “You're in an automated rehabilitation chamber. You've suffered a traumatic experience and were in a perpetual state of screaming and defecating your boiler suit. Dr. Happy has seen fit to treat you.”

trans-unit.source: “That's great news! And significantly reduces the chance of intense nightmares and flashbacks, too. It's an intended but slightly inconvenient side effect of your medication. We just have to re-teach you all the basics, like using your arms and legs, and you're good to go and make some money to pay your medical bills!”
trans-unit.target: “That's great news! And significantly reduces the chance of intense nightmares and flashbacks, too. It's an intended but slightly inconvenient side effect of your medication. We just have to re-teach you all the basics, like using your arms and legs, and you're good to go and make some money to pay your medical bills!”

trans-unit.source: “Anyways, let's get you going. Try to move those arms and legs, will you? The door will open once you press the button. It's slightly out of reach, though.”
trans-unit.target: “Anyways, let's get you going. Try to move those arms and legs, will you? The door will open once you press the button. It's slightly out of reach, though.”

trans-unit.source: “Ah shit, we didn't think you'd get this far so soon... This sector is unfortunately still quite unfinished, as you can see. There used to be a Mudraptor nest here, but we're 90% sure they're all gone.”
trans-unit.target: “Ah shit, we didn't think you'd get this far so soon... This sector is unfortunately still quite unfinished, as you can see. There used to be a Mudraptor nest here, but we're 90% sure they're all gone.”

trans-unit.source: “Hold on a second... I see some additional movement on a camera. Uh oh...”
trans-unit.target: “Hold on a second... I see some additional movement on a camera. Uh oh...”

trans-unit.source: Use [InputType.Up], [InputType.Left], [InputType.Down], and [InputType.Right] to move your character.
trans-unit.target: Use [InputType.Up], [InputType.Left], [InputType.Down], and [InputType.Right] to move your character.

trans-unit.source: Use the cursor to control the direction your character is facing.\nPress [InputType.Use] to close this instruction.
trans-unit.target: Use the cursor to control the direction your character is facing.\nPress [InputType.Use] to close this instruction.

trans-unit.source: Use [InputType.Select] to interact with buttons, doors and objects.
trans-unit.target: Use [InputType.Select] to interact with buttons, doors and objects.

trans-unit.source: Interactable objects are highlighted when the cursor moves over them.
trans-unit.target: Interactable objects are highlighted when the cursor moves over them.

trans-unit.source: To pick up an item, point at it with the cursor and use [InputType.Select].
trans-unit.target: To pick up an item, point at it with the cursor and use [InputType.Select].

trans-unit.source: Locked doors require an ID card to get through.
trans-unit.target: Locked doors require an ID card to get through.

trans-unit.source: Press [InputType.Down] to drop down the platform, onto the stairs.
trans-unit.target: Press [InputType.Down] to drop down the platform, onto the stairs.

trans-unit.source: Devices sometimes break down. They can be repaired with the correct repair tool.\nPress [InputType.Use] to close this instruction.
trans-unit.target: Devices sometimes break down. They can be repaired with the correct repair tool.\nPress [InputType.Use] to close this instruction.

trans-unit.source: Items can be found in containers. Use the cursor and [InputType.Select] to open a container.
trans-unit.target: Items can be found in containers. Use the cursor and [InputType.Select] to open a container.

trans-unit.source: Double-click an item to equip it.
trans-unit.target: Double-click an item to equip it.

trans-unit.source: Items in your hotbar can also be equipped by pressing the corresponding hotbar number (1-9).
trans-unit.target: Items in your hotbar can also be equipped by pressing the corresponding hotbar number (1-9).

trans-unit.source: Well done! Wait for the pump to drain the room.
trans-unit.target: Well done! Wait for the pump to drain the room.

trans-unit.source: Ouch! Time your repairs by clicking the repair button when the line is in the colored section of the bar.
trans-unit.target: Ouch! Time your repairs by clicking the repair button when the line is in the colored section of the bar.

trans-unit.source: Welding tools are vital equipment for sealing leaks. Obtain a welding tool.
trans-unit.target: Welding tools are vital equipment for sealing leaks. Obtain a welding tool.

trans-unit.source: Welding tools need welding fuel to work. Get a welding fuel tank from the container.
trans-unit.target: Welding tools need welding fuel to work. Get a welding fuel tank from the container.

trans-unit.source: Drag a Welding Fuel Tank onto the Welding Tool to insert it.\nAlternatively press the hotbar number of the Welding Fuel Tank to insert it, while you have the tool equipped.
trans-unit.target: Drag a Welding Fuel Tank onto the Welding Tool to insert it.\nAlternatively press the hotbar number of the Welding Fuel Tank to insert it, while you have the tool equipped.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, while you have a welding tool equipped, press the welding fuel tank's hotbar number to insert it.
trans-unit.target: Alternatively, while you have a welding tool equipped, press the welding fuel tank's hotbar number to insert it.

trans-unit.source: To aim your tool or weapon, hold the [InputType.Aim] button, then press [InputType.Shoot] to use or fire it.
trans-unit.target: To aim your tool or weapon, hold the [InputType.Aim] button, then press [InputType.Shoot] to use or fire it.

trans-unit.source: Hold the [InputType.Aim] button to aim toward the cursor.
trans-unit.target: Hold the [InputType.Aim] button to aim toward the cursor.

trans-unit.source: Use [InputType.Up] and [InputType.Down] while near a ladder to go up or down it.
trans-unit.target: Use [InputType.Up] and [InputType.Down] while near a ladder to go up or down it.

trans-unit.source: Weld the leaking wall to continue.
trans-unit.target: Weld the leaking wall to continue.

trans-unit.source: Diving Suits allow you to swim underwater.\n\nEquip a Diving Suit by double clicking it, or dragging it on the highlighted slot.
trans-unit.target: Diving Suits allow you to swim underwater.\n\nEquip a Diving Suit by double clicking it, or dragging it on the highlighted slot.

trans-unit.source: Equip a diving suit by double-clicking it or dragging it onto the highlighted slot.
trans-unit.target: Equip a diving suit by double-clicking it or dragging it onto the highlighted slot.

trans-unit.source: WARNING! Your diving suit is empty, preventing you from breathing. Quickly find an oxygen tank and insert it.
trans-unit.target: WARNING! Your diving suit is empty, preventing you from breathing. Quickly find an oxygen tank and insert it.

trans-unit.source: Wearing a diving suit slowly drains its oxygen tank.
trans-unit.target: Wearing a diving suit slowly drains its oxygen tank.

trans-unit.source: When an oxygen tank is almost empty, your diving suit will sound the alarm.
trans-unit.target: When an oxygen tank is almost empty, your diving suit will sound the alarm.

trans-unit.source: You're running low on oxygen! To unequip the diving suit, drag it out of the inventory slot.
trans-unit.target: You're running low on oxygen! To unequip the diving suit, drag it out of the inventory slot.

trans-unit.source: Pumps are a mechanical device. Mechanical devices require a Wrench to repair.\nFind a Wrench.
trans-unit.target: Pumps are a mechanical device. Mechanical devices require a Wrench to repair.\nFind a Wrench.

trans-unit.source: Equip the wrench to be able to repair the pump.
trans-unit.target: Equip the wrench to be able to repair the pump.

trans-unit.source: Press [InputType.Select] to interact with the pump or other interactable devices.
trans-unit.target: Press [InputType.Select] to interact with the pump or other interactable devices.

trans-unit.source: Using the pump's interface, see if you can get up the ladder...
trans-unit.target: Using the pump's interface, see if you can get up the ladder...

trans-unit.source: By setting the pump to pump water into the room, you will be able to swim to the ladder.
trans-unit.target: By setting the pump to pump water into the room, you will be able to swim to the ladder.

trans-unit.source: Drag the oxygen tank on top of your equipped diving suit in your inventory to insert the tank into it.
trans-unit.target: Drag the oxygen tank on top of your equipped diving suit in your inventory to insert the tank into it.

trans-unit.source: Use the pump controls to pump water into the room. Press the power button to turn on the pump if needed.
trans-unit.target: Use the pump controls to pump water into the room. Press the power button to turn on the pump if needed.

trans-unit.source: You can drop items simply by dragging them out of your inventory.
trans-unit.target: You can drop items simply by dragging them out of your inventory.

trans-unit.source: Unequip your diving suit by dragging it out of its inventory slot.
trans-unit.target: Unequip your diving suit by dragging it out of its inventory slot.

trans-unit.source: Unequip your diving suit by double-clicking the inventory slot or by clicking the green button above it.
trans-unit.target: Unequip your diving suit by double-clicking the inventory slot or by clicking the green button above it.

trans-unit.source: Wait for the room to drain
trans-unit.target: Wait for the room to drain

trans-unit.source: Insert oxygen into the diving suit
trans-unit.target: Insert oxygen into the diving suit

trans-unit.source: Use the pump to flood the room
trans-unit.target: Use the pump to flood the room

trans-unit.source: Your inventory is shown at the bottom.\nTo get the screwdriver into your inventory, drag it there.\nAlternatively, double-click to obtain an item faster.
trans-unit.target: Your inventory is shown at the bottom.\nTo get the screwdriver into your inventory, drag it there.\nAlternatively, double-click to obtain an item faster.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial teaches basic controls and game concepts, such as moving and interacting with the environment.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial teaches basic controls and game concepts, such as moving and interacting with the environment.

trans-unit.source: Well done!\nYou've completed the Basics tutorial. Do you want to continue to the Roles tutorial?
trans-unit.target: Well done!\nYou've completed the Basics tutorial. Do you want to continue to the Roles tutorial?

trans-unit.source: “Oh hey—how's it floating, dude? You here to get your papers to sign on a submarine?”
trans-unit.target: “Oh hey—how's it floating, dude? You here to get your papers to sign on a submarine?”

trans-unit.source: “Whoa, such enthusiasm, dude! I love it! Are you familiar with the courses we offer?”
trans-unit.target: “Whoa, such enthusiasm, dude! I love it! Are you familiar with the courses we offer?”

trans-unit.source: “All righty dude, just chill in the next room until the other students arrive. Lemme open that door for ya.”
trans-unit.target: “All righty dude, just chill in the next room until the other students arrive. Lemme open that door for ya.”

trans-unit.source: “Ah, you know dude, just the thingamajig politician dude in his ivory tower trying to solve a problem...without actually solving the problem, ya know?”
trans-unit.target: “Ah, you know dude, just the thingamajig politician dude in his ivory tower trying to solve a problem...without actually solving the problem, ya know?”

trans-unit.source: “The submarine business—it ain't all that, you feel me? Ain't many that return from a trip. Ain't any that return from ten trips. So there's a 100% discount on whatever passes as education here, 'cus that'll solve things.”
trans-unit.target: “The submarine business—it ain't all that, you feel me? Ain't many that return from a trip. Ain't any that return from ten trips. So there's a 100% discount on whatever passes as education here, 'cus that'll solve things.”

trans-unit.source: “I'm just the reception dude, dude. Ain't my job to get meat for the grinder. Want my advice? Take a station job—fight back against the system, dude.”
trans-unit.target: “I'm just the reception dude, dude. Ain't my job to get meat for the grinder. Want my advice? Take a station job—fight back against the system, dude.”

trans-unit.source: “But I want to find adventure! Besides, there's no food here...”
trans-unit.target: “But I want to find adventure! Besides, there's no food here...”

trans-unit.source: “Suit yourself, dude... We offer five courses here:\n\nFirst off, the Captain. If ya feel like delegating all the shitty tasks, this is for you. Highly recommend.”
trans-unit.target: “Suit yourself, dude... We offer five courses here:\n\nFirst off, the Captain. If ya feel like delegating all the shitty tasks, this is for you. Highly recommend.”

trans-unit.source: “Sure, dude. Then there's the fixin' duo.\nThe Engineer gets all the fancy toys, but with a high risk of bein' shocked. Ain't for the weak hearted.\nThen there's the Mechanic, if ya don't mind getting wet. He's doing the welding and pump-fixing kind of things. Ain't recommended for smokers, feel me?”
trans-unit.target: “Sure, dude. Then there's the fixin' duo.\nThe Engineer gets all the fancy toys, but with a high risk of bein' shocked. Ain't for the weak hearted.\nThen there's the Mechanic, if ya don't mind getting wet. He's doing the welding and pump-fixing kind of things. Ain't recommended for smokers, feel me?”

trans-unit.source: “Yeah, awful right? Then there's the Security Officer, if you like shooting the creepies. They're usually too in love with their power, though. I actually got this tattoo that says ASOAB. Means 'All Security Officers Are Bastards.' Watch out with those dudes, dude.”
trans-unit.target: “Yeah, awful right? Then there's the Security Officer, if you like shooting the creepies. They're usually too in love with their power, though. I actually got this tattoo that says ASOAB. Means 'All Security Officers Are Bastards.' Watch out with those dudes, dude.”

trans-unit.source: “Finally, there's the Medical Doctor. Most of 'em are creepier than the actual creepies, but some actually make people better, man. They're some literal saints, feel me?\nAnyhow, if ya still interested, move on to the next room.”
trans-unit.target: “Finally, there's the Medical Doctor. Most of 'em are creepier than the actual creepies, but some actually make people better, man. They're some literal saints, feel me?\nAnyhow, if ya still interested, move on to the next room.”

trans-unit.source: Move to the room on the right to continue.
trans-unit.target: Move to the room on the right to continue.

trans-unit.source: Use [InputType.CrewOrders] to toggle the list of crewmembers.
trans-unit.target: Use [InputType.CrewOrders] to toggle the list of crewmembers.

trans-unit.source: Select a trainee position from the list of crewmembers with [InputType.Select].
trans-unit.target: Select a trainee position from the list of crewmembers with [InputType.Select].

trans-unit.source: This ID card gives the trainee access to the training areas.
trans-unit.target: This ID card gives the trainee access to the training areas.

trans-unit.source: The Captain steers the submarine, operates the sonar and issues commands to the crew.
trans-unit.target: The Captain steers the submarine, operates the sonar and issues commands to the crew.

trans-unit.source: The Engineer operates the nuclear reactor to generate power and maintains electrical devices. Skilled engineers can add custom functionality to submarines with custom wiring and signal components.
trans-unit.target: The Engineer operates the nuclear reactor to generate power and maintains electrical devices. Skilled engineers can add custom functionality to submarines with custom wiring and signal components.

trans-unit.source: The Mechanic maintains the mechanical devices, such as the engine and pumps, to keep the submarine moving smoothly. Additionally, any leaks in the hull are typically fixed by mechanics, as they have superior welding skills.
trans-unit.target: The Mechanic maintains the mechanical devices, such as the engine and pumps, to keep the submarine moving smoothly. Additionally, any leaks in the hull are typically fixed by mechanics, as they have superior welding skills.

trans-unit.source: The Security Officer protects the submarine and crew from external and internal threats. With a combination of ship-mounted and handheld weapons, and the skills to use them, they're the first line of defense.
trans-unit.target: The Security Officer protects the submarine and crew from external and internal threats. With a combination of ship-mounted and handheld weapons, and the skills to use them, they're the first line of defense.

trans-unit.source: The Medical Doctor treats the ailments of the crew. This ranges from bandaging small wounds to administering drugs. In a worst-case scenario, fallen crewmembers can be saved with CPR.
trans-unit.target: The Medical Doctor treats the ailments of the crew. This ranges from bandaging small wounds to administering drugs. In a worst-case scenario, fallen crewmembers can be saved with CPR.

trans-unit.source: Start the tutorial for the Captain?
trans-unit.target: Start the tutorial for the Captain?

trans-unit.source: Start the tutorial for the Engineer?
trans-unit.target: Start the tutorial for the Engineer?

trans-unit.source: Start the tutorial for the Mechanic?
trans-unit.target: Start the tutorial for the Mechanic?

trans-unit.source: Start the tutorial for the Security Officer?
trans-unit.target: Start the tutorial for the Security Officer?

trans-unit.source: Start the tutorial for the Medical Doctor?
trans-unit.target: Start the tutorial for the Medical Doctor?

trans-unit.source: “Hey dude, the teacher is ready for ya.”
trans-unit.target: “Hey dude, the teacher is ready for ya.”

trans-unit.source: To start the tutorial, find your instructor at the marked location.
trans-unit.target: To start the tutorial, find your instructor at the marked location.

trans-unit.source: “Hi. I am Captain Sterner. I will be your instructor today. I will start with a brief explanation of what it means to be a captain, followed by a practical course. It is crucial to enforce a chain of command, so you will address me as 'Captain.' Say 'Yes, Captain' if you understand.”
trans-unit.target: “Hi. I am Captain Sterner. I will be your instructor today. I will start with a brief explanation of what it means to be a captain, followed by a practical course. It is crucial to enforce a chain of command, so you will address me as 'Captain.' Say 'Yes, Captain' if you understand.”

trans-unit.source: “The Command Room is the brains of the submarine. From here signals are passed—either verbally or electronically—to crew and devices.”
trans-unit.target: “The Command Room is the brains of the submarine. From here signals are passed—either verbally or electronically—to crew and devices.”

trans-unit.source: “Using devices like the navigation terminal and status monitor, the captain can pass all these signals, for example: Order the crew to fix devices, signal the engine to move at full power, or empty the ballast tanks to raise the submarine.”
trans-unit.target: “Using devices like the navigation terminal and status monitor, the captain can pass all these signals, for example: Order the crew to fix devices, signal the engine to move at full power, or empty the ballast tanks to raise the submarine.”

trans-unit.source: “The core function of the navigation terminal is to move the submarine.”
trans-unit.target: “The core function of the navigation terminal is to move the submarine.”

trans-unit.source: “Since we're in a low-light environment, sonar is the most efficient way of identifying terrain, objects and lifeforms.”
trans-unit.target: “Since we're in a low-light environment, sonar is the most efficient way of identifying terrain, objects and lifeforms.”

trans-unit.source: “Sonar is short for 'sound navigation and ranging.' Sonar has two modes: passive and active.”
trans-unit.target: “Sonar is short for 'sound navigation and ranging.' Sonar has two modes: passive and active.”

trans-unit.source: “While in 'passive' mode, the sonar only listens to sounds. It will still detect things, especially if these things make a lot of sound. Static objects or terrain, however, won't be detected until very close.”
trans-unit.target: “While in 'passive' mode, the sonar only listens to sounds. It will still detect things, especially if these things make a lot of sound. Static objects or terrain, however, won't be detected until very close.”

trans-unit.source: “While in 'active' mode, the sonar emits pulses of sound at an interval. Simply put, this means every few seconds, the sound wave will reveal terrain, objects and lifeforms. Active sonar is essential to avoid bumping into terrain while moving at any decent speed.”
trans-unit.target: “While in 'active' mode, the sonar emits pulses of sound at an interval. Simply put, this means every few seconds, the sound wave will reveal terrain, objects and lifeforms. Active sonar is essential to avoid bumping into terrain while moving at any decent speed.”

trans-unit.source: “Finally, there's the directional ping. While active sonar is great for spotting things, it's also great for being spotted. The directional ping limits the direction of the sound pulse, thus preventing hostiles from spotting your submarine—as long as it's not aimed at them.”
trans-unit.target: “Finally, there's the directional ping. While active sonar is great for spotting things, it's also great for being spotted. The directional ping limits the direction of the sound pulse, thus preventing hostiles from spotting your submarine—as long as it's not aimed at them.”

trans-unit.source: “We've hooked up this navigation terminal to a sonar. Feel free to try it out.”
trans-unit.target: “We've hooked up this navigation terminal to a sonar. Feel free to try it out.”

trans-unit.source: Use [InputType.Select] to interact with the navigation terminal.
trans-unit.target: Use [InputType.Select] to interact with the navigation terminal.

trans-unit.source: “Once you have a bearing on your surroundings, it is time to move the submarine.”
trans-unit.target: “Once you have a bearing on your surroundings, it is time to move the submarine.”

trans-unit.source: “Steering is controlled with the display in the middle, which utilizes modern touchcreen and auto-pilot technologies.”
trans-unit.target: “Steering is controlled with the display in the middle, which utilizes modern touchcreen and auto-pilot technologies.”

trans-unit.source: “By default, the auto-pilot will try to maintain the submarine's position. By touching (clicking) the screen, the auto-pilot's target position will change to the indicated position.”
trans-unit.target: “By default, the auto-pilot will try to maintain the submarine's position. By touching (clicking) the screen, the auto-pilot's target position will change to the indicated position.”

trans-unit.source: “Furthermore, the auto-pilot has information on outpost locations. It attempts to automatically navigate to predefined positions. This system, however, is neither infallible nor as quick as manual steering.”
trans-unit.target: “Furthermore, the auto-pilot has information on outpost locations. It attempts to automatically navigate to predefined positions. This system, however, is neither infallible nor as quick as manual steering.”

trans-unit.source: “Speaking of manual steering: This is the preferred option for those who want more control over their submarine. By touching (clicking) the screen, you set the submarine's target velocity.”
trans-unit.target: “Speaking of manual steering: This is the preferred option for those who want more control over their submarine. By touching (clicking) the screen, you set the submarine's target velocity.”

trans-unit.source: “For example: If you want your submarine to move slowly to the right, you touch slightly to the right of the submarine's current position. If you want to rise up quickly, you touch far above the submarine's current position.”
trans-unit.target: “For example: If you want your submarine to move slowly to the right, you touch slightly to the right of the submarine's current position. If you want to rise up quickly, you touch far above the submarine's current position.”

trans-unit.source: “Trick question! No you're not, cadet! A submarine is usually docked while idle, to prevent it from drifting and using fuel. First, you'll need to undock using the big red "Undock" button. Easy, right? Now, let's try it out.”
trans-unit.target: “Trick question! No you're not, cadet! A submarine is usually docked while idle, to prevent it from drifting and using fuel. First, you'll need to undock using the big red "Undock" button. Easy, right? Now, let's try it out.”

trans-unit.source: Undock the drone, using the Shuttle Navigation Terminal.
trans-unit.target: Undock the drone, using the Shuttle Navigation Terminal.

trans-unit.source: Practice steering the drone. Re-dock the drone when ready.\nTo dock, align the docking hatches (marked in green). Press Dock once the button flashes.
trans-unit.target: Practice steering the drone. Re-dock the drone when ready.\nTo dock, align the docking hatches (marked in green). Press Dock once the button flashes.

trans-unit.source: “Not bad, cadet. You are ready to be a helmsman now, but being a captain is more than that.”
trans-unit.target: “Not bad, cadet. You are ready to be a helmsman now, but being a captain is more than that.”

trans-unit.source: “You cannot run a large submarine by yourself. You need a crew. And a crew needs someone to lead them, or they will stumble around like headless chickens. Cluck cluck cluck. Wait, they wouldn't... Never mind.”
trans-unit.target: “You cannot run a large submarine by yourself. You need a crew. And a crew needs someone to lead them, or they will stumble around like headless chickens. Cluck cluck cluck. Wait, they wouldn't... Never mind.”

trans-unit.source: “As captain, you're responsible for leading your crew. So you'll have to issue orders to them. Meaning, you'll need to know what needs doing!”
trans-unit.target: “As captain, you're responsible for leading your crew. So you'll have to issue orders to them. Meaning, you'll need to know what needs doing!”

trans-unit.source: “That's where the status monitor comes in. With the status monitor, you can see where the submarine is in need of repairs. You can then mark these rooms with tasks and pray there's someone competent enough to perform them. Don't skip the praying part.”
trans-unit.target: “That's where the status monitor comes in. With the status monitor, you can see where the submarine is in need of repairs. You can then mark these rooms with tasks and pray there's someone competent enough to perform them. Don't skip the praying part.”

trans-unit.source: “If you don't want shit to break down in the first place though, you'll have to tell your crew to keep it all in good order. This means issuing them orders from the get-go.”
trans-unit.target: “If you don't want shit to break down in the first place though, you'll have to tell your crew to keep it all in good order. This means issuing them orders from the get-go.”

trans-unit.source: “Let's try it out on an actual submarine, shall we? The other cadets ought to be ready right about now. Follow me.”
trans-unit.target: “Let's try it out on an actual submarine, shall we? The other cadets ought to be ready right about now. Follow me.”

trans-unit.source: Follow Captain Sterner into the submarine.
trans-unit.target: Follow Captain Sterner into the submarine.

trans-unit.source: “We're here. Let's start by issuing commands to the crew. Without power, nothing in the submarine will work, so first order the reactor turned on.”
trans-unit.target: “We're here. Let's start by issuing commands to the crew. Without power, nothing in the submarine will work, so first order the reactor turned on.”

trans-unit.source: Order the reactor to be turned on.
trans-unit.target: Order the reactor to be turned on.

trans-unit.source: The command interface will automatically select the most qualified crewmember for the assigned task.
trans-unit.target: The command interface will automatically select the most qualified crewmember for the assigned task.

trans-unit.source: You can also give orders directly to a specific crewmember on the crew list (toggle with [InputType.CrewOrders]).
trans-unit.target: You can also give orders directly to a specific crewmember on the crew list (toggle with [InputType.CrewOrders]).

trans-unit.source: “Great. Remember—captains should command respect and obedience. That's why they usually carry a firearm. Our last engineer, Stevie Dolittle, said, 'What are you going to do, shoot me?' Haha, his cousin didn't stick around long after that. Anyways, let's order some maintenance, shall we?”
trans-unit.target: “Great. Remember—captains should command respect and obedience. That's why they usually carry a firearm. Our last engineer, Stevie Dolittle, said, 'What are you going to do, shoot me?' Haha, his cousin didn't stick around long after that. Anyways, let's order some maintenance, shall we?”

trans-unit.source: Order mechanical devices to be repaired.
trans-unit.target: Order mechanical devices to be repaired.

trans-unit.source: “And no, you won't be given a firearm yet—you'll have to complete your education first. Let's get on with that, shall we? Honkmother knows you'll need it. Speaking of firearms, it's time to get the sub's weapons operational.”
trans-unit.target: “And no, you won't be given a firearm yet—you'll have to complete your education first. Let's get on with that, shall we? Honkmother knows you'll need it. Speaking of firearms, it's time to get the sub's weapons operational.”

trans-unit.source: Order the bottom turret to be operated.
trans-unit.target: Order the bottom turret to be operated.

trans-unit.source: “That covers the basics. Now the real test: Undock from the station, get us to the next outpost, and you'll be done and graduated! Good luck, cadet!”
trans-unit.target: “That covers the basics. Now the real test: Undock from the station, get us to the next outpost, and you'll be done and graduated! Good luck, cadet!”

trans-unit.source: Use what you've learned to reach the next outpost.
trans-unit.target: Use what you've learned to reach the next outpost.

trans-unit.source: Try out the maintain position controls
trans-unit.target: Try out the maintain position controls

trans-unit.source: Order electrical devices to be repaired
trans-unit.target: Order electrical devices to be repaired

trans-unit.source: Order mechanical devices to be repaired
trans-unit.target: Order mechanical devices to be repaired

trans-unit.source: Order the bottom turret to be operated
trans-unit.target: Order the bottom turret to be operated

trans-unit.source: Arrive and dock at the marked station
trans-unit.target: Arrive and dock at the marked station

trans-unit.source: “Welcome! Welcome! I'm Chief Engineer Friar, but please, call me Kayleigh.”
trans-unit.target: “Welcome! Welcome! I'm Chief Engineer Friar, but please, call me Kayleigh.”

trans-unit.source: “The reactor room is where the heart of the submarine resides. As long as there's electrical juices flowing through the wires, there is life in the submarine. And it—the electricity—all originates from this beauty right here.”
trans-unit.target: “The reactor room is where the heart of the submarine resides. As long as there's electrical juices flowing through the wires, there is life in the submarine. And it—the electricity—all originates from this beauty right here.”

trans-unit.source: “While 'nuclear reactor' may sound scary, because of the whole invisible radiation thing, there's actually nothing to worry about! Operating reactors is relatively safe.”
trans-unit.target: “While 'nuclear reactor' may sound scary, because of the whole invisible radiation thing, there's actually nothing to worry about! Operating reactors is relatively safe.”

trans-unit.source: “Relative to the other, waaaay more dangerous dangers, that is. The reactor room is usually quite well protected, and it's centrally located!”
trans-unit.target: “Relative to the other, waaaay more dangerous dangers, that is. The reactor room is usually quite well protected, and it's centrally located!”

trans-unit.source: “One thing to keep in mind, and I will stress this: Do NOT insert every fuel rod you have in your storage into the reactor all at once.”
trans-unit.target: “One thing to keep in mind, and I will stress this: Do NOT insert every fuel rod you have in your storage into the reactor all at once.”

trans-unit.source: “Really. Do not. Each fuel rod increases the amount of heat generated by the reactor. Too much heat means a fire will start. Eventually a full-blown meltdown will trigger, and...KABOOM! Well, at least it's a quick death. Sure beats getting captured by pirates.”
trans-unit.target: “Really. Do not. Each fuel rod increases the amount of heat generated by the reactor. Too much heat means a fire will start. Eventually a full-blown meltdown will trigger, and...KABOOM! Well, at least it's a quick death. Sure beats getting captured by pirates.”

trans-unit.source: “For now, I'm just going to hand you one fuel rod. Let me show you how to insert it.”
trans-unit.target: “For now, I'm just going to hand you one fuel rod. Let me show you how to insert it.”

trans-unit.source: Interact with the reactor, then drag the fuel rod into the slots on the left.
trans-unit.target: Interact with the reactor, then drag the fuel rod into the slots on the left.

trans-unit.source:
“A basic start-up of the nuclear reactor looks like this:
1. One non-empty fuel rod inserted.
2. Power button pressed.
3. Automatic control toggled on.”
trans-unit.target:
“A basic start-up of the nuclear reactor looks like this:
1. One non-empty fuel rod inserted.
2. Power button pressed.
3. Automatic control toggled on.”

trans-unit.source: “Give it a try then! Don't be shy!”
trans-unit.target: “Give it a try then! Don't be shy!”

trans-unit.source: Interact with the reactor, power it up and enable automatic control.
trans-unit.target: Interact with the reactor, power it up and enable automatic control.

trans-unit.source: “Great job! You're a natural! We now have power. Look at how all the lights are turning on—that was all you!”
trans-unit.target: “Great job! You're a natural! We now have power. Look at how all the lights are turning on—that was all you!”

trans-unit.source: “Aha, getting confident, are we? Well, let's switch over to manual control then.”
trans-unit.target: “Aha, getting confident, are we? Well, let's switch over to manual control then.”

trans-unit.source: “In manual control, you're using two controls. The first one, on the left, is the fission rate and the second, on the right, is the turbine output.”
trans-unit.target: “In manual control, you're using two controls. The first one, on the left, is the fission rate and the second, on the right, is the turbine output.”

trans-unit.source: “Increasing the fission rate makes the reactor consume more fuel and generate more heat. The heat is used to spin the turbine, which generates electricity.”
trans-unit.target: “Increasing the fission rate makes the reactor consume more fuel and generate more heat. The heat is used to spin the turbine, which generates electricity.”

trans-unit.source: “The higher the turbine output, the more the reactor attempts to generate electricity. If the output is too high relative to the fission rate, the reactor will cool down; too low and it'll overheat.”
trans-unit.target: “The higher the turbine output, the more the reactor attempts to generate electricity. If the output is too high relative to the fission rate, the reactor will cool down; too low and it'll overheat.”

trans-unit.source: “It all boils down to: Keep the left gauge in the green, keep the right gauge in the green.”
trans-unit.target: “It all boils down to: Keep the left gauge in the green, keep the right gauge in the green.”

trans-unit.source: “Why bother with manual control at all?”
trans-unit.target: “Why bother with manual control at all?”

trans-unit.source: “Great question! Ever been on a submarine and the lights suddenly turned off? That probably meant the reactor was on automatic control and the captain did some sudden maneuvering. Auto is much slower to react to and compensate for higher power needs than manual control is.”
trans-unit.target: “Great question! Ever been on a submarine and the lights suddenly turned off? That probably meant the reactor was on automatic control and the captain did some sudden maneuvering. Auto is much slower to react to and compensate for higher power needs than manual control is.”

trans-unit.source: Interact with the reactor, then switch to manual control.
trans-unit.target: Interact with the reactor, then switch to manual control.

trans-unit.source: Using the sliders, keep both needles of the gauges in the green areas.
trans-unit.target: Using the sliders, keep both needles of the gauges in the green areas.

trans-unit.source: “Good job! Now, let's move on to the next room. But first, turn the automatic control back on. It's important not to leave the reactor on manual when it's unattended!”
trans-unit.target: “Good job! Now, let's move on to the next room. But first, turn the automatic control back on. It's important not to leave the reactor on manual when it's unattended!”

trans-unit.source: “All right, I think we're all done with the reactor now! Follow me.”
trans-unit.target: “All right, I think we're all done with the reactor now! Follow me.”

trans-unit.source: “Welcome to Electrical! Things are buzzing around here, aren't they?! Don't be intimidated by all the wires; they're going exactly where they need to go. I made sure of it.”
trans-unit.target: “Welcome to Electrical! Things are buzzing around here, aren't they?! Don't be intimidated by all the wires; they're going exactly where they need to go. I made sure of it.”

trans-unit.source: “This room is usually filled with junction boxes. All the power from the reactor needs to be distributed, and that's where the jay-bees—or junction boxes—come in!”
trans-unit.target: “This room is usually filled with junction boxes. All the power from the reactor needs to be distributed, and that's where the jay-bees—or junction boxes—come in!”

trans-unit.source: “When junction boxes break down, which they will, any devices connected to them will cease to function. Your job is to keep that from happening!”
trans-unit.target: “When junction boxes break down, which they will, any devices connected to them will cease to function. Your job is to keep that from happening!”

trans-unit.source: “Why do they break? Can't they, like, not break?”
trans-unit.target: “Why do they break? Can't they, like, not break?”

trans-unit.source: “Good question! Some skilled engineers at outposts can make devices more damage resistant, but let's forget about that for now.”
trans-unit.target: “Good question! Some skilled engineers at outposts can make devices more damage resistant, but let's forget about that for now.”

trans-unit.source: “Most captains are the rough breakey kind of captains. They prefer to accelerate at maximum power for a few seconds, then completely idle the submarine the next minute for a cigar break. These power fluctuations are what damages the sub's electrical devices most of the time.”
trans-unit.target: “Most captains are the rough breakey kind of captains. They prefer to accelerate at maximum power for a few seconds, then completely idle the submarine the next minute for a cigar break. These power fluctuations are what damages the sub's electrical devices most of the time.”

trans-unit.source: “The other thing is water, of course. Electricity and water don't mix so well, so any time water leaks into the submarine, there will be damage.”
trans-unit.target: “The other thing is water, of course. Electricity and water don't mix so well, so any time water leaks into the submarine, there will be damage.”

trans-unit.source: “So I just sit here with my screwdriver for the whole trip?”
trans-unit.target: “So I just sit here with my screwdriver for the whole trip?”

trans-unit.source: “Pretty much! Except once you learn how to fast-repair, you'll have a lot of time for other things. Let me show you!”
trans-unit.target: “Pretty much! Except once you learn how to fast-repair, you'll have a lot of time for other things. Let me show you!”

trans-unit.source: Interact with the junction box and click the repair button in rapid succession.
trans-unit.target: Interact with the junction box and click the repair button in rapid succession.

trans-unit.source: Ouch! Repairing too quickly gets you shocked.
trans-unit.target: Ouch! Repairing too quickly gets you shocked.

trans-unit.source: Now try to time clicking the repair button. Click when the moving line hits the colored area of the bar.
trans-unit.target: Now try to time clicking the repair button. Click when the moving line hits the colored area of the bar.

trans-unit.source: “That went okay, I think. But look, this one light is still off!”
trans-unit.target: “That went okay, I think. But look, this one light is still off!”

trans-unit.source: “It's because I removed a wire connecting the junction box to the lamp. But I have it right here—I just need you to connect it.”
