trans-unit.target: “It's because I removed a wire connecting the junction box to the lamp. But I have it right here—I just need you to connect it.”

trans-unit.source: “All you need is a screwdriver in one hand and a wire in the other. Let me show you!”
trans-unit.target: “All you need is a screwdriver in one hand and a wire in the other. Let me show you!”

trans-unit.source: Equip the screwdriver and the wire.
trans-unit.target: Equip the screwdriver and the wire.

trans-unit.source: Attach the wire to the POWER connection.
trans-unit.target: Attach the wire to the POWER connection.

trans-unit.source: Close the current wiring panel, then rewire the lamp with [InputType.Use].
trans-unit.target: Close the current wiring panel, then rewire the lamp with [InputType.Use].

trans-unit.source: Attach the wire to the POWER connection.
trans-unit.target: Attach the wire to the POWER connection.

trans-unit.source: “Awesome job! That covers all the basics of engineering. The rest you can learn on your trips! You were a lovely student. Hope to see you around!”
trans-unit.target: “Awesome job! That covers all the basics of engineering. The rest you can learn on your trips! You were a lovely student. Hope to see you around!”

trans-unit.source: Insert a fuel rod into the reactor
trans-unit.target: Insert a fuel rod into the reactor

trans-unit.source: Keep the fission rate needle on green
trans-unit.target: Keep the fission rate needle on green

trans-unit.source: Keep the turbine output needle on green
trans-unit.target: Keep the turbine output needle on green

trans-unit.source: Wire the Junction Box's POWER output
trans-unit.target: Wire the Junction Box's POWER output

trans-unit.source: Connect the wire to the lamp's POWER input
trans-unit.target: Connect the wire to the lamp's POWER input

trans-unit.source: “Hi, I'm Amos. I'm the mechanic around here. I'll teach you how to care for your submarine. Remember: If you take care of her, she'll take care of you.”
trans-unit.target: “Hi, I'm Amos. I'm the mechanic around here. I'll teach you how to care for your submarine. Remember: If you take care of her, she'll take care of you.”

trans-unit.source: “This right here is the engine room. It houses the engine. Every submarine has one. The engine moves the submarine forwards and backwards.”
trans-unit.target: “This right here is the engine room. It houses the engine. Every submarine has one. The engine moves the submarine forwards and backwards.”

trans-unit.source: “The engine is a mechanical device. You will be a mechanic. You take care of mechanical devices.”
trans-unit.target: “The engine is a mechanical device. You will be a mechanic. You take care of mechanical devices.”

trans-unit.source: “Thing is making funny sounds or smoking? You take a wrench and fix it. Here's a wrench. Now fix it.”
trans-unit.target: “Thing is making funny sounds or smoking? You take a wrench and fix it. Here's a wrench. Now fix it.”

trans-unit.source: “That wasn't terrible. Anyways, the ceiling is leaking too, which is probably what caused the damage in the first place. You know how to handle a welding tool?”
trans-unit.target: “That wasn't terrible. Anyways, the ceiling is leaking too, which is probably what caused the damage in the first place. You know how to handle a welding tool?”

trans-unit.source: “Hm, that will do. Now, grab a diving mask from the supply cabinet.”
trans-unit.target: “Hm, that will do. Now, grab a diving mask from the supply cabinet.”

trans-unit.source: “Down this ladder and through the hatch is a ballast tank. The ballast tank fills up with water when the submarine needs to go down.”
trans-unit.target: “Down this ladder and through the hatch is a ballast tank. The ballast tank fills up with water when the submarine needs to go down.”

trans-unit.source: “Inside, a pump forces the water in or out. If the pump breaks down, you get in there and fix it. Since there's usually water in the ballast tank, it helps to have some diving tools on you. Still got that wrench?”
trans-unit.target: “Inside, a pump forces the water in or out. If the pump breaks down, you get in there and fix it. Since there's usually water in the ballast tank, it helps to have some diving tools on you. Still got that wrench?”

trans-unit.source: “Not bad, cub. Follow me. We'll do some fabricating next.”
trans-unit.target: “Not bad, cub. Follow me. We'll do some fabricating next.”

trans-unit.source: “The engineering room is where you can find the fabrication and deconstruction devices. Not all submarines have them, but most outposts and stations do, and you can use them for free.”
trans-unit.target: “The engineering room is where you can find the fabrication and deconstruction devices. Not all submarines have them, but most outposts and stations do, and you can use them for free.”

trans-unit.source: “Fabricating new items with a fabricator is easy: You put in some basic ingredients, select a blueprint or recipe, press the button and you got yourself some brand new toys.”
trans-unit.target: “Fabricating new items with a fabricator is easy: You put in some basic ingredients, select a blueprint or recipe, press the button and you got yourself some brand new toys.”

trans-unit.source: “Deconstructing is even easier: You put in some item, plant or mineral, and you get basic materials back.\nDo note that you'll lose some materials in the process.”
trans-unit.target: “Deconstructing is even easier: You put in some item, plant or mineral, and you get basic materials back.\nDo note that you'll lose some materials in the process.”

trans-unit.source: “How about you make your own wrench? There's some iron ore in the cabinet—you'll need to refine it in the deconstructor first.”
trans-unit.target: “How about you make your own wrench? There's some iron ore in the cabinet—you'll need to refine it in the deconstructor first.”

trans-unit.source: “You can keep that one if you want, cub. Anyways, almost done. Last room, then some beer.”
trans-unit.target: “You can keep that one if you want, cub. Anyways, almost done. Last room, then some beer.”

trans-unit.source: “This is the oxygen generator compartment. Typically quite small, but also rather important as they keep people breathing.”
trans-unit.target: “This is the oxygen generator compartment. Typically quite small, but also rather important as they keep people breathing.”

trans-unit.source: “Just remember to check up on it and repair it. If you got time to spare, use it to fill up depleted oxygen tanks.”
trans-unit.target: “Just remember to check up on it and repair it. If you got time to spare, use it to fill up depleted oxygen tanks.”

trans-unit.source: “How about you put your oxygen tank in there and we call it a day, eh?”
trans-unit.target: “How about you put your oxygen tank in there and we call it a day, eh?”

trans-unit.source: Drag the used oxygen tank to the oxygen generator
trans-unit.target: Drag the used oxygen tank to the oxygen generator

trans-unit.source: “Good job, cub. You made it through. Keep your tools sorted, your workplace tidy and let's have that beer now.”
trans-unit.target: “Good job, cub. You made it through. Keep your tools sorted, your workplace tidy and let's have that beer now.”

trans-unit.source: Repair the hull with the welding tool
trans-unit.target: Repair the hull with the welding tool

trans-unit.source: “Stand with your back straight, recruit! I’ll teach you to shoot, stab and sink your enemies. My name is Officer Pérez, but you might as well forget it now, since you’ll address me only as ma'am.”
trans-unit.target: “Stand with your back straight, recruit! I’ll teach you to shoot, stab and sink your enemies. My name is Officer Pérez, but you might as well forget it now, since you’ll address me only as ma'am.”

trans-unit.source: “Welcome to the armory. Every crew needs an armory to store their weapons. Preferably one that's secured by a locked door to prevent the munitions from falling into the wrong hands. Armories are often situated near the command room and/or the gunnery compartment. In lieu of armories, secure cabinets are sometimes used to store handheld weaponry.”
trans-unit.target: “Welcome to the armory. Every crew needs an armory to store their weapons. Preferably one that's secured by a locked door to prevent the munitions from falling into the wrong hands. Armories are often situated near the command room and/or the gunnery compartment. In lieu of armories, secure cabinets are sometimes used to store handheld weaponry.”

trans-unit.source: “Being such a quick learner, you might last longer than most. First of all, equip yourself with body armor. You can find some in that cabinet. Just follow the stink of sweat.”
trans-unit.target: “Being such a quick learner, you might last longer than most. First of all, equip yourself with body armor. You can find some in that cabinet. Just follow the stink of sweat.”

trans-unit.source: “Good. I think it was recruit Miller who died in that armor. A bright young man, but the worst aim you ever saw. Now get a gun and ammo from that rack. Make sure it’s loaded by hovering your mouse over it.”
trans-unit.target: “Good. I think it was recruit Miller who died in that armor. A bright young man, but the worst aim you ever saw. Now get a gun and ammo from that rack. Make sure it’s loaded by hovering your mouse over it.”

trans-unit.source: Load your gun with the ammo. (Drag the ammo onto the gun)
trans-unit.target: Load your gun with the ammo. (Drag the ammo onto the gun)

trans-unit.source: “Management wants me to remind you about trigger discipline at this point. ...Now that that’s done with, let’s get to shooting. We’re fresh out of clowns, so you’ll have to make do with a husk. Proceed to the shooting range.”
trans-unit.target: “Management wants me to remind you about trigger discipline at this point. ...Now that that’s done with, let’s get to shooting. We’re fresh out of clowns, so you’ll have to make do with a husk. Proceed to the shooting range.”

trans-unit.source: “Enemies that manage to board your submarine are usually weak enough to be dispatched with handheld weapons. Husks can infect humans with a deadly parasite, but this one is safely contained in the range. Kill it.”
trans-unit.target: “Enemies that manage to board your submarine are usually weak enough to be dispatched with handheld weapons. Husks can infect humans with a deadly parasite, but this one is safely contained in the range. Kill it.”

trans-unit.source: “Nice shooting. You beat Miller’s record. Let’s find you something bigger to shoot. Proceed to the coilgun loader.”
trans-unit.target: “Nice shooting. You beat Miller’s record. Let’s find you something bigger to shoot. Proceed to the coilgun loader.”

trans-unit.source: “This here's the gunnery. From here you'll be able to control various weapons situated on the hull of your submarine.”
trans-unit.target: “This here's the gunnery. From here you'll be able to control various weapons situated on the hull of your submarine.”

trans-unit.source: “Submarine weaponry consists of several devices. Along with the turret itself, you’ll find a loader, a supercapacitor, and a periscope.”
trans-unit.target: “Submarine weaponry consists of several devices. Along with the turret itself, you’ll find a loader, a supercapacitor, and a periscope.”

trans-unit.source: “A loader should have ammunition compatible with the weapon it's linked to. Load some coilgun ammunition into this one.”
trans-unit.target: “A loader should have ammunition compatible with the weapon it's linked to. Load some coilgun ammunition into this one.”

trans-unit.source: Insert a coilgun ammunition box into the loader.
trans-unit.target: Insert a coilgun ammunition box into the loader.

trans-unit.source: “Supercapacitors provide power to the weapons. Turn this one on by cranking the dial. The higher it is, the faster your weapons charge. Just be careful—on red it starts to overload.”
trans-unit.target: “Supercapacitors provide power to the weapons. Turn this one on by cranking the dial. The higher it is, the faster your weapons charge. Just be careful—on red it starts to overload.”

trans-unit.source: “Periscopes are used to control turrets. While interacting with a periscope, use your mouse to aim and [InputType.Shoot] to shoot. Now see if you can’t find something to shoot with this coilgun.”
trans-unit.target: “Periscopes are used to control turrets. While interacting with a periscope, use your mouse to aim and [InputType.Shoot] to shoot. Now see if you can’t find something to shoot with this coilgun.”

trans-unit.source: Kill the enemy outside the station.
trans-unit.target: Kill the enemy outside the station.

trans-unit.source: “Good one. Now I can sleep better at night. Unlike recruit Miller.”
trans-unit.target: “Good one. Now I can sleep better at night. Unlike recruit Miller.”

trans-unit.source: “This is the airlock. If you need to leave the sub to perform external repairs, investigate some minerals or peel a nasty crawler off the hull, this is where you go.\nDon't forget your diving suit, though—a diving mask won't cut it out there.”
trans-unit.target: “This is the airlock. If you need to leave the sub to perform external repairs, investigate some minerals or peel a nasty crawler off the hull, this is where you go.\nDon't forget your diving suit, though—a diving mask won't cut it out there.”

trans-unit.source: “You’re here. Great. My name is Doctor James Beem and I’ll be guiding your hand today. What’s your name again? Oh, it doesn’t matter. Let’s get on with it. My head is absolutely throbbing.”
trans-unit.target: “You’re here. Great. My name is Doctor James Beem and I’ll be guiding your hand today. What’s your name again? Oh, it doesn’t matter. Let’s get on with it. My head is absolutely throbbing.”

trans-unit.source: “The med bay is where medical items and treatments are stored. If a submarine has a medical fabricator, it is usually situated here. Some med bays are also equipped with beds for patients to rest in. As space is limited in submarines, some vessels opt to do without a dedicated med bay.”
trans-unit.target: “The med bay is where medical items and treatments are stored. If a submarine has a medical fabricator, it is usually situated here. Some med bays are also equipped with beds for patients to rest in. As space is limited in submarines, some vessels opt to do without a dedicated med bay.”

trans-unit.source: “Keep it down, will you? Grab some morphine for me. You can find it in that cabinet over there. That’s a standard medical cabinet. You can find those on board most submarines.”
trans-unit.target: “Keep it down, will you? Grab some morphine for me. You can find it in that cabinet over there. That’s a standard medical cabinet. You can find those on board most submarines.”

trans-unit.source: Open the Doctor's health interface with [InputType.Health]
trans-unit.target: Open the Doctor's health interface with [InputType.Health]

trans-unit.source: Drag the morphine anywhere on the body.
trans-unit.target: Drag the morphine anywhere on the body.

trans-unit.source: “That takes care of my headache, but the shakes are still there. We don’t have any naloxone left, do we? You’ll just have to make some. First, find morphine and stabilozine.”
trans-unit.target: “That takes care of my headache, but the shakes are still there. We don’t have any naloxone left, do we? You’ll just have to make some. First, find morphine and stabilozine.”

trans-unit.source: “You can make medicine in the medical fabricator. Like a regular fabricator, it creates new items out of materials you feed it. Try it out.”
trans-unit.target: “You can make medicine in the medical fabricator. Like a regular fabricator, it creates new items out of materials you feed it. Try it out.”

trans-unit.source: Find naloxone on the list and click on it.
trans-unit.target: Find naloxone on the list and click on it.

trans-unit.source: Take the fabricated naloxone from the output on the right-hand side of the screen.
trans-unit.target: Take the fabricated naloxone from the output on the right-hand side of the screen.

trans-unit.source: “Okay, bring it here. Just highlight me with your mouse and press [InputType.Health] to enter my Health interface.”
trans-unit.target: “Okay, bring it here. Just highlight me with your mouse and press [InputType.Health] to enter my Health interface.”

trans-unit.source: Shakes visibly.\n\n“Remember, [InputType.Health] to view my health interface. The sooner, the better.”
trans-unit.target: Shakes visibly.\n\n“Remember, [InputType.Health] to view my health interface. The sooner, the better.”

trans-unit.source: “That’s about all you can do for me right now. If you want to be of more use, tend to the patients next door. And turn off the lights. I’m gonna rest my eyes a bit.”
trans-unit.target: “That’s about all you can do for me right now. If you want to be of more use, tend to the patients next door. And turn off the lights. I’m gonna rest my eyes a bit.”

trans-unit.source: “There are several patients here, each with a different affliction. To find out what ails them, I will give you this Health Scanner HUD. It will display what their issue is, before you see it by yourself up close.”
trans-unit.target: “There are several patients here, each with a different affliction. To find out what ails them, I will give you this Health Scanner HUD. It will display what their issue is, before you see it by yourself up close.”

trans-unit.source: “When treating a patient, the health interface will suggest treatments on the bottom. Simply clicking on a suggestion will apply it, but you can also manually drag a medicine to the wound. Cabinets should be stocked with whatever you need.”
trans-unit.target: “When treating a patient, the health interface will suggest treatments on the bottom. Simply clicking on a suggestion will apply it, but you can also manually drag a medicine to the wound. Cabinets should be stocked with whatever you need.”

trans-unit.source: “Burns are commonly sustained from explosions and electric shocks. Bandages and plastiseal are the typical treatments. Burns are also limb-specific, which means you’ll have to apply the cure to the correct limb.”
trans-unit.target: “Burns are commonly sustained from explosions and electric shocks. Bandages and plastiseal are the typical treatments. Burns are also limb-specific, which means you’ll have to apply the cure to the correct limb.”

trans-unit.source: “Psychosis is usually inflicted by otherworldly sources. It is treated with haloperidol.”
trans-unit.target: “Psychosis is usually inflicted by otherworldly sources. It is treated with haloperidol.”

trans-unit.source: “Blunt force trauma (and other physical damage afflictions like lacerations and bite wounds) are treated with painkillers such as morphine.”
trans-unit.target: “Blunt force trauma (and other physical damage afflictions like lacerations and bite wounds) are treated with painkillers such as morphine.”

trans-unit.source: “Well done. There’s one more thing you need to learn, and that’s how to perform CPR.”
trans-unit.target: “Well done. There’s one more thing you need to learn, and that’s how to perform CPR.”

trans-unit.source: “When someone sustains enough damage, they enter a critical state. In this state they are immobile and will perish if they don’t receive immediate aid.”
trans-unit.target: “When someone sustains enough damage, they enter a critical state. In this state they are immobile and will perish if they don’t receive immediate aid.”

trans-unit.source: “To resuscitate someone before they die, open their health interface and press the ‘Perform CPR’ button. If you're successful, the patient will be stabilized. Note that the resuscitation process often takes time.”
trans-unit.target: “To resuscitate someone before they die, open their health interface and press the ‘Perform CPR’ button. If you're successful, the patient will be stabilized. Note that the resuscitation process often takes time.”

trans-unit.source: “Come back to the med bay. There’s a patient here in need of CPR. Take your time, though; he’s only pretending. ...This time.”
trans-unit.target: “Come back to the med bay. There’s a patient here in need of CPR. Take your time, though; he’s only pretending. ...This time.”

trans-unit.source: Use the medical fabricator to craft naloxone
trans-unit.target: Use the medical fabricator to craft naloxone

trans-unit.source: Treat patients in the crew quarters
trans-unit.target: Treat patients in the crew quarters

trans-unit.source:
This tutorial teaches about the different jobs aboard a submarine. There's five roles to explore:
- Captain
- Engineer
- Mechanic
- Medical Doctor
- Security Officer
trans-unit.target:
This tutorial teaches about the different jobs aboard a submarine. There's five roles to explore:
- Captain
- Engineer
- Mechanic
- Medical Doctor
- Security Officer

trans-unit.source: Well done!\nYou've completed the Roles tutorial. Do you want to restart and explore a different role?
trans-unit.target: Well done!\nYou've completed the Roles tutorial. Do you want to restart and explore a different role?

trans-unit.source: Equip the Body Armor. Click the bar above the Body Armor's inventory slot to equip it or press the hotkey.
trans-unit.target: Equip the Body Armor. Click the bar above the Body Armor's inventory slot to equip it or press the hotkey.

trans-unit.source: [speakername]: “Finally a chance to get off this station. Can you believe there's so few people willing to crew a submarine, they just sponsored us one fresh from the shipyard?”
trans-unit.target: [speakername]: “Finally a chance to get off this station. Can you believe there's so few people willing to crew a submarine, they just sponsored us one fresh from the shipyard?”

trans-unit.source: “I still feel like there must be some catch…”
trans-unit.target: “I still feel like there must be some catch…”

trans-unit.source: “None as far as I can see. Supply and demand in action: They need able-bodied sailors to keep Europan society running, and the original crew of this submarine drank themselves to death before their maiden voyage. It's ours all right.”
trans-unit.target: “None as far as I can see. Supply and demand in action: They need able-bodied sailors to keep Europan society running, and the original crew of this submarine drank themselves to death before their maiden voyage. It's ours all right.”

trans-unit.source: “If you say so… Still seems fishy but it sure beats sitting around here. What do we still have to do before we go?”
trans-unit.target: “If you say so… Still seems fishy but it sure beats sitting around here. What do we still have to do before we go?”

trans-unit.source: “We'll need some supplies for our first voyage. Fuel Rods are a must, without them I cannot keep our submarine powered. We should make sure we have some spare. Welding Fuel, too, as without it we have no way to patch hull damage. Of course, let's try to avoid hull damage, but just in case.\nI'll transfer my last savings to the shared bank account to contribute.”
trans-unit.target: “We'll need some supplies for our first voyage. Fuel Rods are a must, without them I cannot keep our submarine powered. We should make sure we have some spare. Welding Fuel, too, as without it we have no way to patch hull damage. Of course, let's try to avoid hull damage, but just in case.\nI'll transfer my last savings to the shared bank account to contribute.”

trans-unit.source: “Great! Maybe while you're up there, you can check if anyone has some paid work for us? There's not much point in drifting around without a purpose, and keeping a submarine running is expensive.”
trans-unit.target: “Great! Maybe while you're up there, you can check if anyone has some paid work for us? There's not much point in drifting around without a purpose, and keeping a submarine running is expensive.”

trans-unit.source: Find a way to make money
trans-unit.target: Find a way to make money

trans-unit.source: Open the command interface by pressing [InputType.Command] to give orders to your crew.
trans-unit.target: Open the command interface by pressing [InputType.Command] to give orders to your crew.

trans-unit.source: [speakername]: “Looks like you settled into the routines of submarining pretty well!”
trans-unit.target: [speakername]: “Looks like you settled into the routines of submarining pretty well!”

trans-unit.source: “So far it seems the risk has been exaggerated. Smooth sailing!”
trans-unit.target: “So far it seems the risk has been exaggerated. Smooth sailing!”

trans-unit.source: “From what I've heard, things get riskier the further down we go. The money's better though. No risk, no reward…”
trans-unit.target: “From what I've heard, things get riskier the further down we go. The money's better though. No risk, no reward…”

trans-unit.source: “I do have some urge to go deeper… I mean, who could say no to more money?”
trans-unit.target: “I do have some urge to go deeper… I mean, who could say no to more money?”

trans-unit.source: “Money and adventure, exploring the unknown… Sign me up cap'n!”
trans-unit.target: “Money and adventure, exploring the unknown… Sign me up cap'n!”

trans-unit.source: Do you want to skip the remaining tutorial objectives and exit [locationname]?
trans-unit.target: Do you want to skip the remaining tutorial objectives and exit [locationname]?

trans-unit.source:
Every submarine should be equipped with a secure airlock where the crew can exit the sub safely and without too much flooding.

To safely exit the submarine, equip a diving suit and other necessary items (usually a handheld sonar, weapons and extra oxygen tank or two). Then make your way to the airlock. Be sure to close all the doors behind you to stop the water’s flow before too much of it gets inside.

When coming back inside, use water pumps to drain all of the water before going deeper into the submarine. It is also helpful to return all of the equipment back to their proper places and refill used oxygen tanks at the oxygen generator.
trans-unit.target:
Every submarine should be equipped with a secure airlock where the crew can exit the sub safely and without too much flooding.

To safely exit the submarine, equip a diving suit and other necessary items (usually a handheld sonar, weapons and extra oxygen tank or two). Then make your way to the airlock. Be sure to close all the doors behind you to stop the water’s flow before too much of it gets inside.

When coming back inside, use water pumps to drain all of the water before going deeper into the submarine. It is also helpful to return all of the equipment back to their proper places and refill used oxygen tanks at the oxygen generator.

trans-unit.source: The railgun works like a coilgun, except it fires big shells that can be upgraded with explosives.\n\nRailgun loaders are loaded with single railgun shells instead of boxes of ammunition. Otherwise, operating them is the same: Interact with the periscope to aim with the turret, then press {0} to fire. Press {1} to stop aiming.
trans-unit.target: The railgun works like a coilgun, except it fires big shells that can be upgraded with explosives.\n\nRailgun loaders are loaded with single railgun shells instead of boxes of ammunition. Otherwise, operating them is the same: Interact with the periscope to aim with the turret, then press {0} to fire. Press {1} to stop aiming.

trans-unit.source: A ranged weapon of choice for medics, the syringe gun uses medicine as ammunition. This allows for administering cures from afar. Be aware: Medicines fired from long range are less effective than those used in the medical interface.\n\nA tactical choice in combat would be to load the syringe gun with poison and fire it at enemies. Aim the syringe gun the same way you would other long-range weapons: {0} to aim, {1} to fire.
trans-unit.target: A ranged weapon of choice for medics, the syringe gun uses medicine as ammunition. This allows for administering cures from afar. Be aware: Medicines fired from long range are less effective than those used in the medical interface.\n\nA tactical choice in combat would be to load the syringe gun with poison and fire it at enemies. Aim the syringe gun the same way you would other long-range weapons: {0} to aim, {1} to fire.

trans-unit.source: The plasma cutter is a device used to cut through walls and doors. It functions like the welding tool: {0} to aim, {1} to fire.\n\nWhile the plasma cutter is primarily a tool, it does inflict burns on anyone who gets in the way, which makes it a handy makeshift weapon.
trans-unit.target: The plasma cutter is a device used to cut through walls and doors. It functions like the welding tool: {0} to aim, {1} to fire.\n\nWhile the plasma cutter is primarily a tool, it does inflict burns on anyone who gets in the way, which makes it a handy makeshift weapon.

trans-unit.source: A heavy instrument that can be used to force open doors. Handy when someone has been tampering with door wiring or when you need to get to rooms you’re not allowed in. Use ({0}) the crowbar on a closed door to start prying it open. The crowbar must be equipped to do this.
trans-unit.target: A heavy instrument that can be used to force open doors. Handy when someone has been tampering with door wiring or when you need to get to rooms you’re not allowed in. Use ({0}) the crowbar on a closed door to start prying it open. The crowbar must be equipped to do this.

trans-unit.source: The basic materials for crafting can be bought, deconstructed or found in the world.\n\nMinerals are spawned in the cave and ice walls, and they can be cut out using the plasma cutter and then picked up. Raw minerals can be deconstructed to create craftable elements.
trans-unit.target: The basic materials for crafting can be bought, deconstructed or found in the world.\n\nMinerals are spawned in the cave and ice walls, and they can be cut out using the plasma cutter and then picked up. Raw minerals can be deconstructed to create craftable elements.

trans-unit.source: When in contact with certain performance-enhancing drugs or under some extraterrestrial influence, players may be afflicted with psychosis, causing them to experience visual and auditory hallucinations and phantom pains.\n\nPsychosis may be cured using haloperidol.
trans-unit.target: When in contact with certain performance-enhancing drugs or under some extraterrestrial influence, players may be afflicted with psychosis, causing them to experience visual and auditory hallucinations and phantom pains.\n\nPsychosis may be cured using haloperidol.

trans-unit.source: Overuse of pain medication causes addiction and, in time, withdrawal. Withdrawal symptoms can be reduced by feeding the addiction, but to truly be rid of the effects, one must either stop taking the drugs entirely or use naloxone.
trans-unit.target: Overuse of pain medication causes addiction and, in time, withdrawal. Withdrawal symptoms can be reduced by feeding the addiction, but to truly be rid of the effects, one must either stop taking the drugs entirely or use naloxone.

trans-unit.source: Oxygen is a valuable commodity in underwater Europa. It must be readily available during long transits aboard submarines, which is made possible by oxygen generators. They pump air through ventilation to different rooms and can be used to refill oxygen tanks.\n\nTo refill oxygen tanks, interact ([InteractType.Use]) with the generator to open its inventory. Insert an empty oxygen tank into one of the slots to start refilling it. When the tank is full, drag it back to your inventory or into your diving suit/mask.
trans-unit.target: Oxygen is a valuable commodity in underwater Europa. It must be readily available during long transits aboard submarines, which is made possible by oxygen generators. They pump air through ventilation to different rooms and can be used to refill oxygen tanks.\n\nTo refill oxygen tanks, interact ([InteractType.Use]) with the generator to open its inventory. Insert an empty oxygen tank into one of the slots to start refilling it. When the tank is full, drag it back to your inventory or into your diving suit/mask.

trans-unit.source: To grab onto a ladder, press {0}. Use {1} and {2} buttons to climb the ladder. Let go of the ladder by pressing {3} again.
trans-unit.target: To grab onto a ladder, press {0}. Use {1} and {2} buttons to climb the ladder. Let go of the ladder by pressing {3} again.

trans-unit.source: Find the sub’s electrical room and repair the junction boxes by interacting with them while holding a screwdriver, then pressing the “Repair” button.
trans-unit.target: Find the sub’s electrical room and repair the junction boxes by interacting with them while holding a screwdriver, then pressing the “Repair” button.

trans-unit.source:
Nuclear reactors provide power to submarines and outposts. They require fuel to create heat and a crewmember to regulate the output.

Drag a fuel rod to the item slot on the left side. Multiple fuel rods create more heat, but in normal circumstances one is enough and any more might cause the reactor to overheat.

Start by setting the fission rate so that the needle is on green, then do the same for turbine output. You can see load and output values to the right. Try to keep the output as close to load as possible; a lower output can lead to power outages, and higher to overvoltage and fires.

When the reactor operator leaves the interface, consider turning on automatic control. With automatic control, the reactor responds to any fluctuations in grid load, but it is considerably slower than a human operator.
trans-unit.target:
Nuclear reactors provide power to submarines and outposts. They require fuel to create heat and a crewmember to regulate the output.

Drag a fuel rod to the item slot on the left side. Multiple fuel rods create more heat, but in normal circumstances one is enough and any more might cause the reactor to overheat.

Start by setting the fission rate so that the needle is on green, then do the same for turbine output. You can see load and output values to the right. Try to keep the output as close to load as possible; a lower output can lead to power outages, and higher to overvoltage and fires.

When the reactor operator leaves the interface, consider turning on automatic control. With automatic control, the reactor responds to any fluctuations in grid load, but it is considerably slower than a human operator.

trans-unit.source:
To dock the submarine, maneuver the ship’s and outpost’s docking ports close to each other and toggle the docking clamps. Ports are displayed in green on the sonar display.

When the ports are close to each other, a line will be shown on the sonar display. When the line is fully green, close the clamps by pressing the “Dock” button. The submarine will then be locked into position until undocked.

When positioning the submarine for docking, radical movements can easily cause you to overshoot your target. Using autopilot and “maintain position” is helpful in setting the position you want the submarine to move to.
trans-unit.target:
To dock the submarine, maneuver the ship’s and outpost’s docking ports close to each other and toggle the docking clamps. Ports are displayed in green on the sonar display.

When the ports are close to each other, a line will be shown on the sonar display. When the line is fully green, close the clamps by pressing the “Dock” button. The submarine will then be locked into position until undocked.

When positioning the submarine for docking, radical movements can easily cause you to overshoot your target. Using autopilot and “maintain position” is helpful in setting the position you want the submarine to move to.

trans-unit.source: Karma reflects the helpful and harmful actions you've taken while playing. Actions such as repairing the submarine, operating devices and killing monsters increase Karma, while actions such as attacking members of your crew or damaging the submarine decrease it. If your Karma drops too low, you may not get assigned to certain jobs anymore, or, in more extreme cases, you may be banned from the server.
trans-unit.target: Karma reflects the helpful and harmful actions you've taken while playing. Actions such as repairing the submarine, operating devices and killing monsters increase Karma, while actions such as attacking members of your crew or damaging the submarine decrease it. If your Karma drops too low, you may not get assigned to certain jobs anymore, or, in more extreme cases, you may be banned from the server.

trans-unit.source: The submarine and character editors are modding tools that can be used to expand the core game by creating your own submarines and monsters. The custom creations can be shared in the Steam Workshop.\n\nAt the moment the editors are only available in English. The process of building a fully playable submarine or a functional monster can be quite involved, and unfortunately we don’t offer in-game tutorials or documentation for the editors yet. If you want to take a shot at creating your own custom content with the editors, you may be able to find help through the following links:

trans-unit.target: NOTICE: The wiki is maintained by volunteers, so it's possible some information is outdated. Please feel free to join and contribute yourself!

trans-unit.source: Permission to use your information to develop Barotrauma
trans-unit.target: Permission to use your information to develop Barotrauma

trans-unit.source:
Hello and welcome to Barotrauma! By default, we do not collect any information about you. If you would like to keep it that way, please click "No" below.

If you would like to click "Yes" and give us permission to collect some data, we will be able to use your gameplay statistics to improve Barotrauma. See a full list of gameplay data we will collect further down. We will store your consent and a hash of your Steam ID in our own database, but your information will always be handled anonymously when we use it for development.

To be able to use these statistics, we use the services of GameAnalytics Ltd. and comply with their terms of service. Thus, if you give us permission to use your gameplay data, you must also give permission to GameAnalytics to use your data for quality management and analytics purposes.

You can always change your choice regarding this consent in the game settings. For more information about privacy related to GameAnalytics Ltd., please see the following webpage: ‖color:255,255,255,255‖https://gameanalytics.com/privacy/‖end‖

Please review our privacy policy below:
trans-unit.target:

trans-unit.source: The signal sent when the controller is being activated or toggled on. If empty, no signal is sent.
trans-unit.target: The signal sent when the controller is being activated or toggled on. If empty, no signal is sent.

trans-unit.source: The signal sent when the controller is toggled off. If empty, no signal is sent. Only valid if IsToggle is true.
trans-unit.target: The signal sent when the controller is toggled off. If empty, no signal is sent. Only valid if IsToggle is true.

trans-unit.source: When enabled, the item will continuously send out a signal, and interacting with it will flip the signal (making the item behave like a switch). When disabled, the item will simply send out a signal when interacted with.
trans-unit.target: When enabled, the item will continuously send out a signal, and interacting with it will flip the signal (making the item behave like a switch). When disabled, the item will simply send out a signal when interacted with.

trans-unit.source: You almost run into someone wearing a captain’s uniform. You can tell by their appearance that they are a visitor here and their time hasn’t been pleasant. They’re studying a map closely and seem deeply concerned about what they see. A revolver hangs loosely from their belt. They mutter a quick apology before returning to the map.
trans-unit.target: You almost run into someone wearing a captain’s uniform. You can tell by their appearance that they are a visitor here and their time hasn’t been pleasant. They’re studying a map closely and seem deeply concerned about what they see. A revolver hangs loosely from their belt. They mutter a quick apology before returning to the map.

trans-unit.source: “Hey, can I see that map? What’s the fastest route out of this shithole?”
trans-unit.target: “Hey, can I see that map? What’s the fastest route out of this shithole?”

trans-unit.source: They scratch the back of their head. “That’s what I’m trying to find out. The problem is that there’s a long way to where we’re going and we’re short on supplies. Can’t exactly afford to go back either.”
trans-unit.target: They scratch the back of their head. “That’s what I’m trying to find out. The problem is that there’s a long way to where we’re going and we’re short on supplies. Can’t exactly afford to go back either.”

trans-unit.source: “Let me take a look. We might be headed in the same direction.”
trans-unit.target: “Let me take a look. We might be headed in the same direction.”

trans-unit.source: Together you manage to find a shortcut to the next outpost. It’s a little on the dangerous side, but what isn’t? You bid the captain farewell.
trans-unit.target: Together you manage to find a shortcut to the next outpost. It’s a little on the dangerous side, but what isn’t? You bid the captain farewell.

trans-unit.source: Even with two pairs of eyes, you can’t find an easier route. You leave the captain, hoping their fortune turns soon.
trans-unit.target: Even with two pairs of eyes, you can’t find an easier route. You leave the captain, hoping their fortune turns soon.

trans-unit.source: Attempt to grab the revolver when their back is turned.
trans-unit.target: Attempt to grab the revolver when their back is turned.

trans-unit.source: You deftly liberate the gun from its holster and stuff it in your pocket. Your heart skips a beat when the captain turns toward you, but they only give you a quick glance and continue pacing back and forth. You decide it’s best to put some distance between the two of you.
trans-unit.target: You deftly liberate the gun from its holster and stuff it in your pocket. Your heart skips a beat when the captain turns toward you, but they only give you a quick glance and continue pacing back and forth. You decide it’s best to put some distance between the two of you.

trans-unit.source: Just as you’re about to lift the gun, the captain suddenly turns around. Your eyes meet and theirs widen as the situation dawns on them. They reach for the gun.
trans-unit.target: Just as you’re about to lift the gun, the captain suddenly turns around. Your eyes meet and theirs widen as the situation dawns on them. They reach for the gun.

trans-unit.source: You hear a strange scraping sound coming from a nearby vent. Curious, you peer through the slats of the vent cover, but it’s far too dark in there to see anything... A moment later you hear the sound again, you’re sure of it!
trans-unit.target: You hear a strange scraping sound coming from a nearby vent. Curious, you peer through the slats of the vent cover, but it’s far too dark in there to see anything... A moment later you hear the sound again, you’re sure of it!

trans-unit.source: You manage to get the vent off easily enough and spot the source of the noise right away: The fan blade is brushing against a small metal box. Carefully retrieving it, you open it and find 1,000 marks!
trans-unit.target: You manage to get the vent off easily enough and spot the source of the noise right away: The fan blade is brushing against a small metal box. Carefully retrieving it, you open it and find 1,000 marks!

trans-unit.source: You fumble the vent cover as you’re removing it and brush against the spinning blade. It slices into your hand before you can pull away, nicking an artery.
trans-unit.target: You fumble the vent cover as you’re removing it and brush against the spinning blade. It slices into your hand before you can pull away, nicking an artery.

trans-unit.source: An enraged mudraptor bursts from the vent!
trans-unit.target: An enraged mudraptor bursts from the vent!

trans-unit.source: Three enraged mudraptors burst from the vent!
trans-unit.target: Three enraged mudraptors burst from the vent!

trans-unit.source: Seems it might have just been in your head... These outposts can get on your nerves after a while.
trans-unit.target: Seems it might have just been in your head... These outposts can get on your nerves after a while.

trans-unit.source: You decide you don’t have time for this nonsense and creep past the noisy vent. Not your problem! Whatever it is, someone else will sort that out!
trans-unit.target: You decide you don’t have time for this nonsense and creep past the noisy vent. Not your problem! Whatever it is, someone else will sort that out!

trans-unit.source: You decide you don’t have time for this nonsense and creep past the noisy vent, but you get the nagging feeling you've not seen the end of this yet...
trans-unit.target: You decide you don’t have time for this nonsense and creep past the noisy vent, but you get the nagging feeling you've not seen the end of this yet...

trans-unit.source: A nearby research terminal draws your attention. It flickers on and off rapidly for a while, then goes dark.
trans-unit.target: A nearby research terminal draws your attention. It flickers on and off rapidly for a while, then goes dark.

trans-unit.source: You try pressing a couple buttons. No response. Opening a side panel reveals a tangle of wires and some kind of a processing unit seemingly in perfect condition.
trans-unit.target: You try pressing a couple buttons. No response. Opening a side panel reveals a tangle of wires and some kind of a processing unit seemingly in perfect condition.

trans-unit.source: You quickly unscrew the parts that look the most useful, carefully place them in your pocket and then put the panel back.
trans-unit.target: You quickly unscrew the parts that look the most useful, carefully place them in your pocket and then put the panel back.

trans-unit.source: Whoever put this thing together did a poor job. You deem it impossible to salvage anything without taking the whole thing apart. While you’re elbow deep in the wiring, you hear footsteps approach. Panicking, you yank some wires out and slam the panel back in its place.
trans-unit.target: Whoever put this thing together did a poor job. You deem it impossible to salvage anything without taking the whole thing apart. While you’re elbow deep in the wiring, you hear footsteps approach. Panicking, you yank some wires out and slam the panel back in its place.

trans-unit.source: You jiggle some display cables and the terminal comes back to life. Poking around the system reveals some opportunities. Looks like it’s connected to the outpost’s outfitting service. What do you want to do?
trans-unit.target: You jiggle some display cables and the terminal comes back to life. Poking around the system reveals some opportunities. Looks like it’s connected to the outpost’s outfitting service. What do you want to do?

trans-unit.source: After clicking around a bit, you successfully order two boxes of coilgun ammunition for your vessel, free of charge.
trans-unit.target: After clicking around a bit, you successfully order two boxes of coilgun ammunition for your vessel, free of charge.

trans-unit.source: This is what they have insurance for, right?
trans-unit.target: This is what they have insurance for, right?

trans-unit.source: Install an old-school first-person shooter on the system.
trans-unit.target: Install an old-school first-person shooter on the system.

trans-unit.source: You carry on the age-old tradition of installing the game on any platform possible. This accomplishes nothing except to give you a good feeling as you chuckle to yourself.
trans-unit.target: You carry on the age-old tradition of installing the game on any platform possible. This accomplishes nothing except to give you a good feeling as you chuckle to yourself.

trans-unit.source: You try turning the terminal off and on again. Nothing. Now what? That’s the only thing you were taught to do and it usually solves the problem. Frustrated, you jiggle some wires behind the terminal when you feel a sharp pain shoot up your arm, along with a shower of sparks. You decide that’s enough injury for now.
trans-unit.target: You try turning the terminal off and on again. Nothing. Now what? That’s the only thing you were taught to do and it usually solves the problem. Frustrated, you jiggle some wires behind the terminal when you feel a sharp pain shoot up your arm, along with a shower of sparks. You decide that’s enough injury for now.

trans-unit.source: Back away. There have to be some nerds around here who get paid to fix these things.
trans-unit.target: Back away. There have to be some nerds around here who get paid to fix these things.

trans-unit.source: Someone has left a toolbelt in the middle of the hallway.
trans-unit.target: Someone has left a toolbelt in the middle of the hallway.

trans-unit.source: The box contains bike horns, masks and oversized shoes. As you’re rummaging through it, a posse of people dressed in clown suits march down the hallway. One of them walks straight up to the box, picks it up and stares at you, then at your hand. You realize you’re still holding a bike horn in your hand.
trans-unit.target: The box contains bike horns, masks and oversized shoes. As you’re rummaging through it, a posse of people dressed in clown suits march down the hallway. One of them walks straight up to the box, picks it up and stares at you, then at your hand. You realize you’re still holding a bike horn in your hand.

trans-unit.source: Apologize and put the horn back in the box.
trans-unit.target: Apologize and put the horn back in the box.

trans-unit.source: The jester turns around stoically and continues on with the group, leaving you to scratch your head.
trans-unit.target: The jester turns around stoically and continues on with the group, leaving you to scratch your head.

trans-unit.source: You raise the horn to your eye level and squeeze it. Instantly, chaos erupts among the group of clowns. They applaud, prance around and giggle uncontrollably, as if the sound of the horn were the funniest thing imaginable. One of them ruffles your hair approvingly.
trans-unit.target: You raise the horn to your eye level and squeeze it. Instantly, chaos erupts among the group of clowns. They applaud, prance around and giggle uncontrollably, as if the sound of the horn were the funniest thing imaginable. One of them ruffles your hair approvingly.

trans-unit.source: A clown is loitering nearby. When he sees you approach, he perks up and tries to get your attention.
trans-unit.target: A clown is loitering nearby. When he sees you approach, he perks up and tries to get your attention.

trans-unit.source: See what he has to say.
trans-unit.target: See what he has to say.

trans-unit.source: The jester reaches out to you. In a similar motion, you raise your own arm and simultaneously you both honk each other’s noses. Twice, as is tradition when meeting a new brother. Without saying a word, he reaches into his pack and hands you a brand new bike horn. He salutes you and leaves, his footsteps squeaking rhythmically.
trans-unit.target: The jester reaches out to you. In a similar motion, you raise your own arm and simultaneously you both honk each other’s noses. Twice, as is tradition when meeting a new brother. Without saying a word, he reaches into his pack and hands you a brand new bike horn. He salutes you and leaves, his footsteps squeaking rhythmically.

trans-unit.source: Before you can react, the loathsome harlequin reaches out and painfully honks your nose.
trans-unit.target: Before you can react, the loathsome harlequin reaches out and painfully honks your nose.

trans-unit.source: Truly, they are a scourge on Europa.
trans-unit.target: Truly, they are a scourge on Europa.

trans-unit.source: You come across an unconscious worker. There are no signs of violence and nobody else is around.
trans-unit.target: You come across an unconscious worker. There are no signs of violence and nobody else is around.

trans-unit.source: The patient’s lips are blue, their breaths are short and shallow and their heart is beating very slowly. Telltale signs of Fentanyl overdose. Injection marks on their arm confirm your diagnosis.
trans-unit.target: The patient’s lips are blue, their breaths are short and shallow and their heart is beating very slowly. Telltale signs of Fentanyl overdose. Injection marks on their arm confirm your diagnosis.

trans-unit.source: You treat the overdose with Naloxone. The patient is still unconscious, but their condition is stable.
trans-unit.target: You treat the overdose with Naloxone. The patient is still unconscious, but their condition is stable.

trans-unit.source: You have no Naloxone. All you can do at this point is make sure the patient's life is not in immediate danger and alert the local officials.
trans-unit.target: You have no Naloxone. All you can do at this point is make sure the patient's life is not in immediate danger and alert the local officials.

trans-unit.source: Give them basic first aid and alert the outpost doctor.
trans-unit.target: Give them basic first aid and alert the outpost doctor.

trans-unit.source: You make sure the patient is stable and decide to let the local officials deal with the rest.
trans-unit.target: You make sure the patient is stable and decide to let the local officials deal with the rest.

trans-unit.source: Well, he's unconscious all right. Probably just sleeping off a hangover or something.
trans-unit.target: Well, he's unconscious all right. Probably just sleeping off a hangover or something.

trans-unit.source: Eh, that's the best I can do for now.
trans-unit.target: Eh, that's the best I can do for now.

trans-unit.source: You find some spare change in their pocket, but a passerby catches you in the act. It seems looting injured people is frowned upon here.
trans-unit.target: You find some spare change in their pocket, but a passerby catches you in the act. It seems looting injured people is frowned upon here.

trans-unit.source: Step over their body and continue on.
trans-unit.target: Step over their body and continue on.

trans-unit.source: A row of posters line the wall. It looks like the outpost directorial election is coming up. A gallery of stern-looking people are observing the hallway, conveniently grouped according to their political affiliation.
trans-unit.target: A row of posters line the wall. It looks like the outpost directorial election is coming up. A gallery of stern-looking people are observing the hallway, conveniently grouped according to their political affiliation.

trans-unit.source: Some of the Coalition Party’s boards have fallen victim to vandalism. “Bring power back to the hands of the people!” and “Down with the oligarchy!” are some of the catchphrases spray-painted on candidates’ faces. Separatists up to their usual tricks.
trans-unit.target: Some of the Coalition Party’s boards have fallen victim to vandalism. “Bring power back to the hands of the people!” and “Down with the oligarchy!” are some of the catchphrases spray-painted on candidates’ faces. Separatists up to their usual tricks.

trans-unit.source: Add some of your own flair too.
trans-unit.target: Add some of your own flair too.

trans-unit.source: You draw some vulgar art of your own, then quickly move on before the fascists catch you in the act.
trans-unit.target: You draw some vulgar art of your own, then quickly move on before the fascists catch you in the act.

trans-unit.source: As you’re walking down the hallway, you catch a whiff of something sweet.
trans-unit.target: As you’re walking down the hallway, you catch a whiff of something sweet.

trans-unit.source: You sniff around and find the aroma coming from a nearby vent. Suddenly you feel very hungry.
trans-unit.target: You sniff around and find the aroma coming from a nearby vent. Suddenly you feel very hungry.

trans-unit.source: You peer into the dark vent, trying to find out where it leads. No avail—the vents here are all connected. Even if you were to, say, climb in and follow the smell, you’d stand no chance of finding the sau–, er…source.
trans-unit.target: You peer into the dark vent, trying to find out where it leads. No avail—the vents here are all connected. Even if you were to, say, climb in and follow the smell, you’d stand no chance of finding the sau–, er…source.

trans-unit.source: It takes you no effort to remove the vent cover and wriggle inside. The smell is now intoxicating and it seems to come from every direction. Desperate, you start crawling. Eventually the vent splits into two paths. Something clicks in your head. This isn’t right.
trans-unit.target: It takes you no effort to remove the vent cover and wriggle inside. The smell is now intoxicating and it seems to come from every direction. Desperate, you start crawling. Eventually the vent splits into two paths. Something clicks in your head. This isn’t right.

trans-unit.source: “I’ve come this far. Might as well keep going.”
trans-unit.target: “I’ve come this far. Might as well keep going.”

trans-unit.source: You pick a direction and crawl on. Suddenly it doesn’t smell so good anymore. The aroma has gradually turned into a sickly sweet, rotten stink. You start panicking as the tight walls begin closing in. Your vision blurs and everything goes dark. The last thing you see is a vaguely humanoid shape squirming toward your helpless body.
trans-unit.target: You pick a direction and crawl on. Suddenly it doesn’t smell so good anymore. The aroma has gradually turned into a sickly sweet, rotten stink. You start panicking as the tight walls begin closing in. Your vision blurs and everything goes dark. The last thing you see is a vaguely humanoid shape squirming toward your helpless body.

trans-unit.source: The next thing you know, you wake up outside the vent. Strangely, the vent is screwed shut and there are no signs of anyone having entered it. A quick inspection reveals you're uninjured, but your pockets are empty of change.
trans-unit.target: The next thing you know, you wake up outside the vent. Strangely, the vent is screwed shut and there are no signs of anyone having entered it. A quick inspection reveals you're uninjured, but your pockets are empty of change.

trans-unit.source: With great effort, you manage to turn around and make your way back to where you entered. While unhurt, you have a feeling you brought back something with you from the vents.
trans-unit.target: With great effort, you manage to turn around and make your way back to where you entered. While unhurt, you have a feeling you brought back something with you from the vents.

trans-unit.source: “What a fool I would be if I climbed in there…”
trans-unit.target: “What a fool I would be if I climbed in there…”

trans-unit.source: You chuckle at the idea of climbing into an air vent in a strange outpost in search of food. Even so, it takes some effort to leave the vent and the alluring aroma within.
trans-unit.target: You chuckle at the idea of climbing into an air vent in a strange outpost in search of food. Even so, it takes some effort to leave the vent and the alluring aroma within.

trans-unit.source: Now to get back to business.
trans-unit.target: Now to get back to business.

trans-unit.source: Ignore the siren call of the scent.
trans-unit.target: Ignore the siren call of the scent.

trans-unit.source: You overhear someone nearby talking to a radio. “Yeah, I gave them the eggs. Uh huh… Yeah. I made sure they swallowed ‘em. ...I don’t know, maybe three minutes ago?” That’s weird, you think to yourself. Hopefully nothing weird comes out of this.
trans-unit.target: You overhear someone nearby talking to a radio. “Yeah, I gave them the eggs. Uh huh… Yeah. I made sure they swallowed ‘em. ...I don’t know, maybe three minutes ago?” That’s weird, you think to yourself. Hopefully nothing weird comes out of this.

trans-unit.source: You sit down at the table opposite Mike. A pungent smell of alcohol wafts from him. “Come on, then. What d’you wanna know about?”
trans-unit.target: You sit down at the table opposite Mike. A pungent smell of alcohol wafts from him. “Come on, then. What d’you wanna know about?”

trans-unit.source: Mike conjures up a bottle of booze. “Real original.” He takes a swig. “There are a few schools of thought, but basically it boils down to this: Either you make life good for yourself or do good by others.” He reaches over the table to offer you a drink and knocks down a few bottles in the process. They shatter on the floor. “Shit.” Mike slumps down dejectedly. “There’s no God,” he mutters as he pushes himself up and starts for the cleaning closet. “Session’s over.”
trans-unit.target: Mike conjures up a bottle of booze. “Real original.” He takes a swig. “There are a few schools of thought, but basically it boils down to this: Either you make life good for yourself or do good by others.” He reaches over the table to offer you a drink and knocks down a few bottles in the process. They shatter on the floor. “Shit.” Mike slumps down dejectedly. “There’s no God,” he mutters as he pushes himself up and starts for the cleaning closet. “Session’s over.”

trans-unit.source: “What do you reckon is in the center of Europa?”
trans-unit.target: “What do you reckon is in the center of Europa?”

trans-unit.source: Mike blinks. “What? I don’t know. Lava? Or is it magma in this case?” He turns toward a bunk. “Hey Jimmy! Is it lava if it’s underground or magma?” A bundle of sheets stirs a bit. “What is–? Fuck off Mike, I’m sleeping,” it mumbles back. Mike scratches the back of his head. “It’s gotta be one or the other. What else could it be?” He chuckles and flashes his rotting teeth. “A gateway to Earth? Ridiculous.”
trans-unit.target: Mike blinks. “What? I don’t know. Lava? Or is it magma in this case?” He turns toward a bunk. “Hey Jimmy! Is it lava if it’s underground or magma?” A bundle of sheets stirs a bit. “What is–? Fuck off Mike, I’m sleeping,” it mumbles back. Mike scratches the back of his head. “It’s gotta be one or the other. What else could it be?” He chuckles and flashes his rotting teeth. “A gateway to Earth? Ridiculous.”

trans-unit.source: “Funny little fuckers, aren’t they?” Mike leans back in his chair. It squeaks in protest. “The legend has it that a cargo ship carrying entertainment supplies wrecked somewhere near Uusi-Turcu. They recovered a single survivor weeks later. She was wearing a striped shirt, rubber mask and gibbering something about a 'Honkmother' who had kept her company.” He picks his nose and pensively inspects his findings. “Ever since, there’s been a group of ‘em what worships the Honkmother.” “Really?” you ask, enthralled. He flicks the booger off. “No. But that’s all I got.”
trans-unit.target: “Funny little fuckers, aren’t they?” Mike leans back in his chair. It squeaks in protest. “The legend has it that a cargo ship carrying entertainment supplies wrecked somewhere near Uusi-Turcu. They recovered a single survivor weeks later. She was wearing a striped shirt, rubber mask and gibbering something about a 'Honkmother' who had kept her company.” He picks his nose and pensively inspects his findings. “Ever since, there’s been a group of ‘em what worships the Honkmother.” “Really?” you ask, enthralled. He flicks the booger off. “No. But that’s all I got.”

trans-unit.source: You run into a familiar face. It seems Mike the fortune teller has found his way here. This time he’s wearing a janitor’s overalls and is in the process of mopping up a puddle of what seems like someone’s former breakfast.
trans-unit.target: You run into a familiar face. It seems Mike the fortune teller has found his way here. This time he’s wearing a janitor’s overalls and is in the process of mopping up a puddle of what seems like someone’s former breakfast.

trans-unit.source: “Oh, hey. Yeah, I figured it was time to bounce after the... You know, the incident. With the reactor.” You decide not to delve deeper. “I still have plenty of wisdom to dispense. 5 marks or a pack of cigarettes.”
trans-unit.target: “Oh, hey. Yeah, I figured it was time to bounce after the... You know, the incident. With the reactor.” You decide not to delve deeper. “I still have plenty of wisdom to dispense. 5 marks or a pack of cigarettes.”

trans-unit.source: He leans on his mop. “So what can I help you with?”
trans-unit.target: He leans on his mop. “So what can I help you with?”

trans-unit.source: Mike takes out a cigarette and puts it in his mouth. “Guess it’s still out there. A bit worse for wear though, am I right?” He flashes a toothless smile and fishes out a lighter from his pocket. “I had a pen pal there a few years back, you know? A real prolific writer. No wonder, you ought to get a lot of writing done with twelve fingers.” He lights the cigarette, takes a drag and coughs his lungs out. “Fuck me!” He exclaims after the fit subsides. “People really smoke these things?” He tosses the whole pack in the trash. “Not for me.”
trans-unit.target: Mike takes out a cigarette and puts it in his mouth. “Guess it’s still out there. A bit worse for wear though, am I right?” He flashes a toothless smile and fishes out a lighter from his pocket. “I had a pen pal there a few years back, you know? A real prolific writer. No wonder, you ought to get a lot of writing done with twelve fingers.” He lights the cigarette, takes a drag and coughs his lungs out. “Fuck me!” He exclaims after the fit subsides. “People really smoke these things?” He tosses the whole pack in the trash. “Not for me.”

trans-unit.source: “Oh, them? Natural selection. Some things are just better suited for survival.” He rolls up his sleeve, revealing a crude tattoo that states: “I fuck with boots on.” He continues: “Tougher. Faster. Prettier. Only the strong come out on top.” A passerby tosses a soda can on the floor and Mike bends to pick it up. “Apex predators, that’s what we are,” he declares as he places the can in the trash.
trans-unit.target: “Oh, them? Natural selection. Some things are just better suited for survival.” He rolls up his sleeve, revealing a crude tattoo that states: “I fuck with boots on.” He continues: “Tougher. Faster. Prettier. Only the strong come out on top.” A passerby tosses a soda can on the floor and Mike bends to pick it up. “Apex predators, that’s what we are,” he declares as he places the can in the trash.

trans-unit.source: “Why would someone shoot a man before throwing him out of an airlock?”
trans-unit.target: “Why would someone shoot a man before throwing him out of an airlock?”

trans-unit.source: “It’s all part of the plan,” Mike muses. “Sending a message. You gotta assert dominance, otherwise you get no respect.” He gets back to mopping the puke off of the floor. “It’s how you survive on a submarine, same as in prison.” “You were incarcerated?” you ask. “Oh, I’ve been all around. I tell you, the things you have to do to get respect... I still have trouble walking straight.”
trans-unit.target: “It’s all part of the plan,” Mike muses. “Sending a message. You gotta assert dominance, otherwise you get no respect.” He gets back to mopping the puke off of the floor. “It’s how you survive on a submarine, same as in prison.” “You were incarcerated?” you ask. “Oh, I’ve been all around. I tell you, the things you have to do to get respect... I still have trouble walking straight.”

trans-unit.source: Act like someone’s calling you on the radio.
trans-unit.target: Act like someone’s calling you on the radio.

trans-unit.source: “Mike knows many things, and he'll tell you some. But only if you have the coin.”
trans-unit.target: “Mike knows many things, and he'll tell you some. But only if you have the coin.”

trans-unit.source: You notice a thin trail of smoke rising from a trash can.
trans-unit.target: You notice a thin trail of smoke rising from a trash can.

trans-unit.source: There is a lit cigarette in the trash. It seems dangerously close to igniting a larger flame.
trans-unit.target: There is a lit cigarette in the trash. It seems dangerously close to igniting a larger flame.

trans-unit.source: You get some minor burns when you fish the cigarette out and stomp out the fledgling fire, but nothing major.
trans-unit.target: You get some minor burns when you fish the cigarette out and stomp out the fledgling fire, but nothing major.

trans-unit.source: Some workers are huddled together, playing a game with dice. They have piled various items together, presumably as prizes for the winner. Among them is a shiny, symmetrical item. You recognize it as alien, and probably worth more than the other items combined.
trans-unit.target: Some workers are huddled together, playing a game with dice. They have piled various items together, presumably as prizes for the winner. Among them is a shiny, symmetrical item. You recognize it as alien, and probably worth more than the other items combined.

trans-unit.source: Join the game and attempt to win the item for yourself.
trans-unit.target: Join the game and attempt to win the item for yourself.

trans-unit.source: You quickly deduce that it’s a game of pure luck. You take a few careful risks and it pays off. You walk away with the prized alien ornament.
trans-unit.target: You quickly deduce that it’s a game of pure luck. You take a few careful risks and it pays off. You walk away with the prized alien ornament.

trans-unit.source: Unsurprisingly, the other players are more experienced in the game than you. After betting a sizeable amount of cash, you walk away with nothing. You have lost 500 marks.
trans-unit.target: Unsurprisingly, the other players are more experienced in the game than you. After betting a sizeable amount of cash, you walk away with nothing. You have lost 500 marks.

trans-unit.source: Create a distraction and try to snatch it without anyone noticing.
trans-unit.target: Create a distraction and try to snatch it without anyone noticing.

trans-unit.source: You start yelling “Fire! Fire!” and quickly grab the item in the ensuing chaos. You hide it deep in your pocket. It’s time to go before they’re any wiser.
trans-unit.target: You start yelling “Fire! Fire!” and quickly grab the item in the ensuing chaos. You hide it deep in your pocket. It’s time to go before they’re any wiser.

trans-unit.source: You start yelling “Fire! Fire!” and quickly grab the item in the ensuing chaos. However, one of them catches you in the act and calls security.
trans-unit.target: You start yelling “Fire! Fire!” and quickly grab the item in the ensuing chaos. However, one of them catches you in the act and calls security.

trans-unit.source: You feel the faintest of tugs near your pants. When you finally get some space, you find someone has slipped a note in your pocket.
trans-unit.target: You feel the faintest of tugs near your pants. When you finally get some space, you find someone has slipped a note in your pocket.

trans-unit.source: It states: “The truth is out there. cbspusbvnbhbnf.dpn/efsfmjdu/beweht.htm”
trans-unit.target: It states: “The truth is out there. cbspusbvnbhbnf.dpn/efsfmjdu/beweht.htm”

trans-unit.source: You run into some separatists. Being on friendly terms with them, you receive some insight into how this place functions.
trans-unit.target: You run into some separatists. Being on friendly terms with them, you receive some insight into how this place functions.

trans-unit.source: You see some separatists creating their trademark art on an unsuspecting trash can.
trans-unit.target: You see some separatists creating their trademark art on an unsuspecting trash can.

trans-unit.source: “Hey! That’s official property!” you decide to yell. The youngsters stop what they’re doing and attack you.
trans-unit.target: “Hey! That’s official property!” you decide to yell. The youngsters stop what they’re doing and attack you.

trans-unit.source: You act as a lookout for the two activists. When they finish their masterpiece, you exchange a few words. They deem you loyal to their cause and promise to put a good word in for you.
trans-unit.target: You act as a lookout for the two activists. When they finish their masterpiece, you exchange a few words. They deem you loyal to their cause and promise to put a good word in for you.

trans-unit.source: Someone is handing out flyers advertising some kind of a communion. You spot a familiar-looking logo in the corner. It’s just the local husk cult members proselytizing. It might be fun to check out the ritual.
trans-unit.target: Someone is handing out flyers advertising some kind of a communion. You spot a familiar-looking logo in the corner. It’s just the local husk cult members proselytizing. It might be fun to check out the ritual.

trans-unit.source: Sure, what’s the worst that could happen?
trans-unit.target: Sure, what’s the worst that could happen?

trans-unit.source: You make your way into the advertised dorm. It’s the usual stuff: “Fleshbags” this and “ascension” that. The local chapter guys are very friendly and they invite you to partake of the communion.
trans-unit.target: You make your way into the advertised dorm. It’s the usual stuff: “Fleshbags” this and “ascension” that. The local chapter guys are very friendly and they invite you to partake of the communion.

trans-unit.source: You gulp down some husk eggs. A bit salty. Afterwards you joke around with the folks a bit and you part in good spirits. You’ve made some lifelong friends here tonight. That reminds you to pick up some husk antidote at the counter and take some of it pretty soon-ish.
trans-unit.target: You gulp down some husk eggs. A bit salty. Afterwards you joke around with the folks a bit and you part in good spirits. You’ve made some lifelong friends here tonight. That reminds you to pick up some husk antidote at the counter and take some of it pretty soon-ish.

trans-unit.source: Make up an excuse to leave.
trans-unit.target: Make up an excuse to leave.

trans-unit.source: Suicide cults are fun but not for me.
trans-unit.target: Suicide cults are fun but not for me.

trans-unit.source: The engineering crew chief working on a beaten-up old shuttle engine scowls at you for a moment, as if sizing you up.
trans-unit.target: The engineering crew chief working on a beaten-up old shuttle engine scowls at you for a moment, as if sizing you up.

trans-unit.source: You there, you look halfway competent. Give me a hand with this engine.
trans-unit.target: You there, you look halfway competent. Give me a hand with this engine.

trans-unit.source: You decline as tactfully as you can but he’s clearly not happy. He shakes his head and silently goes back to work, trying to refit the engine.
trans-unit.target: You decline as tactfully as you can but he’s clearly not happy. He shakes his head and silently goes back to work, trying to refit the engine.

trans-unit.source: You roll up your sleeves and get to work refitting the engine with him. After a few minutes of work you both manage to get it running. “Thanks. I’m sure I’d have got it going on my own eventually but you’ve saved me some time. Let me know if you want any work done on your sub and I’ll see about giving you a little discount for your trouble.”
trans-unit.target: You roll up your sleeves and get to work refitting the engine with him. After a few minutes of work you both manage to get it running. “Thanks. I’m sure I’d have got it going on my own eventually but you’ve saved me some time. Let me know if you want any work done on your sub and I’ll see about giving you a little discount for your trouble.”

trans-unit.source: You roll up your sleeves and get to work refitting the engine with him. In spite of your best efforts though, the engine refuses to start. He slams shut the access panel. “Well I guess this is one for the scrappers. Thanks for the help anyhow.”
trans-unit.target: You roll up your sleeves and get to work refitting the engine with him. In spite of your best efforts though, the engine refuses to start. He slams shut the access panel. “Well I guess this is one for the scrappers. Thanks for the help anyhow.”

trans-unit.source: He clearly doesn’t care much for what he sees and returns to his work. Apparently you’ve somehow not passed muster.
trans-unit.target: He clearly doesn’t care much for what he sees and returns to his work. Apparently you’ve somehow not passed muster.

trans-unit.source: Two workers are arguing loudly. What once might have been a civil discussion about inter-Europan politics has devolved into a shouting match—it isn’t readily apparent how the other guy’s mother factors into it.
trans-unit.target: Two workers are arguing loudly. What once might have been a civil discussion about inter-Europan politics has devolved into a shouting match—it isn’t readily apparent how the other guy’s mother factors into it.

trans-unit.source: Try to calm the situation down.
trans-unit.target: Try to calm the situation down.

trans-unit.source: You move a bit closer. For a moment, the two loudmouths stop arguing and look at you.
trans-unit.target: You move a bit closer. For a moment, the two loudmouths stop arguing and look at you.

trans-unit.source: “Hey fellas. Not my place to interrupt, but they can hear your conversation back in Versas.”
trans-unit.target: “Hey fellas. Not my place to interrupt, but they can hear your conversation back in Versas.”

trans-unit.source: The two workers are humbled by your parental demeanor. They quiet down and get back to their duties.
trans-unit.target: The two workers are humbled by your parental demeanor. They quiet down and get back to their duties.

trans-unit.source: They are even more pissed off now, but this time at you. Your condescending manner of speaking does you no favors.
trans-unit.target: They are even more pissed off now, but this time at you. Your condescending manner of speaking does you no favors.

trans-unit.source: “I suggest you two shut your traps before I finish counting to three. One…”
trans-unit.target: “I suggest you two shut your traps before I finish counting to three. One…”

trans-unit.source: They get the feeling you have the means to back up your words. The two workers go quiet in a record time.
trans-unit.target: They get the feeling you have the means to back up your words. The two workers go quiet in a record time.

trans-unit.source: They look at each other. Clearly, they’re shaking in their boots.
trans-unit.target: They look at each other. Clearly, they’re shaking in their boots.

trans-unit.source: A smile appears on the other’s face and you smile at him in turn. You feel powerful. Your smile quickly turns into a frown when they grab their tools and walk toward you with ill intent.
trans-unit.target: A smile appears on the other’s face and you smile at him in turn. You feel powerful. Your smile quickly turns into a frown when they grab their tools and walk toward you with ill intent.

trans-unit.source: You don’t know exactly what’s going on, but join in the shouting anyway. “Remember what he said about your mom?” “That shit doesn’t fly where I’m from!” You feel giddy as the shouting crescendos into a fistfight and the two workers start reaching for their tools. It might be a good time to vanish from the area.
