trans-unit.target: You don’t know exactly what’s going on, but join in the shouting anyway. “Remember what he said about your mom?” “That shit doesn’t fly where I’m from!” You feel giddy as the shouting crescendos into a fistfight and the two workers start reaching for their tools. It might be a good time to vanish from the area.

trans-unit.source: Nothing to see here. Keep walking.
trans-unit.target: Nothing to see here. Keep walking.

trans-unit.source: “Hey! Got something for ya here if you’re interested…”
trans-unit.target: “Hey! Got something for ya here if you’re interested…”

trans-unit.source: Listen to what they have to say.
trans-unit.target: Listen to what they have to say.

trans-unit.source: “I happened to find some nice alien contraband. It’s yours for 1,000 marks. I’ll throw in a power cell too. What do you say?” He opens his coat to reveal a pistol that looks like genuine alien tech.
trans-unit.target: “I happened to find some nice alien contraband. It’s yours for 1,000 marks. I’ll throw in a power cell too. What do you say?” He opens his coat to reveal a pistol that looks like genuine alien tech.

trans-unit.source: Do you want to buy the pistol for 1,000 marks?
trans-unit.target: Do you want to buy the pistol for 1,000 marks?

trans-unit.source: He hands you the pistol. It’s a genuine article.
trans-unit.target: He hands you the pistol. It’s a genuine article.

trans-unit.source: He shoves the pistol in your hand and quickly shuffles off. On a closer look, the pistol is actually a children’s toy. You angrily toss it aside.
trans-unit.target: He shoves the pistol in your hand and quickly shuffles off. On a closer look, the pistol is actually a children’s toy. You angrily toss it aside.

trans-unit.source: “I found some weird eggs in the vents. Dunno what they are but figured they’d mean something for someone like you.” He flashes some eggs but it’s too dark to make out which species. He quickly hides them before you can ascertain their nature. “500 marks.”
trans-unit.target: “I found some weird eggs in the vents. Dunno what they are but figured they’d mean something for someone like you.” He flashes some eggs but it’s too dark to make out which species. He quickly hides them before you can ascertain their nature. “500 marks.”

trans-unit.source: Do you want to buy the eggs for 500 marks?
trans-unit.target: Do you want to buy the eggs for 500 marks?

trans-unit.source: He carefully places the eggs in your hand. Most of them are actually oversized marbles, but one is a genuine mudraptor egg. “This can potentially cause a lot of damage,” you think to yourself as you stow it safely inside your jacket.
trans-unit.target: He carefully places the eggs in your hand. Most of them are actually oversized marbles, but one is a genuine mudraptor egg. “This can potentially cause a lot of damage,” you think to yourself as you stow it safely inside your jacket.

trans-unit.source: In the light, the eggs are instantly recognizable as “Velonaceps calyx,” otherwise known as husk eggs.
trans-unit.target: In the light, the eggs are instantly recognizable as “Velonaceps calyx,” otherwise known as husk eggs.

trans-unit.source: “Not enough cash? I thought the submarine business paid well...”
trans-unit.target: “Not enough cash? I thought the submarine business paid well...”

trans-unit.source: “Hello, fellow traveler!” a pale figure greets you. You’re slightly taken aback by their cheerfulness. “Would you happen to have any eggs of the species Velonaceps calyx? I’ll pay good money for each one you come across in your travels.” Their facade momentarily slips and you can hear them muttering under their breath. You can make out “disgusting meatsack” and something about “ascending.”
trans-unit.target: “Hello, fellow traveler!” a pale figure greets you. You’re slightly taken aback by their cheerfulness. “Would you happen to have any eggs of the species Velonaceps calyx? I’ll pay good money for each one you come across in your travels.” Their facade momentarily slips and you can hear them muttering under their breath. You can make out “disgusting meatsack” and something about “ascending.”

trans-unit.source: You check your pockets. As luck would have it, you have some husk eggs on you.
trans-unit.target: You check your pockets. As luck would have it, you have some husk eggs on you.

trans-unit.source: You exchange the eggs for money, which you count immediately. It's all there.
trans-unit.target: You exchange the eggs for money, which you count immediately. It's all there.

trans-unit.source: You decide to donate the eggs for free. The person seems overjoyed.
trans-unit.target: You decide to donate the eggs for free. The person seems overjoyed.

trans-unit.source: Actually, I'll keep these for now.
trans-unit.target: Actually, I'll keep these for now.

trans-unit.source: You check your pockets. You're fresh out of husk eggs.
trans-unit.target: You check your pockets. You're fresh out of husk eggs.

trans-unit.source: “I don't have the eggs on me but I'll go get some.”
trans-unit.target: “I don't have the eggs on me but I'll go get some.”

trans-unit.source: “I'll be here,” the person whispers. It sends shivers down your spine.
trans-unit.target: “I'll be here,” the person whispers. It sends shivers down your spine.

trans-unit.source: A crowd of teens has gathered to observe the newcomers to their outpost. They’re loudly arguing about which is the coolest job on board a submarine.
trans-unit.target: A crowd of teens has gathered to observe the newcomers to their outpost. They’re loudly arguing about which is the coolest job on board a submarine.

trans-unit.source: They have an endless amount of questions. You answer them diligently, and in the end you have the feeling a few of them are going to grow up to be seafarers. Remember: If they wind up as crawler food, it’ll be blood on your hands.
trans-unit.target: They have an endless amount of questions. You answer them diligently, and in the end you have the feeling a few of them are going to grow up to be seafarers. Remember: If they wind up as crawler food, it’ll be blood on your hands.

trans-unit.source: Two pale characters with bags under their eyes approach. They’re reaching for something under their clothes. You feel threatened.
trans-unit.target: Two pale characters with bags under their eyes approach. They’re reaching for something under their clothes. You feel threatened.

trans-unit.source: The two figures draw out sharp knives and lunge at you.
trans-unit.target: The two figures draw out sharp knives and lunge at you.

trans-unit.source: “Easy, dear brothers. My time for ascension isn’t here yet.”
trans-unit.target: “Easy, dear brothers. My time for ascension isn’t here yet.”

trans-unit.source: They stop their approach, apologize for the confusion and the three of you grab some crawler cocktails and laugh it off. They share information on this outpost.
trans-unit.target: They stop their approach, apologize for the confusion and the three of you grab some crawler cocktails and laugh it off. They share information on this outpost.

trans-unit.source: The two figures draw out sharp knives and lunge at you.
trans-unit.target: The two figures draw out sharp knives and lunge at you.

trans-unit.source: “We've sold some basic construction materials to the neighbouring outpost, but delivery is on us. A simple transport job; perfect for a new crew like yourselves. What say you?”
trans-unit.target: “We've sold some basic construction materials to the neighbouring outpost, but delivery is on us. A simple transport job; perfect for a new crew like yourselves. What say you?”

trans-unit.source: “We hired a crew to transport these materials, but they never showed. The stuff is still here if you want the job.”
trans-unit.target: “We hired a crew to transport these materials, but they never showed. The stuff is still here if you want the job.”

trans-unit.source: “Got some real 'handle with care' cargo sitting in the bay. Normally I wouldn't trust them with any new face but I hear you've proved yourselves.”
trans-unit.target: “Got some real 'handle with care' cargo sitting in the bay. Normally I wouldn't trust them with any new face but I hear you've proved yourselves.”

trans-unit.source: “These research materials are sorely needed in the neighboring outpost. It's imperative they get to their destination intact.”
trans-unit.target: “These research materials are sorely needed in the neighboring outpost. It's imperative they get to their destination intact.”

trans-unit.source: “No transport ship can leave without running into a swarm of monsters. Take care of the problem and there's a reward in it for you.”
trans-unit.target: “No transport ship can leave without running into a swarm of monsters. Take care of the problem and there's a reward in it for you.”

trans-unit.source: “There's this especially mean monster terrorizing the caves near here. I've put a little reward aside for the crew that takes it down.”
trans-unit.target: “There's this especially mean monster terrorizing the caves near here. I've put a little reward aside for the crew that takes it down.”

trans-unit.source: “I've heard reports of a gargantuan monster somewhere in the vicinity. If you want to try hunting it down, be my guest. Just make sure you're prepared. It's a dangerous one.”
trans-unit.target: “I've heard reports of a gargantuan monster somewhere in the vicinity. If you want to try hunting it down, be my guest. Just make sure you're prepared. It's a dangerous one.”

trans-unit.source: “We picked up a signal nearby. The eggheads say it could be something alien. If you check it out, there'd be some marks in it for you.”
trans-unit.target: “We picked up a signal nearby. The eggheads say it could be something alien. If you check it out, there'd be some marks in it for you.”

trans-unit.source: “We picked up a faint signal in the depths. The eggheads are pretty sure it's an alien artifact. If you check it out, there'd be some marks in it for you.”
trans-unit.target: “We picked up a faint signal in the depths. The eggheads are pretty sure it's an alien artifact. If you check it out, there'd be some marks in it for you.”

trans-unit.source: “We received a distress signal from a vessel that was carrying some sensitive cargo. The contents are probably long gone by now but the captain's logbook should shed some light on what happened to it. I want you to recover it.”
trans-unit.target: “We received a distress signal from a vessel that was carrying some sensitive cargo. The contents are probably long gone by now but the captain's logbook should shed some light on what happened to it. I want you to recover it.”

trans-unit.source: “I posted about an assignment earlier. Sent the details to your onboard navigation system too, in case you're interested.”
trans-unit.target: “I posted about an assignment earlier. Sent the details to your onboard navigation system too, in case you're interested.”

trans-unit.source: “I posted about an assignment earlier. Sent the details to your onboard navigation system too, in case you're interested.”
trans-unit.target: “I posted about an assignment earlier. Sent the details to your onboard navigation system too, in case you're interested.”

trans-unit.source: “Got some real 'handle with extreme caution' cargo sitting down at the docks. This won't be your average transport job, as magnetic suspension crates keep the very volatile contents from a violent and explosive reaction. Ensure the crates are powered throughout the journey, and you will be fine. Think you can handle this?”
trans-unit.target: “Got some real 'handle with extreme caution' cargo sitting down at the docks. This won't be your average transport job, as magnetic suspension crates keep the very volatile contents from a violent and explosive reaction. Ensure the crates are powered throughout the journey, and you will be fine. Think you can handle this?”

trans-unit.source: “I posted about an assignment earlier. Sent the details to your onboard navigation system too, in case you're interested.”
trans-unit.target: “I posted about an assignment earlier. Sent the details to your onboard navigation system too, in case you're interested.”

trans-unit.source: There are flyers with notices for various jobs. One of them is for ferrying a few boxes of clowning equipment to a neighboring outpost. It states: “If interested, imitate your favorite bird.”
trans-unit.target: There are flyers with notices for various jobs. One of them is for ferrying a few boxes of clowning equipment to a neighboring outpost. It states: “If interested, imitate your favorite bird.”

trans-unit.source: A distant sound of a bike horn confirms you as the recipient of the assignment. A container is waiting for you when you leave the outpost.
trans-unit.target: A distant sound of a bike horn confirms you as the recipient of the assignment. A container is waiting for you when you leave the outpost.

trans-unit.source: A distant sound of a bike horn confirms you as the recipient of the assignment. A container is waiting for you when you leave the outpost.
trans-unit.target: A distant sound of a bike horn confirms you as the recipient of the assignment. A container is waiting for you when you leave the outpost.

trans-unit.source: An announcement comes over the PA. “Calling the crew of the vessel that just docked. Please send a representative to see the security chief in administration.”
trans-unit.target: An announcement comes over the PA. “Calling the crew of the vessel that just docked. Please send a representative to see the security chief in administration.”

trans-unit.source: “You're one of the new arrivals? Good. I have a sensitive issue I can't trust any of my own employees with.” The chief pauses for a second, sizing you up, then continues. “In usual circumstances, I wouldn't ask for help from just anyone, but I'm running out of options. Needless to say, I need you to keep this to yourself. Are you interested?”
trans-unit.target: “You're one of the new arrivals? Good. I have a sensitive issue I can't trust any of my own employees with.” The chief pauses for a second, sizing you up, then continues. “In usual circumstances, I wouldn't ask for help from just anyone, but I'm running out of options. Needless to say, I need you to keep this to yourself. Are you interested?”

trans-unit.source: The chief nods. “According to intel we managed to gather earlier, we can expect a separatist prison break soon,” they state, matter-of-factly. “Prison breaks are already a nasty business, but to complicate matters I have reason to believe they have a man on the inside.”
trans-unit.target: The chief nods. “According to intel we managed to gather earlier, we can expect a separatist prison break soon,” they state, matter-of-factly. “Prison breaks are already a nasty business, but to complicate matters I have reason to believe they have a man on the inside.”

trans-unit.source: “I'm talking about inside the security force.” It seems like sense of humor isn't how one makes it to chief of security. “To cut to the chase, I need to make sure all my personnel are on the level and take precautions. Here's what I want you to do. Take these microphones and hide them in the crew quarters.”
trans-unit.target: “I'm talking about inside the security force.” It seems like sense of humor isn't how one makes it to chief of security. “To cut to the chase, I need to make sure all my personnel are on the level and take precautions. Here's what I want you to do. Take these microphones and hide them in the crew quarters.”

trans-unit.source: You pick up some small surveillance microphones. “One more thing. I can't permit this kind of surveillance in an official capacity. If you get caught, you're on your own.”
trans-unit.target: You pick up some small surveillance microphones. “One more thing. I can't permit this kind of surveillance in an official capacity. If you get caught, you're on your own.”

trans-unit.source: These must be the quarters the chief was talking about.
trans-unit.target: These must be the quarters the chief was talking about.

trans-unit.source: You quickly stuff the mics in footlockers under the bunks. The sound coming through is a bit muffled but serviceable. Return to the chief to receive your payment.
trans-unit.target: You quickly stuff the mics in footlockers under the bunks. The sound coming through is a bit muffled but serviceable. Return to the chief to receive your payment.

trans-unit.source: “Good work. Here's your payment. We never spoke.”
trans-unit.target: “Good work. Here's your payment. We never spoke.”

trans-unit.source: You toss the mics under a bunk. When you turn around to leave, you run into a security guard. “What are you up to?” they ask.
trans-unit.target: You toss the mics under a bunk. When you turn around to leave, you run into a security guard. “What are you up to?” they ask.

trans-unit.source: “Oh, just some calisthenics. Need to stay in shape for emergencies.”
trans-unit.target: “Oh, just some calisthenics. Need to stay in shape for emergencies.”

trans-unit.source: The guard seems satisfied with the explanation and goes back to their rounds. Return to the chief to receive your payment.
trans-unit.target: The guard seems satisfied with the explanation and goes back to their rounds. Return to the chief to receive your payment.

trans-unit.source: “Good work. Here's your payment. We never spoke.”
trans-unit.target: “Good work. Here's your payment. We never spoke.”

trans-unit.source: “You look like you've never done an honest day's work in your life.” They start inspecting undersides of the bunks. Now would be a good time to vanish before they get any wiser. This mission is a failure.
trans-unit.target: “You look like you've never done an honest day's work in your life.” They start inspecting undersides of the bunks. Now would be a good time to vanish before they get any wiser. This mission is a failure.

trans-unit.source: The guard draws their weapon. “Microphones, huh? You need to come with me.” Now would be a REALLY good time to run.
trans-unit.target: The guard draws their weapon. “Microphones, huh? You need to come with me.” Now would be a REALLY good time to run.

trans-unit.source: The guard lets out a brief chuckle. “A funny guy. You shouldn't be here. Go on, git.” The guard then turns their attention to the cameras. Now would be a good time to vanish before they get any wiser. This mission is a failure.
trans-unit.target: The guard lets out a brief chuckle. “A funny guy. You shouldn't be here. Go on, git.” The guard then turns their attention to the cameras. Now would be a good time to vanish before they get any wiser. This mission is a failure.

trans-unit.source: The guard draws their weapon. “Microphones, huh? You need to come with me.” Now would be a REALLY good time to run.
trans-unit.target: The guard draws their weapon. “Microphones, huh? You need to come with me.” Now would be a REALLY good time to run.

trans-unit.source: You open up a nearby transistor radio and install a microphone inside the speaker, out of sight. Return to the chief to receive your payment.
trans-unit.target: You open up a nearby transistor radio and install a microphone inside the speaker, out of sight. Return to the chief to receive your payment.

trans-unit.source: “Good work. Here's your payment. We never spoke.”
trans-unit.target: “Good work. Here's your payment. We never spoke.”

trans-unit.source: You spot a transistor radio that could possibly hold a microphone. As you're fiddling with it, a security guard calls out. “You! Come here!” You decide to comply for now. “What were you doing?” the guard demands.
trans-unit.target: You spot a transistor radio that could possibly hold a microphone. As you're fiddling with it, a security guard calls out. “You! Come here!” You decide to comply for now. “What were you doing?” the guard demands.

trans-unit.source: “Finally. Make sure K-Rawler comes through loud and clear.” Something will come through all right, you think to yourself. Return to the chief to receive your payment.
trans-unit.target: “Finally. Make sure K-Rawler comes through loud and clear.” Something will come through all right, you think to yourself. Return to the chief to receive your payment.

trans-unit.source: “Good work. Here's your payment. We never spoke.”
trans-unit.target: “Good work. Here's your payment. We never spoke.”

trans-unit.source: The guard lets out a brief chuckle. “A funny guy. You shouldn't be here. Go on, git.” The guard then turns their attention to the cameras. Now would be a good time to vanish before they get any wiser. This mission is a failure.
trans-unit.target: The guard lets out a brief chuckle. “A funny guy. You shouldn't be here. Go on, git.” The guard then turns their attention to the cameras. Now would be a good time to vanish before they get any wiser. This mission is a failure.

trans-unit.source: The guard draws their weapon. “Microphones, huh? You need to come with me.” Now would be a REALLY good time to run.
trans-unit.target: The guard draws their weapon. “Microphones, huh? You need to come with me.” Now would be a REALLY good time to run.

trans-unit.source: In a nearby trash can, there are two small bottles of clear liquid. Both of them are labeled with a different chemical formula.
trans-unit.target: In a nearby trash can, there are two small bottles of clear liquid. Both of them are labeled with a different chemical formula.

trans-unit.source: Take a closer look at the bottles.
trans-unit.target: Take a closer look at the bottles.

trans-unit.source: Neither solution is anything you’re especially familiar with, but you are reasonably sure one of them is strongly acidic. You decide to leave the acid be. The other bottle is a total mystery to you.
trans-unit.target: Neither solution is anything you’re especially familiar with, but you are reasonably sure one of them is strongly acidic. You decide to leave the acid be. The other bottle is a total mystery to you.

trans-unit.source: The solution has a slightly mellow and sweet quality to it and it leaves a lingering aftertaste of apricot. It seems to have no other effects. You decide to leave the bottles in the trash and continue on.
trans-unit.target: The solution has a slightly mellow and sweet quality to it and it leaves a lingering aftertaste of apricot. It seems to have no other effects. You decide to leave the bottles in the trash and continue on.

trans-unit.source: After a while, you realize drinking the solution has made all your pains disappear. For the first time in forever, you feel good. You don't know what the solution is but you wish you had some more. Maybe there's some more in the trash?
trans-unit.target: After a while, you realize drinking the solution has made all your pains disappear. For the first time in forever, you feel good. You don't know what the solution is but you wish you had some more. Maybe there's some more in the trash?

trans-unit.source: Maybe I should take another look in there.
trans-unit.target: Maybe I should take another look in there.

trans-unit.source: You return to the trash can and find a couple more bottles. None of them are the same as the one you drank but maybe they can be of some other use.
trans-unit.target: You return to the trash can and find a couple more bottles. None of them are the same as the one you drank but maybe they can be of some other use.

trans-unit.source: Not a very sensible thing to do...
trans-unit.target: Not a very sensible thing to do...

trans-unit.source: Chemistry makes no sense to you; it might as well be an alien language. After a quick shake test, either liquid seems perfectly safe to you. One of them has a blue label, the other green. Do you want to try one of them?
trans-unit.target: Chemistry makes no sense to you; it might as well be an alien language. After a quick shake test, either liquid seems perfectly safe to you. One of them has a blue label, the other green. Do you want to try one of them?

trans-unit.source: The solution has a slightly mellow and sweet quality to it and it leaves a lingering aftertaste of apricot. It seems to have no other effects. You decide to leave the bottles in the trash and continue on.
trans-unit.target: The solution has a slightly mellow and sweet quality to it and it leaves a lingering aftertaste of apricot. It seems to have no other effects. You decide to leave the bottles in the trash and continue on.

trans-unit.source: After a while, you realize drinking the solution has made all your pains disappear. For the first time in forever, you feel good. You don't know what the solution is but you wish you had some more. Maybe there's some more in the trash?
trans-unit.target: After a while, you realize drinking the solution has made all your pains disappear. For the first time in forever, you feel good. You don't know what the solution is but you wish you had some more. Maybe there's some more in the trash?

trans-unit.source: Maybe I should take another look in there.
trans-unit.target: Maybe I should take another look in there.

trans-unit.source: You return to the trash can and find a couple more bottles. Maybe one of these is the same miracle solution!
trans-unit.target: You return to the trash can and find a couple more bottles. Maybe one of these is the same miracle solution!

trans-unit.source: The liquid burns your throat a bit when you swallow it. At first, the effect isn’t unlike a good Jovian vodka, and the prospect of getting buzzed while spending no money appeals to you greatly. The situation suddenly takes a turn for the worse when you feel like your stomach is on fire. A sharp pain causes you to double over in agony. Who would’ve thought drinking something out of the trash was a bad idea?
trans-unit.target: The liquid burns your throat a bit when you swallow it. At first, the effect isn’t unlike a good Jovian vodka, and the prospect of getting buzzed while spending no money appeals to you greatly. The situation suddenly takes a turn for the worse when you feel like your stomach is on fire. A sharp pain causes you to double over in agony. Who would’ve thought drinking something out of the trash was a bad idea?

trans-unit.source: A panicked researcher runs past you. “God dammit Jimmy, I told you we should’ve went with padlocks instead of these electronic pieces of shit!”
trans-unit.target: A panicked researcher runs past you. “God dammit Jimmy, I told you we should’ve went with padlocks instead of these electronic pieces of shit!”

trans-unit.source: As you step inside the office, the manager notices you. “I suppose you're here about the situation in the mines?” he asks.
trans-unit.target: As you step inside the office, the manager notices you. “I suppose you're here about the situation in the mines?” he asks.

trans-unit.source: “Uh...sure. Remind me what the situation was, again?”
trans-unit.target: “Uh...sure. Remind me what the situation was, again?”

trans-unit.source: It turns out the miners have halted the work in the mines because of a toxic gas leak. “They're demanding ridiculous hazard pay and we just don't have the budget for that. That's why you're here, right? To negotiate a better deal?”
trans-unit.target: It turns out the miners have halted the work in the mines because of a toxic gas leak. “They're demanding ridiculous hazard pay and we just don't have the budget for that. That's why you're here, right? To negotiate a better deal?”

trans-unit.source: “Yes, that's right. Get me in contact with the foreman.”
trans-unit.target: “Yes, that's right. Get me in contact with the foreman.”

trans-unit.source: “They can probably be found near the main mineshaft. Good luck.”
trans-unit.target: “They can probably be found near the main mineshaft. Good luck.”

trans-unit.source: The foreman is pacing back and forth, loudly arguing with someone on the radio. You only catch the tail end of their discussion. “There aren't enough diving masks for the whole crew. Even if there were, we couldn't waste the oxygen keeping them on all day long. ...No, the ventilation in the mines is connected to the rest of the outpost so we can't risk pumping it out either.” Exasperated, he looks at you. “Are you here about the gas leaks?”
trans-unit.target: The foreman is pacing back and forth, loudly arguing with someone on the radio. You only catch the tail end of their discussion. “There aren't enough diving masks for the whole crew. Even if there were, we couldn't waste the oxygen keeping them on all day long. ...No, the ventilation in the mines is connected to the rest of the outpost so we can't risk pumping it out either.” Exasperated, he looks at you. “Are you here about the gas leaks?”

trans-unit.source: Haggle for lower hazard pay for miners.
trans-unit.target: Haggle for lower hazard pay for miners.

trans-unit.source: You successfully explain that not everyone can be paid extra for hazardous work. This will probably result in most of the crew walking out and the rest having to work their asses off, but at least you got paid a hefty consultant fee.
trans-unit.target: You successfully explain that not everyone can be paid extra for hazardous work. This will probably result in most of the crew walking out and the rest having to work their asses off, but at least you got paid a hefty consultant fee.

trans-unit.source: The foreman stands their ground. No hazard pay, no digging. At least you tried.
trans-unit.target: The foreman stands their ground. No hazard pay, no digging. At least you tried.

trans-unit.source: “What kind of gases are we talking about?”
trans-unit.target: “What kind of gases are we talking about?”

trans-unit.source: “Mercury gases. Colorless, odorless, gives you breathing problems real quick.”
trans-unit.target: “Mercury gases. Colorless, odorless, gives you breathing problems real quick.”

trans-unit.source: Come up with a solution to help with mercury exposure.
trans-unit.target: Come up with a solution to help with mercury exposure.

trans-unit.source: “A combination of iron, Stabilozine and crawler liver should keep your lungs clean of mercury. Take two pills every six hours.” The foreman thanks you for your advice. You collect a considerable reward from the outpost manager.
trans-unit.target: “A combination of iron, Stabilozine and crawler liver should keep your lungs clean of mercury. Take two pills every six hours.” The foreman thanks you for your advice. You collect a considerable reward from the outpost manager.

trans-unit.source: You can't come up with anything that could help the situation.
trans-unit.target: You can't come up with anything that could help the situation.

trans-unit.source: Haggle for lower hazard pay for miners.
trans-unit.target: Haggle for lower hazard pay for miners.

trans-unit.source: You successfully explain that not everyone can be paid extra for hazardous work. This will probably result in most of the crew walking out and the rest having to work their asses off, but at least you got paid a hefty consultant fee.
trans-unit.target: You successfully explain that not everyone can be paid extra for hazardous work. This will probably result in most of the crew walking out and the rest having to work their asses off, but at least you got paid a hefty consultant fee.

trans-unit.source: The foreman stands their ground. No hazard pay, no digging. At least you tried.
trans-unit.target: The foreman stands their ground. No hazard pay, no digging. At least you tried.

trans-unit.source: “Tell me more about the ventilation problem.”
trans-unit.target: “Tell me more about the ventilation problem.”

trans-unit.source: “The ducts reach from here all the way to the mess hall and dorms, meaning we can't pump the vapors out. I don't know who installed them originally, but I'd like to have a word with 'em.”
trans-unit.target: “The ducts reach from here all the way to the mess hall and dorms, meaning we can't pump the vapors out. I don't know who installed them originally, but I'd like to have a word with 'em.”

trans-unit.source: Attempt to solve the ventilation problem.
trans-unit.target: Attempt to solve the ventilation problem.

trans-unit.source: You study a map of ventilation ducts. “Why not install an extra air filtration system right here?” you suggest, pointing to a junction near the dorms. “Should pump out all the mercury before it spreads farther.” And sure enough, it does. You collect a fee from the manager for solving the problem.
trans-unit.target: You study a map of ventilation ducts. “Why not install an extra air filtration system right here?” you suggest, pointing to a junction near the dorms. “Should pump out all the mercury before it spreads farther.” And sure enough, it does. You collect a fee from the manager for solving the problem.

trans-unit.source: You can't come up with anything that could help the situation.
trans-unit.target: You can't come up with anything that could help the situation.

trans-unit.source: Haggle for lower hazard pay for miners.
trans-unit.target: Haggle for lower hazard pay for miners.

trans-unit.source: You successfully explain that not everyone can be paid extra for hazardous work. This will probably result in most of the crew walking out and the rest having to work their asses off, but at least you got paid a hefty consultant fee.
trans-unit.target: You successfully explain that not everyone can be paid extra for hazardous work. This will probably result in most of the crew walking out and the rest having to work their asses off, but at least you got paid a hefty consultant fee.

trans-unit.source: The foreman stands their ground. No hazard pay, no digging. At least you tried.
trans-unit.target: The foreman stands their ground. No hazard pay, no digging. At least you tried.

trans-unit.source: “This is above my pay grade. Goodbye.”
trans-unit.target: “This is above my pay grade. Goodbye.”

trans-unit.source: “Do you have the eggs with you now?”
trans-unit.target: “Do you have the eggs with you now?”

trans-unit.source: You check your pockets. As luck would have it, you have some husk eggs on you.
trans-unit.target: You check your pockets. As luck would have it, you have some husk eggs on you.

trans-unit.source: You exchange the eggs for money, which you count immediately. It's all there.
trans-unit.target: You exchange the eggs for money, which you count immediately. It's all there.

trans-unit.source: You decide to donate the eggs for free. The person seems overjoyed.
trans-unit.target: You decide to donate the eggs for free. The person seems overjoyed.

trans-unit.source: Actually, I'll keep these for now.
trans-unit.target: Actually, I'll keep these for now.

trans-unit.source: “No, you don't. Please stop wasting my time.”
trans-unit.target: “No, you don't. Please stop wasting my time.”

trans-unit.source: “There's been talk of valuable mineral clusters nearby. We'd like you to see if there's any truth to the rumors.”
trans-unit.target: “There's been talk of valuable mineral clusters nearby. We'd like you to see if there's any truth to the rumors.”

trans-unit.source: “A couple of divers stumbled upon a mudraptor nest full of eggs in a nearby cave. We obviously don't want a swarm of raptors in our backyard, so if you can get rid of those eggs we'd happily pay you.”
trans-unit.target: “A couple of divers stumbled upon a mudraptor nest full of eggs in a nearby cave. We obviously don't want a swarm of raptors in our backyard, so if you can get rid of those eggs we'd happily pay you.”

trans-unit.source: “A couple of divers discovered a bunch of crawler eggs in a nearby cave. We don't need any more crawlers near the station, so I've put a little reward aside for the crew that wipes out the nest.”
trans-unit.target: “A couple of divers discovered a bunch of crawler eggs in a nearby cave. We don't need any more crawlers near the station, so I've put a little reward aside for the crew that wipes out the nest.”

trans-unit.source: “A couple of divers discovered a thresher nest full of eggs in a nearby cave. We don't want to see those things hatching, and there's a reward in it for any crew that makes sure they won't.”
trans-unit.target: “A couple of divers discovered a thresher nest full of eggs in a nearby cave. We don't want to see those things hatching, and there's a reward in it for any crew that makes sure they won't.”

trans-unit.source: “We're conducting research into the nearby ruins, but their guardians are hindering progress. Clear them out for us, would you?”
trans-unit.target: “We're conducting research into the nearby ruins, but their guardians are hindering progress. Clear them out for us, would you?”

trans-unit.source: “A request from the science wing. A nearby ruin needs to be mapped. For a reward, of course.”
trans-unit.target: “A request from the science wing. A nearby ruin needs to be mapped. For a reward, of course.”

trans-unit.source: “We could use a hand getting one of our beacon stations back online and transmitting so we can start building a new outpost out there. There's some marks in it for you and your crew if you can set it right.”
trans-unit.target: “We could use a hand getting one of our beacon stations back online and transmitting so we can start building a new outpost out there. There's some marks in it for you and your crew if you can set it right.”

trans-unit.source: “A highly esteemed medical expert and their armed escort are looking for transportation to a nearby station. Their safety is of utmost importance.”
trans-unit.target: “A highly esteemed medical expert and their armed escort are looking for transportation to a nearby station. Their safety is of utmost importance.”

trans-unit.source: “A rogue vessel has been preying on our cargo shipments. Eliminate its crew, and we will show our graditude. Take care though, the ship is heavily armed.”
trans-unit.target: “A rogue vessel has been preying on our cargo shipments. Eliminate its crew, and we will show our graditude. Take care though, the ship is heavily armed.”

trans-unit.source: “We believe that Separatist terrorists have snuck among the innocent civilians looking to leave on the next transport ship. If you're willing to have your ship act as that transport, you might be able to draw the terrorists out into the open and detain them. Just make sure the civilians survive.”
trans-unit.target: “We believe that Separatist terrorists have snuck among the innocent civilians looking to leave on the next transport ship. If you're willing to have your ship act as that transport, you might be able to draw the terrorists out into the open and detain them. Just make sure the civilians survive.”

trans-unit.source: “We have a few prisoners that need to be transferred to a prison on another station. You'll be paid well for their transportation, but be aware that they need to be closely guarded.”
trans-unit.target: “We have a few prisoners that need to be transferred to a prison on another station. You'll be paid well for their transportation, but be aware that they need to be closely guarded.”

trans-unit.source: “Some of the commoners here are looking for safe passage to a nearby station. Escort them over there safely and you'll be paid.”
trans-unit.target: “Some of the commoners here are looking for safe passage to a nearby station. Escort them over there safely and you'll be paid.”

trans-unit.source: “Looking for work? We've got some…let's say, research materials that are sorely needed in the neighboring outpost. Get them there, don't ask questions, and we'll pay you.”
trans-unit.target: “Looking for work? We've got some…let's say, research materials that are sorely needed in the neighboring outpost. Get them there, don't ask questions, and we'll pay you.”

trans-unit.source: “I've heard a lot about your crew's recent endeavours, and I must say the Coalition appreciates the work you're doing. Not every sub is allowed to pass through this outpost to the deeper regions, but you and your crew are more than welcome to pass.”
trans-unit.target: “I've heard a lot about your crew's recent endeavours, and I must say the Coalition appreciates the work you're doing. Not every sub is allowed to pass through this outpost to the deeper regions, but you and your crew are more than welcome to pass.”

trans-unit.source: “Looking to pass through the outpost to the deeper regions? The Coalition won't grant a novice crew passage there, and judging by your reputation, you're definitely not someone I'd let pass. Of course if you happened to have 5,000 marks to share with me, my opinion of you would almost certainly improve...”
trans-unit.target: “Looking to pass through the outpost to the deeper regions? The Coalition won't grant a novice crew passage there, and judging by your reputation, you're definitely not someone I'd let pass. Of course if you happened to have 5,000 marks to share with me, my opinion of you would almost certainly improve...”

trans-unit.source: “On a second thought, you seem like someone with potential, so perhaps I'll let you pass after all. Pleasure doing business with you.”
trans-unit.target: “On a second thought, you seem like someone with potential, so perhaps I'll let you pass after all. Pleasure doing business with you.”

trans-unit.source: “Your choice. Maybe it's better for you to play in the kiddie pool a little longer anyway.”
trans-unit.target: “Your choice. Maybe it's better for you to play in the kiddie pool a little longer anyway.”

trans-unit.source: “Not enough cash? Well, tough luck. Maybe you should play in the kiddie pool a little longer to prove us you have what it takes to make it out there.”
trans-unit.target: “Not enough cash? Well, tough luck. Maybe you should play in the kiddie pool a little longer to prove us you have what it takes to make it out there.”

trans-unit.source: “You've certainly kept yourself busy in the Cold Caverns. I must say the Coalition appreciates the work you've put in. As you may be aware, this is the last stop before the Europan Ridge. Not every sub is allowed to pass through this outpost to the deeper regions, but you and your crew are more than welcome to pass.”
trans-unit.target: “You've certainly kept yourself busy in the Cold Caverns. I must say the Coalition appreciates the work you've put in. As you may be aware, this is the last stop before the Europan Ridge. Not every sub is allowed to pass through this outpost to the deeper regions, but you and your crew are more than welcome to pass.”

trans-unit.source: “Looking to pass through the outpost to the deeper regions? The Coalition won't grant a novice crew passage there, and judging by your reputation, you're definitely not someone I'd let pass. Of course, if you happened to have some marks to share with me, my opinion of you would almost certainly improve.”
trans-unit.target: “Looking to pass through the outpost to the deeper regions? The Coalition won't grant a novice crew passage there, and judging by your reputation, you're definitely not someone I'd let pass. Of course, if you happened to have some marks to share with me, my opinion of you would almost certainly improve.”

trans-unit.source: “On second thought, you seem like someone with potential. Perhaps I'll let you pass after all. Pleasure doing business with you.”
trans-unit.target: “On second thought, you seem like someone with potential. Perhaps I'll let you pass after all. Pleasure doing business with you.”

trans-unit.source: “Your choice. Maybe it's better for you to play in the kiddie pool a little longer anyway.”
trans-unit.target: “Your choice. Maybe it's better for you to play in the kiddie pool a little longer anyway.”

trans-unit.source: “Not enough cash? Well, tough luck. Maybe you should play in the kiddie pool a little longer to prove to us you have what it takes to make it out there.”
trans-unit.target: “Not enough cash? Well, tough luck. Maybe you should play in the kiddie pool a little longer to prove to us you have what it takes to make it out there.”

trans-unit.source: “It says here you've been helping the effort to colonize the Ridge. For that, we've decided to grant you access to the Aphotic Plateau. Bon voyage!”
trans-unit.target: “It says here you've been helping the effort to colonize the Ridge. For that, we've decided to grant you access to the Aphotic Plateau. Bon voyage!”

trans-unit.source: “Looking to pass through to the Plateau? I don't know... I haven't seen much effort from your side to prove your loyalty to the cause. A donation would go a long way.”
trans-unit.target: “Looking to pass through to the Plateau? I don't know... I haven't seen much effort from your side to prove your loyalty to the cause. A donation would go a long way.”

trans-unit.source: “Ah yes, that will work. You shall now pass.”
trans-unit.target: “Ah yes, that will work. You shall now pass.”

trans-unit.source: “Oh? You're welcome to stay in the Europan Ridge for as long as you want, in that case.”
trans-unit.target: “Oh? You're welcome to stay in the Europan Ridge for as long as you want, in that case.”

trans-unit.source: “I'm sorry. I can't accept anything less than four thousand marks. Maybe you should salvage a couple more wrecks. Or whatever it is you do.”
trans-unit.target: “I'm sorry. I can't accept anything less than four thousand marks. Maybe you should salvage a couple more wrecks. Or whatever it is you do.”

trans-unit.source: “I'll have to congratulate you. Not many make it through the Plateau, much less while being so useful. I'll radio ahead to let you move to the Great Sea.”
trans-unit.target: “I'll have to congratulate you. Not many make it through the Plateau, much less while being so useful. I'll radio ahead to let you move to the Great Sea.”

trans-unit.source: “I'm sorry, I know you've made it this far, but we can't take the risk to let an unknown crew to wander around the Great Sea. For your protection, you understand.”
trans-unit.target: “I'm sorry, I know you've made it this far, but we can't take the risk to let an unknown crew to wander around the Great Sea. For your protection, you understand.”

trans-unit.source: “I'm sure it will. That is not an official guarantee by the Coalition nor an endorsement. I'll let the guard know you can take care of yourself.”
trans-unit.target: “I'm sure it will. That is not an official guarantee by the Coalition nor an endorsement. I'll let the guard know you can take care of yourself.”

trans-unit.source: “I'm sure you'll find a nice duplex to live out your retirement. The radiation shouldn't reach here for a few days at least.”
trans-unit.target: “I'm sure you'll find a nice duplex to live out your retirement. The radiation shouldn't reach here for a few days at least.”

trans-unit.source: “So you want to enter the Hydrothermal Wastes? Why on Europa would you do such a thing? I suppose it's none of my business. A friend of the Coalition is a friend of mine. Go ahead.”
trans-unit.target: “So you want to enter the Hydrothermal Wastes? Why on Europa would you do such a thing? I suppose it's none of my business. A friend of the Coalition is a friend of mine. Go ahead.”

trans-unit.source: “Do you have clearance to enter the Hydrothermal Wastes? Didn't think so. As luck would have it, we're having a clearance sale right now, if you know what I mean.”
trans-unit.target: “Do you have clearance to enter the Hydrothermal Wastes? Didn't think so. As luck would have it, we're having a clearance sale right now, if you know what I mean.”

trans-unit.source: “8,000 will convince me. No less. Come back when you have it.”
trans-unit.target: “8,000 will convince me. No less. Come back when you have it.”

trans-unit.source: “16,000? What a steal! Here you go.”
trans-unit.target: “16,000? What a steal! Here you go.”

trans-unit.source: “This isn't enough. I can't go below 16,000. Come back when you have it.”
trans-unit.target: “This isn't enough. I can't go below 16,000. Come back when you have it.”

trans-unit.source: “I heard one of your crewmates has developed a rather unusual condition as of late, something we usually refer to as the 'Reaper's Tax.' If they're interested, I could take a shot at treating them.”
trans-unit.target: “I heard one of your crewmates has developed a rather unusual condition as of late, something we usually refer to as the 'Reaper's Tax.' If they're interested, I could take a shot at treating them.”

trans-unit.source: “Oh, I see you're the unfortunate sailor in question! I could rid you of the condition for a measly sum of say, 1,000 marks. How's that sound?”
trans-unit.target: “Oh, I see you're the unfortunate sailor in question! I could rid you of the condition for a measly sum of say, 1,000 marks. How's that sound?”

trans-unit.source: Not enough money? Tough luck, this ain't a charity.
trans-unit.target: Not enough money? Tough luck, this ain't a charity.

trans-unit.source: Hmm. This box wasn't here before.
trans-unit.target: Hmm. This box wasn't here before.

trans-unit.source: It is a regular storage crate found all over Europa, identical to the ones you receive your supplies in. You bend down and try to open it. However, as you start lifting the lid, something slams it back down.
trans-unit.target: It is a regular storage crate found all over Europa, identical to the ones you receive your supplies in. You bend down and try to open it. However, as you start lifting the lid, something slams it back down.

trans-unit.source: You hold your breath and put your ear next to the crate. You can hear rustling from inside.
trans-unit.target: You hold your breath and put your ear next to the crate. You can hear rustling from inside.

trans-unit.source: You successfully wrestle the lid off. To your surprise, a small crawler jumps out ready to claw your eyes out!
trans-unit.target: You successfully wrestle the lid off. To your surprise, a small crawler jumps out ready to claw your eyes out!

trans-unit.source: You successfully wrestle the lid off. Lying on top of a saline shipment is a small creature. It eyes you carefully, then crawls out of the crate and looks at you expectantly. It seems like you have made a friend.
trans-unit.target: You successfully wrestle the lid off. Lying on top of a saline shipment is a small creature. It eyes you carefully, then crawls out of the crate and looks at you expectantly. It seems like you have made a friend.

trans-unit.source: Noises are coming out of this cabinet. As you approach it, they grow quiet.
trans-unit.target: Noises are coming out of this cabinet. As you approach it, they grow quiet.

trans-unit.source: When you open the cabinet door, a harlequin in unusual garb steps out. They greet you formally and explain that they are a messenger.
trans-unit.target: When you open the cabinet door, a harlequin in unusual garb steps out. They greet you formally and explain that they are a messenger.

trans-unit.source: The jester explains that there is a sunken submarine nearby. It was carrying an item of tremendous value to the Honkmother. The messenger doesn't wait for your answer. Instead, they turn on their heels and leave you to ponder.
trans-unit.target: The jester explains that there is a sunken submarine nearby. It was carrying an item of tremendous value to the Honkmother. The messenger doesn't wait for your answer. Instead, they turn on their heels and leave you to ponder.

trans-unit.source: You carefully open the cabinet door, only to reveal a mouth-agape, wide-eyed young person hiding in it. By the looks of them, they are in their late teens.
trans-unit.target: You carefully open the cabinet door, only to reveal a mouth-agape, wide-eyed young person hiding in it. By the looks of them, they are in their late teens.

trans-unit.source: “N-nobody special, I guess,” the teen stammers.
trans-unit.target: “N-nobody special, I guess,” the teen stammers.

trans-unit.source: “Me and a couple of friends snuck on board while you were visiting [location]. I was stuffed in here by them, as a joke.” They sniff. “I guess they heard you coming and ran back into the station. I swear I didn't mean to stay here for this long.”
trans-unit.target: “Me and a couple of friends snuck on board while you were visiting [location]. I was stuffed in here by them, as a joke.” They sniff. “I guess they heard you coming and ran back into the station. I swear I didn't mean to stay here for this long.”

trans-unit.source: “What am I going to do with you?”
trans-unit.target: “What am I going to do with you?”

trans-unit.source: “W-well, I'd like to go back home. If you don't want to go back, I guess I can hop onto a shuttle on the next station.”
trans-unit.target: “W-well, I'd like to go back home. If you don't want to go back, I guess I can hop onto a shuttle on the next station.”

trans-unit.source: The teen climbs out of the cabinet. “Thanks. I'll stay out of trouble, I promise.”
trans-unit.target: The teen climbs out of the cabinet. “Thanks. I'll stay out of trouble, I promise.”

trans-unit.source: “You'll get off at the next stop.”
trans-unit.target: “You'll get off at the next stop.”

trans-unit.source: “Come out. You're working for me now.”
trans-unit.target: “Come out. You're working for me now.”

trans-unit.source: “Are you serious?” the teen whines. Yes, you are. That'll teach them to sneak on board strange vessels.
trans-unit.target: “Are you serious?” the teen whines. Yes, you are. That'll teach them to sneak on board strange vessels.

trans-unit.source: A radio is blaring nearby. A man with a raspy voice is yelling about something.
trans-unit.target: A radio is blaring nearby. A man with a raspy voice is yelling about something.

trans-unit.source: “Well we've all heard about this nonsense about so-called clown brutality. As if for some reason clowns are being sought out and roughed up because of how they look. Let me tell you, it's got nothing to do with the color of their makeup and everything to do with how they choose to carry themselves!”
trans-unit.target: “Well we've all heard about this nonsense about so-called clown brutality. As if for some reason clowns are being sought out and roughed up because of how they look. Let me tell you, it's got nothing to do with the color of their makeup and everything to do with how they choose to carry themselves!”

trans-unit.source: In fact, in this latest incident, I can only imagine how it would have unfolded if the jester in question had been wearing a suit and a tie instead of oversized shoes and a ridiculous wig! And instead of running away, they could've gone 'Yes, sir,' 'No, sir,' and they'd be on their merry way right now! But no. The take-away here, dear listeners, is: Clown around and your brains will end up all over the walls.”
trans-unit.target: In fact, in this latest incident, I can only imagine how it would have unfolded if the jester in question had been wearing a suit and a tie instead of oversized shoes and a ridiculous wig! And instead of running away, they could've gone 'Yes, sir,' 'No, sir,' and they'd be on their merry way right now! But no. The take-away here, dear listeners, is: Clown around and your brains will end up all over the walls.”

trans-unit.source: “And that's all the time we have for now. Remember, listen and obey. Maurice! Hold the cards up! Maur— No! What does that even mean?” The person in the booth sounds very irate. “Maurice, I swear to— What do I even pay you for?” The broadcast suddenly stops and is replaced by static.
trans-unit.target: “And that's all the time we have for now. Remember, listen and obey. Maurice! Hold the cards up! Maur— No! What does that even mean?” The person in the booth sounds very irate. “Maurice, I swear to— What do I even pay you for?” The broadcast suddenly stops and is replaced by static.

trans-unit.source: “Recreational drug use is on the rise, people. Have you heard about “Cult of the Husk”? A bunch of weirdos abusing biohazardous materials? And the establishment does nothing about it!”
trans-unit.target: “Recreational drug use is on the rise, people. Have you heard about “Cult of the Husk”? A bunch of weirdos abusing biohazardous materials? And the establishment does nothing about it!”

trans-unit.source: “And don't get me started on casual opioid use that's rampant everywhere! According to trusted sources, the Coalition is putting something in them, making them addicting! Before too long, it'll be your children, squatting away in abandoned outposts, wearing dirty robes, doing whatever substances they can get their grubby hands on.”
trans-unit.target: “And don't get me started on casual opioid use that's rampant everywhere! According to trusted sources, the Coalition is putting something in them, making them addicting! Before too long, it'll be your children, squatting away in abandoned outposts, wearing dirty robes, doing whatever substances they can get their grubby hands on.”

trans-unit.source: “Dear listeners, if I was the Coalition president, I would walk right into the crew quarters, set up my little podium and say, 'Listen, citizens, if you vote against military spending and a separatist army marches in and blows you up, we're not going to do anything about it.'”
trans-unit.target: “Dear listeners, if I was the Coalition president, I would walk right into the crew quarters, set up my little podium and say, 'Listen, citizens, if you vote against military spending and a separatist army marches in and blows you up, we're not going to do anything about it.'”

trans-unit.source: “You want to cry about your ruined little station? Give us your money next time! Anyway, that's what I would say, if I was the president.”
trans-unit.target: “You want to cry about your ruined little station? Give us your money next time! Anyway, that's what I would say, if I was the president.”

trans-unit.source: “What a bunch of bullshit. Don't believe everything you hear on the radio.”
trans-unit.target: “What a bunch of bullshit. Don't believe everything you hear on the radio.”

trans-unit.source: “It's some weird hermit who's built a makeshift radio station somewhere. Nobody knows where, otherwise somebody would have put a stop to it already. The guy gets on everybody's nerves.”
trans-unit.target: “It's some weird hermit who's built a makeshift radio station somewhere. Nobody knows where, otherwise somebody would have put a stop to it already. The guy gets on everybody's nerves.”

trans-unit.source: Take a look at the ID card.
trans-unit.target: Take a look at the ID card.

trans-unit.source: (The ID card belongs to one Jacov Subra. Where have I heard that name before? Oh well.)
trans-unit.target: (The ID card belongs to one Jacov Subra. Where have I heard that name before? Oh well.)

trans-unit.source: A worker, presumably on break, is reading the paper. “Hey, you hear about that Subra guy?”
trans-unit.target: A worker, presumably on break, is reading the paper. “Hey, you hear about that Subra guy?”

trans-unit.source: “Jacov Subra. He's a weird guy who put together these—how should I put it—'themed' festivals.” The person rolls their eyes. “Full of husks. Multiple fatalities. He had a high profile trial a while back. You might have read about it on the Europan. Anyway.”
trans-unit.target: “Jacov Subra. He's a weird guy who put together these—how should I put it—'themed' festivals.” The person rolls their eyes. “Full of husks. Multiple fatalities. He had a high profile trial a while back. You might have read about it on the Europan. Anyway.”

trans-unit.source: “They caught him here a week ago. From what I heard, he had held another disastrous festival nearby, and was sent to the mines.”
trans-unit.target: “They caught him here a week ago. From what I heard, he had held another disastrous festival nearby, and was sent to the mines.”

trans-unit.source: “Good news, until he slipped away again.” A tone signals that the break is over. The worker puts the paper away and starts toward the dock. “I hear they put up a reward for whoever brings him to custody,” they yell over their shoulder.
trans-unit.target: “Good news, until he slipped away again.” A tone signals that the break is over. The worker puts the paper away and starts toward the dock. “I hear they put up a reward for whoever brings him to custody,” they yell over their shoulder.

trans-unit.source: “Welcome to the annual 'Church of the Mollusc' festival! Featuring: Sonata Aquatica, Jethro Hull, Irma-Donna, Draft Bunk and many more! With a special appearance by Sacov Jubra!” The word “mollusc” is written on top of a scribbled out “husk.” Seems like the festival is being held nearby. A passerby exclaims: “Draft Bunk is playing! Sweet!”
trans-unit.target: “Welcome to the annual 'Church of the Mollusc' festival! Featuring: Sonata Aquatica, Jethro Hull, Irma-Donna, Draft Bunk and many more! With a special appearance by Sacov Jubra!” The word “mollusc” is written on top of a scribbled out “husk.” Seems like the festival is being held nearby. A passerby exclaims: “Draft Bunk is playing! Sweet!”

trans-unit.source: “Give up, Jacov! You're coming with me!”
trans-unit.target: “Give up, Jacov! You're coming with me!”

trans-unit.source: “I'm not going anywhere! I'm innocent! Look, I'll pay you!”
trans-unit.target: “I'm not going anywhere! I'm innocent! Look, I'll pay you!”

trans-unit.source: “Been there, done that.” Jacov smiles devilishly. “What makes you think I won't run away again?”
trans-unit.target: “Been there, done that.” Jacov smiles devilishly. “What makes you think I won't run away again?”

trans-unit.source: “I can see your heart isn't in this. I'll give you three thousand marks and you let me walk out of here. Deal?”
trans-unit.target: “I can see your heart isn't in this. I'll give you three thousand marks and you let me walk out of here. Deal?”

trans-unit.source: “Here's the money. We never saw each other.”
trans-unit.target: “Here's the money. We never saw each other.”

trans-unit.source: As soon as the words leave your lips, Jacov hurls a fistful of coins at your head and turns to run away.
trans-unit.target: As soon as the words leave your lips, Jacov hurls a fistful of coins at your head and turns to run away.

trans-unit.source: “Maybe I'll put a bullet in your leg.”
trans-unit.target: “Maybe I'll put a bullet in your leg.”

trans-unit.source: Jacov is sweating profusely. “Surely you wouldn't shoot an unarmed man?”
trans-unit.target: Jacov is sweating profusely. “Surely you wouldn't shoot an unarmed man?”

trans-unit.source: “Three thousand for you and we part as friends, right here.”
trans-unit.target: “Three thousand for you and we part as friends, right here.”

trans-unit.source: The station manager looks at you with haggard eyes. “You're one of the new arrivals? Man, am I glad to see a non-masked face.”
trans-unit.target: The station manager looks at you with haggard eyes. “You're one of the new arrivals? Man, am I glad to see a non-masked face.”

trans-unit.source: “Now that you mention it, there are a lot of masks around.”
trans-unit.target: “Now that you mention it, there are a lot of masks around.”

trans-unit.source: “A bunch of clowns. Let me ask you, you ever wake up in the middle of the night to a sound of bike horns? They don't even attempt any kind of melody, just honking away all willy-nilly. I haven't had a full night's sleep in...days?” They stare blankly into space. “Weeks?”
trans-unit.target: “A bunch of clowns. Let me ask you, you ever wake up in the middle of the night to a sound of bike horns? They don't even attempt any kind of melody, just honking away all willy-nilly. I haven't had a full night's sleep in...days?” They stare blankly into space. “Weeks?”

trans-unit.source: “Who knows? I've tried talking to them, offering money, threatening to kick them out, you name it, I've tried it. I think they're content with torturing me and the rest of the crew.”
trans-unit.target: “Who knows? I've tried talking to them, offering money, threatening to kick them out, you name it, I've tried it. I think they're content with torturing me and the rest of the crew.”

trans-unit.source: “The manager scoffs. “Tell you what. You get them to leave, there's a...” Their eyes narrow as they study you. “Thousand marks for you. One more thing. No physical violence. While I personally wouldn't shed any tears for roughed up clowns, we have rules here we adhere to.”
trans-unit.target: “The manager scoffs. “Tell you what. You get them to leave, there's a...” Their eyes narrow as they study you. “Thousand marks for you. One more thing. No physical violence. While I personally wouldn't shed any tears for roughed up clowns, we have rules here we adhere to.”

trans-unit.source: You approach a clown. They stare at you.
trans-unit.target: You approach a clown. They stare at you.

trans-unit.source: You stare the clown down for a minute. They try to grab your nose but you slap their arm away. You point to the direction of the airlock. With slumped shoulders, the clown shuffles away, their friends in tow.
trans-unit.target: You stare the clown down for a minute. They try to grab your nose but you slap their arm away. You point to the direction of the airlock. With slumped shoulders, the clown shuffles away, their friends in tow.

trans-unit.source: It's suddenly very quiet. You report your success to the manager on the radio and one thousand marks are deposited to your account.
trans-unit.target: It's suddenly very quiet. You report your success to the manager on the radio and one thousand marks are deposited to your account.

trans-unit.source: You strain to flex your biceps. For some reason this only succeeds in making the clown laugh in your face and continue their merriments.
trans-unit.target: You strain to flex your biceps. For some reason this only succeeds in making the clown laugh in your face and continue their merriments.

trans-unit.source: You have missed your chance at making an impactful impression and dejectedly report failure to the station manager.
trans-unit.target: You have missed your chance at making an impactful impression and dejectedly report failure to the station manager.

trans-unit.source: You try to reason with the clowns, explaining that their behaviour is disrupting the lives of the crew here and frankly, quite unacceptable. Your words fall to deaf ears.
trans-unit.target: You try to reason with the clowns, explaining that their behaviour is disrupting the lives of the crew here and frankly, quite unacceptable. Your words fall to deaf ears.

trans-unit.source: A sound of shattering glass makes you jump. Someone is slouched against the wall, shards of glass at her feet. By the looks of it, it might have been a bottle of rum she was holding. She's muttering under her breath.
trans-unit.target: A sound of shattering glass makes you jump. Someone is slouched against the wall, shards of glass at her feet. By the looks of it, it might have been a bottle of rum she was holding. She's muttering under her breath.

trans-unit.source: No response. You notice she's repeating the same thing over and over. “Bad vibrations, man. Bad vibes.” Drool is slowly dripping from the corner of her mouth onto her jacket.
trans-unit.target: No response. You notice she's repeating the same thing over and over. “Bad vibrations, man. Bad vibes.” Drool is slowly dripping from the corner of her mouth onto her jacket.

trans-unit.source: You're wondering about the person's mental health, when they unexpectedly swing around and grab you by the collar. “Bad vibrations, do you hear me?” A sudden realization dawns on her when she recognizes you as a member of a submarine crew. “You can help me,” she pleads. “We found a relic. Turned it on. In the structure. Deep.” She lets up her grasp on you for a second.
trans-unit.target: You're wondering about the person's mental health, when they unexpectedly swing around and grab you by the collar. “Bad vibrations, do you hear me?” A sudden realization dawns on her when she recognizes you as a member of a submarine crew. “You can help me,” she pleads. “We found a relic. Turned it on. In the structure. Deep.” She lets up her grasp on you for a second.

trans-unit.source: The madness seems to have found it's way back to cloud her mind. “I was first! I know! I got the trophy!”
trans-unit.target: The madness seems to have found it's way back to cloud her mind. “I was first! I know! I got the trophy!”

trans-unit.source: You wonder what the person is raving about. A relic inside a structure? Something in the ruins? You make a note to check it out if you have time.
trans-unit.target: You wonder what the person is raving about. A relic inside a structure? Something in the ruins? You make a note to check it out if you have time.

trans-unit.source: Touching the artifact's etched surface causes an almost imperceptible itch inside your head.
trans-unit.target: Touching the artifact's etched surface causes an almost imperceptible itch inside your head.

trans-unit.source: For some reason, you find it very difficult to drop the item, and it remains in your hands. The itch builds up into a slight vibrating feeling in your skull.
trans-unit.target: For some reason, you find it very difficult to drop the item, and it remains in your hands. The itch builds up into a slight vibrating feeling in your skull.

trans-unit.source: It's as if you've forgotten how to move your arms. Your head feels uncomfortably warm and numb. It's getting more and more challenging to keep your focus on anything.
trans-unit.target: It's as if you've forgotten how to move your arms. Your head feels uncomfortably warm and numb. It's getting more and more challenging to keep your focus on anything.

trans-unit.source: You close your eyes. This seems like as good a place as any to have a nap. Jupiter knows you've earned one. You let yourself fall back into a dreamless sleep.
trans-unit.target: You close your eyes. This seems like as good a place as any to have a nap. Jupiter knows you've earned one. You let yourself fall back into a dreamless sleep.

trans-unit.source: As you run your hands across the item's surface, you hit a protrusion. At once, the numbness inside subsides and you are again fully aware of your surroundings. Time to get this artifact somewhere it can be kept safe.
trans-unit.target: As you run your hands across the item's surface, you hit a protrusion. At once, the numbness inside subsides and you are again fully aware of your surroundings. Time to get this artifact somewhere it can be kept safe.

trans-unit.source: Somebody is trying to get your attention. “Hey! I've been looking for you.” She looks vaguely familiar. “You don't remember me, do you?”
trans-unit.target: Somebody is trying to get your attention. “Hey! I've been looking for you.” She looks vaguely familiar. “You don't remember me, do you?”

trans-unit.source: “Oh yeah, you're the one with the, uh, vibrations.”
trans-unit.target: “Oh yeah, you're the one with the, uh, vibrations.”

trans-unit.source: “So, I got better. Suppose that is because you turned the thing off?” She crosses her arms. “Wanted to come say thanks.”
trans-unit.target: “So, I got better. Suppose that is because you turned the thing off?” She crosses her arms. “Wanted to come say thanks.”

trans-unit.source: “There's another thing. Because I was...unwell, I got booted from the crew I was with back then. I was thinking I could join up with you guys? I'm pretty handy with all things mechanical or electrical.” She looks strong and capable now that she's not being hindered by an external influence.
trans-unit.target: “There's another thing. Because I was...unwell, I got booted from the crew I was with back then. I was thinking I could join up with you guys? I'm pretty handy with all things mechanical or electrical.” She looks strong and capable now that she's not being hindered by an external influence.

trans-unit.source: “Well, I guess I'll hang out here 'til I find something.”
trans-unit.target: “Well, I guess I'll hang out here 'til I find something.”

trans-unit.source: “Oh. Uh, I can scrounge up a few hundred marks if you like. I'll send 'em to you as soon as possible.”
trans-unit.target: “Oh. Uh, I can scrounge up a few hundred marks if you like. I'll send 'em to you as soon as possible.”

trans-unit.source: “Huh?” She looks confused and mildly annoyed. “No, you're mistaking me with someone else. I ran into you earlier when I was still having...trouble with a certain relic. You know, with the 'bad vibes' and all.”
trans-unit.target: “Huh?” She looks confused and mildly annoyed. “No, you're mistaking me with someone else. I ran into you earlier when I was still having...trouble with a certain relic. You know, with the 'bad vibes' and all.”

trans-unit.source: A distressed looking person is pacing in circles in the hall. When they see you, their eyes light up. “You're from that sub that just docked, aren't you? Do you take passengers?”
trans-unit.target: A distressed looking person is pacing in circles in the hall. When they see you, their eyes light up. “You're from that sub that just docked, aren't you? Do you take passengers?”

trans-unit.source: “I am indeed. What type of passengers?”
trans-unit.target: “I am indeed. What type of passengers?”

trans-unit.source: “Just me and Rex. We're supposed to visit nana in the next town over, but for some reason nobody wants us on board.” The person can't keep eye contact for more than a second and keeps glancing over their shoulder.
trans-unit.target: “Just me and Rex. We're supposed to visit nana in the next town over, but for some reason nobody wants us on board.” The person can't keep eye contact for more than a second and keeps glancing over their shoulder.

trans-unit.source: There are always vessels traveling these waters, eager to make some extra moolah by taking on passengers. You open your mouth, trying to voice your suspicions about the situation. “Wh—” you start, but the person interrupts you. “I'll pay you three thousand. One when we leave, two when we get there.”
trans-unit.target: There are always vessels traveling these waters, eager to make some extra moolah by taking on passengers. You open your mouth, trying to voice your suspicions about the situation. “Wh—” you start, but the person interrupts you. “I'll pay you three thousand. One when we leave, two when we get there.”

trans-unit.source: “Great!” they exclaim. “I'll get Rex and we'll meet you on board!” What a happy fellow. Hopefully their money is good.
trans-unit.target: “Great!” they exclaim. “I'll get Rex and we'll meet you on board!” What a happy fellow. Hopefully their money is good.

trans-unit.source: You're inspecting the sub when the person you talked to at the station peeks out from a cabin, with a wide smile on their face. “You ready to meet Rex?” Before you can utter a response, the biggest mudraptor you've ever seen jumps out behind them.
trans-unit.target: You're inspecting the sub when the person you talked to at the station peeks out from a cabin, with a wide smile on their face. “You ready to meet Rex?” Before you can utter a response, the biggest mudraptor you've ever seen jumps out behind them.

trans-unit.source: You yell out and reach for a weapon, but the creature only tilts its head and looks at you quizzically. “Isn't he a cutie?” This is Rex? They brought a mudraptor on board? “Be careful, though. Rex gets ornery on long trips. Don't you, boy? Yes you do!” Great.
trans-unit.target: You yell out and reach for a weapon, but the creature only tilts its head and looks at you quizzically. “Isn't he a cutie?” This is Rex? They brought a mudraptor on board? “Be careful, though. Rex gets ornery on long trips. Don't you, boy? Yes you do!” Great.

trans-unit.source: Rex is pacing back and forth.
trans-unit.target: Rex is pacing back and forth.

trans-unit.source: As you approach, this bandit throws down their weapon. “Ah fuck it, I give up. Don't shoot!”
trans-unit.target: As you approach, this bandit throws down their weapon. “Ah fuck it, I give up. Don't shoot!”

trans-unit.source: “Too late for that. Say your prayers.”
trans-unit.target: “Too late for that. Say your prayers.”

trans-unit.source: The bandit reaches for their weapon on the ground. “Do your worst!”
trans-unit.target: The bandit reaches for their weapon on the ground. “Do your worst!”

trans-unit.source: “Thanks for not offing me, I guess.” The bandit squats down and wipes sweat off his brow. “I've never fired that, you know,” he says, pointing to the gun on the floor. “Not cut out for this shit.”
trans-unit.target: “Thanks for not offing me, I guess.” The bandit squats down and wipes sweat off his brow. “I've never fired that, you know,” he says, pointing to the gun on the floor. “Not cut out for this shit.”

trans-unit.source: “Wait!” The bandit cries out and jumps to their feet. “Can I come with you? I know a lot about chemistry. I could cook you meds!”
trans-unit.target: “Wait!” The bandit cries out and jumps to their feet. “Can I come with you? I know a lot about chemistry. I could cook you meds!”

trans-unit.source: “All right! We can sort out a signing bonus later.”
trans-unit.target: “All right! We can sort out a signing bonus later.”

trans-unit.source: “Well what am I gonna do then? Wait 'till another sub comes through guns blazing?”
trans-unit.target: “Well what am I gonna do then? Wait 'till another sub comes through guns blazing?”

trans-unit.source: “I was captured along with the rest of my crew and sub. They're all gone now.” They scowl. “Eaten. They were used as bait for the crawlers that used to inhabit this place. I was spared because I know how to make morphine and fent.”
trans-unit.target: “I was captured along with the rest of my crew and sub. They're all gone now.” They scowl. “Eaten. They were used as bait for the crawlers that used to inhabit this place. I was spared because I know how to make morphine and fent.”

trans-unit.source: “Give me a break. Like you haven't done any opiates yourself? The way I see it I provided a service and, in return, nobody pointed a gun my way.” A dry smile creeps on their face. “Until you, that is.”
trans-unit.target: “Give me a break. Like you haven't done any opiates yourself? The way I see it I provided a service and, in return, nobody pointed a gun my way.” A dry smile creeps on their face. “Until you, that is.”

trans-unit.source: The guard takes a long look at you. “Never mind. I thought you looked like someone else. You're free to go.”
trans-unit.target: The guard takes a long look at you. “Never mind. I thought you looked like someone else. You're free to go.”

trans-unit.source: “Just be careful,” the guard cautions. “We received a bomb threat a few hours ago, by some usual suspects. It's been a while and no bomb has been found, but we advise caution.”
trans-unit.target: “Just be careful,” the guard cautions. “We received a bomb threat a few hours ago, by some usual suspects. It's been a while and no bomb has been found, but we advise caution.”

trans-unit.source: The guard lowers their voice. “Look, you better stay clear of this separatist business. There have been some serious attacks lately. Just come to me if you see something suspicious.”
trans-unit.target: The guard lowers their voice. “Look, you better stay clear of this separatist business. There have been some serious attacks lately. Just come to me if you see something suspicious.”

trans-unit.source: You thrust the bomb to the arms of the guard, who flinches a bit. You recount your experience and the guard thanks you for finding the bomb and gives you a small reward for dismantling it.
trans-unit.target: You thrust the bomb to the arms of the guard, who flinches a bit. You recount your experience and the guard thanks you for finding the bomb and gives you a small reward for dismantling it.
