trans-unit.source: You report finding a bomb in the hallway and the guard immediately springs to action. They thank you for finding and reporting the bomb.
trans-unit.target: You report finding a bomb in the hallway and the guard immediately springs to action. They thank you for finding and reporting the bomb.

trans-unit.source: You see a person crouched next to a vending machine, assembling or fixing something.
trans-unit.target: You see a person crouched next to a vending machine, assembling or fixing something.

trans-unit.source: Find out what they're working on.
trans-unit.target: Find out what they're working on.

trans-unit.source: You sneak behind the person and crane your neck. It seems they're fiddling with some kind of a device with lots of wires. They glance back and jump up when they see you. “Shit! Don't just stand there!”
trans-unit.target: You sneak behind the person and crane your neck. It seems they're fiddling with some kind of a device with lots of wires. They glance back and jump up when they see you. “Shit! Don't just stand there!”

trans-unit.source: “It's all right, I guess.” They check their pulse and exhale deeply. “I've been a wreck ever since my medication was pulled. Couldn't afford it, they said. Then they went ahead and installed these fuckin' things.” Irate, the dweller kicks the vending machine.
trans-unit.target: “It's all right, I guess.” They check their pulse and exhale deeply. “I've been a wreck ever since my medication was pulled. Couldn't afford it, they said. Then they went ahead and installed these fuckin' things.” Irate, the dweller kicks the vending machine.

trans-unit.source: “I, uh...” Their eyes dart around, looking for something. “I'm building a, um...” They're sweating profusely.
trans-unit.target: “I, uh...” Their eyes dart around, looking for something. “I'm building a, um...” They're sweating profusely.

trans-unit.source: “SHHH! Not so loud!” they hiss. Then they continue, whispering. “Yes, it's a bomb. But it's also so much more. It's a symbol of discontent against our overlords. We must topple the monuments of oppression, like this one here.” They spit on the vending machine. “But that's hypothetical at this point, 'cause I don't actually know how to arm this symbol.”
trans-unit.target: “SHHH! Not so loud!” they hiss. Then they continue, whispering. “Yes, it's a bomb. But it's also so much more. It's a symbol of discontent against our overlords. We must topple the monuments of oppression, like this one here.” They spit on the vending machine. “But that's hypothetical at this point, 'cause I don't actually know how to arm this symbol.”

trans-unit.source: The novice terrorist scrutinizes you for a minute, then warily hands you a bunch of wires. “I think I can trust you,” they say.
trans-unit.target: The novice terrorist scrutinizes you for a minute, then warily hands you a bunch of wires. “I think I can trust you,” they say.

trans-unit.source: It's only a matter of connecting the detonator wire to get the bomb armed. You hand the bomb to the person and they give you some change and a promise to talk you up to their Separatist friends.
trans-unit.target: It's only a matter of connecting the detonator wire to get the bomb armed. You hand the bomb to the person and they give you some change and a promise to talk you up to their Separatist friends.

trans-unit.source: You pretend to arm the bomb, but instead you remove some of the wires, making sure the bomb can't go off. The person hands you some change as a reward and promises to talk you up to their Separatist friends.
trans-unit.target: You pretend to arm the bomb, but instead you remove some of the wires, making sure the bomb can't go off. The person hands you some change as a reward and promises to talk you up to their Separatist friends.

trans-unit.source: “Keep it that way. Terrorism is no way of life.”
trans-unit.target: “Keep it that way. Terrorism is no way of life.”

trans-unit.source: “Sorry to hear that. See you later.”
trans-unit.target: “Sorry to hear that. See you later.”

trans-unit.source: “Keep it that way. Terrorism is no way of life.”
trans-unit.target: “Keep it that way. Terrorism is no way of life.”

trans-unit.source: This colony is in a hurry. Lots of workers are loading supplies onto submarines. You see a pair of them arguing quietly and gesturing toward you.
trans-unit.target: This colony is in a hurry. Lots of workers are loading supplies onto submarines. You see a pair of them arguing quietly and gesturing toward you.

trans-unit.source: On your approach, the pair instantly quiets down. Up close you can see an anarchist patch on one of their jackets, revealing them to be separatists. “Didn't you help us out earlier?” the other asks.
trans-unit.target: On your approach, the pair instantly quiets down. Up close you can see an anarchist patch on one of their jackets, revealing them to be separatists. “Didn't you help us out earlier?” the other asks.

trans-unit.source: “You see all that crew running around? A lot of subs here are readying for a dive.”
trans-unit.target: “You see all that crew running around? A lot of subs here are readying for a dive.”

trans-unit.source: “Yeah, so do we. We sent one of ours to the office to find out.” The speaker shifts their weight and pauses for a bit. “They haven't come back yet, and I'm getting worried. Might've been caught doing something they shouldn't have.”
trans-unit.target: “Yeah, so do we. We sent one of ours to the office to find out.” The speaker shifts their weight and pauses for a bit. “They haven't come back yet, and I'm getting worried. Might've been caught doing something they shouldn't have.”

trans-unit.source: “Not a bad idea. Officials here don't know you yet. Just sneak in, see what you can see. Whatever it is, don't cause a scene.”
trans-unit.target: “Not a bad idea. Officials here don't know you yet. Just sneak in, see what you can see. Whatever it is, don't cause a scene.”

trans-unit.source: “Oh, and if our guy ask you if you've had Versas liver, the answer is 'It's to die for.'”
trans-unit.target: “Oh, and if our guy ask you if you've had Versas liver, the answer is 'It's to die for.'”

trans-unit.source: The person is semi-delirious, but they manage to mutter a question: “You ever...ever had V-versas liver?”
trans-unit.target: The person is semi-delirious, but they manage to mutter a question: “You ever...ever had V-versas liver?”

trans-unit.source: “S-shame. I hear it's to die for.” They chuckle to themselves. “You better leave before s-security comes back. If you could let somebody know I'm in here, it'd be s-swell.”
trans-unit.target: “S-shame. I hear it's to die for.” They chuckle to themselves. “You better leave before s-security comes back. If you could let somebody know I'm in here, it'd be s-swell.”

trans-unit.source: You inform the separatists of the location of their agent. They thank you for your help and set out to rescue their comrade.
trans-unit.target: You inform the separatists of the location of their agent. They thank you for your help and set out to rescue their comrade.

trans-unit.source: “Take th-the scrap of paper from my pocket. M-make s-sure it makes it to safe hands. I better stay here or the pigs smell something's going on.” You take the paper and stuff it in your pocket.
trans-unit.target: “Take th-the scrap of paper from my pocket. M-make s-sure it makes it to safe hands. I better stay here or the pigs smell something's going on.” You take the paper and stuff it in your pocket.

trans-unit.source: You hand the intel to the separatist. “Damn. This isn't much to go on. The only thing this proves is that the Coalition has started mobilizing en masse and they're searching for something. I could've told you that by just looking around. Thanks for your help anyway. If you'll excuse me, we have a rescue mission to undertake.”
trans-unit.target: You hand the intel to the separatist. “Damn. This isn't much to go on. The only thing this proves is that the Coalition has started mobilizing en masse and they're searching for something. I could've told you that by just looking around. Thanks for your help anyway. If you'll excuse me, we have a rescue mission to undertake.”

trans-unit.source: “Hey, psst!” You hear a sharp whisper from behind. A person in a clown costume is trying to get your attention.
trans-unit.target: “Hey, psst!” You hear a sharp whisper from behind. A person in a clown costume is trying to get your attention.

trans-unit.source: Listen to what they have to say.
trans-unit.target: Listen to what they have to say.

trans-unit.source: They seem grateful that you're willing to hear them out, but under all that white makeup, you can't be sure. The person is really fidgety and every time they shift, their shoes squeak loudly.
trans-unit.target: They seem grateful that you're willing to hear them out, but under all that white makeup, you can't be sure. The person is really fidgety and every time they shift, their shoes squeak loudly.

trans-unit.source: You manage to gather that a shipment of important materials has been falsely impounded from this clown person's vessel and they're asking for help getting it back.
trans-unit.target: You manage to gather that a shipment of important materials has been falsely impounded from this clown person's vessel and they're asking for help getting it back.

trans-unit.source: The jester is overjoyed. The box has been taken to the manager's office. They toot a horn as you turn to leave. Weird.
trans-unit.target: The jester is overjoyed. The box has been taken to the manager's office. They toot a horn as you turn to leave. Weird.

trans-unit.source: There is a box of supplies here, labeled “Confiscated.” This must be what the clown wanted. You bend down and pick up the box, then turn around to head back when you see a security guard pointing at you with a stun baton. “Where do you think you're going? That's confiscated materials you're carrying.”
trans-unit.target: There is a box of supplies here, labeled “Confiscated.” This must be what the clown wanted. You bend down and pick up the box, then turn around to head back when you see a security guard pointing at you with a stun baton. “Where do you think you're going? That's confiscated materials you're carrying.”

trans-unit.source: You explain that you're helping someone get their unlawfully confiscated cargo back. “Unlawfully? Do you realize you're carrying highly dangerous implements of terror there?” The guard carefully opens the box, revealing a bunch of red and white costumes and an assortment of bike horns.
trans-unit.target: You explain that you're helping someone get their unlawfully confiscated cargo back. “Unlawfully? Do you realize you're carrying highly dangerous implements of terror there?” The guard carefully opens the box, revealing a bunch of red and white costumes and an assortment of bike horns.

trans-unit.source: The guard takes the box from you. “Don't let me catch you trying that shit again.”
trans-unit.target: The guard takes the box from you. “Don't let me catch you trying that shit again.”

trans-unit.source: Without saying another word, you turn tail and run. The officer is stunned for a moment, then chases after you.
trans-unit.target: Without saying another word, you turn tail and run. The officer is stunned for a moment, then chases after you.

trans-unit.source: You explain that you are a new customs officer here and are transporting the box to a more secure facility.
trans-unit.target: You explain that you are a new customs officer here and are transporting the box to a more secure facility.

trans-unit.source: The guard decides it's not worth their time to fact-check what you said. They wave you to continue on.
trans-unit.target: The guard decides it's not worth their time to fact-check what you said. They wave you to continue on.

trans-unit.source: The clown is happy to see their items back and teaches you a customary clown greeting that you can use to impress other clowns.
trans-unit.target: The clown is happy to see their items back and teaches you a customary clown greeting that you can use to impress other clowns.

trans-unit.source: The guard is not convinced and takes the box from you.
trans-unit.target: The guard is not convinced and takes the box from you.

trans-unit.source: Sadly, you return to the clown empty-handed.
trans-unit.target: Sadly, you return to the clown empty-handed.

trans-unit.source:
A gaunt young man walks up to you, a bottle of liquor in hand. Despite appearances, he speaks to you in a peppy tune:

"Hey, the name's Artie Dolittle. You came here on that ship, right? You should take me with you!"
trans-unit.target:
A gaunt young man walks up to you, a bottle of liquor in hand. Despite appearances, he speaks to you in a peppy tune:

"Hey, the name's Artie Dolittle. You came here on that ship, right? You should take me with you!"

trans-unit.source: “Because I'd be a great employee! I'm good at everything and I'll even work for free! How's that sound?”
trans-unit.target: “Because I'd be a great employee! I'm good at everything and I'll even work for free! How's that sound?”

trans-unit.source: “Oh. Can't blame a guy for trying though, right?”
trans-unit.target: “Oh. Can't blame a guy for trying though, right?”

trans-unit.source: A passing scientist grabs hold of you. “It lives! Who would've thought it would ever live?” Their eyes are wide open and sporting impressive bags under them.
trans-unit.target: A passing scientist grabs hold of you. “It lives! Who would've thought it would ever live?” Their eyes are wide open and sporting impressive bags under them.

trans-unit.source: “I was too preoccupied with asking 'Can I?' instead of 'Should I?'” They pace back and forth, directing each word to a different passerby. When it becomes clear to them nobody's paying any attention besides you, they turn their attention back toward you.
trans-unit.target: “I was too preoccupied with asking 'Can I?' instead of 'Should I?'” They pace back and forth, directing each word to a different passerby. When it becomes clear to them nobody's paying any attention besides you, they turn their attention back toward you.

trans-unit.source: “Are you not listening to me?” the hysterical researcher bellows, sending drops of spittle across your face. “A human-crawler hybrid! Oh, it's beautiful! No! Hideous!” They sit down, cross-legged on the floor. “How will the scientific community remember me? As a creator? A destroyer?” they pose to no one in particular. “Dare I say...a god?”
trans-unit.target: “Are you not listening to me?” the hysterical researcher bellows, sending drops of spittle across your face. “A human-crawler hybrid! Oh, it's beautiful! No! Hideous!” They sit down, cross-legged on the floor. “How will the scientific community remember me? As a creator? A destroyer?” they pose to no one in particular. “Dare I say...a god?”

trans-unit.source: Looking at the scientist—now writhing on the floor, gibbering and laughing to themself—you are somewhat grateful that the end comes in your line of work quickly and violently, instead of a slow spiral to madness.
trans-unit.target: Looking at the scientist—now writhing on the floor, gibbering and laughing to themself—you are somewhat grateful that the end comes in your line of work quickly and violently, instead of a slow spiral to madness.

trans-unit.source: Their claims of having successfully bred a human-crawler hybrid are obviously fantastical. Although... There is a small part of you that wants to believe. Maybe you could check the lab, just in case?
trans-unit.target: Their claims of having successfully bred a human-crawler hybrid are obviously fantastical. Although... There is a small part of you that wants to believe. Maybe you could check the lab, just in case?

trans-unit.source: A crawler is sitting motionless in a tank.
trans-unit.target: A crawler is sitting motionless in a tank.

trans-unit.source: It seems to have been heavily sedated. This is not unordinary. Researchers are known to catch live specimens for research. Numerous scientific breakthroughs have been made using data received from crawlers: medical, gastronomical, psychologica— Wait. Did it just...blink?
trans-unit.target: It seems to have been heavily sedated. This is not unordinary. Researchers are known to catch live specimens for research. Numerous scientific breakthroughs have been made using data received from crawlers: medical, gastronomical, psychologica— Wait. Did it just...blink?

trans-unit.source: You tap on the glass three times and the creature opens its eyes. They are remarkably blue and fixated on you. It blinks once, twice… You can't help but feel like the creature is trying to communicate.
trans-unit.target: You tap on the glass three times and the creature opens its eyes. They are remarkably blue and fixated on you. It blinks once, twice… You can't help but feel like the creature is trying to communicate.

trans-unit.source: It is a living creature, after all. Why shouldn't it be granted clemency?
trans-unit.target: It is a living creature, after all. Why shouldn't it be granted clemency?

trans-unit.source: It takes a few swings to make a crack appear. The water crashes out along with the creature, who turns its head toward you and nods, before slithering into a vent and disappearing from view. Weird. Did it acknowledge your help, or was it simply a jerky movement on its part?
trans-unit.target: It takes a few swings to make a crack appear. The water crashes out along with the creature, who turns its head toward you and nods, before slithering into a vent and disappearing from view. Weird. Did it acknowledge your help, or was it simply a jerky movement on its part?

trans-unit.source: A glint catches your eye in the now empty, broken tank.
trans-unit.target: A glint catches your eye in the now empty, broken tank.

trans-unit.source: Among the debris, there is a small trinket with alien etchings. You take it. It's time to go before someone starts asking questions.
trans-unit.target: Among the debris, there is a small trinket with alien etchings. You take it. It's time to go before someone starts asking questions.

trans-unit.source: It's time to go before someone starts asking questions.
trans-unit.target: It's time to go before someone starts asking questions.

trans-unit.source: You decide to leave the creature in its tank.
trans-unit.target: You decide to leave the creature in its tank.

trans-unit.source: A low humming voice can be heard in the background, like an old-timey vacuum cleaner. “Basically. Though you should be careful not to overheat it.”
trans-unit.target: A low humming voice can be heard in the background, like an old-timey vacuum cleaner. “Basically. Though you should be careful not to overheat it.”

trans-unit.source: “Overheat?” The humming noise grows louder and louder, increasing in pitch.
trans-unit.target: “Overheat?” The humming noise grows louder and louder, increasing in pitch.

trans-unit.source: It looks as if a bomb had gone off inside the laboratory. Expensive instruments are strewn broken on the floor and the once-white walls are decorated with streaks of dark red and pieces of brain matter. Two smoking corpses lie on the floor, along with an alien device of some kind. Someone nearby is yelling for a security guard.
trans-unit.target: It looks as if a bomb had gone off inside the laboratory. Expensive instruments are strewn broken on the floor and the once-white walls are decorated with streaks of dark red and pieces of brain matter. Two smoking corpses lie on the floor, along with an alien device of some kind. Someone nearby is yelling for a security guard.

trans-unit.source: Examine the device before security gets here.
trans-unit.target: Examine the device before security gets here.

trans-unit.source: The device is made of black metallic material and is heavy to hold. There is a handle that your hand fits into, and a button that lies directly under your index finger.
trans-unit.target: The device is made of black metallic material and is heavy to hold. There is a handle that your hand fits into, and a button that lies directly under your index finger.

trans-unit.source: Nothing happens. It seems if this item indeed is the cause of the mess here, it has run dry of its destructive power.
trans-unit.target: Nothing happens. It seems if this item indeed is the cause of the mess here, it has run dry of its destructive power.

trans-unit.source: Look for anything else useful in the lab.
trans-unit.target: Look for anything else useful in the lab.

trans-unit.source: You find a shiny capsule that fits into a slot on the underside of the device. You hear footsteps approaching. If you want to keep the device for yourself, it's time to bounce.
trans-unit.target: You find a shiny capsule that fits into a slot on the underside of the device. You hear footsteps approaching. If you want to keep the device for yourself, it's time to bounce.

trans-unit.source: Surrender the weapon to the authorities.
trans-unit.target: Surrender the weapon to the authorities.

trans-unit.source: Security is happy to take the dangerous device off your hands. They promise to put in a good word for you in the office.
trans-unit.target: Security is happy to take the dangerous device off your hands. They promise to put in a good word for you in the office.

trans-unit.source: You find nothing. You decide to hold on to the device and leave before security gets here.
trans-unit.target: You find nothing. You decide to hold on to the device and leave before security gets here.

trans-unit.source: A man with a hard hat is nursing a drink.
trans-unit.target: A man with a hard hat is nursing a drink.

trans-unit.source: You pull a seat next to him and he acknowledges you with a nod. “Here to work?”
trans-unit.target: You pull a seat next to him and he acknowledges you with a nod. “Here to work?”

trans-unit.source: He chuckles. “Had you pegged as the type. Well, if you're thinking of heading into the mines, don't,” he says and finishes his drink in one gulp.
trans-unit.target: He chuckles. “Had you pegged as the type. Well, if you're thinking of heading into the mines, don't,” he says and finishes his drink in one gulp.

trans-unit.source: “Well,” the worker starts, is interrupted by a hiccup, and continues: “Not any miners with two brain cells to rub together, that's for sure. Not during breeding season.”
trans-unit.target: “Well,” the worker starts, is interrupted by a hiccup, and continues: “Not any miners with two brain cells to rub together, that's for sure. Not during breeding season.”

trans-unit.source: The worker grunts an affirmation. “But when the boss says 'drill' you drill, or you go without food. So I went deeper until I hit something.”
trans-unit.target: The worker grunts an affirmation. “But when the boss says 'drill' you drill, or you go without food. So I went deeper until I hit something.”

trans-unit.source: “Mudraptor eggs. Now the whole shaft is overrun with angry raptor mamas and papas.”
trans-unit.target: “Mudraptor eggs. Now the whole shaft is overrun with angry raptor mamas and papas.”

trans-unit.source: “So, is there a reward for clearing them out?”
trans-unit.target: “So, is there a reward for clearing them out?”

trans-unit.source: The man bursts into laughter. “No. What are you, some kind of a monster hunter? Rudy might've had some cash on him but he's down there.” He yelps at the bartender and motions for another beer. “Or a part of him at least.”
trans-unit.target: The man bursts into laughter. “No. What are you, some kind of a monster hunter? Rudy might've had some cash on him but he's down there.” He yelps at the bartender and motions for another beer. “Or a part of him at least.”

trans-unit.source: You excuse yourself and leave the man in peace. You wonder if you could find this Rudy's body in the mineshaft.
trans-unit.target: You excuse yourself and leave the man in peace. You wonder if you could find this Rudy's body in the mineshaft.

trans-unit.source: You find a badly mauled body clad in miner's overalls. The name tag says "Rudy."
trans-unit.target: You find a badly mauled body clad in miner's overalls. The name tag says "Rudy."

trans-unit.source: You see a man with an eyepatch and a white beard sitting at a table. Some passersby are casting nervous side-eye glances at him. “That's Hognose Huber, sea captain extraordinaire,” someone whispers.
trans-unit.target: You see a man with an eyepatch and a white beard sitting at a table. Some passersby are casting nervous side-eye glances at him. “That's Hognose Huber, sea captain extraordinaire,” someone whispers.

trans-unit.source: The man growls as you approach.
trans-unit.target: The man growls as you approach.

trans-unit.source: He hacks up something from his throat and spits it out. “Had a bit of a blockage. Help you?” Huber squints at you.
trans-unit.target: He hacks up something from his throat and spits it out. “Had a bit of a blockage. Help you?” Huber squints at you.

trans-unit.source: ”I was wondering how one gets a nickname like Hognose.”
trans-unit.target: ”I was wondering how one gets a nickname like Hognose.”

trans-unit.source: “Hognose was the name of my ship. Used to run the Hettol-Ihesas-Urghstead circuit.” He sits up, beaming with pride. “Must've had a hundred successful transports. Meds, military ordnance, submarine parts, you name it, I hauled it.”
trans-unit.target: “Hognose was the name of my ship. Used to run the Hettol-Ihesas-Urghstead circuit.” He sits up, beaming with pride. “Must've had a hundred successful transports. Meds, military ordnance, submarine parts, you name it, I hauled it.”

trans-unit.source: “What happened? It got sunk! By Moping Jack!” Hognose pounds the table with his fist, sending empty glasses flying. “Caught me totally by surprise. One hit, the engine was down. Second, the hull was breached.” He stares through you, into the distance.
trans-unit.target: “What happened? It got sunk! By Moping Jack!” Hognose pounds the table with his fist, sending empty glasses flying. “Caught me totally by surprise. One hit, the engine was down. Second, the hull was breached.” He stares through you, into the distance.

trans-unit.source: “I swam,” Hognose states matter-of-factly. “Grabbed all the O2 I could and hopped on a scooter. Had to even leave Ringo, my pet toad, behind.” A single tear rolls down from Hognose's remaining eye. “At that moment I swore revenge against the beast.” He slams down a radio on the table. Noticing your puzzled look, he explains. “It ate my radio mast. I've been all over Europa, trying to get a signal. If I ever find him, it's—” The radio lets out a series of beeps.
trans-unit.target: “I swam,” Hognose states matter-of-factly. “Grabbed all the O2 I could and hopped on a scooter. Had to even leave Ringo, my pet toad, behind.” A single tear rolls down from Hognose's remaining eye. “At that moment I swore revenge against the beast.” He slams down a radio on the table. Noticing your puzzled look, he explains. “It ate my radio mast. I've been all over Europa, trying to get a signal. If I ever find him, it's—” The radio lets out a series of beeps.

trans-unit.source: “It's here! You have a ship, don't you? Up for a hunt, young one?” Hognose is shaking with excitement. “Well compensated of course.”
trans-unit.target: “It's here! You have a ship, don't you? Up for a hunt, young one?” Hognose is shaking with excitement. “Well compensated of course.”

trans-unit.source: “I knew there was a fight in your generation after all! I'll see you on board.”
trans-unit.target: “I knew there was a fight in your generation after all! I'll see you on board.”

trans-unit.source: An elderly woman waves at you. “Could you be a dear and throw this out for me?” she asks, shoving a handful of trash in your hand.
trans-unit.target: An elderly woman waves at you. “Could you be a dear and throw this out for me?” she asks, shoving a handful of trash in your hand.

trans-unit.source: You're glad to be rid of the old hag's garbage. While unloading your smelly cargo you catch a glimpse of a human finger amid the refuse.
trans-unit.target: You're glad to be rid of the old hag's garbage. While unloading your smelly cargo you catch a glimpse of a human finger amid the refuse.

trans-unit.source: Being up to your elbows in the trash can draws some weird looks from onlookers but they shrug it off. The economy is bad after all. Under all the burger wrappers you can see a lanyard identifying the corpse as a reporter for The Europan, a newspaper of questionable quality. Curiously, their name is scratched out.
trans-unit.target: Being up to your elbows in the trash can draws some weird looks from onlookers but they shrug it off. The economy is bad after all. Under all the burger wrappers you can see a lanyard identifying the corpse as a reporter for The Europan, a newspaper of questionable quality. Curiously, their name is scratched out.

trans-unit.source: You try not to gag at the smell of the garbage and the dead body and rip the tag off. Maybe somebody in security would be interested in this?
trans-unit.target: You try not to gag at the smell of the garbage and the dead body and rip the tag off. Maybe somebody in security would be interested in this?

trans-unit.source: ”I'd like to report a dead body.”
trans-unit.target: ”I'd like to report a dead body.”

trans-unit.source: You show the name tag to the security officer and explain your findings. They scratch their head and sigh. “Look, I've been working security for fifteen years. If a line cook at Irma Burger is found dead, it's probably a crime of passion, an argument gone wrong,” they explain. “The killer may be found, justice dispensed.” They take a look around. Nobody seems to be listening, but the guard continues in whisper: “A reporter is found in the trash, their ID scratched out? You turn a blind eye. There's nothing good to be found in that rabbit hole.”
trans-unit.target: You show the name tag to the security officer and explain your findings. They scratch their head and sigh. “Look, I've been working security for fifteen years. If a line cook at Irma Burger is found dead, it's probably a crime of passion, an argument gone wrong,” they explain. “The killer may be found, justice dispensed.” They take a look around. Nobody seems to be listening, but the guard continues in whisper: “A reporter is found in the trash, their ID scratched out? You turn a blind eye. There's nothing good to be found in that rabbit hole.”

trans-unit.source: The guard raises their voice again. “Thank you for your tip, citizen. Five hunded marks have been deposited to your account.”
trans-unit.target: The guard raises their voice again. “Thank you for your tip, citizen. Five hunded marks have been deposited to your account.”

trans-unit.source: To the guard's dismay, you ask them to elaborate. “Do I need to spell this out for you? Reporters investigate—” Somebody walks by you, and the guard stops mid-sentence, waits for them to pass, then continues: “and more importantly, they report. Somebody clearly didn't want to be reported on.”
trans-unit.target: To the guard's dismay, you ask them to elaborate. “Do I need to spell this out for you? Reporters investigate—” Somebody walks by you, and the guard stops mid-sentence, waits for them to pass, then continues: “and more importantly, they report. Somebody clearly didn't want to be reported on.”

trans-unit.source: The guard rolls their eyes. “You finally get it. There's a nice reward for reporting a dead body. I suggest you take that, buy yourself some opium, or whatever it is you submarine types like and forget about what you saw. I'll take care of the body.”
trans-unit.target: The guard rolls their eyes. “You finally get it. There's a nice reward for reporting a dead body. I suggest you take that, buy yourself some opium, or whatever it is you submarine types like and forget about what you saw. I'll take care of the body.”

trans-unit.source: "What kind of idiot would interrupt our undergoing experiment in the post-ascension stage?!"
trans-unit.target: "What kind of idiot would interrupt our undergoing experiment in the post-ascension stage?!"

trans-unit.source: "Ah, of course it's a non-believer. Look around, open your eyes. Have you noticed society is slowly crumbling? Food on outposts is scarce, populations are thinning."
trans-unit.target: "Ah, of course it's a non-believer. Look around, open your eyes. Have you noticed society is slowly crumbling? Food on outposts is scarce, populations are thinning."

trans-unit.source: "So you decided to speed up our demise?"
trans-unit.target: "So you decided to speed up our demise?"

trans-unit.source: "Our demise? No! Our salvation. Humankind's only way to move beyond slowly being wiped out is by adapting. And the way to adapt is through the Velonaceps calyx, or Husk as you would call it. It takes us beyond the limits of our frail human bodies, makes us something more. A sacrifice now means less deaths in the long-term—probably even preventing the extinction of our whole race! By whatever means necessary!"
trans-unit.target: "Our demise? No! Our salvation. Humankind's only way to move beyond slowly being wiped out is by adapting. And the way to adapt is through the Velonaceps calyx, or Husk as you would call it. It takes us beyond the limits of our frail human bodies, makes us something more. A sacrifice now means less deaths in the long-term—probably even preventing the extinction of our whole race! By whatever means necessary!"

trans-unit.source: "The Husk may be the way forward, but not like this… Through voluntary experiments and real science in labs, we'll find our way."
trans-unit.target: "The Husk may be the way forward, but not like this… Through voluntary experiments and real science in labs, we'll find our way."

trans-unit.source: "We will find a way to survive. I'd prefer it to be without a parasite in my throat."
trans-unit.target: "We will find a way to survive. I'd prefer it to be without a parasite in my throat."

trans-unit.source: "You may have a point… We'll leave you be."
trans-unit.target: "You may have a point… We'll leave you be."

trans-unit.source: "Brothers, you are clearly misguided. The mess you've made here isn't what an Ascension looks like."
trans-unit.target: "Brothers, you are clearly misguided. The mess you've made here isn't what an Ascension looks like."

trans-unit.source: "Oh, so you're one of the cowards who pretend to be on the way to Ascension, but are too afraid to take a proper dive to the deep end? Perhaps we need to silence those weak little human thoughts and give you a little push over the edge?"
trans-unit.target: "Oh, so you're one of the cowards who pretend to be on the way to Ascension, but are too afraid to take a proper dive to the deep end? Perhaps we need to silence those weak little human thoughts and give you a little push over the edge?"

trans-unit.source: "The kind that has a post-shotgun to the face experiment prepared for you."
trans-unit.target: "The kind that has a post-shotgun to the face experiment prepared for you."

trans-unit.source: Increase submarine hull durability. Makes the walls less vulnerable to damage and allows the submarine to dive deeper without getting crushed by pressure.
trans-unit.target: Increase submarine hull durability. Makes the walls less vulnerable to damage and allows the submarine to dive deeper without getting crushed by pressure.

trans-unit.source: Equipment will take longer to start deteriorating.
trans-unit.target: Equipment will take longer to start deteriorating.

trans-unit.source: Decrease the amount of time and skill needed to repair equipment.
trans-unit.target: Decrease the amount of time and skill needed to repair equipment.

trans-unit.source: Decrease the skill level required to repair items.
trans-unit.target: Decrease the skill level required to repair items.

trans-unit.source: Decrease the time needed to fabricate items, but increase power usage.
trans-unit.target: Decrease the time needed to fabricate items, but increase power usage.

trans-unit.source: Lower the skill levels required for item fabrication.
trans-unit.target: Lower the skill levels required for item fabrication.

trans-unit.source: Items will be deconstructed faster. Power usage increased slightly.
trans-unit.target: Items will be deconstructed faster. Power usage increased slightly.

trans-unit.source: Increase the rotation rate of all guns when operated by insufficiently skilled crew.
trans-unit.target: Increase the rotation rate of all guns when operated by insufficiently skilled crew.

trans-unit.source: Increase the view range of all weapons.
trans-unit.target: Increase the view range of all weapons.

trans-unit.source: Increase the amount of oxygen generated.
trans-unit.target: Increase the amount of oxygen generated.

trans-unit.source: Decrease fuel consumption rate. Increase the time reactors can stay at critical temperature before meltdown.
trans-unit.target: Decrease fuel consumption rate. Increase the time reactors can stay at critical temperature before meltdown.

trans-unit.source: Increase the time reactors can stay at critical temperature before meltdown.
trans-unit.target: Increase the time reactors can stay at critical temperature before meltdown.

trans-unit.source: Increase the speed at which water is pumped in or out of the sub. Decreases pumps' power consumption.
trans-unit.target: Increase the speed at which water is pumped in or out of the sub. Decreases pumps' power consumption.

trans-unit.source: Decrease the probability of fires occurring.
trans-unit.target: Decrease the probability of fires occurring.

trans-unit.source: Resist damage from excessive voltage. Decrease the probability of fires occurring.
trans-unit.target: Resist damage from excessive voltage. Decrease the probability of fires occurring.

trans-unit.source: Increases the maximum condition of the item, making it deteriorate more slowly and withstand more damage.
trans-unit.target: Increases the maximum condition of the item, making it deteriorate more slowly and withstand more damage.

trans-unit.source: Significantly increases submarine hull durability. Makes the walls less vulnerable to damage and allows the submarine to dive deeper without getting crushed by pressure.
trans-unit.target: Significantly increases submarine hull durability. Makes the walls less vulnerable to damage and allows the submarine to dive deeper without getting crushed by pressure.

trans-unit.source: Substantially increases submarine hull durability. Makes the walls less vulnerable to damage and allows the submarine to dive to abyssal depths.
trans-unit.target: Substantially increases submarine hull durability. Makes the walls less vulnerable to damage and allows the submarine to dive to abyssal depths.

trans-unit.source: Displays locations of minerals on Navigation Terminals and Sonar Monitors.
trans-unit.target: Displays locations of minerals on Navigation Terminals and Sonar Monitors.

trans-unit.source: This upgrade category is not applicable for the selected submarine.
trans-unit.target: This upgrade category is not applicable for the selected submarine.

trans-unit.source: Do you want to purchase "[upgradename]" for [amount] marks?
trans-unit.target: Do you want to purchase "[upgradename]" for [amount] marks?

trans-unit.source: Do you want to purchase a [itemtoinstall] for [amount] marks?
trans-unit.target: Do you want to purchase a [itemtoinstall] for [amount] marks?

trans-unit.source: Do you want to cancel the installation of [itemtouninstall]?
trans-unit.target: Do you want to cancel the installation of [itemtouninstall]?

trans-unit.source: Do you want to cancel the uninstallation of [itemtouninstall]?
trans-unit.target: Do you want to cancel the uninstallation of [itemtouninstall]?

trans-unit.source: Do you want to repair all items on the submarine for [amount] marks?
trans-unit.target: Do you want to repair all items on the submarine for [amount] marks?

trans-unit.source: Do you want to repair all hulls on the submarine for [amount] marks?
trans-unit.target: Do you want to repair all hulls on the submarine for [amount] marks?

trans-unit.source: Do you want to replace lost shuttles for [amount] marks?

trans-unit.target: Your previous vote was rejected. You need to wait at least [time] seconds before you can vote again.

trans-unit.source: The autocratic de facto superpower of Europa, with a distributed bureaucracy and an iron grip on the resources, manufacturing and power within Europan society. They rule by fear, and have a reputation for shutting disobedient colonies and outposts out of the supply loop, or simply subjugating them by direct force. Their motivation is ultimately to preserve humanity, but at any cost, and preferably with the status quo left intact.
trans-unit.target: The autocratic de facto superpower of Europa, with a distributed bureaucracy and an iron grip on the resources, manufacturing and power within Europan society. They rule by fear, and have a reputation for shutting disobedient colonies and outposts out of the supply loop, or simply subjugating them by direct force. Their motivation is ultimately to preserve humanity, but at any cost, and preferably with the status quo left intact.

trans-unit.source: The autocratic de facto superpower of Europa, with a distributed bureaucracy and an iron grip on the resources, manufacturing and power within Europan society.
trans-unit.target: The autocratic de facto superpower of Europa, with a distributed bureaucracy and an iron grip on the resources, manufacturing and power within Europan society.

trans-unit.source: Every once in a while, these minstrels, fools and clowns attempt to form unions, and names like "Europan Jesters' Association" pop up. In truth, the Honkmother's children are a less-than-organized lot who simply heed the call of the bikehorn.
trans-unit.target: Every once in a while, these minstrels, fools and clowns attempt to form unions, and names like "Europan Jesters' Association" pop up. In truth, the Honkmother's children are a less-than-organized lot who simply heed the call of the bikehorn.

trans-unit.source: The Honkmother's children are an unorganized lot who simply heed the call of the bikehorn.
trans-unit.target: The Honkmother's children are an unorganized lot who simply heed the call of the bikehorn.

trans-unit.source: A small, underground organization seeking a more democratic society by any means, from petty resistance to full-blown terrorism, all with the end goal of disrupting the ability of the Europa Coalition to function, and to undermine its authority.
trans-unit.target: A small, underground organization seeking a more democratic society by any means, from petty resistance to full-blown terrorism, all with the end goal of disrupting the ability of the Europa Coalition to function, and to undermine its authority.

trans-unit.source: A small, underground organization seeking a more democratic society by any means, from petty resistance to full-blown terrorism.
trans-unit.target: A small, underground organization seeking a more democratic society by any means, from petty resistance to full-blown terrorism.

trans-unit.source: A mysterious and outlawed religious group with a transhumanist twist, they seek "communion" with the husk parasite in order to usher in a new kind of humanity, one more capable of surviving in this harsh environment, more in tune with the local ecosystem, and devoid of pride, hatred, fear, or complex thought. Hated equally by the Europa Coalition and the Jovian separatists.
trans-unit.target: A mysterious and outlawed religious group with a transhumanist twist, they seek "communion" with the husk parasite in order to usher in a new kind of humanity, one more capable of surviving in this harsh environment, more in tune with the local ecosystem, and devoid of pride, hatred, fear, or complex thought. Hated equally by the Europa Coalition and the Jovian separatists.

trans-unit.source: A religious group that seeks 'communion' with the husk parasite in order to usher in a new kind of humanity, one more capable of surviving in this harsh environment.
trans-unit.target: A religious group that seeks 'communion' with the husk parasite in order to usher in a new kind of humanity, one more capable of surviving in this harsh environment.

trans-unit.source:
In the late 20th century, it was discovered that under the icy, irradiated surface of Jupiter's moon Europa lies a vast sea capable of sustaining life. This discovery sent shockwaves through the scientific community.

In the year 2022, the first manned space flight arrived on Europa to discover that the moon was indeed already sustaining life, in the form of hostile sub-aquatic fauna. Besides the wildlife, the researchers faced gruelling difficulties posed by the dangerous radiation emitted from Jupiter and the intense cold and tremendous pressure of the Europan ocean.

Despite all their hardships, Earth-born colonists were able to construct a handful of habitable outposts where a new way of life developed over many decades. A new system of governance was formed by a coalition of the largest, most influential cities on the moon. Different industries made their mark in the new world, including mining, manufacturing and chemical laboratories.

Over the years, Europan society became more and more dissociated from Earth. Fifty years ago, contact was lost entirely, and no more supply ships have arrived since.

Sub-aquatic travel and vehicles are in a key role in this new society, scouting for new inhabitable locations, protecting citizens from creature attacks and establishing supply lines between stations as humanity ventures ever deeper to evade the lethal radiation from Jupiter above. The life of a crewmember aboard one of these submarines is a lucrative one, albeit dangerous and often short.

You have enlisted to serve on a yyyy-class submarine, docked at xxxx. The waters of Europa open up before you—explore, help expand the colonies, and make of this place what you will.
trans-unit.target:
In the late 20th century, it was discovered that under the icy, irradiated surface of Jupiter's moon Europa lies a vast sea capable of sustaining life. This discovery sent shockwaves through the scientific community.

In the year 2022, the first manned space flight arrived on Europa to discover that the moon was indeed already sustaining life, in the form of hostile sub-aquatic fauna. Besides the wildlife, the researchers faced gruelling difficulties posed by the dangerous radiation emitted from Jupiter and the intense cold and tremendous pressure of the Europan ocean.

Despite all their hardships, Earth-born colonists were able to construct a handful of habitable outposts where a new way of life developed over many decades. A new system of governance was formed by a coalition of the largest, most influential cities on the moon. Different industries made their mark in the new world, including mining, manufacturing and chemical laboratories.

Over the years, Europan society became more and more dissociated from Earth. Fifty years ago, contact was lost entirely, and no more supply ships have arrived since.

Sub-aquatic travel and vehicles are in a key role in this new society, scouting for new inhabitable locations, protecting citizens from creature attacks and establishing supply lines between stations as humanity ventures ever deeper to evade the lethal radiation from Jupiter above. The life of a crewmember aboard one of these submarines is a lucrative one, albeit dangerous and often short.

You have enlisted to serve on a yyyy-class submarine, docked at xxxx. The waters of Europa open up before you—explore, help expand the colonies, and make of this place what you will.

trans-unit.source: Hints of what are to come flash before your eyes: a crystalline space, something coiled within itself slumbering fitfully. But you are not yet ready to fully experience this. Your fate is still being woven by the Undertow.
trans-unit.target: Hints of what are to come flash before your eyes: a crystalline space, something coiled within itself slumbering fitfully. But you are not yet ready to fully experience this. Your fate is still being woven by the Undertow.

trans-unit.source: Everything fades to black in this moment... You've just been commissioned by the Europa Coalition at xxxx to serve aboard a yyyy class sub. The waters of Europa open up before you, ever deadlier. A sense of déjà vu overcomes you—have you done this all before?
trans-unit.target: Everything fades to black in this moment... You've just been commissioned by the Europa Coalition at xxxx to serve aboard a yyyy class sub. The waters of Europa open up before you, ever deadlier. A sense of déjà vu overcomes you—have you done this all before?

trans-unit.source: Having reached the end, your adventure restarts from a new beginning, this time with greater peril in store for you.
trans-unit.target: Having reached the end, your adventure restarts from a new beginning, this time with greater peril in store for you.

trans-unit.source: As the intensity of the Jovian radiation effect increases, shallower regions of Europa will gradually become uninhabitable and unsafe to travel. Make your way to deeper waters to avoid it.
trans-unit.target: As the intensity of the Jovian radiation effect increases, shallower regions of Europa will gradually become uninhabitable and unsafe to travel. Make your way to deeper waters to avoid it.

trans-unit.source: How many instances of this module can be used in the same outpost.
trans-unit.target: How many instances of this module can be used in the same outpost.

trans-unit.source: Outposts are generated from a combination of outpost modules. If you want your custom modules to be used in outpost generation, you must add them to a content package (i.e. your mod) after saving.
trans-unit.target: Outposts are generated from a combination of outpost modules. If you want your custom modules to be used in outpost generation, you must add them to a content package (i.e. your mod) after saving.

trans-unit.source: The area beyond this door is flooded with water under high pressure. Proceeding without a diving suit may be dangerous.
trans-unit.target: The area beyond this door is flooded with water under high pressure. Proceeding without a diving suit may be dangerous.

trans-unit.source: A nearby room is currently filled with water. You might need to bring some diving gear with you.
trans-unit.target: A nearby room is currently filled with water. You might need to bring some diving gear with you.

trans-unit.source: You've developed an affliction. Afflictions can be treated by pressing [key] to open the medical interface.
trans-unit.target: You've developed an affliction. Afflictions can be treated by pressing [key] to open the medical interface.

trans-unit.source: The autopilot has navigated the sub to the outpost. Switch to manual control to move closer to the docking port.
trans-unit.target: The autopilot has navigated the sub to the outpost. Switch to manual control to move closer to the docking port.

trans-unit.source: You have returned to the beginning of the level. Select a new destination to continue your journey, or close the map by pressing Esc.
trans-unit.target: You have returned to the beginning of the level. Select a new destination to continue your journey, or close the map by pressing Esc.

trans-unit.source: You have reached the end of the level. Select a new destination to continue your journey.
trans-unit.target: You have reached the end of the level. Select a new destination to continue your journey.

trans-unit.source: The character you were controlling has died. Switch to another crewmember by opening the crew list to the top left of the screen and clicking on a portrait.
trans-unit.target: The character you were controlling has died. Switch to another crewmember by opening the crew list to the top left of the screen and clicking on a portrait.

trans-unit.source: The character you were controlling has fallen unconscious. You can either wait for another crewmember to heal you or give in by clicking on the button on the top of the screen.
trans-unit.target: The character you were controlling has fallen unconscious. You can either wait for another crewmember to heal you or give in by clicking on the button on the top of the screen.

trans-unit.source: You have equipped diving gear that lacks a sufficient oxygen source. Put in a new oxygen tank before using this gear.
trans-unit.target: You have equipped diving gear that lacks a sufficient oxygen source. Put in a new oxygen tank before using this gear.

trans-unit.source: You have been handcuffed and your capability to move or interact is limited. Someone else needs to uncuff you.
trans-unit.target: You have been handcuffed and your capability to move or interact is limited. Someone else needs to uncuff you.

trans-unit.source: Adding more than one fuel rod to the reactor is useful for jump starting it when it's submerged but will produce a dangerous rate of reaction under normal operation.
trans-unit.target: Adding more than one fuel rod to the reactor is useful for jump starting it when it's submerged but will produce a dangerous rate of reaction under normal operation.

trans-unit.source: The reactor has run out of fuel and the sub will run out of power. Replace the fuel rod to get power back on.
trans-unit.target: The reactor has run out of fuel and the sub will run out of power. Replace the fuel rod to get power back on.

trans-unit.source: Failing to repair a device can cause you harm. Characters more skillful in mechanical or electrical repairs are more likely to succeed.
trans-unit.target: Failing to repair a device can cause you harm. Characters more skillful in mechanical or electrical repairs are more likely to succeed.

trans-unit.source: Turn on the voice chat in the setting if you want to communicate using your microphone.
trans-unit.target: Turn on the voice chat in the setting if you want to communicate using your microphone.

trans-unit.source: You'll need to aim by holding [key] before using this.
trans-unit.target: You'll need to aim by holding [key] before using this.

trans-unit.source: Use the campaign map to select your next destination. After picking a destination, you can choose the mission you want to undertake.
trans-unit.target: Use the campaign map to select your next destination. After picking a destination, you can choose the mission you want to undertake.

trans-unit.source: Use the command wheel to issue commands to other crewmembers. Choose an order category, then the order. A suitable person will be assigned for the job.
trans-unit.target: Use the command wheel to issue commands to other crewmembers. Choose an order category, then the order. A suitable person will be assigned for the job.

trans-unit.source: This is the health interface. Choose a body part to see the afflictions affecting that part. Drag medical items from your inventory to administer them to a body part.
trans-unit.target: This is the health interface. Choose a body part to see the afflictions affecting that part. Drag medical items from your inventory to administer them to a body part.

trans-unit.source: Sonar is picking up a moving target. Make sure the sub's guns are manned and try to manouver so that your gunners have a clear shot.
trans-unit.target: Sonar is picking up a moving target. Make sure the sub's guns are manned and try to manouver so that your gunners have a clear shot.

trans-unit.source: You're playing an assistant. Assistants are a jack-of-all-trades class. Be helpful where you can and develop your skills.
trans-unit.target: You're playing an assistant. Assistants are a jack-of-all-trades class. Be helpful where you can and develop your skills.

trans-unit.source: You're playing a captain. You should make your way to the command room and start navigating the submarine to the destination.
trans-unit.target: You're playing a captain. You should make your way to the command room and start navigating the submarine to the destination.

trans-unit.source: You're playing an engineer. Engineers are responsible for keeping the submarine powered at all times. To do that, tend to the reactor and keep electrical equipment in good condition by repairing them.
trans-unit.target: You're playing an engineer. Engineers are responsible for keeping the submarine powered at all times. To do that, tend to the reactor and keep electrical equipment in good condition by repairing them.

trans-unit.source: You're playing a mechanic. You should keep an eye out on all the devices on the submarine and repair them if they break.
trans-unit.target: You're playing a mechanic. You should keep an eye out on all the devices on the submarine and repair them if they break.

trans-unit.source: You're playing a medical doctor. Take care of your fellow crew and treat their injuries if they hurt themselves.
trans-unit.target: You're playing a medical doctor. Take care of your fellow crew and treat their injuries if they hurt themselves.

trans-unit.source: You're playing a security officer. Take inventory of the weapons on board the submarine, arm the turrets in case of an enemy attack and keep the rowdy crewmembers in line.
trans-unit.target: You're playing a security officer. Take inventory of the weapons on board the submarine, arm the turrets in case of an enemy attack and keep the rowdy crewmembers in line.

trans-unit.source: All devices on a sub will gradually break down over time, as this one has, and must be maintained for peak operating performance. Equip a screwdriver to repair electrical devices, and a wrench to repair mechanical ones.
trans-unit.target: All devices on a sub will gradually break down over time, as this one has, and must be maintained for peak operating performance. Equip a screwdriver to repair electrical devices, and a wrench to repair mechanical ones.

trans-unit.source: Items with a red hand icon belong to someone else. If you take them, there will be consequences to deal with.
trans-unit.target: Items with a red hand icon belong to someone else. If you take them, there will be consequences to deal with.

trans-unit.source: This periscope controls a submarine weapon. Use the mouse to look around and press [shootkey] to fire and [deselectkey] or "ESC" to stop.
trans-unit.target: This periscope controls a submarine weapon. Use the mouse to look around and press [shootkey] to fire and [deselectkey] or "ESC" to stop.

trans-unit.source: Use the deconstructor to break down items to their components. Insert an item to the input slot and press "Deconstruct" to start the process.
trans-unit.target: Use the deconstructor to break down items to their components. Insert an item to the input slot and press "Deconstruct" to start the process.

trans-unit.source: Use the fabricator to craft items. Choose an item from the list, and if you have the required items in your inventory, press "Create" to start fabricating.
trans-unit.target: Use the fabricator to craft items. Choose an item from the list, and if you have the required items in your inventory, press "Create" to start fabricating.

trans-unit.source: This loader must be loaded with ammunition for the linked submarine weapon.
trans-unit.target: This loader must be loaded with ammunition for the linked submarine weapon.

trans-unit.source: You can plot a course for the sub, set the autopilot, control the sonar, and monitor a side view of the sonar returns from here. Click on the sonar view to select direction. Use Mouse scroll wheel to zoom in and out.
trans-unit.target: You can plot a course for the sub, set the autopilot, control the sonar, and monitor a side view of the sonar returns from here. Click on the sonar view to select direction. Use Mouse scroll wheel to zoom in and out.

trans-unit.source: Nuclear reactors provide power to your devices. Try to keep the "load" and "output" the same, otherwise you'll likely suffer from blackouts or power spikes that damage your devices.
trans-unit.target: Nuclear reactors provide power to your devices. Try to keep the "load" and "output" the same, otherwise you'll likely suffer from blackouts or power spikes that damage your devices.

trans-unit.source: You just stole something. This has hurt your reputation, and worse still, security will need to deal with you.
trans-unit.target: You just stole something. This has hurt your reputation, and worse still, security will need to deal with you.

trans-unit.source: The door has been welded shut. You need a plasma cutter to open it.
trans-unit.target: The door has been welded shut. You need a plasma cutter to open it.

trans-unit.source: You're welding a door shut. Once it's completely welded, you'll need to use a plasma cutter or crowbar to get it open again.
trans-unit.target: You're welding a door shut. Once it's completely welded, you'll need to use a plasma cutter or crowbar to get it open again.

trans-unit.source: If you wish, you can play as any of your crew by opening the crew list to the top left of the screen and clicking on a portrait.
trans-unit.target: If you wish, you can play as any of your crew by opening the crew list to the top left of the screen and clicking on a portrait.

trans-unit.source: You can give orders to the crew via the command wheel, which is displayed with [commandkey].
trans-unit.target: You can give orders to the crew via the command wheel, which is displayed with [commandkey].

trans-unit.source: Press [infotabkey] to open the info tab where you can find information about things like your crew, your mission, and your reputation.
trans-unit.target: Press [infotabkey] to open the info tab where you can find information about things like your crew, your mission, and your reputation.

trans-unit.source: You have a toolbelt equipped. Hover over the icon in your inventory to access the toolbelt inventory.
trans-unit.target: You have a toolbelt equipped. Hover over the icon in your inventory to access the toolbelt inventory.

trans-unit.source: One of the ballast pumps is infected with ballast flora. Destroy the root with fire to kill it.
trans-unit.target: One of the ballast pumps is infected with ballast flora. Destroy the root with fire to kill it.

trans-unit.source: You've found a mass of unidentified alien genetic material. You can use a research station to process it into something that can be inserted into a Gene Splicer—a device that can be used to augment people with non-human abilities.
trans-unit.target: You've found a mass of unidentified alien genetic material. You can use a research station to process it into something that can be inserted into a Gene Splicer—a device that can be used to augment people with non-human abilities.

trans-unit.source: You've obtained a vial of identified alien genetic material. You can use it with a Gene Splicer, combine it with genetic material of the same type in a Research Station to refine it and boost it's effectiveness, or combine it with a genetic material of different type to combine their effects.
trans-unit.target: You've obtained a vial of identified alien genetic material. You can use it with a Gene Splicer, combine it with genetic material of the same type in a Research Station to refine it and boost it's effectiveness, or combine it with a genetic material of different type to combine their effects.

trans-unit.source: You are approaching a depth of 4,000 meters, after which normal diving suits will not be adequate to protect you from the pressure. You should try to obtain better ones, such as combat or abyss suits.
trans-unit.target: You are approaching a depth of 4,000 meters, after which normal diving suits will not be adequate to protect you from the pressure. You should try to obtain better ones, such as combat or abyss suits.

trans-unit.source: You have been assigned a traitor objective. If you complete the objective successfully, you'll be given a reward and potentially a more difficult (and dangerous) traitor objective later.
trans-unit.target: You have been assigned a traitor objective. If you complete the objective successfully, you'll be given a reward and potentially a more difficult (and dangerous) traitor objective later.

trans-unit.source: Be discreet! Others in the crew can vote on who they suspect to be a traitor, and if the majority of the crew suspects you, the objective will fail and you will receive no rewards.
trans-unit.target: Be discreet! Others in the crew can vote on who they suspect to be a traitor, and if the majority of the crew suspects you, the objective will fail and you will receive no rewards.

trans-unit.source: There may be traitors in the crew. If a traitor completes their objective successfully, they might get to steal portions of the mission reward and experience points gained by the rest of the crew.
trans-unit.target: There may be traitors in the crew. If a traitor completes their objective successfully, they might get to steal portions of the mission reward and experience points gained by the rest of the crew.

trans-unit.source: You can suspect someone as the traitor by clicking the traitor icon in the crew list. If most of the crew correctly suspects the traitor, the traitor's objective will fail and they will not receive any rewards. But if the suspicions fall on an innocent player, the crew will need to pay a fine.
trans-unit.target: You can suspect someone as the traitor by clicking the traitor icon in the crew list. If most of the crew correctly suspects the traitor, the traitor's objective will fail and they will not receive any rewards. But if the suspicions fall on an innocent player, the crew will need to pay a fine.

trans-unit.source: Following Barotrauma’s release on Epic Games Store, Barotrauma uses Epic Online Services (EOS) to enable crossplay between Steam and Epic Games Store users. Crossplay between platforms makes it possible to host and join servers seamlessly between players on Steam and Epic.
trans-unit.target: Following Barotrauma’s release on Epic Games Store, Barotrauma uses Epic Online Services (EOS) to enable crossplay between Steam and Epic Games Store users. Crossplay between platforms makes it possible to host and join servers seamlessly between players on Steam and Epic.

trans-unit.source: To enable crossplay, you are not required to create an Epic Games account. However, the crossplay feature requires sharing your SteamID and display name with the EOS backend. Additionally, joining servers hosted by Epic players may also require Steam authentication tickets to be sent to the host to verify your identity using your SteamID (and if applicable, such as when playing Barotrauma through Steam Family Sharing, the SteamID of the account that owns the copy of Barotrauma that you are using).
trans-unit.target: To enable crossplay, you are not required to create an Epic Games account. However, the crossplay feature requires sharing your SteamID and display name with the EOS backend. Additionally, joining servers hosted by Epic players may also require Steam authentication tickets to be sent to the host to verify your identity using your SteamID (and if applicable, such as when playing Barotrauma through Steam Family Sharing, the SteamID of the account that owns the copy of Barotrauma that you are using).

trans-unit.source: By enabling crossplay, you agree that your Steam account will be registered in EOS’ backend for authentication purposes.
trans-unit.target: By enabling crossplay, you agree that your Steam account will be registered in EOS’ backend for authentication purposes.

trans-unit.source:
Hello, and welcome to Barotrauma! By default, we do not collect any information about you. If you would like to keep it that way, please click "No" below.

If you would like to let us use your gameplay statistics to improve Barotrauma , click "Yes" to give us permission to collect some data. See a full list of gameplay data we will collect further down. We will store your consent and a hash of your Epic Account ID in our own database, but your information will always be handled anonymously when we use it for development.

To make use of these statistics, we employ the services of GameAnalytics Ltd. and comply with their terms of service. Thus, if you give us permission to use your gameplay data, you must also give permission to GameAnalytics to use your data for quality management and analytics purposes.

You can always change your choice regarding this consent in the game settings. For more information about privacy related to GameAnalytics Ltd., please see the following webpage: ‖color:255,255,255,255‖https://gameanalytics.com/privacy/‖end‖

Please review our privacy policy below:
trans-unit.target:

We will store your consent and a hash of your Epic Account ID in our own database, but your information will always be handled anonymously when we use it for development.

To make use of these statistics, we employ the services of GameAnalytics Ltd. and comply with their terms of service. Thus, if you give us permission to use your gameplay data, you must also give permission to GameAnalytics to use your data for quality management and analytics purposes.

You can always change your choice regarding this consent in the game settings. For more information about privacy related to GameAnalytics Ltd., please see the following webpage: ‖color:255,255,255,255‖https://gameanalytics.com/privacy/‖end‖
